union select 'Thousand' T, 1000 V
union select 'Lacs' T, 100000 V

select mcode v, lpad(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY mcode desc),3,0)||'. '||month_name d from admmonth where mcode >= (select month_code from sys_cube_backfill_month where sys_cube_name ='stk_book_summary') and mcode <= (select mcode from admmonth where current_date between dtfr and dtto) union all select mcode v, 'Current Month' d from admmonth where current_date between dtfr and dtto union all select mcode v,'Previous Month' d from admmonth where (current_date - INTERVAL '1 month')::date between dtfr and dtto

parameter_dropdown.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 13-03-2023 12:14:34 (QP5 v5.294) */ SELECT cube_code || ' | ' || CUBE_USRDFN_NAME || CASE WHEN asondt IS NULL THEN ' | ' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (dtfr), 'DD/MM/YYYY') || ' To ' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (dtto), 'DD/MM/YYYY') ELSE ' | ASON: ' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (asondt), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END||' | ' || TO_CHAR (REPORT_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:SS') N, cube_code C FROM OLAP_DATACUBE a, OLAP_DATACUBE_LIST b WHERE a.CODE = b.DATACUBE_CODE AND cube_name = '@MasterCube@'

SELECT DISTINCT NAME N, CODE V FROM ginview.LV_ARAP_SUB_LEDGER WHERE Extinct = 'No' Union SELECT 'ALL' N, -1 V
select code V, name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name T from ginview.LV_SUB_LEDGER --select CODE V, name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name T from ginview.LV_SUB_LEDGER

'||n n, C C from (select YEAR_NAME N, CODE C from GINVIEW.LV_ACCOUNTING_YEAR WHERE YEAR_NAME = '@CurrentFiscalYear@' union select YEAR_NAME N, CODE C from GINVIEW.LV_ACCOUNTING_YEAR WHERE YEAR_NAME = CASE WHEN YEAR_NAME='@CurrentFiscalYear@' THEN null ELSE YEAR_NAME END ORDER BY 2) a

entity.object_description: TBD
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT NULL requestid, /*DENSE_RANK () OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM) uk,*/ row_number() over() uk, TAG_AGCODE TAG_AGENT_CODE, TAG_AGENT, DOC_PARTY_CODE, DOC_PARTY, PARTY_CRDAYS, DOC_NO, DOC_DT, DOC_DT::date - TAG_DT::date DAYS_DIFF, coalesce (DOC_AMT, 0) DOC_AMT, TAG_POST_CODE, TAG_NO, TAG_DT, coalesce (TAG_AMT, 0) TAG_AMT, coalesce (TAG_GRSAMT, 0) TAG_GRSAMT, coalesce (TAG_NETAMT, 0) TAG_NETAMT, CASE WHEN TAG_AGRATE = 0 THEN to_number(coalesce(nullif('@CommissionRate@',''),'0'),'9G999g999999999999d99') ELSE TAG_AGRATE END TAG_AGRATE, coalesce (CHG_AMT, 0) CHG_AMT, CASE WHEN coalesce (TAG_NETAMT, 0) > 0 THEN ROUND ( ( ( (coalesce (TAG_GRSAMT, 0) + coalesce (CHG_AMT, 0)) / coalesce (TAG_NETAMT, 0)) * coalesce (TAG_AMT, 0)), 2) WHEN coalesce (TAG_NETAMT, 0) < 0 THEN ROUND ( ( ( (coalesce (TAG_GRSAMT, 0) + coalesce (CHG_AMT, 0)) / coalesce (TAG_NETAMT, 0)) * coalesce (TAG_AMT, 0) * (-1)), 2) END commission_value, CASE WHEN to_number(nullif('@AllowGraceDays@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 THEN ROUND ( ( ( ( (coalesce (TAG_GRSAMT, 0) + coalesce (CHG_AMT, 0)) / coalesce (TAG_NETAMT, 0)) * coalesce (TAG_AMT, 0)) * CASE WHEN coalesce (TAG_AGRATE, 0) = 0 THEN coalesce (to_number(nullif('@CommissionRate@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0) ELSE coalesce (TAG_AGRATE, 0) END / 100), 2) WHEN to_number(nullif('@AllowGraceDays@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN CASE WHEN SIGN ( (DOC_DT::date - TAG_DT::date) - coalesce (PARTY_CRDAYS, coalesce (to_number(nullif('@CreditPeriod@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0))) = 1 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND ( ( ( ( (coalesce (TAG_GRSAMT, 0) + coalesce (CHG_AMT, 0)) / coalesce (TAG_NETAMT, 0)) * coalesce (TAG_AMT, 0)) * CASE WHEN TAG_AGRATE = 0 THEN coalesce (to_number(nullif('@CommissionRate@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0) ELSE TAG_AGRATE END / 100), 2) END END COMMISION FROM ( SELECT SUB_LEDGER DOC_PARTY, V_FIN.SLCODE DOC_PARTY_CODE, POSTING_CODE DOC_POST_CODE, DISPLAY_DOCNO DOC_NO, COALESCE (CRDAYS, COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@CreditPeriod@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0)) PARTY_CRDAYS, DOCUMENT_DATE DOC_DT, CASE WHEN (COALESCE (to_number(DEBIT,'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0) = 0) THEN COALESCE (to_number(CREDIT,'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0) ELSE COALESCE (to_number(DEBIT,'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0) END DOC_AMT FROM V_FIN INNER JOIN FINSL ON (V_FIN.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where V_FIN.ENTRY_TYPE = 'VDP' AND ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND V_FIN.DOCUMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) DOC inner join (SELECT TAG_AGENT, TAG_POST_CODE, TAG_NO, TAG_DT, TAG_AMT, TAG_GRSAMT, TAG_NETAMT, TAG_AGCODE, TAG_AGRATE, TAG_INVCODE FROM ( SELECT COALESCE (SLNAME, 'No Agent') TAG_AGENT, POSTCODE1 TAG_POST_CODE, SALINVMAIN.SCHEME_DOCNO TAG_NO, ENTDT TAG_DT, AMOUNT TAG_AMT, GRSAMT TAG_GRSAMT, NETAMT TAG_NETAMT, SALINVMAIN.AGCODE TAG_AGCODE, COALESCE (SALINVMAIN.AGRATE, 0) TAG_AGRATE, INVCODE TAG_INVCODE FROM FINTAG INNER JOIN FINPOST ON (POSTCODE2 = POSTCODE) INNER JOIN SALINVMAIN ON (ENTCODE::int = INVCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (SALINVMAIN.AGCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where SALINVMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( salinvmain.pcode IN (SELECT slcode FROM finsl WHERE slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) AND FINPOST.ENTTYPE = 'SIM' UNION ALL SELECT COALESCE (SLNAME, 'No Agent') TAG_AGENT, POSTCODE1 TAG_POST_CODE, SALINVJRNMAIN.SCHEME_DOCNO TAG_NO, ENTDT TAG_DT, AMOUNT TAG_AMT, SALINVJRNMAIN.GRSAMT TAG_GRSAMT, SALINVJRNMAIN.NETAMT TAG_NETAMT, SALINVMAIN.AGCODE TAG_AGCODE, COALESCE (SALINVMAIN.AGRATE, 0) TAG_AGRATE, JRNCODE TAG_INVCODE FROM FINTAG INNER JOIN FINPOST ON (POSTCODE2 = POSTCODE) INNER JOIN SALINVJRNMAIN ON (ENTCODE::int = JRNCODE) INNER JOIN SALINVMAIN ON (INVCODE = SALINVMAIN_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (SALINVMAIN.AGCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where SALINVMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( salinvmain.pcode IN (SELECT slcode FROM finsl WHERE slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) AND FINPOST.ENTTYPE = 'SDM' UNION ALL SELECT COALESCE (SLNAME, 'No Agent') TAG_AGENT, POSTCODE2 TAG_POST_CODE, SALINVMAIN.SCHEME_DOCNO TAG_NO, ENTDT TAG_DT, AMOUNT TAG_AMT, GRSAMT TAG_GRSAMT, NETAMT TAG_NETAMT, SALINVMAIN.AGCODE TAG_AGCODE, COALESCE (SALINVMAIN.AGRATE, 0) TAG_AGRATE, INVCODE TAG_INVCODE FROM FINTAG INNER JOIN FINPOST ON (POSTCODE1 = POSTCODE) INNER JOIN SALINVMAIN ON (ENTCODE::int = INVCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (SALINVMAIN.AGCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where SALINVMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( salinvmain.pcode IN (SELECT slcode FROM finsl WHERE slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) AND FINPOST.ENTTYPE = 'SIM' UNION ALL SELECT COALESCE (SLNAME, 'No Agent') TAG_AGENT, POSTCODE2 TAG_POST_CODE, SALINVJRNMAIN.SCHEME_DOCNO TAG_NO, ENTDT TAG_DT, AMOUNT TAG_AMT, SALINVJRNMAIN.GRSAMT TAG_GRSAMT, SALINVJRNMAIN.NETAMT TAG_NETAMT, SALINVMAIN.AGCODE TAG_AGCODE, COALESCE (SALINVMAIN.AGRATE, 0) TAG_AGRATE, JRNCODE TAG_INVCODE FROM FINTAG INNER JOIN FINPOST ON (POSTCODE1 = POSTCODE) INNER JOIN SALINVJRNMAIN ON (ENTCODE::int = JRNCODE) INNER JOIN SALINVMAIN ON (INVCODE = SALINVMAIN_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (SALINVMAIN.AGCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where SALINVMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( salinvmain.pcode IN (SELECT slcode FROM finsl WHERE slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) AND FINPOST.ENTTYPE = 'SDM' UNION ALL SELECT COALESCE (SLNAME, 'No Agent') TAG_AGENT, POSTCODE1 TAG_POST_CODE, SALRTMAIN.SCHEME_DOCNO TAG_NO, ENTDT TAG_DT, AMOUNT TAG_AMT, (-1) * GRSAMT TAG_GRSAMT, (-1) * NETAMT TAG_NETAMT, SALRTMAIN.AGCODE TAG_AGCODE, COALESCE (SALRTMAIN.AGRATE, 0) TAG_AGRATE, RTCODE TAG_INVCODE FROM FINTAG INNER JOIN FINPOST ON (POSTCODE2 = POSTCODE) INNER JOIN SALRTMAIN ON (ENTCODE::int = RTCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (SALRTMAIN.AGCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where SALRTMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( salrtmain.pcode IN (SELECT slcode FROM finsl WHERE slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) AND FINPOST.ENTTYPE = 'SRM' UNION ALL SELECT COALESCE (SLNAME, 'No Agent') TAG_AGENT, POSTCODE2 TAG_POST_CODE, SALRTMAIN.SCHEME_DOCNO TAG_NO, ENTDT TAG_DT, AMOUNT TAG_AMT, (-1) * GRSAMT TAG_GRSAMT, (-1) * NETAMT TAG_NETAMT, SALRTMAIN.AGCODE TAG_AGCODE, COALESCE (SALRTMAIN.AGRATE, 0) TAG_AGRATE, RTCODE TAG_INVCODE FROM FINTAG INNER JOIN FINPOST ON (POSTCODE1 = POSTCODE) INNER JOIN SALRTMAIN ON (ENTCODE::int = RTCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (SALRTMAIN.AGCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where SALRTMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( salrtmain.pcode IN (SELECT slcode FROM finsl WHERE slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) AND FINPOST.ENTTYPE = 'SRM' UNION ALL SELECT COALESCE (SLNAME, 'No Agent') TAG_AGENT, POSTCODE1 TAG_POST_CODE, FINOPDOC.SCHEME_DOCNO TAG_NO, FINPOST.ENTDT TAG_DT, AMOUNT TAG_AMT, AGCOMVALUE TAG_GRSAMT, CASE WHEN (FINPOST.ENTTYPE = 'SIM') THEN FINOPDOC.DAMOUNT ELSE ( (-1) * FINOPDOC.CAMOUNT) END TAG_NETAMT, FINOPDOC.AGCODE TAG_AGCODE, COALESCE (FINOPDOC.AGRATE, 0) TAG_AGRATE, FINOPDOC.ENTCODE TAG_INVCODE FROM FINTAG INNER JOIN FINPOST ON (POSTCODE2 = POSTCODE) INNER JOIN FINOPDOC ON (FINPOST.ENTCODE::int = FINOPDOC.ENTCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (FINOPDOC.AGCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( finopdoc.slcode IN (SELECT slcode FROM finsl WHERE slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) AND FINPOST.ENTTYPE IN ('SIM', 'SRM') UNION ALL SELECT COALESCE (SLNAME, 'No Agent') TAG_AGENT, POSTCODE2 TAG_POST_CODE, FINOPDOC.SCHEME_DOCNO TAG_NO, FINPOST.ENTDT TAG_DT, AMOUNT TAG_AMT, AGCOMVALUE TAG_GRSAMT, CASE WHEN (FINPOST.ENTTYPE = 'SIM') THEN FINOPDOC.DAMOUNT ELSE ( (-1) * FINOPDOC.CAMOUNT) END TAG_NETAMT, FINOPDOC.AGCODE TAG_AGCODE, COALESCE (FINOPDOC.AGRATE, 0) TAG_AGRATE, FINOPDOC.ENTCODE TAG_INVCODE FROM FINTAG INNER JOIN FINPOST ON (POSTCODE1 = POSTCODE) INNER JOIN FINOPDOC ON (FINPOST.ENTCODE::int = FINOPDOC.ENTCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (FINOPDOC.AGCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( finopdoc.slcode IN (SELECT slcode FROM finsl WHERE slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text )) AND FINPOST.ENTTYPE IN ('SIM', 'SRM'))q1) TAG on (DOC.DOC_POST_CODE = TAG.TAG_POST_CODE) left outer join ( SELECT INVCODE CHG_INVCODE, SUM (COALESCE (CHGAMT, 0)) CHG_AMT FROM SALINVCHG INNER JOIN SALCHG ON (SALINVCHG.SALCHGCODE = SALCHG.SALCHGCODE) AND SALCHG.AGCOMM = 'Y' GROUP BY SALINVCHG.INVCODE UNION ALL SELECT RTCODE CHG_INVCODE, (-1) * SUM (COALESCE (CHGAMT, 0)) CHG_AMT FROM SALRTCHG INNER JOIN SALCHG ON (SALRTCHG.SALCHGCODE = SALCHG.SALCHGCODE) AND SALCHG.AGCOMM = 'Y' GROUP BY SALRTCHG.RTCODE UNION ALL SELECT FINOPDOC.ENTCODE CHG_INVCODE, 0 CHG_AMT FROM FINOPDOC WHERE FINOPDOC.ENTTYPE IN ('SIM', 'SRM') AND ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99')) CHG on (TAG.TAG_INVCODE = CHG.CHG_INVCODE) Where ( TO_NUMBER (coalesce(nullif('@AgentCommission@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1 OR ( TO_NUMBER (coalesce(nullif('@AgentCommission@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND tag.tag_agcode = TO_NUMBER (coalesce(nullif('@AgentCommission@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')))

entity.object_description: Get Audit Action List
entity.sql_stmt: select 'INSERT' ACTION, 1 UK union all select 'UPDATE', 2 union all select 'DELETE',3

entity.object_description: TBD
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT MODULE_KEY_DISPLAY MODULE, MODULE_KEY MODULE_SHORT_CODE, MODULE_AREA AREA, IS_MANDATORY , LOGIN_USER, CASE WHEN ACTION = 'INSERT' THEN 'ENABLED' WHEN ACTION = 'DELETE' THEN 'DISABLED' END ACTION, TRANSACTION_DATE, row_number() over() UK, NULL REQUESTID FROM MAIN.V_AUD2_AUD2_MODULE T WHERE TRANSACTION_DATE::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')

entity.object_description: This data source will display the Enable/Disable history of the Ginesys module performed by users before Ginesys version 12.17.2 for the selected period.
entity.sql_stmt:
/* Change Id ADO Id Developer ReleaseDate Version 001 59464 Jyotirmoy
Name : Audit Module Enable Legacy */ select row_number() over() UK, MODULE_SHORTCODE module_short_code, name module, login_user login_user, case action when 'INSERT' then 'ENABLED' when 'DELETE' then 'DISABLED' end action, transaction_date action_date From AUD_TRANSACTION AT inner join aud_aud_module aam on (AT.TRANSACTION_ID = aam.TRANSACTION_ID) inner join aud_module am on (am.SHORTCODE = aam.SHORTCODE) where transaction_Date::date between to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')

entity.object_description: Retrieve the modification history for a specific entry, including all modified and deleted records, concerning the Audit Trail.
entity.sql_stmt: select * from ginview."fnc_ri$audit_trail_detail"( '@AuditModule@'::VARCHAR, '@AuditTransactionId@'::text, nullif('@AuditModification@','')::integer)

entity.object_description: Get the history of all modified and Deleted entries concerning Audit Trail.
entity.sql_stmt: select * from ginview.fnc_ri$audit_trail_summary( to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd')::DATE, to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')::DATE, '@AuditModule@'::VARCHAR, '@AuditUser@'::VARCHAR )

entity.object_description: Get details of Post Dated Cheques based on the selected parameters.
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_BANK_PDC_01*/ SELECT null datasetid, row_number() over() UK, chqdt, vchdt, row_type, vchno, chqno, ledger, amount, receipt_amount, issue_amount, exclude_pdc_receipt_amount, exclude_pdc_issue_amount, ispdc FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN (COALESCE (CHQDT::DATE, ENTDT::DATE) <= TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')) THEN TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') ELSE COALESCE (CHQDT::DATE, ENTDT::DATE) END CHQDT, ENTDT VCHDT, 'Pending Receipts' ROW_TYPE, SCHEME_DOCNO VCHNO, COALESCE (CHQNO, 'Unknown') CHQNO, CASE WHEN (SLNAME IS NULL) THEN GLNAME ELSE ( ( (SLNAME || '(') || GLNAME) || ')') END LEDGER, COALESCE (CAMOUNT, 0) AMOUNT, COALESCE (CAMOUNT, 0) RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 0 ISSUE_AMOUNT, CASE WHEN (ENTDT <= TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')) THEN COALESCE (CAMOUNT, 0) END EXCLUDE_PDC_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 0 EXCLUDE_PDC_ISSUE_AMOUNT, CASE WHEN (ENTDT <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) THEN 'N' else 'Y' END ISPDC FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINGL ON (P.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (P.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where P.entcode IN (SELECT P2.entcode FROM FINPOST P2 WHERE P2.glcode = TO_NUMBER('@BankNamePDC@','999999999') ) AND P.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND P.ENTTYPE <> 'PJN' AND P.glcode <> TO_NUMBER('@BankNamePDC@','999999999') AND COALESCE (P.damount, 0) = 0 AND P.YCODE >= (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE yname = '@CurrentFiscalYear@') AND ( ('@BasedOnBRS@' = 1 AND P.brsdt IS NULL) OR ( '@BasedOnBRS@' = 0 AND COALESCE (P.chqdt::DATE, P.entdt::DATE) >= to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (P.brsdt IS NULL OR P.brsdt = to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')))) AND P.entdt <= TO_DATE ('@PDCTillDateRp@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN (COALESCE (CHQDT::DATE, ENTDT::DATE) <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) THEN TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') ELSE COALESCE (CHQDT::DATE, ENTDT::DATE) END CHQDT, ENTDT VCHDT, 'Pending Issues' ROW_TYPE, SCHEME_DOCNO VCHNO, COALESCE (CHQNO, 'Unknown') CHQNO, CASE WHEN (SLNAME IS NULL) THEN GLNAME ELSE ( ( (SLNAME || '(') || GLNAME) || ')') END LEDGER, COALESCE (DAMOUNT, 0) AMOUNT, 0 RECEIPT_AMOUNT, COALESCE (DAMOUNT, 0) ISSUE_AMOUNT, 0 EXCLUDE_PDC_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, CASE WHEN (ENTDT <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) THEN COALESCE (DAMOUNT, 0) END EXCLUDE_PDC_ISSUE_AMOUNT, CASE WHEN (ENTDT <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) THEN 'N' else 'Y' END ISPDC FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINGL ON (P.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (P.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where P.entcode IN (SELECT P2.entcode FROM FINPOST P2 WHERE P2.glcode = TO_NUMBER('@BankNamePDC@','999999999')) AND P.ENTTYPE <> 'PJN' AND P.glcode <> TO_NUMBER('@BankNamePDC@','999999999') AND COALESCE (P.camount, 0) = 0 AND P.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND P.YCODE >= (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE yname = '@CurrentFiscalYear@') AND ( ('@BasedOnBRS@' = 1 AND P.brsdt IS NULL) OR ( '@BasedOnBRS@' = 0 AND COALESCE (P.chqdt::DATE, P.entdt::DATE) >= to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (P.brsdt IS NULL OR P.brsdt = to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')))) AND P.entdt <= TO_DATE ('@PDCTillDateRp@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') )X

entity.object_description: This report will show transaction details which is not yet reconciled for the selected Bank type ledger.
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_BANK_RECON_01*/ /* Formatted on 28-03-2023 18:41:41 (QP5 v5.294) */ SELECT row_number() over() UK, ENTCODE, BRS_TYPE, CR_VCHDT, CR_VCHDT_DUMMY, CR_VCHNO, CR_VCHNO_DUMMY, CR_LEDGER, CR_CHQNO, CR_CHQDT, CR_DRAWNON, DEBIT, CREDIT, Stat, INSTRUMENT_TYPE, Opening, (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE glname = '@BankNameBRS@'::TEXT) glcode FROM (SELECT 'BRS CREDIT' BRS_TYPE, ENTCODE, CR_VCHDT, CR_VCHDT_DUMMY, CR_VCHNO, CR_VCHNO_DUMMY, CR_LEDGER, CR_CHQNO, CR_CHQDT, CR_DRAWNON, 0 DEBIT, CREDIT, Stat, INSTRUMENT_TYPE, NULL::NUMERIC opening FROM (SELECT FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE ENTCODE, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT CR_VCHDT, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT CR_VCHDT_DUMMY, SCHEME_DOCNO CR_VCHNO, FINVCHMAIN.VCHNO CR_VCHNO_DUMMY, CASE WHEN (SRCTYPE = 'R') THEN SLNAME WHEN (SRCTYPE = 'M') THEN SLNAME ELSE GLNAME END CR_LEDGER, CHQNO CR_CHQNO, CHQDT CR_CHQDT, DRAWNON CR_DRAWNON, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT, CASE WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'P') THEN 'Posted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'U') THEN 'UnPosted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'R') THEN 'Reversed' END STAT, CASE WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'C') THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'R') THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'H') THEN 'CASH' END INSTRUMENT_TYPE FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (FINVCHDET.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) WHERE FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = (SELECT FINGL.GLCODE FROM FINGL WHERE FINGL.GLNAME = '@BankNameBRS@') AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('G', 'P', 'R')) AND (COALESCE (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) = 0) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT <= TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') ) AND ( (BRSDT IS NULL) OR (BRSDT > TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') )) AND ( (ADMOU_CODE IS NULL) OR (ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999'))) UNION ALL SELECT FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE ENTCODE, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT CR_VCHDT, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT CR_VCHDT_DUMMY, SCHEME_DOCNO CR_VCHNO, FINVCHMAIN.VCHNO CR_VCHNO_DUMMY, GLNAME CR_LEDGER, CHQNO CR_CHQNO, CHQDT CR_CHQDT, DRAWNON CR_DRAWNON, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT, CASE WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'P') THEN 'Posted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'U') THEN 'UnPosted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'R') THEN 'Reversed' END STATUS, CASE WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'C') THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'R') THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'H') THEN 'CASH' END INSTRUMENT_TYPE FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) WHERE ( ( ( ( ( (SRCTYPE IN ('B', 'C')) AND (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = (SELECT FINGL.GLCODE FROM FINGL WHERE FINGL.GLNAME = '@BankNameBRS@'))) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C')) AND (COALESCE (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) = 0)) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT <= TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND ( (BRSDT IS NULL) OR (BRSDT > TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD')))) AND ( (ADMOU_CODE IS NULL) OR (ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999'))) UNION ALL SELECT FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE ENTCODE, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT CR_VCHDT, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT CR_VCHDT_DUMMY, SCHEME_DOCNO CR_VCHNO, FINVCHMAIN.VCHNO CR_VCHNO_DUMMY, GLNAME CR_LEDGER, CHQNO CR_CHQNO, CHQDT CR_CHQDT, DRAWNON CR_DRAWNON, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT, CASE WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'P') THEN 'Posted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'U') THEN 'UnPosted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'R') THEN 'Reversed' END STATUS, CASE WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'C') THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'R') THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'H') THEN 'CASH' END INSTRUMENT_TYPE FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) WHERE SRCTYPE IN ('B', 'C') AND (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = (SELECT FINGL.GLCODE FROM FINGL WHERE FINGL.GLNAME = '@BankNameBRS@')) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('C')) AND (COALESCE (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) = 0) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT <= TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD')) AND ( (BRSDT IS NULL) OR (BRSDT > TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND ( (ADMOU_CODE IS NULL) OR (ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999'))))X UNION ALL SELECT 'BRS DEBIT' BRS_TYPE, ENTCODE, DR_VCHDT, DR_VCHDT_DUMMY, DR_VCHNO, DR_VCHNO_DUMMY, DR_LEDGER, DR_CHQNO, DR_CHQDT, DR_DRAWNON, DEBIT, 0 CREDIT, Status, INSTRUMENT_TYPE, NULL::NUMERIC opening FROM (SELECT FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE ENTCODE, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT DR_VCHDT, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT DR_VCHDT_DUMMY, SCHEME_DOCNO DR_VCHNO, FINVCHMAIN.VCHNO DR_VCHNO_DUMMY, CASE WHEN (SRCTYPE = 'R') THEN SLNAME WHEN (SRCTYPE = 'M') THEN SLNAME ELSE GLNAME END DR_LEDGER, CHQNO DR_CHQNO, CHQDT DR_CHQDT, DRAWNON DR_DRAWNON, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, CASE WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'P') THEN 'Posted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'U') THEN 'UnPosted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'R') THEN 'Reversed' END STATUS, CASE WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'C') THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'R') THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'H') THEN 'CASH' END INSTRUMENT_TYPE FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (FINVCHDET.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) WHERE FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = (SELECT FINGL.GLCODE FROM FINGL WHERE FINGL.GLNAME = '@BankNameBRS@') AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('G', 'P', 'R')) AND (COALESCE (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) = 0) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT <= TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD')) AND ( (BRSDT IS NULL) OR (BRSDT > TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND ( (ADMOU_CODE IS NULL) OR (ADMOU_CODE =to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999'))) UNION ALL SELECT FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE ENTCODE, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT DR_VCHDT, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT DR_VCHDT_DUMMY, SCHEME_DOCNO DR_VCHNO, FINVCHMAIN.VCHNO DR_VCHNO_DUMMY, GLNAME DR_LEDGER, CHQNO DR_CHQNO, CHQDT DR_CHQDT, DRAWNON DR_DRAWNON, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, CASE WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'P') THEN 'Posted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'U') THEN 'UnPosted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'R') THEN 'Reversed' END STATUS, CASE WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'C') THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'R') THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'H') THEN 'CASH' END INSTRUMENT_TYPE FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) WHERE SRCTYPE IN ('B', 'C') AND (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = (SELECT FINGL.GLCODE FROM FINGL WHERE FINGL.GLNAME = '@BankNameBRS@')) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('C')) AND (COALESCE (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) = 0) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT <= TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD')) AND ( (BRSDT IS NULL) OR (BRSDT > TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND ( (ADMOU_CODE IS NULL) OR (ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999'))) UNION ALL SELECT FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE ENTCODE, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT DR_VCHDT, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT DR_VCHDT_DUMMY, SCHEME_DOCNO DR_VCHNO, FINVCHMAIN.VCHNO DR_VCHNO_DUMMY, GLNAME DR_LEDGER, CHQNO DR_CHQNO, CHQDT DR_CHQDT, DRAWNON DR_DRAWNON, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, CASE WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'P') THEN 'Posted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'U') THEN 'UnPosted' WHEN (RELEASE_STATUS = 'R') THEN 'Reversed' END STATUS, CASE WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'C') THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'R') THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'H') THEN 'CASH' END INSTRUMENT_TYPE FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) WHERE SRCTYPE IN ('B', 'C') AND (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = (SELECT FINGL.GLCODE FROM FINGL WHERE FINGL.GLNAME = '@BankNameBRS@')) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('C')) AND (COALESCE (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) = 0) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT <= TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD')) AND ( (BRSDT IS NULL) OR (BRSDT > TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND ( (ADMOU_CODE IS NULL) OR (ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999'))))Z UNION ALL SELECT 'Opening' BRS_TYPE, NULL ENTCODE, TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') CR_VCHDT, NULL CR_VCHDT_DUMMY, NULL CR_VCHNO, NULL CR_VCHNO_DUMMY, NULL CR_LEDGER, NULL CR_CHQNO, NULL CR_CHQDT, NULL CR_DRAWNON, NULL DEBIT, NULL CREDIT, NULL Stat, NULL INSTRUMENT_TYPE, SUM (opening) ::NUMERIC Opening FROM (SELECT SUM (damount - camount) Opening FROM finpost WHERE glcode = (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE glname = '@BankNameBRS@') AND entdt <= TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') UNION ALL SELECT SUM (OPDAMT - OPCAMT) Opening FROM FINGLOP WHERE glcode = (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE glname = '@BankNameBRS@') AND ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999'))Y)Y1

entity.object_description: Get all details of the Outstanding details as per the selected report parameter. This data source to be used for specific report purpose.
entity.sql_stmt: /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 78391 Jyotirmoy Performance Issue 104777 Jyotirmoy Agent Name Not Showing */ with sledger as ( select sl.slcode sl_code, slname, bctname, glcode, trpcode, agcode ag_code, taxcode, crdays, pricelistcode, agrate, pricetype, due_date_basis, saltradegrp_code, salformcode, cl.* from finsl SL inner join admcls cl on (sl.clscode = cl.clscode) inner join (select distinct slcode from ( select slcode from finsl where (coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@','')::int,-1) = - 1) OR ( coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@','')::int,-1) <> - 1 AND glcode = coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@','')::int,-1) ) union select slcode from finsl_gl where (coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@','')::int,-1) = - 1) OR ( coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@','')::int,-1) <> - 1 AND glcode = coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@','')::int,-1) ) ) )s on (sl.slcode = s.slcode) where (sl.slname || '|' || sl.slid IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerDisplayNameShortCodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerDisplayNameShortCodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and ((coalesce(nullif('@Class@',''),'-1') = '-1') or (coalesce(nullif('@Class@',''),'-1') <> '-1' and cl.clsname = coalesce(nullif('@Class@',''),'-1'))) and ((sl.agcode = coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1')::int and coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1')::int <>-1) or (coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1')::int = -1)) ), vadj as ( select * from v_adj aj inner join sledger sld on (aj.SUB_LEDGER_CODE = sld.sl_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT invcode::text entcode, SUM (taxable_amount) taxable_amount, SUM (cgst_amount) cgst_amount, SUM (sgst_amount) sgst_amount, SUM (igst_amount) igst_amount, SUM (cess_amount) cess_amount FROM ( SELECT invcode, salinvdet_code, appamt taxable_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'CGST' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) cgst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'SGST' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) sgst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'IGST' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) igst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'CESS' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) cess_amount FROM salinvchg_item WHERE source = 'G' AND nullif('@ShowTaxableAmount@','')::int = 1 GROUP BY invcode, salinvdet_code, appamt) T2 GROUP BY invcode::text UNION ALL SELECT rtcode::text, SUM (taxable_amount) taxable_amount, SUM (cgst_amount) cgst_amount, SUM (sgst_amount) sgst_amount, SUM (igst_amount) igst_amount, SUM (cess_amount) cess_amount FROM (SELECT rtcode, salrtdet_code, appamt taxable_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'CGST' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) cgst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'SGST' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) sgst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'IGST' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) igst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'CESS' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) cess_amount FROM salrtchg_item WHERE source = 'G' AND nullif('@ShowTaxableAmount@','')::int = 1 GROUP BY rtcode, salrtdet_code, appamt) T3 GROUP BY rtcode::text UNION ALL SELECT invcode::text, SUM (taxable_amount) taxable_amount, SUM (cgst_amount) cgst_amount, SUM (sgst_amount) sgst_amount, SUM (igst_amount) igst_amount, SUM (cess_amount) cess_amount FROM ( SELECT invcode, purinvdet_code, appamt taxable_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'CGST' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) cgst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'SGST' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) sgst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'IGST' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) igst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'CESS' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) cess_amount FROM purinvchg_item WHERE source = 'G' AND nullif('@ShowTaxableAmount@','')::int = 1 GROUP BY invcode, purinvdet_code, appamt) T4 GROUP BY invcode::text UNION ALL SELECT rtcode::text, SUM (taxable_amount) taxable_amount, SUM (cgst_amount) cgst_amount, SUM (sgst_amount) sgst_amount, SUM (igst_amount) igst_amount, SUM (cess_amount) cess_amount FROM ( SELECT rtcode, purrtdet_code, appamt taxable_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'CGST' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) cgst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'SGST' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) sgst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'IGST' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) igst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'CESS' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) cess_amount FROM purrtchg_item WHERE source = 'G' AND nullif('@ShowTaxableAmount@','')::int = 1 GROUP BY rtcode, purrtdet_code, appamt) T5 GROUP BY rtcode::text UNION ALL SELECT srvcode::text, SUM (taxable_amount) taxable_amount, SUM (cgst_amount) cgst_amount, SUM (sgst_amount) sgst_amount, SUM (igst_amount) igst_amount, SUM (cess_amount) cess_amount FROM ( SELECT srvcode, pursrvdet_code, appamt taxable_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'CGST' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) cgst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'SGST' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) sgst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'IGST' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) igst_amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN gst_component = 'CESS' AND isreverse = 'NO' THEN chgamt ELSE 0 END) cess_amount FROM pursrvchg_item WHERE source = 'G' AND nullif('@ShowTaxableAmount@','')::int = 1 GROUP BY srvcode, pursrvdet_code, appamt) T6 GROUP BY srvcode::text) vtax ON (aj.document_code = vtax.entcode) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT INVCODE::text ENTCODE, A.AGCODE, SLNAME AGNAME FROM SALINVMAIN A INNER JOIN FINSL S ON (A.AGCODE = S.SLCODE) Where COALESCE ( NULLIF ( '@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT RTCODE::text ENTCODE, A.AGCODE, SLNAME AGNAME FROM SALRTMAIN A INNER JOIN FINSL S ON (A.AGCODE = S.SLCODE) Where COALESCE ( NULLIF ( '@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT INVCODE::text ENTCODE, A.AGCODE, SLNAME AGNAME FROM PURINVMAIN A INNER JOIN FINSL S ON (A.AGCODE = S.SLCODE) Where COALESCE ( NULLIF ( '@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT RTCODE::text ENTCODE, A.AGCODE, SLNAME AGNAME FROM PURRTMAIN A INNER JOIN FINSL S ON (A.AGCODE = S.SLCODE) Where COALESCE ( NULLIF ( '@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT ENTCODE::text ENTCODE, A.AGCODE, SLNAME AGNAME FROM FINOPDOC A INNER JOIN FINSL S ON (A.AGCODE = s.SLCODE) Where a.enttype IN ('SIM', 'SRM', 'PIM', 'PRM') and COALESCE ( NULLIF ( '@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') = 'T') ag ON (aj.document_code = ag.entcode) where aj.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int and 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND aj.document_date <= TO_DATE ( '@DocumentTillDate@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND CASE sld.due_date_basis WHEN 'E' THEN aj.document_date ELSE COALESCE ( aj.ref_dt, aj.document_date) END <= TO_DATE ( '@DocumentTillDate@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END and ((nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 1) or (nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 0 and release_status = 'Posted')) and ((coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'-1')::int = -1) or (coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'-1')::int <> -1 and aj.general_ledger_code = coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'-1')::int)) and aj.general_ledger_code in (select glcode from fingl where srctype = 'R') ), f_post as ( select aj.*, sld.sl_code, sld.slname, sld.bctname, sld.glcode gl_code, sld.trpcode , sld.ag_code, sld.taxcode, sld.crdays, sld.pricelistcode, sld.agrate, sld.pricetype, sld.due_date_basis, sld.saltradegrp_code, sld.salformcode, sld.clscode, sld.clsname, sld.ext, sld.clstype, sld.cmpcode from finpost aj inner join sledger sld on (aj.slcode = sld.sl_code) where aj.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int and ((aj.release_status = 'P' and nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 0) or (nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 1)) and ((aj.glcode = coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'-1')::int and coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'-1')::int <> -1 ) or (coalesce(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'-1')::int = -1)) and aj.glcode in (select glcode from fingl where srctype = 'R') ), fin_tag as (select DETAIL_POST_CODE, sum(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT) DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT from (SELECT POSTCODE1 DETAIL_POST_CODE, CASE WHEN (ENTDT <= TO_DATE ('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) THEN (CASE WHEN (ENTTYPE1 = 'VDP') THEN COALESCE (AMOUNT, 0) ELSE (CASE COALESCE (b.damount, 0) WHEN 0 THEN (-AMOUNT) ELSE AMOUNT END) END) ELSE 0 END DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT FROM FINTAG A INNER JOIN f_post B ON (POSTCODE2 = POSTCODE) where 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND b.entdt <= TO_DATE ( '@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND CASE b.due_date_basis WHEN 'E' THEN entdt ELSE COALESCE ( docdt, entdt) END <= TO_DATE ( '@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END union all SELECT POSTCODE2 DETAIL_POST_CODE, CASE WHEN (ENTDT <= TO_DATE ('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) THEN (CASE WHEN (ENTTYPE2 = 'VDP') THEN ABS (COALESCE (AMOUNT, 0)) ELSE (CASE COALESCE (b.damount, 0) WHEN 0 THEN (-AMOUNT) ELSE AMOUNT END) END) ELSE 0 END DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT FROM FINTAG A INNER JOIN f_post B ON (POSTCODE1 = POSTCODE) where 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND b.entdt <= TO_DATE ( '@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND CASE b.due_date_basis WHEN 'E' THEN entdt ELSE COALESCE ( docdt, entdt) END <= TO_DATE ( '@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 end) group by DETAIL_POST_CODE) /*End Of With Clause*/ /*Start Query*/ select tab1.*, ag.slname agent_name, gl.glname, os.SHRTNAME admsite_name, rs.SHRTNAME refsite_name /*End Changes Bug 107129*/ from ( select * from ( select null datasetid, row_number () over (order by slcode) uk, due_date_basis, crdays credit_days, slcode, glcode, agcode agent_code, agrate agent_rate_doc, admou_code, created_sitecode admsite_code_owner, sitecode ref_admsite_code, entcode entry_code, entno document_no, entdt document_date, docno ref_document_no, docdt ref_document_date, duedt due_date, entname document_type, amount amount, adjusted adjusted_amount, pending balance_amount, running_pending_amount, coalesce (nullif ('@OutstandingAgeDayBasis@', ''), '-1') outstanding_basis, outstanding_age, slab_name outstanding_age_slab, gst_taxable_amount, cgst_tax_amount, sgst_tax_amount, igst_tax_amount, cess_amount, total_gst_amount, group1, group2, group3, group4, lvl, cheq_no, cheq_date, chque_type, chque_drawn_on, chque_reference, cheque_amount, remarks, doc_ref_date, nullif('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','')::int IncludeZeroFlag, coalesce(nullif('@ShowPendingAboveValue@',''),'-1')::int showpendingaboveamt from ( select due_date_basis, crdays, slcode, glcode, agcode, agrate, admou_code, created_sitecode, sitecode, entcode, entno, entdt, docno, docdt, duedt, entname, amount, adjusted, pending, running_pending_amount, coalesce ( nullif ('@OutstandingAgeDayBasis@', ''), '-1'), outstanding_age, ( select LPAD (slab_day_from::text, 3, '0') || '#' || slab_name from findoc_age_slab where outstanding_age between slab_day_from and slab_day_to) slab_name, gst_taxable_amount, cgst_tax_amount, sgst_tax_amount, igst_tax_amount, cess_amount, total_gst_amount, group1, group2, group3, group4, lvl, cheq_no, cheq_date, chque_type, chque_drawn_on, chque_reference, cheque_amount, remarks, doc_ref_date from ( select case coalesce (aj.DUE_DATE_BASIS, 'E') when 'E' then 'ENTRY DATE' when 'D' then 'DOCUMENT DATE' end due_date_basis, aj.crdays, aj.sl_code slcode, aj.general_ledger_code glcode, case coalesce ( nullif ('@AgentSource@',''),'M') when 'T' then coalesce (aj.agcode,aj.ag_code) when 'M' then aj.ag_code end agcode, aj.agrate, aj.admou_code, aj.admsite_code_owner created_sitecode, aj.ref_admsite_code sitecode, aj.document_code entcode, display_docno entno, aj.document_date entdt, ref_no docno, ref_dt docdt, due_dt duedt, aj.document_type entname, SUM ( case drcr when 'Dr' then coalesce (aj.amount, 0) when 'Cr' then 0 - coalesce (aj.amount, 0) end) amount, SUM ( case when drcr = 'Dr' then case when coalesce ( detail_receipt_amt, 0) <= 0 then coalesce ( detail_receipt_amt, 0) else 0 - coalesce ( detail_receipt_amt, 0) end else case when coalesce ( detail_receipt_amt, 0) <= 0 then 0 - coalesce ( detail_receipt_amt, 0) else coalesce ( detail_receipt_amt, 0) end end) adjusted, (SUM ( case DRCR when 'Dr' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) when 'Cr' then 0 - coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end)) + SUM ( case when DRCR = 'Dr' then case when coalesce ( DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) <= 0 then coalesce ( DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) else 0 - coalesce ( DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) end else case when coalesce ( DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) <= 0 then 0 - coalesce ( DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) else coalesce ( DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) end end) PENDING, null running_pending_amount, ROUND ( TO_DATE ('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - (case coalesce ( nullif ( '@OutstandingAgeDayBasis@', ''), '-1') when '3DOC' then aj.document_date::date when '2DUE' then aj.due_dt::date when '4REF' then coalesce ( aj.ref_dt, aj.document_date)::date when '1VND' then case aj.due_date_basis when 'E' then aj.document_date::date else coalesce ( aj.ref_dt, aj.document_date)::date end end)) outstanding_age, SUM (taxable_amount) gst_taxable_amount, SUM (cgst_amount) cgst_tax_amount, SUM (sgst_amount) sgst_tax_amount, SUM (igst_amount) igst_tax_amount, SUM (cess_amount) cess_amount, SUM (cgst_amount) + SUM (sgst_amount) + SUM (igst_amount) + SUM (cess_amount) total_gst_amount, case when nullif('@ShowAgent@','')::int = 1 then case coalesce ( nullif ('@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') when 'T' then coalesce ( coalesce (aj.agname, ag1.slname), 'No Agent Defined in Document') when 'M' then coalesce ( ag1.slname, 'No Agent Defined in Document') end else 'Do not show Agent' end group1, case when nullif('@ShowClassWise@','')::int = 1 then aj.clsname else 'Do Not Show Class' end group2, aj.slname group3, case when '@DisplayType@' = 'D' then aj.document_type when '@DisplayType@' = 'E' then 'Date wise Display' end group4, 1 lvl, chqno cheq_no, chqdt cheq_date, case when drcr = 'Dr' then 'Payment' else 'Receipt' end chque_type, drawnon chque_drawn_on, ref_no chque_reference, SUM (amount) cheque_amount, null remarks, case aj.due_date_basis when 'E' then aj.document_date else coalesce (aj.ref_dt, aj.document_date) end doc_ref_date from vadj aj left outer join admcity ct on (aj.bctname = ct.ctname) left outer join finsl ag1 on (aj.ag_code = ag1.slcode) left outer join fin_tag adjustment on (aj.posting_code = adjustment.detail_post_code) where adjusted <> 0 and ((ct.ctname = coalesce(nullif('@City@',''),'-1') and (coalesce(nullif('@City@',''),'-1')<>'-1')) or (coalesce(nullif('@City@',''),'-1') = '-1')) and ((ct.dist = coalesce(nullif('@District@',''),'-1') and (coalesce(nullif('@District@',''),'-1')<>'-1')) or (coalesce(nullif('@District@',''),'-1') = '-1')) and ((ct.stname = coalesce(nullif('@State@',''),'-1') and (coalesce(nullif('@State@',''),'-1')<>'-1')) or (coalesce(nullif('@State@',''),'-1') = '-1')) group by case coalesce (aj.DUE_DATE_BASIS, 'E') when 'E' then 'ENTRY DATE' when 'D' then 'DOCUMENT DATE' end, aj.crdays, aj.sl_code, aj.general_ledger_code, case coalesce ( nullif ('@AgentSource@',''),'M') when 'T' then coalesce (aj.agcode,aj.ag_code) when 'M' then aj.ag_code end, aj.agrate, aj.admou_code, aj.admsite_code_owner, aj.ref_admsite_code, aj.document_code, display_docno, aj.document_date, ref_no, ref_dt, due_dt, aj.document_type, ROUND ( TO_DATE ('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - (case coalesce ( nullif ( '@OutstandingAgeDayBasis@', ''), '-1') when '3DOC' then aj.document_date::date when '2DUE' then aj.due_dt::date when '4REF' then coalesce ( aj.ref_dt, aj.document_date)::date when '1VND' then case aj.due_date_basis when 'E' then aj.document_date::date else else 'Do not show Agent' end, case when nullif('@ShowClassWise@','')::int = 1 then sl.clsname else 'Do Not Show Class' end, sl.slname, remarks)t7)t1) where 1 = case when coalesce (showpendingaboveamt, -1) <> -1 and LVL in (2, 3) then 1 when coalesce (showpendingaboveamt, -1) <> -1 and LVL = 1 and balance_amount > showpendingaboveamt then 1 when coalesce (showpendingaboveamt, -1) <> -1 and LVL = 1 and balance_amount <= showpendingaboveamt then 0 when coalesce (showpendingaboveamt, -1) = -1 then 1 end /*New protion added Change for compatable with Oracle 12.1.0.1.0*/ /*Bug 106921*/ and admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int and ( OUTSTANDING_AGE >= coalesce ('@ShowPendingAboveDays@', '0')::int or LVL in (3, 2)) and ( ( (BALANCE_AMOUNT <> 0 and INCLUDEZEROFLAG = 0) or LVL in (2, 3)) or INCLUDEZEROFLAG = 1) and ( ( OUTSTANDING_BASIS = '2DUE' and LVL = 1 and OUTSTANDING_AGE <> 0 or OUTSTANDING_AGE > 0) or OUTSTANDING_BASIS <> '2DUE' or LVL in (2, 3))/*End Change*/ /*Bug 106921*/) tab1 left outer join finsl ag on (tab1.agent_code = ag.SLCODE) inner join fingl gl on (tab1.glcode = gl.GLCODE) inner join sledger sld on (tab1.slcode = sld.sl_code) left outer join admsite os on (tab1.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = os.code) left outer join admsite rs on (tab1.REF_ADMSITE_CODE = rs.code)/*End Changes Bug 107129*/

entity.object_description: Special format for Billwise Outstanding to get Unadjusted amount and Post dated payments in customer ageing report.
entity.sql_stmt: /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 73614 Jyotirmoy Data showing wrong in #Customer-Vendor Outstanding Ageing Analysis# report for a specific scenario. 100168 Jyotirmoy Slowness issue in #Customer-Vendor Outstanding Ageing Analysis# report . */ with d_slab as ( select LPAD (slab_from::text, 5, '0') || '#' ||slab_name slab_name, slab_from,slab_to from ( select ('0'::bigint)::text||' - '||(nullif('@Slab1@','')::bigint)::text||' Days' slab_name, ('0'::bigint)slab_from, (nullif('@Slab1@','')::bigint) slab_to union all select ((nullif('@Slab1@','')::bigint)+1)::text||' - '|| case when (nullif('@Slab2@','')::bigint) is null then 'Above'::text else ((nullif('@Slab2@','')::bigint))::text end ||' Days' slab_name, (nullif('@Slab1@','')::bigint)+1 slab_from, coalesce((nullif('@Slab2@','')::bigint),99999) slab_to union all select case when (nullif('@Slab2@','')::bigint)is null then null else ((nullif('@Slab2@','')::bigint)+1)::text||' - '|| case when (nullif('@Slab3@','')::bigint) is null then 'Above'::text else ((nullif('@Slab3@','')::bigint))::text end ||' Days' end slab_name, (nullif('@Slab2@','')::bigint)+1 slab_from, coalesce((nullif('@Slab3@','')::bigint),99999) slab_to union all select case when (nullif('@Slab3@','')::bigint)is null then null else ((nullif('@Slab3@','')::bigint)+1)::text||' - '|| case when (nullif('@Slab4@','')::bigint) is null then 'Above'::text else ((nullif('@Slab4@','')::bigint))::text end ||' Days' end slab_name, (nullif('@Slab3@','')::bigint)+1 slab_from, coalesce((nullif('@Slab4@','')::bigint),99999) slab_to union all select case when (nullif('@Slab4@','')::bigint)is null then null else ((nullif('@Slab4@','')::bigint)+1)::text||' - '|| case when (nullif('@Slab5@','')::bigint) is null then 'Above'::text else ((nullif('@Slab5@','')::bigint))::text end ||' Days' end slab_name, (nullif('@Slab4@','')::bigint)+1 slab_from, coalesce((nullif('@Slab5@','')::bigint),99999) slab_to union all select case when (nullif('@Slab5@','')::bigint)is null then null else ((nullif('@Slab5@','')::bigint)+1)::text||' - '|| 'Above Days'::text end slab_name, ((nullif('@Slab5@','')::bigint)+1) slab_from, 99999 slab_to ) a where slab_name is not null and (nullif('@Slab1@','')::bigint) is not null ), slname as (select * From ( select sl.SLCODE sl_code, SLNAME, BCTNAME, sl.CLSCODE, AGCODE, DUE_DATE_BASIS, clsname, GINVIEW.ERPBALANCE('SL'::TEXT, sl.slcode::INTEGER, to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), ( SELECT yname::TEXT FROM admyear WHERE to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto ), NULL::INTEGER, nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INTEGER) Outstanding From finsl sl inner join admcls cl on (sl.clscode = cl.clscode) inner join (select distinct slcode from (SELECT s.slcode FROM finsl s WHERE ( ( s.glcode = TO_NUMBER (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@ARAPLedger@', ''), '-1'), '9G999g999999999999d99') AND TO_NUMBER (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@ARAPLedger@', ''), '-1'), '9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1) OR TO_NUMBER (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@ARAPLedger@', ''), '-1'), '9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) UNION all SELECT s.slcode FROM FINSL_GL s WHERE ( ( s.glcode = TO_NUMBER (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@ARAPLedger@', ''), '-1'), '9G999g999999999999d99') AND TO_NUMBER (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@ARAPLedger@', ''), '-1'), '9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1) OR TO_NUMBER (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@ARAPLedger@', ''), '-1'), '9G999g999999999999d99') = -1)))glsl on (sl.slcode = glsl.slcode) where (sl.slname||'|'||sl.slid IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerDisplayNameShortCodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerDisplayNameShortCodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ((cl.clsname = coalesce(nullif('@Class@',''), '-1') and coalesce(nullif('@Class@',''), '-1') <> '-1') or coalesce(nullif('@Class@',''), '-1') = '-1') and ((sl.agcode = coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''), '-1')::int and coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''), '-1')::int <> -1) or coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''), '-1')::int = -1)) where (nullif('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','')::int= 1 or (nullif('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','')::int = 0 and Outstanding <> 0)) ), fin_post as ( Select * from finpost p inner join slname sl on (p.slcode = sl.sl_code) where p.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int AND (NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 1 OR (NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 0 AND p.release_status = 'P')) ), fin_tag as ( SELECT a.postcode1 detail_post_code ,CASE WHEN entdt <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN CASE WHEN a.enttype1='VDP' THEN coalesce(a.amount,0) ELSE case coalesce(b.damount,0) when 0 then -a.amount else a.amount end END ELSE 0 END detail_receipt_amt FROM fintag a, fin_post b WHERE a.postcode2 = b.postcode AND 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND b.entdt <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND case b.due_date_basis when 'E' then entdt else coalesce(docdt, entdt) end <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END UNION ALL SELECT a.postcode2 detail_post_code ,CASE WHEN entdt <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN CASE WHEN a.enttype2='VDP' THEN abs(coalesce(a.amount,0)) ELSE case coalesce(b.damount,0) when 0 then -a.amount else a.amount end END ELSE 0 END detail_receipt_amt FROM fintag a ,fin_post b WHERE a.postcode1 = b.postcode AND 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND b.entdt <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND case b.due_date_basis when 'E' then entdt else coalesce(docdt, entdt) end <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END ), v_adjst as ( SELECT sl.sl_code slcode, aj.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, aj.general_ledger_code glcode, CASE COALESCE (NULLIF ('@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') WHEN 'T' THEN COALESCE (ag.agcode, sl.agcode) WHEN 'M' THEN sl.agcode END agcode, aj.admou_code, ( TO_DATE ('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - (CASE COALESCE (NULLIF ('@OutstandingAgeDayBasis@', ''), '-1') WHEN '3DOC' THEN aj.document_date::date WHEN '2DUE' THEN aj.due_dt::date WHEN '4REF' THEN COALESCE (aj.ref_dt::date, aj.document_date::date) WHEN '1VND' THEN CASE sl.due_date_basis WHEN 'E' THEN aj.document_date::date ELSE COALESCE (aj.ref_dt::date, aj.document_date::date) END END)) outstanding_age, CASE drcr WHEN 'Dr' THEN COALESCE (amount, 0) WHEN 'Cr' THEN 0 - COALESCE (amount, 0) END amount, adjusted, aj.document_type, drcr, sl.sl_code, posting_code FROM v_adj aj INNER JOIN slname sl ON (aj.sub_ledger_code = sl.sl_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT a.invcode::text entcode, a.agcode, s.slname agname FROM salinvmain a, finsl s WHERE a.agcode = s.slcode AND COALESCE (NULLIF ('@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT a.rtcode::text entcode, a.agcode, s.slname agname FROM salrtmain a, finsl s WHERE a.agcode = s.slcode AND COALESCE (NULLIF ('@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT a.invcode::text entcode, a.agcode, s.slname agname FROM purinvmain a, finsl s WHERE a.agcode = s.slcode AND COALESCE (NULLIF ('@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT a.rtcode::text ENTCODE, a.agcode, s.slname agname FROM purrtmain a, finsl s WHERE a.agcode = s.slcode AND COALESCE (NULLIF ('@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT a.entcode::text ENTCODE, a.agcode, s.slname agname FROM finopdoc a, finsl s WHERE a.agcode = s.slcode AND a.enttype IN ('SIM', 'SRM', 'PIM', 'PRM') AND COALESCE (NULLIF ('@AgentSource@', ''), 'M') = 'T') ag ON (aj.document_code = ag.entcode) WHERE 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND aj.document_date <= TO_DATE ('@DocumentTillDate@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND CASE sl.due_date_basis WHEN 'E' THEN aj.document_date ELSE COALESCE (aj.ref_dt, aj.document_date) END <= TO_DATE ('@DocumentTillDate@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END AND aj.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int AND ( NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 1 OR (NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 0 AND aj.release_status = 'Posted')) AND aj.general_ledger_code IN (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE srctype = 'R') ) select t1.*,pdc.pdc from (SELECT SLCODE ,ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER /*Bug 106966*/ ,GLCODE ,agent_code ,admou_code ,SUM(adjusted) OVER (PARTITION BY SLCODE ORDER BY SLCODE) adjusted ,balance_amount ,outstanding_age_slab ,row_number() over() UK ,SUM(unadjust_payment) OVER (PARTITION BY SLCODE ORDER BY SLCODE) unadjusted FROM ( select slcode ,ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER /*Bug 106966*/ ,glcode ,agcode agent_code ,admou_code ,sum(amount) unadjusted ,sum(adjusted) adjusted ,sum(pending) balance_amount ,outstanding_age_slab ,sum(cheque_amount) pdc ,sum(unadjust_payment) unadjust_payment from ( SELECT slcode ,ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER /*Bug 106966*/ ,glcode ,agcode ,admou_code ,amount ,adjusted ,pending ,( case when (nullif('@Slab1@','')::bigint) is null /*and to_number('@Slab2@') is null and to_number('@Slab3@') is null and to_number('@Slab4@') is null and to_number('@Slab5@') is null*/ then (SELECT LPAD(slab_day_from::text,5,'0')||'#'||slab_name FROM findoc_age_slab WHERE outstanding_age BETWEEN slab_day_from AND slab_day_to) else (select slab_name from d_slab where outstanding_age BETWEEN slab_from AND slab_to) end ) outstanding_age_slab ,cheque_amount ,CASE WHEN DOCUMENT_TYPE = 'AR/AP Voucher' THEN CASE WHEN adjusted <> amount THEN pending ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END unadjust_payment FROM ( SELECT aj.sl_code slcode ,aj.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER /*Bug 106966*/ ,aj.glcode ,agcode ,aj.admou_code ,outstanding_age ,SUM(amount) amount ,0 adjusted ,SUM(amount) PENDING ,0 cheque_amount ,aj.document_type FROM v_adjst aj WHERE adjusted = 0 group by aj.sl_code ,aj.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ,aj.glcode ,agcode ,aj.admou_code ,outstanding_age ,aj.document_type union all SELECT aj.sl_code slcode ,aj.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER /*Bug 106966*/ ,aj.glcode ,agcode ,aj.admou_code ,outstanding_age ,SUM(amount) amount ,SUM(CASE WHEN drcr = 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN coalesce(detail_receipt_amt,0) <= 0 THEN coalesce(detail_receipt_amt,0) ELSE 0-coalesce(detail_receipt_amt,0) END ELSE CASE WHEN coalesce(detail_receipt_amt,0) <= 0 THEN 0-coalesce(detail_receipt_amt,0) ELSE coalesce(detail_receipt_amt,0) END END) adjusted ,(SUM(AMOUNT)) + SUM(CASE WHEN DRCR = 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN coalesce(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) <= 0 THEN coalesce(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) ELSE 0-coalesce(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) END ELSE CASE WHEN coalesce(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) <= 0 THEN 0-coalesce(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) ELSE coalesce(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) END END) PENDING ,0 cheque_amount ,aj.document_type FROM v_adjst aj inner join ( SELECT detail_post_code ,SUM(detail_receipt_amt) detail_receipt_amt FROM fin_tag T1 GROUP BY detail_post_code ) adjustment ON (aj.posting_code = adjustment.detail_post_code) WHERE adjusted <> 0 group by aj.sl_code ,aj.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ,aj.glcode ,agcode ,aj.admou_code ,outstanding_age ,aj.document_type ) T7 ) t8 GROUP BY slcode ,ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER /*Bug 106966*/ ,glcode ,agcode ,admou_code ,outstanding_age_slab ) T9)t1 left outer join ( SELECT aj.slcode ,aj.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER /*Bug 106966*/ ,gl.glcode ,aj.agcode ,aj.admou_code ,sum(damount)-sum(camount) pdc ,'PDC' document_type FROM fin_post aj JOIN fingl gl ON (aj.glcode = gl.glcode) WHERE (gl.glcode IS NULL OR gl.srctype = 'R') AND aj.chqdt::date > to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND aj.time::date <=to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND nullif('@ShowPDC@','')::int = 1 GROUP BY aj.slcode ,aj.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER /*Bug 106966*/ ,gl.glcode ,aj.agcode ,aj.admou_code ) pdc on (t1.slcode = pdc.slcode)

entity.object_description: Get Details of Month wise Budget detail along with actual and deviation.
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT NULL requestid, row_number() over() uk, ADMGRP.GRPNAME PARGROUP, ADMGRP.GRPCODE ParGroup_code, FINGL.GLNAME Ledger, FINGL.GLCODE Ledger_code, LTRIM (TO_CHAR (ADMMONTH.MONSTDT, 'Month')) DummyMonth, TO_CHAR (ADMMONTH.MONSTDT, 'YYYY') DummyYear, ADMMONTH.MCODE OrderMonth, SUM (NVL (FINGLBUD.BUDDAMT, 0) - NVL (FINGLBUD.BUDCAMT, 0)) BudAmount, SUM (NVL (FINGLBUD.ACTDAMT, 0) - NVL (FINGLBUD.ACTCAMT, 0)) ActAmount, DECODE ( SUM (NVL (FINGLBUD.BUDDAMT, 0) - NVL (FINGLBUD.BUDCAMT, 0)), 0, ( 0 - (SUM ( NVL (FINGLBUD.ACTDAMT, 0) - NVL (FINGLBUD.ACTCAMT, 0)))), DECODE ( SIGN ( SUM ( NVL (FINGLBUD.ACTDAMT, 0) - NVL (FINGLBUD.ACTCAMT, 0))), -1, ( SUM ( NVL (FINGLBUD.BUDDAMT, 0) - NVL (FINGLBUD.BUDCAMT, 0)) + SUM ( NVL (FINGLBUD.ACTDAMT, 0) - NVL (FINGLBUD.ACTCAMT, 0))), ( SUM ( NVL (FINGLBUD.BUDDAMT, 0) - NVL (FINGLBUD.BUDCAMT, 0)) - SUM ( NVL (FINGLBUD.ACTDAMT, 0) - NVL (FINGLBUD.ACTCAMT, 0))))) Difference, SUM ( (SELECT NVL (XFINGLBUD.ACTDAMT, 0) - NVL (XFINGLBUD.ACTCAMT, 0) FROM FINGLBUD XFINGLBUD, FINGL XFINGL, ADMMONTH XADMMONTH WHERE XFINGLBUD.MCODE = XADMMONTH.MCODE AND XADMMONTH.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE yname = '@CurrentFiscalYear@') - 1 AND XFINGLBUD.MCODE = XADMMONTH.MCODE AND TO_CHAR (XADMMONTH.MONSTDT, 'MM') = TO_CHAR (ADMMONTH.MONSTDT, 'MM') AND XFINGLBUD.GLCODE = XFINGL.GLCODE AND XFINGL.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE)) PREV_ACT FROM FINGLBUD, FINGL, ADMMONTH, FINGRP ADMGRP, FINGRP PARGRP, FINGRP PARGRP1 WHERE FINGLBUD.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE AND FINGLBUD.MCODE = ADMMONTH.MCODE AND ADMMONTH.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE yname = '@CurrentFiscalYear@') AND FINGL.EXT = 'N' AND FINGL.TYPE IN ('I', 'E') AND FINGLBUD.ADMOU_CODE = '@ConnOUCode@' AND FINGL.GRPCODE = ADMGRP.GRPCODE(+) AND ADMGRP.PARCODE = PARGRP.GRPCODE(+) AND PARGRP.PARCODE = PARGRP1.GRPCODE(+) AND FINGLBUD.COSTCODE = NVL ('@FinSiteName@', FINGLBUD.COSTCODE) AND ( (NVL ('@MonthFrom@', -1) = -1 AND NVL ('@MonthTo@', -1) = -1) OR ADMMONTH.MCODE BETWEEN '@MonthFrom@' AND '@MonthTo@') AND ( ( FINGL.GRPCODE = '@FinGroupName@' OR ADMGRP.PARCODE = '@FinGroupName@' OR PARGRP.PARCODE = '@FinGroupName@' OR PARGRP1.PARCODE = '@FinGroupName@') OR NVL ('@FinGroupName@', -1) = -1) GROUP BY ADMGRP.GRPNAME, ADMGRP.GRPCODE, FINGL.GLCODE, TO_CHAR (ADMMONTH.MONSTDT, 'Month'), ADMMONTH.MONSTDT, ADMMONTH.MCODE, TO_CHAR (ADMMONTH.MONSTDT, 'YYYY'), FINGL.GLNAME
