entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 07-10-2021 15:14:58 (QP5 v5.294) */ SELECT row_number() over() UK, Keyval, CODE, VCHCODE, VCHTYPE, ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE, ARAP_SLCODE, BANK_CASH, BANK_CASH_GLCODE, VOUCHER_DATE, VOUCHER_NO, VOUCHER_TYPE, ARAP_GLCODE, ARAP_LEDGER, ARAP_SUB_LEDGER, NARRATION, DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, DOCUMENT_REMARKS, INSTRUMENT_NO, INSTRUMENT_DATE, DRAWN_ON, STATUS, BRS_DATE, TDS_APPLICABLE_AMOUNT, TDS_AMOUNT, REFDETAILS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_ON, CHEQUE_DATE, CHEQUE_NO, CHEQUE_LABEL, NO_OF_PRINTS, LAST_ACCESSED_BY, LAST_ACCESSED_ON, RELEASED_BY, RELEASED_ON, Running_Balance opening, DEBIT_AMOUNT, CREDIT_AMOUNT, Closing FROM (SELECT keyval, CODE, VCHCODE, VCHTYPE, ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE, ARAP_SLCODE, BANK_CASH, BANK_CASH_GLCODE, VOUCHER_DATE, VOUCHER_NO, VOUCHER_TYPE, ARAP_GLCODE, ARAP_LEDGER, ARAP_SUB_LEDGER, NARRATION, DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, DOCUMENT_REMARKS, INSTRUMENT_NO, INSTRUMENT_DATE, DRAWN_ON, STATUS, BRS_DATE, TDS_APPLICABLE_AMOUNT, TDS_AMOUNT, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, REFDETAILS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_ON, CHEQUE_DATE, CHEQUE_NO, CHEQUE_LABEL, NO_OF_PRINTS, LAST_ACCESSED_BY, LAST_ACCESSED_ON, RELEASED_BY, RELEASED_ON, Opening, closing, (Closing + CREDIT_AMOUNT - DEBIT_AMOUNT) Running_Balance FROM (SELECT keyval, CODE, VCHCODE, VCHTYPE, ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE, ARAP_SLCODE, BANK_CASH, BANK_CASH_GLCODE, VOUCHER_DATE, VOUCHER_NO, VOUCHER_TYPE, ARAP_GLCODE, ARAP_LEDGER, ARAP_SUB_LEDGER, NARRATION, DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, DOCUMENT_REMARKS, INSTRUMENT_NO, INSTRUMENT_DATE, DRAWN_ON, STATUS, BRS_DATE, TDS_APPLICABLE_AMOUNT, TDS_AMOUNT, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, REFDETAILS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_ON, CHEQUE_DATE, CHEQUE_NO, CHEQUE_LABEL, NO_OF_PRINTS, LAST_ACCESSED_BY, LAST_ACCESSED_ON, RELEASED_BY, RELEASED_ON, Opening, SUM (Balance) OVER (partition by BANK_CASH_GLCODE ORDER BY keyval) closing FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN entry_type = 'Opening' THEN concat('00001' , Keyval) ELSE Keyval END keyval, CODE CODE, VCHCODE, VCHTYPE, ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE, ARAP_SLCODE, BANK_CASH, BANK_CASH_GLCODE, VOUCHER_DATE, VOUCHER_NO, VOUCHER_TYPE, ARAP_GLCODE, ARAP_LEDGER, ARAP_SUB_LEDGER, NARRATION, DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, DOCUMENT_REMARKS, INSTRUMENT_NO, INSTRUMENT_DATE, DRAWN_ON, STATUS, BRS_DATE, TDS_APPLICABLE_AMOUNT, TDS_AMOUNT, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, REFDETAILS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_ON, CHEQUE_DATE, CHEQUE_NO, CHEQUE_LABEL, NO_OF_PRINTS, LAST_ACCESSED_BY, LAST_ACCESSED_ON, RELEASED_BY, RELEASED_ON, Opening, (Opening + DEBIT_AMOUNT - CREDIT_AMOUNT) Balance FROM ( SELECT concat( Bank_Cash_glcode::text , TO_CHAR (VOUCHER_DATE, 'yyyymmdd')::text ,VCHCODE::text ,ARAP_GLCODE::text ,arap_slcode::text) Keyval, CODE CODE, VCHCODE, VCHTYPE, ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE, ARAP_SLCODE, BANK_CASH, BANK_CASH_GLCODE, VOUCHER_DATE, VOUCHER_NO, VOUCHER_TYPE, ARAP_GLCODE, ARAP_LEDGER, ARAP_SUB_LEDGER, NARRATION, DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, DOCUMENT_REMARKS, INSTRUMENT_NO, INSTRUMENT_DATE, DRAWN_ON, STATUS, BRS_DATE, TDS_APPLICABLE_AMOUNT, TDS_AMOUNT, coalesce (CREDIT_AMOUNT, 0) CREDIT_AMOUNT, coalesce (DEBIT_AMOUNT, 0) DEBIT_AMOUNT, ginview.fnc_adj_docs (vchcode, vchcode) REFDETAILS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_ON, CHEQUE_DATE, CHEQUE_NO, CHEQUE_LABEL, NO_OF_PRINTS, LAST_ACCESSED_BY, LAST_ACCESSED_ON, RELEASED_BY, RELEASED_ON, coalesce (Opening, 0) Opening FROM ( SELECT CODE CODE, M.VCHCODE VCHCODE, CASE WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'C' THEN 'VDC' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'P' THEN 'VDP' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'G' THEN 'VDG' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'R' THEN 'VDP' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'B' THEN 'VDP' END VCHTYPE, ENTNAME ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE ADMOU_CODE, D.SLCODE ARAP_SLCODE, G.GLNAME BANK_CASH, G.GLCODE BANK_CASH_GLCODE, M.VCHDT VOUCHER_DATE, SCHEME_DOCNO VOUCHER_NO, CASE M.VCHTYPE WHEN 'C' THEN 'CONTRA' WHEN 'P' THEN 'PAYMENT' WHEN 'G' THEN 'GENERAL' WHEN 'R' THEN 'RECEIPT' WHEN 'B' THEN 'BOTH ARAP' END VOUCHER_TYPE, D.GLCODE ARAP_GLCODE, G1.GLNAME ARAP_LEDGER, SLNAME ARAP_SUB_LEDGER, D.NARTEXT NARRATION, M.REFNO DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, M.NARTEXT DOCUMENT_REMARKS, CASE WHEN (CHQNO IS NULL) THEN NULL ELSE ( (INITCAP (CASE PAYMENT_MODE WHEN 'C' THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN 'H' THEN 'CASH' WHEN 'R' THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' END) || '#') || CHQNO) END INSTRUMENT_NO, CHQDT INSTRUMENT_DATE, DRAWNON DRAWN_ON, case release_status when 'P' then 'POSTED' when 'U' then 'UNPOSTED' when 'R' then 'REVERSED' end STATUS, BRSDT BRS_DATE, TDS_APPAMT TDS_APPLICABLE_AMOUNT, TDSAMT TDS_AMOUNT, D.DAMOUNT CREDIT_AMOUNT, D.CAMOUNT DEBIT_AMOUNT, ( (CR.FNAME || '[') || CR.ENO) || ']' CREATED_BY, TIME CREATED_ON, CASE WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'C') THEN CHQDT ELSE NULL END CHEQUE_DATE, CASE WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'C') THEN CHQNO ELSE NULL END CHEQUE_NO, D.CHQLABEL CHEQUE_LABEL, PRINTCHQ NO_OF_PRINTS, CASE WHEN (LAST_ACCESS_ECODE IS NOT NULL) THEN ( ( (LA.FNAME || '[') || LA.ENO) || ']') END LAST_ACCESSED_BY, LAST_ACCESS_TIME LAST_ACCESSED_ON, CASE WHEN (RELEASE_ECODE IS NOT NULL) THEN ( ( (RLS.FNAME || '[') || RLS.ENO) || ']') END RELEASED_BY, RELEASE_TIME RELEASED_ON, NULL::INT OPENING FROM FINVCHMAIN M INNER JOIN FINVCHDET D ON (M.VCHCODE = D.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (M.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) INNER JOIN HRDEMP CR ON (M.ECODE = CR.ECODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP LA ON (LAST_ACCESS_ECODE = LA.ECODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP RLS ON (RELEASE_ECODE = RLS.ECODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINGL G1 ON (D.GLCODE = G1.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL SL ON (D.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) CROSS JOIN FINENTTYPE ENT WHERE ENTTYPE = CASE WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'C' THEN 'VDC' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'P' THEN 'VDP' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'G' THEN 'VDG' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'R' THEN 'VDP' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'B' THEN 'VDP' END UNION ALL SELECT CODE CODE, M.VCHCODE VCHCODE, CASE WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'C' THEN 'VDC' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'P' THEN 'VDP' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'G' THEN 'VDG' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'R' THEN 'VDP' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'B' THEN 'VDP' END VCHTYPE, ENTNAME ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE ADMOU_CODE, D.SLCODE ARAP_SLCODE, G1.GLNAME BANK_CASH, D.GLCODE BANK_CASH_GLCODE, M.VCHDT VOUCHER_DATE, SCHEME_DOCNO VOUCHER_NO, CASE M.VCHTYPE WHEN 'C' THEN 'CONTRA' WHEN 'P' THEN 'PAYMENT' WHEN 'G' THEN 'GENERAL' WHEN 'R' THEN 'RECEIPT' WHEN 'B' THEN 'BOTH ARAP' END VOUCHER_TYPE, G.GLCODE ARAP_GLCODE, G.GLNAME ARAP_LEDGER, SLNAME ARAP_SUB_LEDGER, D.NARTEXT NARRATION, M.REFNO DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, M.NARTEXT DOCUMENT_REMARKS, CASE WHEN (CHQNO IS NULL) THEN NULL ELSE ( (INITCAP (CASE PAYMENT_MODE WHEN 'C' THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN 'H' THEN 'CASH' WHEN 'R' THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' END) || '#') || CHQNO) END INSTRUMENT_NO, CHQDT INSTRUMENT_DATE, DRAWNON DRAWN_ON, case release_status when 'P' then 'POSTED' when 'U' then 'UNPOSTED' when 'R' then 'REVERSED' end STATUS, BRSDT BRS_DATE, TDS_APPAMT TDS_APPLICABLE_AMOUNT, TDSAMT TDS_AMOUNT, D.CAMOUNT CREDIT_AMOUNT, D.DAMOUNT DEBIT_AMOUNT, ( (CR.FNAME || '[') || CR.ENO) || ']' CREATED_BY, TIME CREATED_ON, CASE WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'C') THEN CHQDT ELSE NULL END CHEQUE_DATE, CASE WHEN (PAYMENT_MODE = 'C') THEN CHQNO ELSE NULL END CHEQUE_NO, D.CHQLABEL CHEQUE_LABEL, PRINTCHQ NO_OF_PRINTS, CASE WHEN (LAST_ACCESS_ECODE IS NOT NULL) THEN ( ( (LA.FNAME || '[') || LA.ENO) || ']') END LAST_ACCESSED_BY, LAST_ACCESS_TIME LAST_ACCESSED_ON, CASE WHEN (RELEASE_ECODE IS NOT NULL) THEN ( ( (RLS.FNAME || '[') || RLS.ENO) || ']') END RELEASED_BY, RELEASE_TIME RELEASED_ON, NULL::INT OPENING FROM FINVCHMAIN M INNER JOIN FINVCHDET D ON (M.VCHCODE = D.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (M.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) INNER JOIN HRDEMP CR ON (M.ECODE = CR.ECODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP LA ON (LAST_ACCESS_ECODE = LA.ECODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP RLS ON (RELEASE_ECODE = RLS.ECODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINGL G1 ON (D.GLCODE = G1.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL SL ON (D.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) CROSS JOIN FINENTTYPE ENT WHERE ENT.ENTTYPE = CASE WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'C' THEN 'VDC' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'P' THEN 'VDP' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'G' THEN 'VDG' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'R' THEN 'VDP' WHEN M.VCHTYPE = 'B' THEN 'VDP' END AND M.VCHTYPE = 'C' UNION ALL SELECT CODE::INT, VCHCODE::INT, VCHTYPE, ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE, ARAP_SLCODE::INT, Bank_Cash, Bank_Cash_glcode, Voucher_Date, Voucher_No, Voucher_Type, ARAP_GLCODE::INT, ARAP_Ledger, ARAP_Sub_ledger, Narration, Document_Reference, Document_Remarks, Instrument_No, Instrument_Date::DATE, Drawn_On, Status, BRS_Date::DATE, TDS_Applicable_Amount::INT, TDS_Amount::INT, Credit_Amount::INT, Debit_Amount::INT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_ON::date, CHEQUE_DATE::date, CHEQUE_NO, CHEQUE_LABEL, NO_OF_PRINTS::INT, LAST_ACCESSED_BY, CAST(NULL as timestamp without time zone) LAST_ACCESSED_ON, RELEASED_BY, CAST(NULL as timestamp without time zone) RELEASED_ON, sum(coalesce(opening,0)) opening FROM ( SELECT NULL CODE, NULL VCHCODE, NULL VCHTYPE, 'Opening' ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE ADMOU_CODE, NULL ARAP_SLCODE, GLNAME BANK_CASH, G.GLCODE BANK_CASH_GLCODE, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') VOUCHER_DATE, NULL VOUCHER_NO, NULL VOUCHER_TYPE, NULL ARAP_GLCODE, NULL ARAP_LEDGER, NULL ARAP_SUB_LEDGER, NULL NARRATION, NULL DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, NULL DOCUMENT_REMARKS, NULL INSTRUMENT_NO, NULL INSTRUMENT_DATE, NULL DRAWN_ON, NULL STATUS, NULL BRS_DATE, NULL TDS_APPLICABLE_AMOUNT, NULL TDS_AMOUNT, NULL CREDIT_AMOUNT, NULL DEBIT_AMOUNT, NULL CREATED_BY, NULL CREATED_ON, NULL CHEQUE_DATE, NULL CHEQUE_NO, NULL CHEQUE_LABEL, NULL NO_OF_PRINTS, NULL LAST_ACCESSED_BY, NULL LAST_ACCESSED_ON, NULL RELEASED_BY, NULL RELEASED_ON, SUM (DAMOUNT - CAMOUNT) OPENING FROM FINPOST M INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (M.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) where G.SRCTYPE IN ('B', 'C') -- AND M.glcode = -- TO_NUMBER ( -- '@CashBank@') AND entdt < TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND admou_code = TO_NUMBER ('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) GROUP BY M.ADMOU_CODE, G.GLNAME, G.GLCODE UNION ALL SELECT NULL CODE, NULL VCHCODE, NULL VCHTYPE, 'Opening' ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE ADMOU_CODE, NULL ARAP_SLCODE, GLNAME BANK_CASH, G.GLCODE BANK_CASH_GLCODE, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') VOUCHER_DATE, NULL VOUCHER_NO, NULL VOUCHER_TYPE, NULL ARAP_GLCODE, NULL ARAP_LEDGER, NULL ARAP_SUB_LEDGER, NULL NARRATION, NULL DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, NULL DOCUMENT_REMARKS, NULL INSTRUMENT_NO, NULL INSTRUMENT_DATE, NULL DRAWN_ON, NULL STATUS, NULL BRS_DATE, NULL TDS_APPLICABLE_AMOUNT, NULL TDS_AMOUNT, NULL CREDIT_AMOUNT, NULL DEBIT_AMOUNT, NULL CREATED_BY, NULL CREATED_ON, NULL CHEQUE_DATE, NULL CHEQUE_NO, NULL CHEQUE_LABEL, NULL NO_OF_PRINTS, NULL LAST_ACCESSED_BY, NULL LAST_ACCESSED_ON, NULL RELEASED_BY, NULL RELEASED_ON, SUM (OPDAMT - OPCAMT) OPENING FROM FINGLOP M INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (M.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) Where G.SRCTYPE IN ('B', 'C') -- AND M.glcode = -- TO_NUMBER ( -- '@CashBank@') AND admou_code = TO_NUMBER ( '@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) GROUP BY M.ADMOU_CODE, G.GLNAME, G.GLCODE) q1 GROUP BY CODE, VCHCODE, VCHTYPE, ENTRY_TYPE, ADMOU_CODE, ARAP_SLCODE, Bank_Cash, Bank_Cash_glcode, Voucher_Date, Voucher_No, Voucher_Type, ARAP_GLCODE, ARAP_Ledger, ARAP_Sub_ledger, Narration, Document_Reference, Document_Remarks, Instrument_No, Instrument_Date, Drawn_On, Status, BRS_Date, TDS_Applicable_Amount, TDS_Amount, Credit_Amount, Debit_Amount, CREATED_BY, CREATED_ON, CHEQUE_DATE, CHEQUE_NO, CHEQUE_LABEL, NO_OF_PRINTS, LAST_ACCESSED_BY, LAST_ACCESSED_ON, RELEASED_BY, RELEASED_ON) T1 ORDER BY concat(Bank_Cash_glcode::text ,TO_CHAR (VOUCHER_DATE, 'yyyymmdd')::text , VCHCODE::text ,arap_slcode::text)) q2 WHERE voucher_date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( coalesce (TO_NUMBER (nullif('@CashBank@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 OR ( coalesce (TO_NUMBER (nullif('@CashBank@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND Bank_Cash_glcode = TO_NUMBER (nullif('@CashBank@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR ( coalesce (TO_NUMBER (nullif('@CashBank@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = 0 AND Bank_Cash_glcode IS NULL)) ORDER BY keyval) q3) q4) q5

entity.object_description: This Report will display Cash/Bank wise Transaction details. This report can be used for printing in A4 Size page format.
entity.sql_stmt: /*Cash Bank Book Printable*/ SELECT row_number() over() uk, BOOKNAME, BOOKCODEMAIN, SEQ, VCHDT, VCHCODE, VCHNO, VCHNO_DUMMY, REFNO, OP_TEXT, MAIN_NARRATION, DET_GLCODE, g.glname DET_GLNAME, s.slname DET_SLNAME, DET_NARRATION, CHQNO, CHQDT, DRAWNON, DEBIT, CREDIT, OP_DEBIT, OP_CREDIT, OP_BALANCE, POSTING_CODE, DET_SLCODE, cost_center_remarks, adj_remarks, -----Start change Feature 106723 Entry_Type, Entry_Name, BRS_Date, Particulars, Status FROM (SELECT row_number() over() uk, a.BOOKNAME, a.BOOKCODEMAIN, a.SEQ, a.VCHDT, a.VCHCODE, a.VCHNO, a.VCHNO_DUMMY, a.REFNO, a.OP_TEXT, a.MAIN_NARRATION, a.DET_GLCODE, a.DET_GLNAME, a.DET_SLNAME, a.DET_NARRATION, a.CHQNO, a.CHQDT, a.DRAWNON, a.DEBIT, a.CREDIT, a.OP_DEBIT, a.OP_CREDIT, a.OP_BALANCE, a.POSTING_CODE, a.DET_SLCODE, ginview.cost_center_remarks (a.VCHCODE, a.DET_GLCODE, a.DET_SLCODE, TO_NUMBER ('@ConnOUCode@','999999999')::INTEGER) cost_center_remarks, ginview.adj_particulars (a.POSTING_CODE) adj_remarks, -----Start change Feature 106723 f.ENTTYPE Entry_Type, ent.ENTNAME Entry_Name, f.BRSDT BRS_Date, GINVIEW.fnc_ledgerdetails (a.POSTING_CODE, a.VCHCODE, f.ENTTYPE, a.DET_GLCODE, a.DEBIT, a.CREDIT) Particulars, CASE WHEN f.RELEASE_STATUS = 'P' THEN 'Posted' WHEN f.RELEASE_STATUS = 'U' THEN 'UnPosted' END Status ----End change FROM ( /*------------------------ FOR OPENING -------------------------------------------*/ SELECT BOOKNAME, BOOKCODEMAIN, 1 SEQ, TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') VCHDT, NULL::TEXT VCHCODE, NULL VCHNO, 0 VCHNO_DUMMY, NULL REFNO, 'Opening Balance' OP_TEXT, NULL MAIN_NARRATION, NULL::INTEGER DET_GLCODE, NULL DET_GLNAME, NULL DET_SLNAME, NULL DET_NARRATION, NULL CHQNO, NULL::DATE CHQDT, NULL DRAWNON, 0 DEBIT, 0 CREDIT, SUM (COALESCE (OP_DEBIT, 0)) OP_DEBIT, SUM (COALESCE (OP_CREDIT, 0)) OP_CREDIT, SUM (COALESCE (OP_DEBIT, 0)) - SUM (COALESCE (OP_CREDIT, 0)) OP_BALANCE, 0 POSTING_CODE, 0 DET_SLCODE FROM ( SELECT GLNAME BOOKNAME, FINGL.GLCODE BOOKCODEMAIN, SUM (COALESCE (OPDAMT, 0)) OP_DEBIT, SUM (COALESCE (OPCAMT, 0)) OP_CREDIT FROM FINGLOP INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINGLOP.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) where YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND FINGL.GLCODE = COALESCE (TO_NUMBER (nullif('@BookName@',''),'999999999'), FINGL.GLCODE) AND FINGL.SRCTYPE IN ('C', 'B') AND FINGLOP.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER (nullif('@ConnOUCode@',''),'999999999') GROUP BY FINGL.GLNAME, FINGL.GLCODE UNION ALL SELECT GLNAME BOOKNAME, FINGL.GLCODE BOOKCODEMAIN, SUM (COALESCE (DAMOUNT, 0)) OP_DEBIT, SUM (COALESCE (CAMOUNT, 0)) OP_CREDIT FROM FINPOST INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINPOST.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND FINGL.GLCODE = COALESCE (TO_NUMBER(nullif('@BookName@',''),'999999999'), FINGL.GLCODE) AND ENTDT < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND FINGL.SRCTYPE IN ('C', 'B') AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER ('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') GROUP BY FINGL.GLNAME, FINGL.GLCODE)X2 GROUP BY BOOKNAME, BOOKCODEMAIN /*------------------------ FOR TRANSACTION WHERE ADJUSTMENT TO BE SHOWN -------------------------------------------*/ UNION ALL SELECT MAIN_GL.GLNAME BOOKNAME, MAIN_GL.GLCODE BOOKCODEMAIN, 2 SEQ, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT VCHDT, FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE::TEXT VCHCODE, FINVCHMAIN.SCHEME_DOCNO VCHNO, FINVCHMAIN.VCHNO VCHNO_DUMMY, FINVCHMAIN.REFNO REFNO, 'Balance B / F' OP_TEXT, INITCAP (FINVCHMAIN.NARTEXT) MAIN_NARRATION, FINGL.GLCODE DET_GLCODE, CASE WHEN (FINGL.SRCTYPE = 'R') THEN ( ( (SLNAME || ' (') || (SELECT GL.GLNAME FROM FINGL GL WHERE GL.GLCODE = FINSL.GLCODE)) || ')') ELSE ( ( (FINGL.GLNAME || ' (') || GRPNAME) || ')') END DET_GLNAME, CASE WHEN FINGL.SRCTYPE = 'R' THEN NULL ELSE SLNAME END DET_SLNAME, INITCAP (FINVCHDET.NARTEXT) DET_NARRATION, FINVCHDET.CHQNO CHQNO, FINVCHDET.CHQDT CHQDT, FINVCHDET.DRAWNON DRAWNON, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT, 0 OP_DEBIT, 0 OP_CREDIT, 0 OP_BALANCE, POSTCODE POSTING_CODE, COALESCE (FINSL.SLCODE, 0) DET_SLCODE FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL MAIN_GL ON (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = MAIN_GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (FINVCHDET.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) INNER JOIN FINPOST ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = FINPOST.GLCODE) AND (FINVCHDET.VCHCODE::TEXT = FINPOST.ENTCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMCLS ON (FINSL.CLSCODE = ADMCLS.CLSCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINGRP ADMGRP ON (FINGL.GRPCODE = ADMGRP.GRPCODE) WHERE ( (FINVCHDET.SLCODE IS NULL) OR (FINVCHDET.SLCODE = FINPOST.SLCODE)) AND FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = COALESCE (TO_NUMBER (nullif('@BookName@',''),'999999999'), FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE) AND TO_NUMBER (nullif('@ShowAdjustmentTF@',''),'999999999') = 1 AND MAIN_GL.SRCTYPE IN ('C', 'B') AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER ('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') and ( COALESCE (TO_NUMBER ('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','999999999'), 1) = 1 OR ( COALESCE (TO_NUMBER ('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','999999999'), 1) = 0 AND finpost.release_status = 'P'))/*Bug Id : 110112*/ /*------------------------ FOR TRANSACTION WHERE ADJUSTMENT NOT TO BE SHOWN -------------------------------------------*/ UNION ALL SELECT MAIN_GL.GLNAME BOOKNAME, MAIN_GL.GLCODE BOOKCODEMAIN, 2 SEQ, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT VCHDT, FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE::TEXT VCHCODE, SCHEME_DOCNO VCHNO, FINVCHMAIN.VCHNO VCHNO_DUMMY, FINVCHMAIN.REFNO REFNO, 'Balance B / F' OP_TEXT, INITCAP (FINVCHMAIN.NARTEXT) MAIN_NARRATION, FINGL.GLCODE DET_GLCODE, CASE WHEN (FINGL.SRCTYPE = 'R') THEN ( ( (SLNAME || ' (') || (SELECT GL.GLNAME FROM FINGL GL WHERE GL.GLCODE = FINSL.GLCODE)) || ')') ELSE ( ( (FINGL.GLNAME || ' (') || GRPNAME) || ')') END DET_GLNAME, CASE WHEN FINGL.SRCTYPE = 'R' THEN NULL ELSE SLNAME END DET_SLNAME, INITCAP (FINVCHDET.NARTEXT) DET_NARRATION, CHQNO CHQNO, CHQDT CHQDT, DRAWNON DRAWNON, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT, 0 OP_DEBIT, 0 OP_CREDIT, 0 OP_BALANCE, 0 POSTING_CODE, COALESCE (FINSL.SLCODE, 0) DET_SLCODE FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL MAIN_GL ON (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = MAIN_GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (FINVCHDET.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMCLS ON (FINSL.CLSCODE = ADMCLS.CLSCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINGRP ADMGRP ON (FINGL.GRPCODE = ADMGRP.GRPCODE) WHERE FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = COALESCE (TO_NUMBER (nullif('@BookName@',''),'999999999'), FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE) AND TO_NUMBER ('@ShowAdjustmentTF@','999999999') = 0 AND ( FINVCHMAIN.ADMOU_CODE IS NULL OR FINVCHMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER ('@ConnOUCode@','999999999')) AND MAIN_GL.SRCTYPE IN ('C', 'B') AND FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') and ( COALESCE (TO_NUMBER ('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','999999999'), 1) = 1 OR ( COALESCE (TO_NUMBER ('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','999999999'), 1) = 0 AND finvchmain.release_status = 'P'))/*Bug Id : 110112*/ /*------------------------ FOR CONTRA TRANSACTION -------------------------------------------*/ UNION ALL SELECT DETAIL_GL.GLNAME BOOKNAME, DETAIL_GL.GLCODE BOOKCODEMAIN, 2 SEQ, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT VCHDT, FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE::TEXT VCHCODE, FINVCHMAIN.SCHEME_DOCNO VCHNO, FINVCHMAIN.VCHNO VCHNO_DUMMY, FINVCHMAIN.REFNO REFNO, 'Balance B / F' OP_TEXT, INITCAP (FINVCHMAIN.NARTEXT) MAIN_NARRATION, FINGL.GLCODE DET_GLCODE, ( (FINGL.GLNAME || ' (') || GRPNAME) || ')' DET_GLNAME, NULL DET_SLNAME, INITCAP (FINVCHDET.NARTEXT) DET_NARRATION, FINVCHDET.CHQNO CHQNO, FINVCHDET.CHQDT CHQDT, FINVCHDET.DRAWNON DRAWNON, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, COALESCE (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT, 0 OP_DEBIT, 0 OP_CREDIT, 0 OP_BALANCE, POSTCODE POSTING_CODE, 0 DET_SLCODE FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINGRP ADMGRP ON (FINGL.GRPCODE = ADMGRP.GRPCODE) INNER JOIN FINPOST F ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = F.GLCODE) AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE::TEXT = f.ENTCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL DETAIL_GL ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = DETAIL_GL.GLCODE) WHERE FINVCHDET.GLCODE = COALESCE (TO_NUMBER (nullif('@BookName@',''),'999999999'), FINVCHDET.GLCODE) AND FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C' AND DETAIL_GL.SRCTYPE IN ('C', 'B') AND ( FINVCHMAIN.ADMOU_CODE IS NULL OR FINVCHMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER ('@ConnOUCode@','999999999')) AND FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and( COALESCE (TO_NUMBER ('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','999999999'), 1) = 1 OR ( COALESCE (TO_NUMBER ('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','999999999'), 1) = 0 AND f.release_status = 'P'))/*Bug Id : 110112*/) A LEFT OUTER JOIN finpost f ON (A.POSTING_CODE = f.POSTCODE) left outer join finenttype ent on (f.ENTTYPE = ent.ENTTYPE))X1 left outer join fingl g on (X1.det_glcode = g.glcode) left outer join finsl s on (X1.DET_SLCODE = s.slcode) WHERE ( COALESCE ( TO_NUMBER (NULLIF ('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@', ''), '999999999'), 1) = 1 OR ( COALESCE ( TO_NUMBER ( NULLIF ('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@', ''), '999999999'), 1) = 0 AND GINVIEW.ERPBALANCE ( 'GL'::TEXT, DET_GLCODE::INTEGER,/*Zero Balance Issue*/ TO_DATE ('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd'), (SELECT yname::TEXT FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto), null::INTEGER,/*Zero Balance Issue*/ TO_NUMBER ('@ConnOUCode@', '999999999')::INTEGER) <> 0)) /*AND ( COALESCE (TO_NUMBER ('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','999999999'), 1) = 1 OR ( COALESCE (TO_NUMBER ('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','999999999'), 1) = 0 AND Status = 'Posted'))/*Bug Id : 110112*/*/

entity.object_description: This Report will helpful to have Cash Planning for future date. This Report will consider Purchase Invoice, Service Invoice, Sales Invoice, Sale of Service Invoice document as parent document for the analysis pupose.
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_CASH_PLANING_01*/ SELECT null REQUESTID, row_number() over() UK, document_code entcode, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_CODE, MAIN_POST_CODE, REF_NO, REF_DATE, DUE_DATE, main_scheme_docno, DOCUMENT_DATE, glcode, PARTY, PARTY_CODE, AMOUNT, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DETAIL_POST_CODE, RECEIPT_NO, RECEIPT_DT, RECEIPT_AMT, PDC_DATE, PDC_AMOUNT FROM (SELECT document_code, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_CODE, MAIN_POST_CODE, REF_NO, REF_DATE, DUE_DATE, MAIN_SCHEME_DOCNO, DOCUMENT_DATE, GLCODE, PARTY, PARTY_CODE, AMOUNT, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DETAIL_POST_CODE, RECEIPT_NO, RECEIPT_DT, RECEIPT_AMT, PDC_DATE, PDC_AMOUNT FROM (SELECT document_code, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_CODE, MAIN_POST_CODE, REF_NO, REF_DATE, DUE_DATE, MAIN_SCHEME_DOCNO, DOCUMENT_DATE, GLCODE, PARTY, PARTY_CODE, AMOUNT, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DETAIL_POST_CODE, RECEIPT_NO, RECEIPT_DT, RECEIPT_AMT, PDC_DATE, PDC_AMOUNT, SUM (adjusted) OVER (PARTITION BY main_post_code) pending_amount FROM ( SELECT T1.DOCUMENT_CODE, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_CODE, MAIN_POST_CODE, REF_NO, REF_DATE, DUE_DATE, MAIN_SCHEME_DOCNO, DOCUMENT_DATE, GLCODE, PARTY, PARTY_CODE, SUM (AMOUNT) AMOUNT, SUM ( CASE WHEN drcr = 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN coalesce (RECEIPT_AMT, 0) <= 0 THEN coalesce (RECEIPT_AMT, 0) ELSE 0 - coalesce (RECEIPT_AMT, 0) END ELSE CASE WHEN coalesce (RECEIPT_AMT, 0) <= 0 THEN 0 - coalesce (RECEIPT_AMT, 0) ELSE coalesce (RECEIPT_AMT, 0) END END) adjusted, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DETAIL_POST_CODE, RECEIPT_NO, RECEIPT_DT, RECEIPT_AMT, PDC_DATE, PDC_AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT DOCUMENT_CODE, AG.SLNAME AGENT_NAME, AG.SLCODE AGENT_CODE, POSTING_CODE MAIN_POST_CODE, REF_NO, REF_DT REF_DATE, DUE_DT DUE_DATE, DISPLAY_DOCNO MAIN_SCHEME_DOCNO, DOCUMENT_DATE, GL.GLCODE, SL.SLNAME PARTY, SL.SLCODE PARTY_CODE, CASE WHEN DRCR = 'Dr' THEN coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) WHEN DRCR = 'Cr' THEN 0 - coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) END AMOUNT, DOCUMENT_TYPE DOCUMENT_TYPE, DRCR FROM V_ADJ P INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN FINSL SL ON (SUB_LEDGER_CODE = SL.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL AG ON (SL.AGCODE = AG.SLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMCLS CL ON (SL.CLSCODE = CL.CLSCODE) WHERE p.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND '@ShowPastDue@' = 0 AND document_date <= CURRENT_DATE AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ARAPLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (sl.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ag.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND coalesce (DUE_DT, coalesce (REF_DT, document_date)) BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DueDateFrom@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@DueDateTo@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND cl.clsname = nullif('@AllClass@','')) OR coalesce (nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') = '-1') UNION ALL SELECT DOCUMENT_CODE, AG.SLNAME AGENT_NAME, AG.SLCODE AGENT_CODE, POSTING_CODE MAIN_POST_CODE, REF_NO, REF_DT REF_DATE, DUE_DT DUE_DATE, DISPLAY_DOCNO MAIN_SCHEME_DOCNO, DOCUMENT_DATE DOCUMENT_DATE, GL.GLCODE, SL.SLNAME PARTY, SL.SLCODE PARTY_CODE, CASE WHEN DRCR = 'Dr' THEN coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) WHEN DRCR = 'Cr' THEN 0 - coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) END AMOUNT, DOCUMENT_TYPE DOCUMENT_TYPE, DRCR FROM V_ADJ P INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN FINSL SL ON (SUB_LEDGER_CODE = SL.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL AG ON (SL.AGCODE = AG.SLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMCLS CL ON (SL.CLSCODE = CL.CLSCODE) WHERE p.document_type IN ('Voucher', 'AR/AP Voucher', 'Voucher (Contra)') AND p.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND '@ShowPastDue@' = 0 AND document_date <= TO_DATE('@DueDateTo@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FINTAG T1 WHERE P.posting_code = T1.postcode1) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ARAPLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (sl.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ag.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND cl.clsname = nullif('@AllClass@','')) OR coalesce (nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') = '-1')) T1 left outer join ( SELECT detail_post_code, scheme_docno receipt_no, CASE WHEN ENTDT <= CURRENT_DATE THEN entdt ELSE NULL END receipt_dt, CASE WHEN ENTDT <= CURRENT_DATE THEN SUM (detail_receipt_amt) ELSE 0 END RECEIPT_AMT, CASE WHEN ENTDT > CURRENT_DATE THEN entdt ELSE NULL END PDC_DATE, CASE WHEN ENTDT > CURRENT_DATE THEN SUM (detail_receipt_amt) ELSE 0 END PDC_amount FROM ( SELECT POSTCODE1 DETAIL_POST_CODE, SCHEME_DOCNO, ENTDT, CASE WHEN (ENTTYPE1 = 'VDP') THEN coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) ELSE case when coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0)= 0 then -AMOUNT else AMOUNT end END DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT FROM FINTAG A INNER JOIN FINPOST B ON (POSTCODE2 = POSTCODE) Where '@ShowPastDue@' = 0 UNION ALL SELECT POSTCODE2 DETAIL_POST_CODE, SCHEME_DOCNO, ENTDT, CASE WHEN (ENTTYPE2 = 'VDP') THEN ABS (coalesce (AMOUNT, 0)) ELSE case when coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) = 0 then -AMOUNT else AMOUNT end END DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT FROM FINTAG A INNER JOIN FINPOST B ON (POSTCODE1 = POSTCODE) Where '@ShowPastDue@' = 0)X GROUP BY detail_post_code, scheme_docno, entdt) t2 on (T1.MAIN_POST_CODE = T2.DETAIL_POST_CODE) GROUP BY T1.DOCUMENT_CODE, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_CODE, MAIN_POST_CODE, REF_NO, REF_DATE, DUE_DATE, MAIN_SCHEME_DOCNO, DOCUMENT_DATE, GLCODE, PARTY, PARTY_CODE, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DETAIL_POST_CODE, RECEIPT_NO, RECEIPT_DT, RECEIPT_AMT, PDC_DATE, PDC_AMOUNT)Z)Z1 WHERE ABS (amount) <> ABS (pending_amount) UNION ALL SELECT document_code, agent_name, agent_code, main_post_code, ref_no, REF_DT, DUE_DT, display_docno, document_date, general_ledger_code, slname, sub_ledger_code, amount, document_type, detail_post_code, receipt_no, receipt_dt, adjusted, PDC_DATE, PDC_AMT FROM (SELECT document_code, agent_name, agent_code, main_post_code, ref_no, REF_DT, DUE_DT, display_docno, document_date, general_ledger_code, slname, sub_ledger_code, amount, document_type, detail_post_code, receipt_no, receipt_dt, adjusted, PDC_DATE, PDC_AMT, SUM (adjusted) OVER (PARTITION BY main_post_code) pending_amount FROM ( SELECT aj.document_code, ag.slname agent_name, ag.slcode agent_code, aj.posting_code main_post_code, aj.REF_NO ref_no, aj.REF_DT, aj.DUE_DT, aj.display_docno, aj.document_date, aj.general_ledger_code, sl.slname, aj.sub_ledger_code, SUM ( CASE WHEN drcr = 'Dr' THEN coalesce (amount, 0) WHEN drcr = 'Cr' THEN 0 - coalesce (amount, 0) END) amount, SUM ( CASE WHEN drcr = 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) <= 0 THEN coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) ELSE 0 - coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) END ELSE CASE WHEN coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) <= 0 THEN 0 - coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) ELSE coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) END END) adjusted, aj.document_type, detail_post_code, receipt_no, receipt_dt, PDC_DATE, PDC_amt FROM v_adj aj INNER JOIN fingl gl ON (aj.general_ledger_code = gl.glcode) INNER JOIN finsl sl ON (aj.sub_ledger_code = sl.slcode) LEFT OUTER JOIN finsl AG ON (sl.agcode = ag.slcode) INNER JOIN admcls cl ON (sl.clscode = cl.clscode) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT detail_post_code, scheme_docno receipt_no, CASE WHEN ENTDT <= CURRENT_DATE THEN entdt ELSE NULL END receipt_dt, CASE WHEN ENTDT <= CURRENT_DATE THEN SUM (detail_receipt_amt) ELSE 0 END detail_receipt_amt, CASE WHEN ENTDT > CURRENT_DATE THEN entdt ELSE NULL END PDC_DATE, CASE WHEN ENTDT > CURRENT_DATE THEN SUM (detail_receipt_amt) ELSE 0 END PDC_amt FROM (SELECT POSTCODE1 DETAIL_POST_CODE, SCHEME_DOCNO, ENTDT, CASE WHEN (ENTTYPE1 = 'VDP') THEN coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) ELSE case when coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0)= 0 then -AMOUNT else AMOUNT end END DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT FROM FINTAG A INNER JOIN FINPOST B ON (POSTCODE2 = POSTCODE) WHERE '@ShowPastDue@' = 1 UNION ALL SELECT POSTCODE2 DETAIL_POST_CODE, SCHEME_DOCNO, ENTDT, CASE WHEN (ENTTYPE2 = 'VDP') THEN ABS (coalesce (AMOUNT, 0)) ELSE case when coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0)= 0 then -AMOUNT else AMOUNT end END DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT FROM FINTAG A INNER JOIN FINPOST B ON (POSTCODE1 = POSTCODE) WHERE '@ShowPastDue@' = 1)X1 GROUP BY detail_post_code, scheme_docno, entdt) adjustment ON (aj.posting_code = adjustment.detail_post_code) WHERE aj.document_date <= TO_DATE('@DueDateTo@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND coalesce (DUE_DT, coalesce (REF_DT, document_date)) <= TO_DATE('@DueDateTo@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND '@ShowPastDue@' = 1 AND aj.general_ledger_code IN (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE srctype = 'R') AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ARAPLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (sl.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ag.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND cl.clsname = nullif('@AllClass@','')) OR coalesce (nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND aj.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') GROUP BY aj.document_code, ag.slname, ag.slcode, aj.posting_code, aj.REF_NO, aj.REF_DT, aj.DUE_DT, aj.display_docno, aj.document_date, aj.general_ledger_code, sl.slname, aj.sub_ledger_code, aj.document_type, detail_post_code, receipt_no, receipt_dt, PDC_DATE, PDC_amt)X2)X3 WHERE ABS (amount) <> ABS (pending_amount)) t1

entity.object_description: This Report will helpful to have Cash Planning (Summary) for future date. This Report will consider Purchase Invoice, Service Invoice, Sales Invoice, Sale of Service Invoice document as parent document for this report purpose.
entity.sql_stmt: select null requestid , row_number() over() uk , agent_name , agent_code , main_post_code , ref_no , ref_dt ref_date , due_dt due_date , document_code main_scheme_doccode /*Added for Grouping*/ , display_docno main_scheme_docno , document_date , general_ledger_code glcode , slname party , sub_ledger_code party_code , amount , document_type , detail_post_code , receipt_no , receipt_dt , adjusted receipt_amt , pdc_date , pdc_amount from ( select agent_name , agent_code , main_post_code , ref_no , REF_DT , DUE_DT , document_code , display_docno , document_date , general_ledger_code , slname , sub_ledger_code , amount , document_type , detail_post_code , receipt_no , receipt_dt , adjusted , PDC_DATE , PDC_AMOUNT, release_status , sum(adjusted) over (partition by main_post_code) pending_amount from ( select ag.slname agent_name, ag.slcode agent_code, aj.posting_code main_post_code, aj.ref_no, aj.REF_DT, aj.DUE_DT, aj.document_code, aj.display_docno, aj.document_date, aj.general_ledger_code, sl.slname, aj.sub_ledger_code, SUM ( case when drcr = 'Dr' then coalesce (amount, 0) when drcr = 'Cr' then 0 - coalesce (amount, 0) end) amount, SUM ( case when drcr = 'Dr' then case when coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) <= 0 then coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) else 0 - coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) end else case when coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) <= 0 then 0 - coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) else coalesce (detail_receipt_amt, 0) end end) adjusted, aj.document_type, detail_post_code, receipt_no, receipt_dt, PDC_DATE, PDC_AMOUNT, release_status from v_adj aj inner join fingl gl on (aj.general_ledger_code = gl.glcode) inner join finsl sl on (aj.sub_ledger_code = sl.slcode) left outer join finsl AG on (sl.agcode = ag.slcode) inner join admcls cl on (sl.clscode = cl.clscode) left outer join ( select detail_post_code, scheme_docno receipt_no, case when ENTDT <= CURRENT_DATE then entdt else null end receipt_dt, case when ENTDT <= CURRENT_DATE then SUM (detail_receipt_amt) else 0 end detail_receipt_amt, case when ENTDT > CURRENT_DATE then entdt else null end PDC_DATE, case when ENTDT > CURRENT_DATE then SUM (detail_receipt_amt) else 0 end PDC_AMOUNT from ( select POSTCODE1 DETAIL_POST_CODE, SCHEME_DOCNO, ENTDT, case when (ENTTYPE1 = 'VDP') then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) else case when coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0)= 0 then -AMOUNT else AMOUNT end end DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT from FINTAG A inner join FINPOST B on (POSTCODE2 = POSTCODE) union all select POSTCODE2 DETAIL_POST_CODE, SCHEME_DOCNO, ENTDT, case when (ENTTYPE2 = 'VDP') then ABS (coalesce (AMOUNT, 0)) else case when coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) = 0 then -AMOUNT else AMOUNT end end DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT from FINTAG A inner join FINPOST B on (POSTCODE1 = POSTCODE))X group by detail_post_code, scheme_docno, entdt) adjustment on (aj.posting_code = adjustment.detail_post_code) where aj.document_date <= TO_DATE('@DueDateTo@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and coalesce (DUE_DT, coalesce (REF_DT, document_date)) <= TO_DATE('@DueDateTo@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and aj.general_ledger_code in ( select glcode from fingl where srctype = 'R') and ( gl.glname in ( with recursive cte as ( select regexp_split_to_table('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+') as col1, 1 as level union all select regexp_split_to_table('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+') as col1, level + 1 as level from cte where level <= ( select ARRAY_LENGTH(REGEXP_MATCHES('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'), 1) + 1) ) select col1 from cte ) or coalesce ( ( select ARRAY_LENGTH(REGEXP_MATCHES('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'), 1)) + 1, 0) = 0) and ( sl.slname in ( with recursive cte as ( select regexp_split_to_table('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+') as col1, 1 as level union all select regexp_split_to_table('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+') as col1, level + 1 as level from cte where level <= ( select ARRAY_LENGTH(REGEXP_MATCHES('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'), 1) + 1) ) select col1 from cte ) or coalesce ( ( select ARRAY_LENGTH(REGEXP_MATCHES('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'), 1)) + 1, 0) = 0) and ( ag.slname in ( with recursive cte as ( select regexp_split_to_table('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', '[^]+') as col1, 1 as level union all select regexp_split_to_table('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', '[^]+') as col1, level + 1 as level from cte where level <= ( select ARRAY_LENGTH(REGEXP_MATCHES('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', '', 'g'), 1) + 1) ) select col1 from cte ) or coalesce ( ( select ARRAY_LENGTH(REGEXP_MATCHES('@#ARAPSubLedgerAgentNameMulti#@', '', 'g'), 1)) + 1, 0) = 0) and ( ( coalesce (nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' and cl.clsname = nullif('@AllClass@', '')) or coalesce (nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') = '-1') and aj.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@', '999999999') group by ag.slname, ag.slcode, aj.posting_code, aj.REF_NO, aj.REF_DT, aj.DUE_DT, aj.document_code, aj.display_docno, aj.document_date, aj.general_ledger_code, sl.slname, aj.sub_ledger_code, aj.document_type, detail_post_code, receipt_no, receipt_dt, PDC_DATE, PDC_AMOUNT, release_status)X)x1 where ABS(amount) <> ABS(pending_amount) and ((cast('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@' as numeric) = 1) or (cast('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@' as numeric) = 0 and release_status = 'Posted'))

entity.object_description: Get details of Cheque Book as per the selected date range and other parameters selected.
entity.sql_stmt: select null REQUESTID, row_number() over() UK, BOOKNO BOOKNO, BOOKDT BOOKDT, G.GLNAME BANKNAME, M.REM, D.CHQNO CHEQUE_NO, D.CHQDT, INITCAP (case d.type when 'A' then 'A/C PAYEE' when 'B' then 'BEARER' when 'U' then 'UNKNOWN' end ) CHQTYPE, INITCAP (case stat when 'N' then 'NEW' when 'I' then 'ISSUED' when 'C' then 'CANCELLED' when 'D' then 'DISHONOURED' end) CHQSTATUS, VD.VCHDT VCHDT, SCHEME_DOCNO VCHNO, coalesce (VD.CHQLABEL, coalesce (SLNAME, VCHGL.GLNAME)) PARTY, coalesce (VD.DAMOUNT, 0) AMOUNT, DRAWNON DRAWN_ON, BRSDT BRS_DATE, VD.VCHCODE from FINCHQMAIN M inner join FINCHQDET D on (M.BOOKCODE = D.BOOKCODE) inner join FINGL G on (M.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) left outer join FINVCHDET VD on (D.CHQNO = VD.CHQNO) and (D.VCHCODE = VD.VCHCODE) left outer join FINGL VCHGL on (VD.GLCODE = VCHGL.GLCODE) left outer join FINVCHMAIN VM on (VD.VCHCODE = VM.VCHCODE) left outer join FINSL S on (VD.SLCODE = S.SLCODE) where ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@BankName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 or (coalesce (to_number(nullif('@BankName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 and g.glcode = to_number(nullif('@BankName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'))) and ( coalesce (nullif('@ChequeStatus@', ''), '-1') = '-1' or ( coalesce (nullif('@ChequeStatus@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' and (case d.stat when 'N' then 'NEW' when 'I' then 'ISSUED' when 'C' then 'CANCELLED' when 'D' then 'DISHONOURED' end) = coalesce (nullif('@ChequeStatus@', ''), '-1'))) and d.chqdt between to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and ( ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@ChequeBookNoFrom@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 and coalesce (to_number(nullif('@ChequeBookNoTo@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) or ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@ChequeBookNoFrom@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 and coalesce (to_number(nullif('@ChequeBookNoTo@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 and m.bookcode between to_number(nullif('@ChequeBookNoFrom@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') and to_number(nullif('@ChequeBookNoTo@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99')))

entity.object_description: This data source will stock of item which are allocation for a specific connected app. This data source will show stock status at the time of report running
entity.sql_stmt: /*CONNECTED_APP_ITEM_STOCK_REG_01*/ /* Formatted on 29-03-2023 17:58:45 (QP5 v5.294) */ SELECT row_number() over() uk, stk.* FROM ( SELECT Org_Unit_Short_Name, ORGANIZATION_UNIT, APP_NAME, OU_SHORT_NAME, ALlO_SITE_NAME_SHORT_NAME, Site_name, Site_Short_Name, Site_Type, SITE_ALLOCATION_TYPE, Allocated_Stock_Point, Allocation_Bin, ICODE, ITEM_NAME, DIVISION, SECTION, DEPARTMENT, SUM (COALESCE (STOCKPOINT_STOCK_QTY, 0)) STOCKPOINT_STOCK_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (BIN_STOCK_QTY, 0)) BIN_STOCK_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (Bin_Reserved_Qty, 0)) Bin_Reserved_Qty, SUM (COALESCE (POS_unsettles_Stock_Qty, 0)) POS_unsettles_Stock_Qty, ( SUM (COALESCE (STOCKPOINT_STOCK_QTY, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (BIN_STOCK_QTY, 0))) - ( SUM (COALESCE (Bin_Reserved_Qty, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (POS_unsettles_Stock_Qty, 0))) Effective_Stock, CASE WHEN ( ( SUM (COALESCE (STOCKPOINT_STOCK_QTY, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (BIN_STOCK_QTY, 0))) - ( SUM (COALESCE (Bin_Reserved_Qty, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (POS_unsettles_Stock_Qty, 0)))) > 0 THEN 'Positive Stock Only' WHEN ( ( SUM (COALESCE (STOCKPOINT_STOCK_QTY, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (BIN_STOCK_QTY, 0))) - ( SUM (COALESCE (Bin_Reserved_Qty, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (POS_unsettles_Stock_Qty, 0)))) < 0 THEN 'Negative Stock Only' WHEN ( ( SUM (COALESCE (STOCKPOINT_STOCK_QTY, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (BIN_STOCK_QTY, 0))) - ( SUM (COALESCE (Bin_Reserved_Qty, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (POS_unsettles_Stock_Qty, 0)))) = 0 THEN 'Zero Stock Only' END Effective_Stock_value FROM (SELECT (CAS.ORGANIZATION_UNIT || ' | ') || OU_SHORT_NAME ORG_UNIT_SHORT_NAME, CAS.ORGANIZATION_UNIT ORGANIZATION_UNIT, CAS.APP_NAME APP_NAME, OU_SHORT_NAME OU_SHORT_NAME, (CAS.SITE_NAME || ' | ') || CAS.SITE_SHORT_NAME ALLO_SITE_NAME_SHORT_NAME, CAS.SITE_NAME SITE_NAME, CAS.SITE_SHORT_NAME SITE_SHORT_NAME, CAS.SITE_TYPE, TYPE_OF_ALLOCATION SITE_ALLOCATION_TYPE, STOCK_POINT_NAME ALLOCATED_STOCK_POINT, NULL ALLOCATION_BIN, CAI.ICODE, ITEM_NAME, I.DIVISION, I.SECTION, I.DEPARTMENT, CLOSINGSTOCKQTY STOCKPOINT_STOCK_QTY, 0 BIN_STOCK_QTY, 0 BIN_RESERVED_QTY, UNSETTLESALEQTY POS_UNSETTLES_STOCK_QTY FROM GINVIEW.LV_CONNAPP_ALLOCATED_SITE CAS INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CONNAPP_ALLOCATED_STKPT CASTK ON (CAS.APP_NAME = CASTK.APP_NAME) AND (CAS.ORGANIZATION_UNIT = CASTK.ORGANIZATION_UNIT) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CONNAPP_ALLOCATED_ITEM CAI ON (CAS.APP_NAME = CAI.APP_NAME) AND (CAS.ORGANIZATION_UNIT = CAI.ORGANIZATION_UNIT) LEFT OUTER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_REALTIMESTOCK_STKPOINT RSTK ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) AND (STOCK_POINT_CODE = STOCKPOINTCODE) AND (CAI.ICODE = RSTK.ICODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (CAI.ICODE = I.CODE) WHERE CAS.Type_of_Allocation = 'Stock Point' UNION ALL SELECT (CAS.ORGANIZATION_UNIT || ' | ') || OU_SHORT_NAME ORG_UNIT_SHORT_NAME, CAS.ORGANIZATION_UNIT ORGANIZATION_UNIT, CAS.APP_NAME APP_NAME, OU_SHORT_NAME OU_SHORT_NAME, (CAS.SITE_NAME || ' | ') || CAS.SITE_SHORT_NAME ALLO_SITE_NAME_SHORT_NAME, CAS.SITE_NAME SITE_NAME, CAS.SITE_SHORT_NAME SITE_SHORT_NAME, CAS.SITE_TYPE, TYPE_OF_ALLOCATION SITE_ALLOCATION_TYPE, NULL ALLOCATED_STOCK_POINT, CAB.BIN_NO ALLOCATION_BIN, CAI.ICODE, ITEM_NAME, I.DIVISION, I.SECTION, I.DEPARTMENT, 0 STOCKPOINT_STOCK_QTY, TOTAL_STOCK BIN_STOCK_QTY, RESERVED_STOCK BIN_RESERVED_QTY, 0 POS_UNSETTLES_STOCK_QTY FROM GINVIEW.LV_CONNAPP_ALLOCATED_SITE CAS INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CONNAPP_ALLOCATED_BIN CAB ON (CAS.ORGANIZATION_UNIT = CAB.ORGANIZATION_UNIT) AND (CAS.APP_NAME = CAB.APP_NAME) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CONNAPP_ALLOCATED_ITEM CAI ON (CAS.ORGANIZATION_UNIT = CAI.ORGANIZATION_UNIT) AND (CAS.APP_NAME = CAI.APP_NAME) LEFT OUTER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ONHAND_STOCK_BIN OSB ON (CAS.ADMSITE_CODE = OSB.ADMSITE_CODE) AND (CAB.INVBIN_CODE = OSB.INVBIN_CODE) AND (CAI.ICODE = OSB.ICODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (CAI.ICODE = I.CODE) WHERE CAS.Type_of_Allocation = 'Bin')X WHERE (ICODE IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#CONNECTEDAPPICODEMULTI#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#CONNECTEDAPPICODEMULTI#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#CONNECTEDAPPICODEMULTI#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (DIVISION IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ConnectedAppDivisionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ConnectedAppDivisionMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ConnectedAppDivisionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (SECTION IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ConnectedAppSectionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ConnectedAppSectionMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ConnectedAppSectionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (DEPARTMENT IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ConnectedAppDepartmentMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ConnectedAppDepartmentMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ConnectedAppDepartmentMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY Org_Unit_Short_Name, ORGANIZATION_UNIT, APP_NAME, OU_SHORT_NAME, ALlO_SITE_NAME_SHORT_NAME, Site_name, Site_Short_Name, Site_Type, SITE_ALLOCATION_TYPE, Allocated_Stock_Point, Allocation_Bin, ICODE, ITEM_NAME, DIVISION, SECTION, DEPARTMENT) stk WHERE ( ( Effective_Stock_value = nullif('@EffectiveStockValue@','') AND COALESCE (nullif('@EffectiveStockValue@',''), '-1') <> '-1') OR COALESCE (nullif('@EffectiveStockValue@',''), '-1') = '-1')

entity.object_description: This data source will display Store wise Sale across all platform. This data source will display information at item description level.
entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 28-10-2021 13:09:31 (QP5 v5.294) */ select q1.*, null REQUESTID, row_number () over() uk from ( SELECT T1.admsite_code, T1.icode, T1.POS_OFFLINE_SETTLED_QTY, T1.POS_OFFLINE_UNSETTLED_QTY, T1.ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_QTY, T1.WHOLESALE_QTY, T1.POS_OFFLINE_SETTLED_AMT, T1.POS_OFFLINE_UNSETTLED_AMT, T1.ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_AMT, T1.WHOLESALE_AMT, 0 POS_OFFLINE_Sattled_AMT_roff, 0 POS_OFFLINE_unsattled_AMT_roff, 0 ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_AMT_roff, 0 wholesale_roundoff, coalesce (STK.qty, 0) STOCK_ASON FROM ( SELECT admsite_code, icode, SUM (POS_settled_saleqty) POS_OFFLINE_SETTLED_QTY, SUM (POS_unsettled_qty) POS_OFFLINE_UNSETTLED_QTY, SUM (Online_ecom_saleqty) ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_QTY, SUM (wholesale_qty) WHOLESALE_QTY, SUM (POS_settled_saleAMT) POS_OFFLINE_SETTLED_AMT, SUM (POS_unsettled_amt) POS_OFFLINE_UNSETTLED_AMT, SUM (Online_ecom_saleamt) ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_AMT, SUM (wholesale_amt) WHOLESALE_AMT FROM (SELECT admsite_code, icode, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL' THEN qty END Online_ecom_saleqty, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL' THEN NETAMT END Online_ecom_saleamt, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'RTL' THEN qty END POS_settled_saleqty, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'RTL' THEN NETAMT END POS_settled_saleAMT, 0 POS_unsettled_qty, 0 POS_unsettled_amt, 0 wholesale_qty, 0 wholesale_amt FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, coalesce (CHANNELTYPE, 'RTL') CHANNELTYPE, ICODE, D.QTY, TAXABLEAMT NETAMT FROM SALCSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALCSDET D ON (M.CSCODE = D.CSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (ICODE = I.CODE) Where m.csdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.DIVISION IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.SECTION IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.DEPARTMENT IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, coalesce (CHANNELTYPE, 'RTL') CHANNELTYPE, ICODE, D.QTY, TAXABLEAMT NETAMT FROM SALSSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALSSDET D ON (M.SSCODE = D.SSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (ICODE = I.CODE) Where m.ssdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.DIVISION IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.SECTION IN ( SELECT ('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.DEPARTMENT IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text))q1 UNION ALL SELECT M.ADMSITE_CODE, ICODE, 0 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.DIVISION IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.SECTION IN ( SELECT ('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.DEPARTMENT IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, icode, 0 Online_ecom_saleqty, 0 ADMSITE_CODE, ICODE, INVQTY QTY, EFFAMT AMT FROM SALINVMAIN M INNER JOIN SALINVDET D ON (M.INVCODE = D.INVCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = SITECODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (ICODE = I.CODE) Where M.invdt BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE ('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND m.saletype = 'O' UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, ICODE, -QTY QTY, -EFFAMT AMT FROM SALRTMAIN M INNER JOIN SALRTDET D ON (M.RTCODE = D.RTCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = SITECODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (ICODE = I.CODE) Where M.rtdt BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.DIVISION IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.SECTION IN ( SELECT regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND m.saletype = 'O')q2 GROUP BY admsite_code, icode) data GROUP BY admsite_code, icode) T1 left outer join ( SELECT S.ADMSITE_CODE, ICODE, SUM (QTY) QTY FROM INVSTOCK_ONHAND S INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (S.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) Where l.loctype <> 'T' GROUP BY s.admsite_code, icode ) STK on (T1.admsite_code = STK.ADMSITE_CODE and T1.icode = STK.ICODE) UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, '' icode, 0 POS_OFFLINE_SETTLED_QTY, 0 POS_OFFLINE_UNSETTLED_QTY, 0 admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_AMT_roff, POS_OFFLINE_Sattled_AMT_roff, 0 POS_OFFLINE_unsattled_AMT_roff, 0 wholesale_roundoff FROM ( SELECT admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL' THEN SUM (roundoff) ELSE 0 END ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_AMT_roff, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'RTL' THEN SUM (roundoff) ELSE 0 END POS_OFFLINE_Sattled_AMT_roff FROM ( SELECT admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, SUM (roundoff) roundoff FROM (SELECT admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, icode, qty, NETAMT, NETPAYABLE, inetamt, NETPAYABLE - inetamt roundoff FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, '' ICODE, 0 QTY, 0 NETAMT, MAX (NETPAYABLE) NETPAYABLE, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) INETAMT, M.CSCODE FROM SALCSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALCSDET D ON (M.CSCODE = D.CSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (ICODE = I.CODE) Where m.csdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY M.admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, M.cscode)q4)q5 GROUP BY admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, SUM (roundoff) roundoff FROM (SELECT admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, icode, qty, NETAMT, NETPAYABLE, inetamt, NETPAYABLE - inetamt roundoff FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, '' ICODE, 0 QTY, 0 NETAMT, MAX (NETPAYABLE) NETPAYABLE, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) INETAMT, M.SSCODE FROM SALSSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALSSDET D ON (M.SSCODE = D.SSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (ICODE = I.CODE) Where m.ssdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY M.admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, M.sscode)q6)q7 GROUP BY admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE)q8 GROUP BY admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE)q9 UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, '' CHANNELTYPE, 0 ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_AMT_roff, 0 POS_OFFLINE_Sattled_AMT_roff, SUM (roundoff) POS_OFFLINE_unsattled_AMT_roff, 0 wholesale_roundoff FROM (SELECT admsite_code, NETPAYABLE, POS_unsettled_amt, NETPAYABLE - POS_unsettled_amt roundoff FROM ( SELECT M.ADMSITE_CODE, M.CODE, MAX (NETPAYABLE) NETPAYABLE, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) POS_UNSETTLED_AMT FROM PSITE_POSBILL_PARK M INNER JOIN PSITE_POSBILLITEM_PARK D ON (M.CODE = PSITE_POSBILL_CODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (M.ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (ICODE = I.CODE) Where m.billdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY M.admsite_code, M.code)t1)t2 GROUP BY admsite_code UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, '' CHANNELTYPE, 0 ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_AMT_roff, 0 POS_OFFLINE_Sattled_AMT_roff, 0 POS_OFFLINE_unsattled_AMT_roff, SUM (wholesale_roundoff) wholesale_roundoff FROM ( SELECT admsite_code_OWNER admsite_code, SUM (roundoff) wholesale_roundoff FROM (SELECT ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, invcode, Netamt, inetamt, Netamt - inetamt roundoff FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, M.INVCODE, MAX (NETAMT) NETAMT, SUM (EFFAMT) INETAMT FROM SALINVMAIN M INNER JOIN SALINVDET D ON (M.INVCODE = D.INVCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = SITECODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (ICODE = I.CODE) Where M.invdt BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND m.saletype = 'O' GROUP BY M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, m.invcode)t3)t4 GROUP BY ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER admsite_code, -SUM (roundoff) wholesale_roundoff FROM (SELECT ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, rtcode, Netamt, inetamt, Netamt - inetamt roundoff FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, M.RTCODE, MAX (NETAMT) NETAMT, SUM (EFFAMT) INETAMT FROM SALRTMAIN M INNER JOIN SALRTDET D ON (M.RTCODE = D.RTCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = SITECODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (ICODE = I.CODE) Where M.rtdt BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND m.saletype = 'O' GROUP BY M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, m.rtcode)t6)t7 GROUP BY ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER)t8 GROUP BY admsite_code)t9 GROUP BY admsite_code) q1

(POS_unsettled_amt) POS_OFFLINE_UNSETTLED_AMT, SUM (Online_ecom_saleamt) ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_AMT, SUM (wholesale_amt) WHOLESALE_AMT, sum (offline_settled_billcount) POS_OFFLINE_SETTLED_COUNT, sum (POS_unsettled_billcount) POS_OFFLINE_UNSETTLED_COUNT, sum (online_billcount) ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_COUNT, sum (whoesale_billcount) WHOESALE_COUNT FROM (SELECT admsite_code, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL' THEN sum(NETAMT) end /*Bug Id*/ Online_ecom_saleamt, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'RTL' THEN sum(NETAMT) end /*Bug Id*/ POS_settled_saleAMT, COUNT (DISTINCT scheme_docno) online_billcount, 0 offline_settled_billcount, 0 POS_unsettled_amt, 0 POS_unsettled_billcount, 0 wholesale_amt, 0 whoesale_billcount FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, CASE WHEN (CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL') THEN M.CSCODE ELSE NULL END SCHEME_DOCNO, CASE WHEN (CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL') THEN SUM (TAXABLEAMT) ELSE NULL END NETAMT FROM SALCSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALCSDET D ON (M.CSCODE = D.CSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.csdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY M.admsite_code, M.CHANNELTYPE, CASE WHEN channeltype = 'ETL' THEN m.cscode ELSE NULL END UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, CASE WHEN (CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL') THEN M.SSCODE ELSE NULL END SCHEME_DOCNO, CASE WHEN (CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL') THEN SUM (TAXABLEAMT) ELSE NULL END NETAMT FROM SALSSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALSSDET D ON (M.SSCODE = D.SSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) WHere m.ssdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY M.admsite_code, M.CHANNELTYPE, CASE WHEN channeltype = 'ETL' THEN m.sscode ELSE NULL END)q1 WHERE CHANNELTYPE IS NOT NULL group by admsite_code,channeltype /*Bug Id*/ --START ADDITION UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, 0 Online_ecom_saleamt, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'RTL' THEN sum(NETAMT) end /*Bug Id*/ POS_settled_saleAMT, 0 online_billcount, COUNT (DISTINCT scheme_docno) offline_settled_billcount, 0 POS_unsettled_amt, 0 POS_unsettled_billcount, 0 wholesale_amt, 0 whoesale_billcount FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, 'RTL' CHANNELTYPE, M.CSCODE::text SCHEME_DOCNO, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) NETAMT FROM SALCSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALCSDET D ON (M.CSCODE = D.CSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.csdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND channeltype IS NULL AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY M.admsite_code, 'RTL'::text, m.cscode::text UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, 'RTL' CHANNELTYPE, M.SSCODE::text SCHEME_DOCNO, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) NETAMT FROM SALSSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALSSDET D ON (M.SSCODE = D.SSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.ssdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND channeltype IS NULL AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY M.admsite_code, 'RTL'::text, m.sscode::text UNION ALL SELECT M.ADMSITE_CODE, 'RTL' CHANNELTYPE, M.CODE SCHEME_DOCNO, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) NETAMT FROM PSITE_POSBILL M INNER JOIN PSITE_POSBILLITEM D ON (M.CODE = PSITE_POSBILL_CODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (M.ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) INNER JOIN PSITE_POSSTLM STLM ON (M.ADMSITE_CODE = STLM.ADMSITE_CODE and m.billdate::date = stlm.stlmfor::date) Where coalesce (stlm.status, 'U') = 'C' AND m.billdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND s.SITE_TYPE LIKE '%MS%' AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY m.admsite_code, 'RTL'::text, m.code UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, scheme_docno, sum(taxableamt) NETAMT /*Bug Id*/ FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, m.CSCODE::text SCHEME_DOCNO, taxableamt FROM SALCSMAIN M inner join salcsdet d on (m.cscode = d.cscode) /*Bug Id*/ INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.csdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND m.channeltype = 'RTL' AND s.SITE_TYPE NOT LIKE '%MS%' AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, m.SSCODE::text SCHEME_DOCNO, taxableamt FROM SALSSMAIN M inner join salssdet d on (m.sscode = d.sscode) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.ssdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND m.channeltype = 'RTL' AND s.SITE_TYPE NOT LIKE '%MS%' AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text))q2 group by admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, scheme_docno)q3 group by admsite_code,CHANNELTYPE /*Bug Id*/ UNION ALL SELECT M.ADMSITE_CODE, 0 ONLINE_ECOM_SALEAMT, 0 POS_SETTLED_SALEAMT, 0 ONLINE_BILLCOUNT, 0 OFFLINE_SETTLED_BILLCOUNT, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) POS_UNSETTLED_AMT, COUNT (DISTINCT M.CODE) POS_UNSETTLED_BILLCOUNT, 0 WHOLESALE_AMT, 0 WHOESALE_BILLCOUNT FROM PSITE_POSBILL_PARK M INNER JOIN PSITE_POSBILLITEM_PARK D ON (M.CODE = PSITE_POSBILL_CODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (M.ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.billdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY M.admsite_code, m.code UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, 0 Online_ecom_saleamt, 0 POS_settled_saleAMT, 0 online_billcount, 0 offline_settled_billcount, 0 POS_unsettled_amt, 0 POS_unsettled_billcount, SUM (AMT) wholesale_amt, COUNT (DISTINCT invcode) whoesale_billcount FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, M.INVCODE, SUM (EFFAMT) AMT FROM SALINVMAIN M INNER JOIN SALINVDET D ON (M.INVCODE = D.INVCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = SITECODE) Where M.invdt BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND m.saletype = 'O' GROUP BY M.admsite_code_OWNER, m.invcode UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, M.RTCODE INVCODE, -SUM (EFFAMT) AMT FROM SALRTMAIN M INNER JOIN SALRTDET D ON (M.RTCODE = D.RTCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = SITECODE) Where M.rtdt BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND m.saletype = 'O' GROUP BY M.admsite_code_OWNER, M.RTCODE)q4 GROUP BY admsite_code, invcode) data GROUP BY admsite_code

entity.object_description: Get details of Cost Centre wise Ledger/Sub-ledger detail for the selected date range and other parameters considered in the report.
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_CASH_BANK_CC_01*/ SELECT row_number() over() uk, KEYVAL, ENTCODE, CODE sitecode, SHRTNAME sitename, GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, SLNAME, ENTDT, ENTNO, ENTNAME ENTRY_NAME, NARTEXT, CASE WHEN PARCODE IS NULL THEN opening ELSE COALESCE ( LAG (CLOSING) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE, GLCODE, SLCODE ORDER BY KEYVAL), 0) END OPENING, DEBIT, CREDIT, CLOSING, parcode FROM (SELECT KEYVAL, ENTCODE, CODE, SHRTNAME, GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, SLNAME, ENTDT, ENTNO, ENTNAME, NARTEXT, OPENING, DEBIT, CREDIT, SUM (balance) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE, glcode, SLCODE ORDER BY keyval) CLOSING, LAG (keyval) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE, glcode, SLCODE ORDER BY keyval) parcode FROM ( SELECT KEYVAL, ENTCODE, CODE, SHRTNAME, GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, SLNAME, ENTDT, ENTNO, ENTNAME, NARTEXT, SUM (OPENING) OPENING, SUM (DEBIT) DEBIT, SUM (CREDIT) CREDIT, SUM (COALESCE (OPENING, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (DEBIT, 0)) - SUM (COALESCE (CREDIT, 0)) BALANCE FROM ( SELECT S.CODE::TEXT || GL.GLCODE::TEXT || CASE WHEN SL.SLCODE IS NOT NULL THEN SL.SLCODE ELSE NULL END::TEXT || T.entdt::DATE || F.ENTCODE::TEXT KEYVAL, F.ENTCODE, S.CODE, S.SHRTNAME, GL.GLCODE, GL.GLNAME, SL.SLCODE, SL.SLNAME, T.ENTDT, F.SCHEME_DOCNO ENTNO, ENT.ENTNAME, F.NARTEXT, 0 OPENING, SUM (coalesce (T.DAMOUNT,0)) DEBIT, SUM (coalesce (T.CAMOUNT,0)) CREDIT FROM FINGL GL INNER JOIN FINCOSTTAG T ON (T.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (T.REF_ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) INNER JOIN FINPOST F ON (T.POSTCODE = F.POSTCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL SL ON (T.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) INNER JOIN FINENTTYPE ENT ON (F.ENTTYPE = ENT.ENTTYPE) WHERE T.ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND S.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND COALESCE (GL.COSTAPP, 'N') = 'Y' AND (s.SHRTNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteShortCodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteShortCodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteShortCodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY F.ENTCODE, S.CODE, S.SHRTNAME, GL.GLCODE, GL.GLNAME, SL.SLCODE, SL.SLNAME, T.ENTDT, T.entdt::DATE, F.SCHEME_DOCNO, ENT.ENTNAME, F.NARTEXT, F.ENTCODE UNION ALL SELECT S.CODE::TEXT || G.GLCODE::TEXT || CASE WHEN SL.SLCODE IS NOT NULL THEN SL.SLCODE::TEXT ELSE NULL END::TEXT KEYVAL, NULL ENTCODE, S.CODE, S.SHRTNAME, G.GLCODE, G.GLNAME, SL.SLCODE, SL.SLNAME, NULL ENTDT, NULL ENTNO, NULL ENTNAME, NULL NARRATION, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT,0)) - SUM (coalesce (CAMOUNT,0)), 0 DEBIT, 0 CREDIT FROM FINGL G INNER JOIN FINCOSTTAG T ON (T.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (T.REF_ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL SL ON (T.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) WHERE T.ENTDT < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND S.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND COALESCE (G.COSTAPP, 'N') = 'Y' AND (s.SHRTNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteShortCodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteShortCodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteShortCodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (g.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND 1 = CASE WHEN G.TYPE IN ('A', 'L') AND T.YCODE >= (SELECT MIN (YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE > (SELECT MIN ( YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR)) THEN 1 WHEN G.TYPE IN ('I', 'E') AND T.YCODE = (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) THEN 1 END GROUP BY S.CODE, S.SHRTNAME, G.GLCODE, G.GLNAME, SL.SLCODE, SL.SLNAME UNION ALL SELECT S.CODE::TEXT || G.GLCODE::TEXT || CASE WHEN SL.SLCODE IS NOT NULL THEN SL.SLCODE::TEXT ELSE NULL END::TEXT KEYVAL, NULL ENTCODE, S.CODE, S.SHRTNAME, G.GLCODE, G.GLNAME, SL.SLCODE, SL.SLNAME, NULL ENTDT, NULL ENTNO, NULL ENTTYPE, NULL NARRATION, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT,0)) - SUM (coalesce (CAMOUNT,0)), 0 DEBIT, 0 CREDIT FROM FINGL G INNER JOIN FINCOSTOP T ON (T.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (T.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL SL ON (T.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) WHERE S.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (s.SHRTNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteShortCodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteShortCodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteShortCodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (g.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND 1 = CASE WHEN G.TYPE IN ('A', 'L') AND T.YCODE >= (SELECT MIN (YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE > (SELECT MIN ( YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR)) THEN 1 WHEN G.TYPE IN ('I', 'E') AND T.YCODE = (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) THEN 1 END AND COALESCE (G.COSTAPP, 'N') = 'Y' GROUP BY S.CODE, S.SHRTNAME, G.GLCODE, G.GLNAME, SL.SLCODE, SL.SLNAME) T1 GROUP BY KEYVAL, ENTCODE, CODE, SHRTNAME, GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, SLNAME, ENTDT, ENTNO, ENTNAME, NARTEXT) T2) T3

entity.object_description: TBD
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk ,SLCODE ,MODULENAME ,DOCUMENT_DATE ,DOCUMENT_NO ,DOCNO ,DOCDT ,DC_ORDDT ,GROUPNAME ,DATE_RANGE ,MONTH_NAME ,MONTHCODE ,DRCR ,CHQNO ,CHQDT ,CHQUE_TYPE ,CHQUE_DRAWN_ON ,ROUND(NO_OF_DAYS) NO_OF_DAYS ,ORDQTY ,DQTY ,CNLQTY ,PENDING_QTY ,DC_QTY ,SALAMT ,SALQTY ,RETURNAMT ,AMOUNT ,PENDING ,CHEQUE_AMOUNT ,SUM(PENDING) OVER (PARTITION BY SLCODE ORDER BY SLCODE) + SUM(CHEQUE_AMOUNT) OVER (PARTITION BY SLCODE ORDER BY SLCODE) EFFECTIVETOTAL FROM ( SELECT 'Sales Order' MODULENAME ,M.PCODE SLCODE ,M.ORDDT DOCUMENT_DATE ,M.SCHEME_DOCNO DOCUMENT_NO ,M.DOCNO ,M.DOCDT ,NULL DC_ORDDT ,NULL GROUPNAME ,NULL DATE_RANGE ,NULL MONTH_NAME ,NULL MONTHCODE ,NULL DRCR ,NULL CHQNO ,NULL CHQDT ,NULL CHQUE_TYPE ,NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON ,0 NO_OF_DAYS ,SUM(NVL(D.ORDQTY,0)) ORDQTY ,SUM(NVL(D.DQTY,0)) DQTY ,SUM(NVL(D.CNLQTY,0)) CNLQTY ,SUM(NVL(D.ORDQTY,0) -(NVL(D.DQTY,0)+NVL(D.CNLQTY,0))) PENDING_QTY ,0 DC_QTY ,0 SALAMT ,0 SALQTY ,0 RETURNAMT ,0 AMOUNT ,0 PENDING ,0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT ,null chequeamounttotal,null pendingamounttotal FROM SALORDMAIN M, SALORDDET D WHERE M.ORDCODE = D.ORDCODE AND M.ORDDT BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'),-3) AND (to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND M.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') GROUP BY M.SCHEME_DOCNO ,M.ORDDT ,M.DOCNO ,M.DOCDT ,M.PCODE HAVING SUM(NVL(D.ORDQTY,0)) <> SUM(NVL(D.DQTY,0))+ SUM(NVL(D.CNLQTY,0)) UNION ALL SELECT 'Delivery Issue Pending' MODULENAME ,M.PCODE SLCODE ,M.DCDT DOCUMENT_DATE ,M.SCHEME_DOCNO DOCUMENT_NO ,M.DOCNO ,NULL DOCDT ,ORD.ORDDT ORDDT ,NULL GROUPNAME ,NULL DATE_RANGE ,NULL MONTH_NAME ,NULL MONTHCODE ,NULL DRCR ,NULL CHQNO ,NULL CHQDT ,NULL CHQUE_TYPE ,NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON ,0 NO_OF_DAYS ,0 ORDQTY ,0 DQTY ,0 CNLQTY ,0 PENDING_QTY ,SUM(NVL(D.ISQTY,0)) DC_QTY ,0 SALAMT ,0 SALQTY ,0 RETURNAMT ,0 AMOUNT ,0 PENDING ,0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT ,null chequeamounttotal,null pendingamounttotal FROM INVDCMAIN M ,INVDCDET D ,SALINVMAIN INV ,SALORDMAIN ORD WHERE M.DCCODE = D.DCCODE AND M.ORDCODE = ORD.ORDCODE(+) AND M.INVCODE = INV.INVCODE(+) AND M.DCDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( M.INVCODE IS NULL OR INV.INVDT > to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND M.PCODE=(SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') GROUP BY M.DCDT ,M.SCHEME_DOCNO ,M.DOCNO ,ORD.ORDDT ,M.PCODE UNION ALL SELECT 'Sales Analysis (Monthwise)' MODULENAME ,PCODE SLCODE ,NULL DOCUMENT_DATE ,NULL DOCUMENT_NO ,NULL DOCNO ,NULL DOCDT ,null ORDDT ,null GROUPNAME ,YEAR_CODE DATE_RANGE ,MONTH_NAME ,MONTH_CODE ,NULL DRCR ,NULL CHQNO ,NULL CHQDT ,NULL CHQUE_TYPE ,NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON ,0 NO_OF_DAYS ,0 ORDQTY ,0 DQTY ,0 CNLQTY ,0 PENDING_QTY ,0 DC_QTY ,ROUND(sum(NVL(AMOUNT,0)),2) SALAMT ,NVL(sum(QTY),0) SALQTY ,0 RETURNAMT ,0 AMOUNT ,0 PENDING ,0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT ,null chequeamounttotal,null pendingamounttotal FROM ( SELECT YEAR_CODE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, SUM(NVL(AMOUNT_INV,0) - NVL(AMOUNT_RT,0)) AMOUNT, sum(NVL(QTY_INV,0) - NVL(QTY_RT,0)) QTY, PCODE FROM ( SELECT ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, TO_CHAR(SALINVMAIN.INVDT,'MON') MONTH_NAME, ADMMONTH.MCODE MONTH_CODE, NVL(SALINVDET.INVAMT,0) AMOUNT_INV, 0 AMOUNT_RT, NVL(SALINVDET.INVQTY,0) QTY_INV, 0 QTY_RT, SALINVMAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN, SALINVDET, ADMMONTH, ADMYEAR WHERE SALINVMAIN.INVCODE = SALINVDET.INVCODE AND TRUNC(SALINVMAIN.INVDT,'MON') = ADMMONTH.MONSTDT AND SALINVMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE AND SALINVMAIN.INVDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SALINVMAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' |
