'||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') UNION ALL SELECT ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, TO_CHAR(SALRTMAIN.RTDT,'MON') MONTH_NAME, ADMMONTH.MCODE MONTH_CODE, 0 AMOUNT_INV, (NVL(SALRTDET.RATE,0)*NVL(SALRTDET.QTY,0)) AMOUNT_RT, 0 QTY_INV, NVL(SALRTDET.QTY,0) QTY_RT ,SALRTMAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN, SALRTDET, ADMMONTH, ADMYEAR WHERE SALRTMAIN.RTCODE = SALRTDET.RTCODE AND SALRTMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE AND TRUNC(SALRTMAIN.RTDT,'MON') = ADMMONTH.MONSTDT AND SALRTMAIN.RTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SALRTMAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') ) GROUP BY YEAR_CODE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, PCODE UNION ALL SELECT YEAR_CODE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, SUM(NVL(AMOUNT_INV,0) - NVL(AMOUNT_RT,0)) AMOUNT, sum(NVL(QTY_INV,0) - NVL(QTY_RT,0)) QTY, PCODE FROM ( SELECT ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, TO_CHAR(SALINVMAIN.INVDT,'MON') MONTH_NAME, ADMMONTH.MCODE MONTH_CODE, NVL(SALINVDET.INVAMT,0) AMOUNT_INV, 0 AMOUNT_RT, NVL(SALINVDET.INVQTY,0) QTY_INV, 0 QTY_RT, SALINVMAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN, SALINVDET, ADMMONTH, ADMYEAR WHERE SALINVMAIN.INVCODE = SALINVDET.INVCODE AND SALINVMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE AND TRUNC(SALINVMAIN.INVDT,'MON') = ADMMONTH.MONSTDT AND SALINVMAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') AND SALINVMAIN.YCODE = ( SELECT MAX(YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) ) UNION ALL SELECT ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, TO_CHAR(SALRTMAIN.RTDT,'MON') MONTH_NAME, ADMMONTH.MCODE MONTH_CODE, 0 AMOUNT_INV, (NVL(SALRTDET.RATE,0)*NVL(SALRTDET.QTY,0)) AMOUNT_RT, 0 QTY_INV, NVL(SALRTDET.QTY,0) QTY_RT, SALRTMAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN, SALRTDET, ADMMONTH, ADMYEAR WHERE SALRTMAIN.RTCODE = SALRTDET.RTCODE AND SALRTMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE AND TRUNC(SALRTMAIN.RTDT,'MON') = ADMMONTH.MONSTDT AND SALRTMAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') AND SALRTMAIN.YCODE = ( SELECT MAX(YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) ) ) GROUP BY YEAR_CODE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, PCODE ) GROUP BY YEAR_CODE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, PCODE UNION ALL SELECT 'Sales Analysis (Groupwise)' MODULENAME ,PCODE SLCODE ,NULL DOCUMENT_DATE ,NULL DOCUMENT_NO ,NULL DOCNO ,NULL DOCDT ,null ORDDT ,GROUP_NAME GROUPNAME ,YEAR_CODE DATE_RANGE ,null MONTH_NAME ,null MONTHCODE ,NULL DRCR ,NULL CHQNO ,NULL CHQDT ,NULL CHQUE_TYPE ,NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON ,0 NO_OF_DAYS ,0 ORDQTY ,0 DQTY ,0 CNLQTY ,0 PENDING_QTY ,0 DC_QTY ,round(SUM(nvl(AMOUNT,0)),2) SAL_AMT ,SUM(nvl(QTY,0)) SAL_QTY ,0 RETURNAMT ,0 AMOUNT ,0 PENDING ,0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT ,null chequeamounttotal,null pendingamounttotal FROM ( SELECT YEAR_CODE, GROUP_NAME, SUM(NVL(AMOUNT_INV,0) - NVL(AMOUNT_RT,0)) AMOUNT, SUM(NVL(QTY_INV,0) - NVL(QTY_RT,0)) QTY, PCODE FROM ( SELECT ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, V_ITEM.GRPNAME GROUP_NAME, NVL(SALINVDET.INVAMT,0) AMOUNT_INV, 0 AMOUNT_RT, NVL(SALINVDET.INVQTY,0) QTY_INV, 0 QTY_RT, SALINVMAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN, SALINVDET, V_ITEM, ADMYEAR WHERE SALINVMAIN.INVCODE = SALINVDET.INVCODE AND SALINVDET.ICODE = V_ITEM.ICODE AND SALINVMAIN.YCODE= ADMYEAR.YCODE AND SALINVMAIN.INVDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SALINVMAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') UNION ALL SELECT ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, V_ITEM.GRPNAME GROUP_NAME, 0 AMOUNT_INV, (NVL(SALRTDET.RATE,0)*NVL(SALRTDET.QTY,0)) AMOUNT_RT, 0 QTY_INV, NVL(SALRTDET.QTY,0) QTY_RT, SALRTMAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN, SALRTDET, V_ITEM, ADMYEAR WHERE SALRTMAIN.RTCODE = SALRTDET.RTCODE AND SALRTDET.ICODE = V_ITEM.ICODE AND SALRTMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE AND SALRTMAIN.RTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SALRTMAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') ) GROUP BY YEAR_CODE ,GROUP_NAME ,PCODE UNION ALL SELECT YEAR_CODE, GROUP_NAME, SUM(NVL(AMOUNT_INV,0) - NVL(AMOUNT_RT,0)) AMOUNT, SUM(NVL(QTY_INV,0) - NVL(QTY_RT,0)) QTY, PCODE FROM ( SELECT ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, V_ITEM.GRPNAME GROUP_NAME, NVL(SALINVDET.INVAMT,0) AMOUNT_INV, 0 AMOUNT_RT, NVL(SALINVDET.INVQTY,0) QTY_INV, 0 QTY_RT, SALINVMAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN, SALINVDET, V_ITEM, ADMYEAR WHERE SALINVMAIN.INVCODE = SALINVDET.INVCODE AND SALINVDET.ICODE = V_ITEM.ICODE AND SALINVMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE AND SALINVMAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') AND SALINVMAIN.YCODE = ( SELECT MAX(YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) ) UNION ALL SELECT /*TO_CHAR(DTFR,'RR')||'-'||TO_CHAR(DTTO,'RR') YEAR_CODE,*/ ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, V_ITEM.GRPNAME GROUP_NAME, 0 AMOUNT_INV, NVL(SALRTDET.RATE,0)*NVL(SALRTDET.QTY,0) AMOUNT_RT, 0 QTY_INV, NVL(SALRTDET.QTY,0) QTY_RT, SALRTMAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN, SALRTDET, V_ITEM, ADMYEAR WHERE SALRTMAIN.RTCODE = SALRTDET.RTCODE AND SALRTDET.ICODE = V_ITEM.ICODE AND SALRTMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE AND SALRTMAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') AND SALRTMAIN.YCODE = ( SELECT MAX(YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) ) ) GROUP BY YEAR_CODE ,GROUP_NAME ,PCODE ) GROUP BY YEAR_CODE ,GROUP_NAME ,PCODE UNION ALL SELECT 'Sales Return Ratio' MODULENAME ,PCODE ,NULL DOCUMENT_DATE ,NULL DOCUMENT_NO ,NULL DOCNO ,NULL DOCDT ,NULL DC_ORDDT ,GRP.GRPNAME GROUPNAME ,YNAME DATE_RANGE ,NULL MONTH_NAME ,NULL MONTHCODE ,NULL DRCR ,NULL CHQNO ,NULL CHQDT ,NULL CHQUE_TYPE ,NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON ,0 NO_OF_DAYS ,0 ORDQTY ,0 DQTY ,0 CNLQTY ,0 PENDING_QTY ,0 DC_QTY ,SUM(SALE_AMT) SALE_AMT ,0 SALE_QTY ,SUM(RETURN_AMT) RETURN_AMT ,0 AMOUNT ,0 PENDING ,0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT ,null chequeamounttotal,null pendingamounttotal FROM ( SELECT YR.YNAME ,DET.ICODE ,DET.INVAMT SALE_AMT ,0 RETURN_AMT ,MAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN MAIN ,SALINVDET DET ,ADMYEAR YR WHERE MAIN.INVCODE = DET.INVCODE AND MAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') AND MAIN.YCODE IN (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) AND MAIN.INVDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MAIN.YCODE = YR.YCODE UNION ALL SELECT YR.YNAME ,DET.ICODE ,DET.INVAMT SALE_AMT ,0 RETURN_AMT ,MAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN MAIN ,SALINVDET DET ,ADMYEAR YR ,ADMMONTH WHERE MAIN.INVCODE = DET.INVCODE AND MAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') AND MAIN.YCODE = ( SELECT MAX(YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) ) AND TRUNC(MAIN.INVDT,'MON') = ADMMONTH.MONSTDT AND MAIN.YCODE = YR.YCODE UNION ALL SELECT YR.YNAME ,DET.ICODE ,0 ,(NVL(DET.QTY,0) * NVL(RATE, 0)) RETURN_AMT ,MAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN MAIN ,SALRTDET DET ,ADMYEAR YR WHERE MAIN.RTCODE = DET.RTCODE AND MAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') AND MAIN.YCODE IN (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) AND MAIN.RTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MAIN.YCODE = YR.YCODE UNION ALL SELECT YR.YNAME ,DET.ICODE ,0 ,(NVL(DET.QTY,0) * NVL(RATE, 0)) RETURN_AMT ,MAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN MAIN , SALRTDET DET , ADMYEAR YR , ADMMONTH WHERE MAIN.RTCODE = DET.RTCODE AND MAIN.PCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') AND MAIN.YCODE = ( SELECT MAX(YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) ) AND TRUNC(MAIN.RTDT,'MON') = ADMMONTH.MONSTDT AND MAIN.YCODE = YR.YCODE ) TRAN, INVITEM ITEM ,INVGRP GRP WHERE TRAN.ICODE = ITEM.ICODE AND ITEM.GRPCODE = GRP.GRPCODE GROUP BY YNAME ,GRP.GRPNAME ,PCODE UNION ALL SELECT 'Adjustment Analysis' ,B.SUB_LEDGER_CODE SLCODE ,NULL DOCUMENT_DATE ,NULL DOCUMENT_NO ,NULL DOCNO ,NULL DOCDT ,NULL DC_ORDDT ,NULL GROUPNAME ,TO_CHAR(ADMYEAR.DTFR,'RR')||'-'||TO_CHAR(ADMYEAR.DTTO,'RR') DATE_RANGE ,NULL MONTH_NAME ,NULL MONTHCODE ,NULL DRCR ,NULL CHQNO ,NULL CHQDT ,NULL CHQUE_TYPE ,NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON ,Abs((NVL(SUM(NVL(DECODE(B.DRCR,'Dr',A.AMOUNT,'Cr',-A.AMOUNT),0)*NVL((NVL(A.RECEIPT_DT,to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))-B.DOCUMENT_DATE),0)),0))/NVL(SUM(A.AMOUNT),1)) NO_OF_DAYS ,0 ORDQTY ,0 DQTY ,0 CNLQTY ,0 PENDING_QTY ,0 DC_QTY ,0 SALAMT ,0 SALQTY ,0 RETURNAMT ,0 AMOUNT ,0 PENDING ,0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT ,null chequeamounttotal,null pendingamounttotal FROM ( SELECT FINTAG.POSTCODE1 POSTING_CODE, FINPOST.ENTDT RECEIPT_DT, NVL(FINTAG.AMOUNT,0) AMOUNT FROM FINTAG,FINPOST WHERE FINTAG.POSTCODE2 = FINPOST.POSTCODE UNION ALL SELECT FINTAG.POSTCODE2, FINPOST.ENTDT, NVL(FINTAG.AMOUNT,0) FROM FINTAG,FINPOST WHERE FINTAG.POSTCODE1 = FINPOST.POSTCODE ) A ,( SELECT A.DOCUMENT_DATE, A.YEAR, A.DRCR, A.POSTING_CODE, A.SUB_LEDGER_CODE FROM V_ADJ A,(SELECT YCODE YEAR FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) B WHERE A.YEAR BETWEEN (B.YEAR - 2) AND B.YEAR AND A.SUB_LEDGER_CODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') AND A.ENTRY_TYPE ='VDP' ) B ,ADMYEAR WHERE A.POSTING_CODE = B.POSTING_CODE AND B.YEAR = ADMYEAR.YCODE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ADMYEAR.DTFR,'RR')||'-'||TO_CHAR(ADMYEAR.DTTO,'RR') ,B.SUB_LEDGER_CODE UNION ALL SELECT 'Outstanding Summary' MODULENAME ,FINSL.SLCODE PARTYCODE ,CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' THEN DOCUMENT_DATE ELSE DECODE(FINSL.DUE_DATE_BASIS, 'E', DOCUMENT_DATE, NVL(REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE)) END DOCUMENT_DATE ,DISPLAY_DOCNO DISPLAY_DOCNO ,DECODE(REF_NO,NULL,NULL,DECODE(REF_DT,NULL,REF_NO,REF_NO||' ('||TO_CHAR(REF_DT,'DD/MM/RR')||')')) REF_NO ,NULL DOCDT ,NULL DC_ORDDT ,NULL GROUPNAME ,NULL DATE_RANGE ,NULL MONTH_NAME ,NULL MONTHCODE ,DRCR DRCR ,NULL CHQNO ,NULL CHQDT ,NULL CHQUE_TYPE ,NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON ,to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' THEN DOCUMENT_DATE ELSE DECODE(FINSL.DUE_DATE_BASIS, 'E', DOCUMENT_DATE, NVL(REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE)) END NO_OF_DAYS ,0 SALES_ORDQTY ,0 SALES_DQTY ,0 SALES_CNLQTY ,0 SALES_PENDING_QTY ,0 DC_QTY ,0 SALAMT ,0 SALQTY ,0 RETURNAMT ,SUM(DECODE(DRCR,'Dr',NVL(AMOUNT,0),'Cr',0-NVL(AMOUNT,0))) AMOUNT ,(SUM(DECODE(DRCR,'Dr',NVL(AMOUNT,0),'Cr',0-NVL(AMOUNT,0)))) + SUM(CASE WHEN DRCR = 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) <= 0 THEN NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) ELSE 0-NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) END ELSE CASE WHEN NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) <= 0 THEN 0-NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) ELSE NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) END END) PENDINGAMT ,0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT , null AS chequeamounttotal , (SUM(DECODE(DRCR,'Dr',NVL(AMOUNT,0),'Cr',0-NVL(AMOUNT,0)))) + SUM(CASE WHEN DRCR = 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) <= 0 THEN NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) ELSE 0-NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) END ELSE CASE WHEN NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) <= 0 THEN 0-NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) ELSE NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) END END) pendingamounttotal FROM V_ADJ ,FINSL ,FINGL ,( SELECT detail_post_code ,SUM(detail_receipt_amt) detail_receipt_amt FROM ( SELECT a.postcode1 detail_post_code ,CASE WHEN entdt <= to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN CASE WHEN a.enttype1='VDP' THEN NVL(a.amount,0) ELSE DECODE(NVL(b.damount,0), 0, -a.amount, a.amount) END ELSE 0 END detail_receipt_amt FROM fintag a ,finpost b ,finsl s ,admcls cl WHERE a.postcode2 = b.postcode AND b.slcode = s.slcode AND s.clscode = cl.clscode AND 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND b.entdt <= to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND DECODE(s.due_date_basis, 'E', entdt, NVL(docdt, entdt)) <= to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END AND b.slcode = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') UNION ALL SELECT a.postcode2 detail_post_code ,CASE WHEN entdt <= to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN CASE WHEN a.enttype2='VDP' THEN abs(NVL(a.amount,0)) ELSE DECODE(NVL(b.damount,0),0,-a.amount,a.amount) END ELSE 0 END detail_receipt_amt FROM fintag a ,finpost b ,finsl s ,admcls cl WHERE a.postcode1 = b.postcode AND b.slcode = s.slcode AND s.clscode = cl.clscode AND 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND b.entdt <= to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND DECODE(s.due_date_basis, 'E', entdt, NVL(docdt, entdt)) <= to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END AND b.slcode = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') ) GROUP BY detail_post_code ) adjustment WHERE V_ADJ.POSTING_CODE = ADJUSTMENT.DETAIL_POST_CODE(+) AND 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND V_ADJ.document_date <= to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND DECODE(FINSL.due_date_basis, 'ENTRY DATE', V_ADJ.document_date, nvl(V_ADJ.ref_dt, V_ADJ.document_date)) <= to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END AND V_ADJ.SUB_LEDGER_CODE = FINSL.SLCODE AND V_ADJ.GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE = FINGL.GLCODE AND FINSL.SLCODE = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') AND FINGL.SRCTYPE = 'R' GROUP BY CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' THEN DOCUMENT_DATE ELSE DECODE(FINSL.DUE_DATE_BASIS, 'E', DOCUMENT_DATE, NVL(REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE)) END ,DISPLAY_DOCNO ,to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' THEN DOCUMENT_DATE ELSE DECODE(FINSL.DUE_DATE_BASIS, 'E', DOCUMENT_DATE, NVL(REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE)) END ,DECODE(REF_NO,NULL,NULL,DECODE(REF_DT,NULL,REF_NO,REF_NO||' ('||TO_CHAR(REF_DT,'DD/MM/RR')||')')) ,DRCR ,FINSL.SLCODE HAVING (SUM(DECODE(DRCR,'Dr',NVL(AMOUNT,0),'Cr',0-NVL(AMOUNT,0)))) + SUM(CASE WHEN DRCR = 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) <= 0 THEN NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) ELSE 0-NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) END ELSE CASE WHEN NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) <= 0 THEN 0-NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) ELSE NVL(DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT,0) END END) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT 'PDC' MODULENAME ,sl.slcode ,entdt docdt ,NULL DOCUMENT_NO ,docno DOCNO ,NULL DOCDT ,NULL DC_ORDDT ,NULL GROUPNAME ,NULL DATE_RANGE ,NULL MONTH_NAME ,NULL MONTHCODE ,NULL DRCR ,CHQNO CHQNO ,CHQDT CHQDT ,DECODE(NVL(camount,0), 0, 'Payment', 'Receipt') CHQUE_TYPE ,drawnon CHQUE_DRAWN_ON ,(CHQDT - to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) NO_OF_DAYS ,0 ORDQTY ,0 DQTY ,0 CNLQTY ,0 PENDING_QTY ,0 DC_QTY ,0 SALAMT ,0 SALQTY ,0 RETURNAMT ,0 AMOUNT ,0 PENDING ,sum(damount)-sum(camount) cheque_amount ,0 chequeamounttotal ,null AS pendingamounttotal FROM finpost aj ,ginssot.dim$finsl sl ,ginssot.dim$fingl gl ,ginssot.dim$admcls ls ,ginssot.dim$finsl ag ,ginssot.dim$admcity ct WHERE aj.slcode = sl.slcode AND aj.glcode = gl.glcode and sl.clscode = ls.clscode AND sl.bctname = ct.ctname(+) and sl.agcode = ag.slcode(+) AND (gl.glcode IS NULL OR gl.srctype = 'AR/AP') AND aj.chqdt > to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND trunc(aj.time) <=to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND sl.slcode = (SELECT CODE FROM ginview.lv_sub_ledger WHERE name||' | '||identity_no||' | '||class_name = '@CustomerNameSL@') GROUP BY sl.slcode ,entdt ,chqno ,chqdt ,DECODE(NVL(camount,0), 0, 'Payment', 'Receipt') ,drawnon ,docno )

entity.object_description: Get all details of the Customer Master Label as per selected report parameter. This data source to be used for specific report purpose. Source from Inventory Status Summary for Inventory Purpose
entity.sql_stmt: WITH LREC AS (select (row_number() over (order by s.SLNAME || '(' || s.slid || ')'))-1 rn, s.slcode AS code, s.SLNAME || '(' || s.slid || ')' as NAME, s.baddr AS BILLING_ADDRESS, bct.stname AS BILLING_STATE, bct.dist AS BILLING_DISTRICT, s.bctname AS BILLING_CITY, s.bpin AS BILLING_PINCODE, s.bfx2 AS BILLING_MOBILE, s.glcode AS ARAP_GLCODE, CASE WHEN s.ext = 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END EXTINCT, COALESCE(ag.slname, 'No Agent') AS AGENT_NAME from finsl s JOIN fingl gl ON s.glcode = gl.glcode JOIN admcls cls ON s.clscode = cls.clscode LEFT JOIN admcity bct ON s.bctname = bct.ctname LEFT JOIN finsl ag ON s.agcode = ag.slcode WHERE gl.srctype = 'R' and cls.clstype = 'C' and (coalesce (nullif('@CustomerClass@', ''), '-1')::text = '-1' or cls.clsname = '@CustomerClass@') and (coalesce (nullif('@City@', ''), '-1')::text = '-1' or (s.bctname = '@City@' and '@City@' <> '-1')) and (coalesce (nullif('@State@', ''), '-1')::text = '-1' or bct.stname = '@State@') and (coalesce (nullif('@AgentSubledger@', ''), '-1')::text = '-1' or COALESCE(ag.slname, 'No Agent') = '@AgentSubledger@') and (coalesce (nullif('@ARAPLedger@', '')::int, -1) = -1 or s.glcode = nullif('@ARAPLedger@', '')::int) and (coalesce (nullif('@Extinct@', ''), '-1')::text = '-1' or coalesce(NULLIF(s.ext,''),'No') = '@Extinct@') and (s.SLNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)), grouped AS ( SELECT (rn / 3) + 1 AS row_group, (rn % 3) + 1 AS pos , CODE, NAME, BILLING_ADDRESS, BILLING_STATE, BILLING_DISTRICT, BILLING_CITY, BILLING_PINCODE, BILLING_MOBILE, ARAP_GLCODE, EXTINCT, AGENT_NAME FROM LREC) SELECT NULL REQUESTID ,row_group UK ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN CODE ELSE NULL END) CODE_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN NAME ELSE NULL END) NAME_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_ADDRESS ELSE NULL END) BILLING_ADDRESS_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_STATE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_STATE_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_DISTRICT ELSE NULL END) BILLING_DISTRICT_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_CITY ELSE NULL END) BILLING_CITY_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_PINCODE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_PINCODE_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_MOBILE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_MOBILE_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN ARAP_GLCODE ELSE NULL END) ARAP_GLCODE_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN EXTINCT ELSE NULL END) EXTINCT_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN AGENT_NAME ELSE NULL END) AGENT_NAME_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN CODE ELSE NULL END) CODE_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN NAME ELSE NULL END) NAME_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_ADDRESS ELSE NULL END) BILLING_ADDRESS_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_STATE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_STATE_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_DISTRICT ELSE NULL END) BILLING_DISTRICT_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_CITY ELSE NULL END) BILLING_CITY_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_PINCODE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_PINCODE_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_MOBILE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_MOBILE_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN ARAP_GLCODE ELSE NULL END) ARAP_GLCODE_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN EXTINCT ELSE NULL END) EXTINCT_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN AGENT_NAME ELSE NULL END) AGENT_NAME_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN CODE ELSE NULL END) CODE_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN NAME ELSE NULL END) NAME_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_ADDRESS ELSE NULL END) BILLING_ADDRESS_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_STATE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_STATE_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_DISTRICT ELSE NULL END) BILLING_DISTRICT_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_CITY ELSE NULL END) BILLING_CITY_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_PINCODE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_PINCODE_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_MOBILE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_MOBILE_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN ARAP_GLCODE ELSE NULL END) ARAP_GLCODE_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN EXTINCT ELSE NULL END) EXTINCT_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN AGENT_NAME ELSE NULL END) AGENT_NAME_3 FROM grouped group by row_group

entity.object_description: Get details of Document Adjustments as per the selected date range and other parameters considered.
entity.sql_stmt: /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 71286 Jyotirmoy Entry type is not showing for unadjusted documents */ /*DOCUMENT_ADJUSTMENT_REGISTER*/ with dta as ( select p.entcode, p.postcode as main_post_code, p.docno as ref_no, p.scheme_docno as main_scheme_docno, case when '@DisplayType@' = 'D' then coalesce(p.docdt,p.entdt) else p.entdt end as main_document_date, p.glcode, p.slcode as party_code, coalesce(p.damount,0) - coalesce(p.camount,0) as amount, ent.entname, coalesce(p.adjamt,0) as adjamt from finpost p join fingl gl on p.glcode = gl.glcode join finsl sl on p.slcode = sl.slcode join finenttype ent on p.enttype = ent.enttype join admcls cl on sl.clscode = cl.clscode where p.enttype in ('VDG', 'VDP', 'VDC', 'JMD', 'JMC', 'JDJ', 'PIM', 'PRM', 'PSM', 'SIM', 'SRM', 'SSM', 'TFS', 'TFP', 'SCP', 'SRP', 'CTM', 'CRM', 'CSM', 'GVJ', 'PJN', 'JDT', 'SDM', 'SCM', 'PDM', 'PCM', 'PJM', 'PJD', 'JDR') and (case when '@DisplayType@' = 'D' then coalesce(p.docdt,p.entdt) else p.entdt end) between TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') and (coalesce(to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'),'-1') = '-1' or (coalesce(to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'),'-1') = '0' and sl.agcode is null) or (coalesce(to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'),'-1') <> '-1' and coalesce(to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'),'-1') <> '0' and ( p.enttype in ('SIM', 'SRM', 'PIM', 'PRM', 'CTM', 'CSM', 'VDP', 'JMC', 'JMD') and exists ( select 1 from ( select m.invcode::text as code, m.agcode from salinvmain m union all select m.rtcode::text, m.agcode from salrtmain m union all select m.invcode::text, m.agcode from purinvmain m union all select m.rtcode::text, m.agcode from purrtmain m union all select m.vchcode::text, m.slcode from finvchdet m union all select m.jrncode::text, m.slcode from finjrnmain m ) t where t.code = p.entcode and t.agcode = to_number(nullif('@Agent@', ''), '999999999') ) ) ) ) and (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (sl.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and ( coalesce(nullif('@DocumentType@', ''), '-1') = '-1' or ent.entname = nullif('@DocumentType@', '') ) and ( (coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' and cl.clsname = nullif('@AllClass@', '')) or coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) and ( coalesce(nullif('@ShowAdjustment@', ''), '-1') = '-1' or ( coalesce(nullif('@ShowAdjustment@', ''), '-1') = 'Adjusted' and coalesce(p.damount, 0) - coalesce(p.camount, 0) - coalesce(p.adjamt, 0) = 0 ) or ( coalesce(nullif('@ShowAdjustment@', ''), '-1') = 'Pending' and coalesce(p.damount, 0) - coalesce(p.camount, 0) - coalesce(p.adjamt, 0) <> 0 ) ) and p.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') ) select null as requestid, row_number() over() as uk, entcode, main_post_code, ref_no, main_scheme_docno, main_document_date as document_date, glcode, party_code, amount, entname as document_type, detail_post_code, receipt_no, receipt_dt, receipt_amt, receipt_document_type, receipt_entcode from ( select t.entcode, t.main_post_code, t.ref_no, t.main_scheme_docno, t.main_document_date, t.glcode, t.party_code, t.amount, t.entname, a.postcode1 as detail_post_code, b.entcode as receipt_entcode, b.scheme_docno as receipt_no, case when '@DisplayType@' = 'D' then coalesce(b.docdt, b.entdt) else b.entdt end as receipt_dt, case when a.enttype1 = 'VDP' then coalesce(a.amount, 0) else case when coalesce(b.damount, 0) = 0 then -a.amount else a.amount end end as receipt_amt, ent.entname as receipt_document_type from fintag a join dta t on t.main_post_code = a.postcode1 join finpost b on a.postcode2 = b.postcode join finenttype ent on a.enttype2 = ent.enttype union all select t.entcode, t.main_post_code, t.ref_no, t.main_scheme_docno, t.main_document_date, t.glcode, t.party_code, t.amount, t.entname, a.postcode2 as detail_post_code, b.entcode as receipt_entcode, b.scheme_docno as receipt_no, case when '@DisplayType@' = 'D' then coalesce(b.docdt, b.entdt) else b.entdt end as receipt_dt, case when a.enttype2 = 'VDP' then ABS(coalesce(a.amount, 0)) else case when coalesce(b.damount, 0) = 0 then -a.amount else a.amount end end as receipt_amt, ent.entname as receipt_document_type from fintag a join dta t on t.main_post_code = a.postcode2 join finpost b on a.postcode1 = b.postcode join finenttype ent on a.enttype1 = ent.enttype ) union all select null as requestid, row_number() over() as uk, entcode, main_post_code, ref_no, main_scheme_docno, main_document_date as document_date, glcode, party_code, amount, entname as document_type,/*71286*/ null as detail_post_code, null as receipt_no, null as receipt_dt, null as receipt_amt, null as receipt_document_type, null as receipt_entcode from dta where adjamt = 0

entity.object_description: This data source will show finance transaction entry type.
entity.sql_stmt: select row_number() over() uk, entname from(select distinct ENTNAME from finenttype where enttype <>'ROM') a

entity.object_description: This Data Source will show ledger wise posting across different transactions. In this data source charge information also available for relevant transactions.
entity.sql_stmt: /* Feature Id : 111152 | Phase IV, Ginssot Removal */ /*Transaction History (Finance)*/ select row_number() over() uk, LEDGER, LEDGER_code, ENTRY_TYPE, Entry_Clasification, CHARGE_NAME, TAX_CHARGE, Charge_Source, DAMOUNT, CAMOUNT, OPENING, ledger_opening from (/*OPENING PART*/ select LEDGER, ledger_code, ENTRY_TYPE, Entry_Clasification, CHARGE_NAME, TAX_CHARGE, Charge_Source, DAMOUNT, CAMOUNT, OPENING, ginview.erpbalance('GL', ledger_code, to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd'), yname, null::int, to_number('@ConnOUCode@','99999')::int) ledger_opening from ( select GL.GLNAME LEDGER, f.glcode ledger_code, 'Opn' ENTRY_TYPE, 'Opening' Entry_Clasification, null CHARGE_NAME, null TAX_CHARGE, null Charge_Source, 0 DAMOUNT, 0 CAMOUNT, SUM (F.DAMOUNT) - SUM (CAMOUNT) OPENING, ( select yname from admyear where TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto) yname from FINPOST F inner join FINGL GL on F.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE where ENTDT::DATE < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and f.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@', '9G999g999999999999d99') and (gl.glname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g) or coalesce (nullif ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) group by GL.GLNAME, f.glcode)q1 union all /*TRANSACTION PART*/ select LEDGER, LEDGER_code, ENTRY_TYPE, Entry_Clasification, CHARGE_NAME, TAX_CHARGE, Charge_Source, SUM (DAMOUNT) DAMOUNT, SUM (CAMOUNT) CAMOUNT, SUM (OPENING) OPENING, null from ( select GL.GLNAME LEDGER, f.glcode LEDGER_code, ENTP.ENTNAME ENTRY_TYPE, ginview.fnc_get_trns_name (F.POSTCODE, 'CL', F.ENTTYPE) Entry_Clasification, ginview.fnc_get_trns_name (F.POSTCODE, 'CN', F.ENTTYPE) CHARGE_NAME, ginview.fnc_get_trns_name (F.POSTCODE, 'TC', F.ENTTYPE) TAX_CHARGE, ginview.fnc_get_trns_name (F.POSTCODE, 'CS', F.ENTTYPE) Charge_Source, DAMOUNT, CAMOUNT, 0 OPENING from FINPOST F inner join FINGL GL on F.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE inner join FINENTTYPE ENTP on F.ENTTYPE = ENTP.ENTTYPE where f.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@', '9G999g999999999999d99') and ((to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 and F.RELEASE_STATUS = 'P') or to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '9G999g999999999999d99')= 1) and ENTDT::DATE between TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (gl.glname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g) or coalesce (nullif ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (ENTP.entname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#FinanceTransactionEntryTypeEntnameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#FinanceTransactionEntryTypeEntnameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g) or coalesce (nullif ('@#FinanceTransactionEntryTypeEntnameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text))q2 group by LEDGER, LEDGER_code, ENTRY_TYPE, Entry_Clasification, CHARGE_NAME, TAX_CHARGE, Charge_Source)q3

entity.object_description: This is a report specific source dedicated to produce #Balance Sheet# and #Balance Sheet Periodic# system report. Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
entity.sql_stmt: select * from ginview.fnc_ri$finbs( to_date('@FinHidDTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd')::date, to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')::date, nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int, '@OpeningOnly@'::character varying, '@IncludeUnpostedRecords@', '@IncludeZeroBalanceRecords@' );

entity.object_description: This is a report specific source dedicated to produce #Balance Sheet Tabular# system report. Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
entity.sql_stmt: WITH SelectedYear AS (SELECT ycode vycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto), CompanyPnLLedger AS (SELECT profit_loss_glcode FROM admcmpprof WHERE cmpcode = (SELECT cmpcode FROM admcmp)) select NULL datasetid ,row_number() over () UK , level1 , level2 , level3 , level4 , glcode , glname , opening , debit , credit , balance FROM (SELECT grp.level1 level1 ,case when NULLIF('@Level@','') IN ('Level2', 'Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') then grp.level2 end level2 ,case when NULLIF('@Level@','') IN ('Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') then grp.level3 end level3 ,case when NULLIF('@Level@','') IN ('Level4', 'With Ledger') then grp.level4 end level4 ,case when NULLIF('@Level@','') = 'With Ledger' then t1.glcode end glcode ,case when NULLIF('@Level@','') = 'With Ledger' then GL.glname end glname ,sum(opening) opening ,sum(debit) debit ,sum(credit) credit ,sum(opening) + sum(debit)-sum(credit) balance FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN g.TYPE IN ('I','E') THEN (select profit_loss_glcode from CompanyPnLLedger) else P.GLCODE end GLCODE, 0 opening, coalesce(P.DAMOUNT,0) DEBIT, coalesce(P.CAMOUNT,0) CREDIT FROM FINPOST P JOIN FINGL G ON P.GLCODE = G.GLCODE WHERE p.admou_code = NULLIF('@ConnOUCode@','')::INT AND P.ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') /*AND GLCODE IN (SELECT GLCODE FROM FINGL WHERE TYPE IN ('A', 'L'))*/ AND (( COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::INT,1) = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::INT,1) = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) UNION ALL SELECT P1.GLCODE GLCODE, SUM(coalesce(P1.DAMOUNT,0)) - SUM(coalesce(P1.CAMOUNT,0)) GL_OPENING, 0 debit, 0 credit FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN g.TYPE IN ('I','E') THEN (select profit_loss_glcode from CompanyPnLLedger) else P.GLCODE end GLCODE, SUM(coalesce(P.DAMOUNT,0)) DAMOUNT, SUM(coalesce(P.CAMOUNT,0)) CAMOUNT FROM FINPOST P JOIN FINGL G ON P.GLCODE = G.GLCODE JOIN SelectedYear Y ON P.YCODE=Y.vycode WHERE P.ENTDT < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') /*AND P.YCODE = vycode*/ AND p.admou_code = NULLIF('@ConnOUCode@','')::INT AND (( COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::INT,1) = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::INT,1) = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) /*AND GLCODE IN (SELECT GLCODE FROM FINGL WHERE TYPE IN ('A', 'L'))*/ GROUP BY CASE WHEN g.TYPE IN ('I','E') THEN (select profit_loss_glcode from CompanyPnLLedger) else P.GLCODE end UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN g.TYPE IN ('I','E') THEN (select profit_loss_glcode from CompanyPnLLedger) else o.GLCODE end GLCODE, coalesce(O.OPDAMT,0), coalesce(O.OPCAMT,0) FROM FINGLOP O JOIN FINGL G ON o.GLCODE = G.GLCODE JOIN SelectedYear Y ON o.YCODE=Y.vycode WHERE o.admou_code = NULLIF('@ConnOUCode@','')::INT /*AND GLCODE IN (SELECT GLCODE FROM FINGL WHERE TYPE IN ('A', 'L')*/ ) P1 GROUP BY P1.GLCODE ) t1 ,fingl gl ,ginview.lv_chart_of_accounts grp WHERE t1.glcode = gl.glcode AND gl.grpcode = grp.code GROUP BY grp.level1 ,case when NULLIF('@Level@','') IN ('Level2', 'Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') then grp.level2 end ,case when NULLIF('@Level@','') IN ('Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') then grp.level3 end ,case when NULLIF('@Level@','') IN ('Level4', 'With Ledger') then grp.level4 end ,case when NULLIF('@Level@','') = 'With Ledger' then t1.glcode end ,case when NULLIF('@Level@','') = 'With Ledger' then GL.glname end) T WHERE (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','')::INT,1) = 1 OR (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','')::INT,1) = 0 AND balance <> 0))

entity.object_description: This is a report specific source dedicated to produce #Profit and Loss# and #Profit and Loss Periodic# system report. Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
entity.sql_stmt: select * from ginview.fnc_ri$finpl( to_date('@FinHidDTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd')::date, to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')::date, nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int, '@OpeningOnly@'::character varying, '@IncludeUnpostedRecords@', '@IncludeZeroBalanceRecords@' );

entity.object_description: This is a report specific source dedicated to produce #Profit&Loss (Tabular)# system report. Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 02-02-2023 12:54:07 (QP5 v5.294) */ SELECT NULL requestid, row_number() over() uk, grp.level1 level1, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level2', 'Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level2 END level2, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level3 END level3, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level4 END level4, CASE WHEN '@Level@' = 'With Ledger' THEN t1.glcode END glcode, CASE WHEN '@Level@' = 'With Ledger' THEN GL.glname END glname, SUM (opening_only) opening_only, /*Bug Id 107105*/ SUM (opening) opening, SUM (debit) debit, SUM (credit) credit, SUM (opening) + SUM (debit) - SUM (credit) balance FROM (SELECT P.GLCODE, 0 opening_only, /*Bug Id 107105*/ 0 opening, coalesce (P.DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, coalesce (P.CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT FROM FINPOST P WHERE p.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND p.glcode IN (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE TYPE IN ('I', 'E')) AND P.ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) UNION ALL SELECT P1.GLCODE GLCODE, 0 opening_only, /*Bug Id 107105*/ SUM (coalesce (P1.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (P1.CAMOUNT, 0)) GL_OPENING, 0 debit, 0 credit FROM ( SELECT P.GLCODE, SUM (coalesce (P.DAMOUNT, 0)) DAMOUNT, SUM (coalesce (P.CAMOUNT, 0)) CAMOUNT FROM FINPOST P WHERE P.ENTDT < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND P.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND p.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND p.glcode IN (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE TYPE IN ('I', 'E')) AND ( ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) GROUP BY P.GLCODE UNION ALL SELECT O.GLCODE, coalesce (O.OPDAMT, 0), coalesce (O.OPCAMT, 0) FROM FINGLOP O WHERE O.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND O.glcode IN (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE TYPE IN ('I', 'E')) AND o.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99')) P1 GROUP BY P1.GLCODE UNION ALL /*Changes Start For Bug Id 107105*/ SELECT O.GLCODE, CASE WHEN (SELECT dtfr FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) = TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN SUM (coalesce (DAMount, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (O.CAMOUNT, 0)) ELSE 0 END opening_only, /*Bug Id 107105*/ 0 opening, 0 debit, 0 credit --coalesce (O.OPCAMT, 0) CAMOUNT FROM FINPOST O WHERE O.YCODE < (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND O.glcode IN (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE TYPE IN ('I', 'E')) AND o.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') GROUP BY o.GLCODE /*Changes End For Bug Id 107105*/ ) t1 inner join fingl gl on (t1.glcode = gl.glcode) inner join ginview.lv_chart_of_accounts grp on (gl.grpcode = grp.code) GROUP BY grp.level1, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level2', 'Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level2 END, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level3 END, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level4 END, CASE WHEN '@Level@' = 'With Ledger' THEN t1.glcode END, CASE WHEN '@Level@' = 'With Ledger' THEN GL.glname end having ((nullif('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','')::int = 1 ) or ((nullif('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','')::int = 0) and (SUM (opening) + SUM (debit) - SUM (credit))<>0))

entity.object_description: This is a report specific source dedicated to produce #Trial Balance# and #Trial Balance Periodic# system report. Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
entity.sql_stmt: select * from ginview.fnc_ri$fintb( to_date('@FinHidDTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd')::date, to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')::date, nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int, '@OpeningOnly@'::character varying, '@ShowSubledgerYN@', '@IncludeUnpostedRecords@', '@IncludeZeroBalanceRecords@' );

entity.object_description: This is a report specific source dedicated to produce #Trial Balance Tabular# system report. Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
entity.sql_stmt: WITH SelectedYear AS ( SELECT ycode AS vycode FROM admyear WHERE to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto ) SELECT NULL datasetid, min(displayorder) display_order, row_number() over () UK, grp.level1 level1, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('Level2', 'Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger', 'With Subledger') THEN grp.level2 END level2, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger','With Subledger') THEN grp.level3 END level3, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('Level4', 'With Ledger','With Subledger') THEN grp.level4 END level4, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('With Ledger','With Subledger') THEN t1.glcode END glcode, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('With Ledger','With Subledger') THEN GL.glname END glname, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('With Subledger') THEN t1.slcode END slcode, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('With Subledger') THEN SL.slname END slname, sum(opening) opening, sum(debit) debit, sum(credit) credit, sum(balance) balance FROM ( select CONCAT('GL'::varchar,GLCODE::varchar,case when slcode is NULL then null else 'SL' end::varchar,slcode::varchar) JOIN_KEY, GLCODE, slcode, opening, debit, credit, balance FROM ( select GLCODE, slcode, opening, debit, credit, balance, sum(balance) over (partition by GLCODE) gl_balance from ( WITH SL_DATA AS (select GLCODE,slcode, SUM (opening) opening , SUM (debit) debit, SUM (credit) credit, SUM (opening) + SUM (debit) - SUM (credit) balance FROM ( SELECT P.GLCODE, p.SLCODE, 0 opening, COALESCE (P.DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, COALESCE (P.CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT FROM FINPOST P WHERE p.admou_code = NULLIF('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND p.slcode is NOT NULL AND P.ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) UNION ALL SELECT P1.GLCODE GLCODE, P1.SLCODE, SUM (COALESCE (P1.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (COALESCE (P1.CAMOUNT, 0)) GL_OPENING, 0 debit, 0 credit FROM (SELECT P.GLCODE, P.SLCODE, SUM (COALESCE (P.DAMOUNT, 0)) DAMOUNT, SUM (COALESCE (P.CAMOUNT, 0)) CAMOUNT FROM FINPOST P WHERE P.ENTDT < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND p.slcode is NOT NULL AND P.YCODE = (select vycode from SelectedYear) AND p.admou_code = NULLIF('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND ( (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) GROUP BY P.GLCODE,P.SLCODE UNION ALL SELECT O.GLCODE, O.SLCODE, COALESCE (O.OPDAMT, 0), COALESCE (O.OPCAMT, 0) FROM FINSLOP O WHERE O.YCODE = (select vycode from SelectedYear) AND o.admou_code = NULLIF('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT) P1 /*Against bug 95649*/ GROUP BY P1.GLCODE,P1.SLCODE ) where NULLIF('@Level@', '') = 'With Subledger' GROUP BY GLCODE,slcode) SELECT GLCODE, slcode, opening, debit, credit, balance FROM SL_DATA UNION ALL select GLCODE, NULL slcode, SUM (opening) opening, SUM (debit) debit, SUM (credit) credit, SUM (opening) + SUM (debit) - SUM (credit) balance FROM ( SELECT P.GLCODE, 0 opening, COALESCE (P.DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, COALESCE (P.CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT FROM FINPOST P WHERE p.admou_code = NULLIF('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND p.glcode not in (select distinct glcode from SL_DATA) AND P.ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) UNION ALL SELECT P1.GLCODE GLCODE, SUM (COALESCE (P1.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (COALESCE (P1.CAMOUNT, 0)) GL_OPENING, 0 debit, 0 credit FROM ( SELECT P.GLCODE, SUM (COALESCE (P.DAMOUNT, 0)) DAMOUNT, SUM (COALESCE (P.CAMOUNT, 0)) CAMOUNT FROM FINPOST P WHERE P.ENTDT < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND p.glcode not in (select distinct glcode from SL_DATA) AND P.YCODE = (select vycode from SelectedYear) AND p.admou_code = NULLIF('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND ( (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) GROUP BY P.GLCODE UNION ALL SELECT O.GLCODE, COALESCE (O.OPDAMT, 0), COALESCE (O.OPCAMT, 0) FROM FINGLOP O WHERE O.YCODE = (select vycode from SelectedYear) AND glcode not in (select distinct glcode from SL_DATA) AND o.admou_code = NULLIF('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT) P1 GROUP BY P1.GLCODE) t1 GROUP BY GLCODE ) ) where (COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@', '')::INT, 0) = 1 OR ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@', '')::INT, 0) = 0 AND (opening <> 0 OR debit <> 0 OR credit <> 0 OR gl_balance <> 0)))) t1 JOIN fingl gl ON t1.glcode = gl.glcode left join finsl sl ON t1.slcode = sl.slcode join ginview.lv_chart_of_accounts grp ON gl.grpcode = grp.code JOIN ( WITH recursive GROUPS AS ( SELECT t1.grpcode ,t1.grpname ,t1.seq seqnum ,t1.parcode ,'GRP' || t1.parcode::VARCHAR treeparentcode ,'GRP' as child_type ,'GRP' || t1.grpcode::VARCHAR treechildcode FROM fingrp t1 UNION ALL SELECT t2.grpcode ,t2.grpname ,t2.seq seqnum ,t2.parcode ,'GRP' || t2.parcode::VARCHAR treeparentcode ,'GRP' as child_type ,'GRP' || t2.grpcode::VARCHAR treechildcode FROM fingrp t2 JOIN GROUPS ON GROUPS.parcode = t2.grpcode ) ,GROUPS_N_LEDGERS AS ( SELECT DISTINCT grpcode childcode ,grpname childname ,seqnum ,parcode ,treeparentcode ,child_type ,treechildcode FROM GROUPS UNION ALL SELECT glcode ,glname ,glseq ,grpcode ,'GRP' || GRPCODE::VARCHAR PARENTCODE ,'GL' CHILD_TYPE ,'GL' || GLCODE::VARCHAR CHILDCODE FROM fingl g UNION ALL SELECT childcode ,childname ,seqnum ,parcode ,treeparentcode ,CHILD_TYPE ,treechildcode FROM (SELECT slcode childcode ,slname childname ,slcode seqnum ,glcode parcode ,'GL' || GLCODE::VARCHAR treeparentcode ,'SL' CHILD_TYPE ,'SL' || SLCODE::VARCHAR treechildcode FROM finsl s WHERE GLCODE IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT g.slcode ,s.slname ,g.slcode ,g.glcode ,'GL' || g.GLCODE::VARCHAR PARENTCODE ,'SL' CHILD_TYPE ,'SL' || g.SLCODE::VARCHAR CHILDCODE FROM finsl_gl g JOIN finsl s on g.slcode = s.slcode) where NULLIF('@Level@', '') = 'With Subledger' ) ,SORTED_ORDER AS ( SELECT childcode ,childname ,parcode parentcode ,treeparentcode ,child_type ,treechildcode ,seqnum ,1 LVL ,array [cast(seqnum::text||childcode::text as int)::int] hierchy FROM GROUPS_N_LEDGERS WHERE UPPER(childname) = 'TREE' UNION SELECT T2.childcode ,T2.childname ,T2.parcode parentcode ,T2.treeparentcode ,T2.child_type ,T2.treechildcode ,T2.seqnum ,T1.LVL + 1 LVL ,T1.hierchy || t2.seqnum::INT || T2.childcode::INT FROM GROUPS_N_LEDGERS T2 JOIN SORTED_ORDER T1 ON T1.treechildcode = T2.treeparentcode ) ,DISPLAY_ORDER_TBL AS ( SELECT childcode,childname,treechildcode,parentcode,treeparentcode ,LVL hierarchylevel ,child_type ,row_number() OVER ( ORDER BY T1.hierchy ) displayorder FROM SORTED_ORDER T1 WHERE UPPER(childname) <> 'TREE' ) select displayorder, treeparentcode, child_type, treechildcode, case child_type when 'GL' then treechildcode when 'SL' then treeparentcode||treechildcode else NULL end JOIN_KEY from DISPLAY_ORDER_TBL where child_type in ('GL','SL'))coa ON t1.JOIN_KEY = coa.JOIN_KEY GROUP BY grp.level1, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('Level2', 'Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger', 'With Subledger') THEN grp.level2 END, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger','With Subledger') THEN grp.level3 END, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('Level4', 'With Ledger','With Subledger') THEN grp.level4 END, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('With Ledger','With Subledger') THEN t1.glcode END, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('With Ledger','With Subledger') THEN GL.glname END, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('With Subledger') THEN t1.slcode END, CASE WHEN NULLIF('@Level@', '') IN ('With Subledger') THEN SL.slname END

entity.object_description: Get details of Transaction to be shown as per the selected ledger (cost centre wise) and other parameter.
entity.sql_stmt: /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 78791 Jyotirmoy Performance Issue 106227 Jyotirmoy Date filter for mid range showing wrong data */ with glname as materialized (select glcode gl_code, glname, abbre, "type", srctype, costapp, slapp, level1, level2, level3, level4, ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER GL_ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER from fingl g inner join ginview.lv_chart_of_accounts grp on (g.grpcode = grp.code) where (glname IN (SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level1 IN (SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN (SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN (SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN (SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) ), data as materialized ( select p.postcode, entcode, scheme_docno entno, entdt::date entdt, p.enttype, docno, docdt, duedt, glcode, slcode, coalesce(damount,0) debit, coalesce(camount,0) credit, nartext, chqno, chqdt, drawnon, brsdt, chqlabel, case RELEASE_STATUS when 'P' then 'Posted' when 'U' then 'Unposted' when 'R' then 'Reversed' end RELEASE_STATUS, p.admsite_code_owner, ref_admsite_code, admou_code, gl_code, glname, abbre, "type", srctype, costapp, slapp, level1, level2, level3, level4, case when p2.POSTCODE is null then ginview.fnc_ledgerdetails (p.postcode,entcode,p.enttype,p.glcode,damount,camount) else p2.particulars end particulars, null particulars_2 , null particulars_3 , null particulars_4 , null particulars_5, ENTNAME, GL_ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER from finpost p inner join glname g on (p.glcode = g.gl_code) inner join finenttype e on (p.enttype = e.enttype) left outer join main.FINPOST_PARTICULARS p2 on (p.POSTCODE = p2.POSTCODE) where ((entdt::date between to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')) or (entdt::date < to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and ycode = (select ycode from admyear where to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto))) and p.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int and ((p.release_status = 'P' and nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 0) or (nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 1))) select null requestid, row_number () over () uk, keyval, entcode, level1, level2, level3, level4, os.code owner_sitecode, os.name owner_sitename, q1.glcode, q1.glname, q1.slcode, slname, sitecode, s.name sitename, entno scheme_docno, entdt, docno, docdt, duedt, entry_type_short, entry_type_long, narration, particulars, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ particulars_2, particulars_3, particulars_4, particulars_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY q1.GLCODE,sitecode,q1.slcode ORDER BY keyval) = 1 THEN FIRST_VALUE(opening) OVER (PARTITION BY q1.GLCODE,sitecode,q1.slcode) ELSE SUM(opening + debit - credit) OVER (PARTITION BY q1.GLCODE,sitecode,q1.slcode ORDER BY keyval ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING) end opening, debit, CREDIT, SUM(opening + debit - credit) OVER ( PARTITION BY q1.glcode, q1.sitecode, q1.slcode ORDER BY keyval ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING ) AS balance, release_status from ( select CONCAT_WS( '', t.glcode::text, t.ref_admsite_code::text, p.slcode::text, TO_CHAR(p.entdt, 'YYYYMMDD'), p.postcode::text )::numeric AS keyval, P.ENTCODE, P.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, T.GLCODE, g.GLNAME, P.SLCODE, T.REF_ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, P.entno, P.ENTDT, DOCNO, DOCDT, DUEDT, P.ENTTYPE ENTRY_TYPE_SHORT, ENTNAME ENTRY_TYPE_LONG, case when P.ENTTYPE = 'JDJ' then (J.NARTEXT || ' ') || P.NARTEXT else P.NARTEXT end NARRATION, /*Performance*/ particulars, particulars_2, particulars_3, particulars_4, particulars_5, 0 OPENING, case when ( (coalesce (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (T.CAMOUNT, 0)) >= 0) then (coalesce (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (T.CAMOUNT, 0)) else 0 end DEBIT, case when ( (coalesce (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (T.CAMOUNT, 0)) < 0) then (0 - (coalesce (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (T.CAMOUNT, 0))) else 0 end CREDIT, p.RELEASE_STATUS from data P inner join FINCOSTTAG T on (P.POSTCODE = T.POSTCODE) left join FINJRNMAIN J on (P.ENTCODE = JRNCODE::text) inner join FINGL G on (T.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) where coalesce (g.costapp, 'N') = 'Y' and p.entdt::date between to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') union all select CONCAT_WS( '',glcode::text, sitecode::text , slcode::text , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYYMMDD'))::numeric KEYVAL, null, null, glcode, glname, slcode, sitecode sitecode, 'Opening' scheme_docno, null entdt, null docno, null docdt, null duedt, null entry_type_short, null entry_type_long, null narration, null particulars, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ null particulars_2, null particulars_3, null particulars_4, null particulars_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ site_opening opening, 0 debit, 0 credit, null release_status from ( select p1.sitecode, p1.glcode, p1.glname, p1.slcode, SUM (coalesce (p1.damount, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (p1.camount, 0)) site_opening from ( select REF_ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, P.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0)) DAMOUNT, SUM (coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) CAMOUNT from FINCOSTTAG P inner join FINGL G on (P.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) where p.entdt < TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and coalesce (g.costapp, 'N') = 'Y' and p.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int and 1 = case when g.TYPE in ('A', 'L') and p.ycode >= ( select MIN (ycode) from admyear where ycode > ( select MIN (ycode) from admyear)) then 1 when g.TYPE in ('I', 'E') and p.ycode = ( select ycode from admyear where TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto) then 1 end group by p.ref_admsite_code, p.glcode, g.glname, p.slcode union all select ADMSITE_CODE, O.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0), coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0) from FINCOSTOP O inner join FINGL G on (O.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) where o.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@', '999999999') and coalesce (g.costapp, 'N') = 'Y' and 1 = case when g.TYPE in ('A', 'L') and o.ycode = ( select MIN (ycode) from admyear where ycode > ( select MIN (ycode) from admyear)) then 1 when g.TYPE in ('I', 'E') and o.ycode = ( select ycode from admyear where TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto) then 1 end) P1 group by p1.sitecode, p1.glcode, p1.glname, p1.slcode)X union all select CONCAT_WS( '',P.GLCODE::text , P.SLCODE::text , TO_CHAR(ENTDT::date,'YYYYMMDD'), p.POSTCODE::text, P.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER::text)::numeric KEYVAL, ENTCODE, P.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, P.GLCODE, GLNAME, P.SLCODE, case when (SRCTYPE in ('B', 'C')) then GL_ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER else DEFAULT_HO_SITE end, P.entno, ENTDT, DOCNO, DOCDT, DUEDT, P.ENTTYPE ENTRY_TYPE_SHORT, ENTNAME ENTRY_TYPE_LONG, case when P.ENTTYPE = 'JDJ' then (J.NARTEXT || ' ') || P.NARTEXT else P.NARTEXT end NARRATION, particulars, particulars_2, particulars_3, particulars_4, particulars_5, 0 OPENING, case when ( (coalesce (P.debit, 0) - coalesce (P.credit, 0)) >= 0) then (coalesce (P.debit, 0) - coalesce (P.credit, 0)) else 0 end DEBIT, case when ( (coalesce (P.debit, 0) - coalesce (P.credit, 0)) < 0) then (0 - (coalesce (P.debit, 0) - coalesce (P.credit, 0))) else 0 end CREDIT, p.RELEASE_STATUS from data P inner join admou ou on (p.admou_code = ou.code) left join FINJRNMAIN J on (ENTCODE = JRNCODE::VARCHAR) where coalesce (p.costapp, 'N') = 'N' and p.entdt::date between to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') union all select concat_ws(t1.glcode::text, t1.slcode::text, to_char(TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd'),'YYYYMMDD'),CASE WHEN g.srctype IN ('B', 'C') THEN g.admsite_code_owner ELSE u.default_ho_site END )::numeric KEYVAL, null, null, t1.glcode, t1.glname, t1.slcode, case when g.srctype in ('B', 'C') then g.admsite_code_owner else u.default_ho_site end, 'Opening' scheme_docno, null entdt, null docno, null docdt, null duedt, null entry_type_short, null entry_type_long, null narration, null particulars, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ null particulars_2, null particulars_3, null particulars_4, null particulars_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ gl_opening opening, 0 debit, 0 credit, null release_status from ( select p1.glcode, p1.glname, p1.slcode, admou_code, SUM (coalesce (p1.damount, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (p1.camount, 0)) gl_opening from ( select P.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, ADMOU_CODE, SUM (coalesce (debit, 0)) DAMOUNT, SUM (coalesce (credit, 0)) CAMOUNT from data P where p.entdt < TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and coalesce (p.costapp, 'N') = 'N' group by p.admou_code, p.glcode, p.glname, p.slcode union all select O.GLCODE, GLNAME, null SLCODE, ADMOU_CODE, coalesce (OPDAMT, 0), coalesce (OPCAMT, 0) from FINGLOP O inner join FINGL G on (O.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) where o.ycode = ( select ycode from admyear where TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto) and coalesce (g.costapp, 'N') = 'N' and coalesce (g.slapp, 'N') = 'N' and o.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int union all select O.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, ADMOU_CODE, coalesce (OPDAMT, 0), coalesce (OPCAMT, 0) from FINSLOP O inner join FINGL G on (O.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) where o.ycode = ( select ycode from admyear where TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto) and coalesce (g.costapp, 'N') = 'N' and coalesce (g.slapp, 'N') = 'Y' and o.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int) P1 group by admou_code, P1.GLCODE, p1.glname, p1.slcode) T1, admou u, fingl g where t1.admou_code = u.code and t1.glcode = g.glcode) q1 inner join glname g on (q1.glcode = g.gl_code) inner join admsite s on (q1.sitecode = s.code) left outer join finsl sl on (q1.slcode = sl.slcode) left outer join admsite os on (q1.admsite_code_owner = os.code)

entity.object_description: This report will show summary of the ledgers (cost centre wise) during a given period. Click on 'Site' to get transaction details in a separate report.
entity.sql_stmt:
/*TV_GL_SUMMARY_CC_01*/
SELECT NULL requestid ,row_number() over() UK ,grp.level1 ,grp.level2 ,grp.level3 ,grp.level4 ,t1.glcode ,t1.glname ,CASE when nullif('@ShowSubledger@','')::int = 1 then t1.slcode end slcode ,CASE when nullif('@ShowSubledger@','')::int = 1 then sl.slname end slname ,t1.sitecode ,s.name sitename ,sum(opening) opening ,sum(debit) debit ,sum(CREDIT) credit ,sum(opening)+ sum(debit)-sum(credit) balance FROM ( SELECT T.GLCODE, GLNAME, P.SLCODE, T.REF_ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, 0 OPENING, CASE WHEN ( (coalesce (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (T.CAMOUNT, 0)) >= 0) THEN (coalesce (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (T.CAMOUNT, 0)) ELSE 0 END DEBIT, CASE WHEN ( (coalesce (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (T.CAMOUNT, 0)) < 0) THEN (0 - (coalesce (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (T.CAMOUNT, 0))) ELSE 0 END CREDIT FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINCOSTTAG T ON (P.POSTCODE = T.POSTCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (T.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) Where p.entdt between TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND coalesce(g.costapp,'N') = 'Y' AND p.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 0 AND p.release_status = 'P') OR ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 1 AND p.release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) UNION ALL SELECT glcode, glname, slcode, sitecode sitecode, site_opening, 0 debit, 0 credit FROM ( SELECT p1.glcode, p1.glname, p1.slcode, p1.sitecode, sum(coalesce(p1.damount,0)) - sum(coalesce(p1.camount,0)) site_opening FROM ( SELECT P.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, REF_ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0)) DAMOUNT, SUM (coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) CAMOUNT FROM FINCOSTTAG P INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (P.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) Where p.entdt < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND coalesce(g.costapp,'N') = 'Y' AND p.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND 1 = CASE WHEN g.type IN ('A','L') AND p.ycode >= (SELECT MIN(ycode) FROM admyear WHERE ycode > (SELECT MIN(ycode) FROM admyear )) THEN 1 WHEN g.type IN ('I','E') AND p.ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) THEN 1 END GROUP BY p.glcode ,g.glname ,p.ref_admsite_code ,p.slcode UNION ALL SELECT O.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, ADMSITE_CODE, coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0), coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0) FROM FINCOSTOP O INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (O.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) Where o.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND coalesce(g.costapp,'N') = 'Y' AND 1 = CASE WHEN g.type IN ('A','L') AND o.ycode = (SELECT MIN(ycode) FROM admyear WHERE ycode > (SELECT MIN(ycode) FROM admyear )) THEN 1 WHEN g.type IN ('I','E') AND o.ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) THEN 1 END ) P1 GROUP BY p1.glcode ,p1.glname ,p1.sitecode ,p1.slcode )X UNION ALL SELECT P.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, CASE WHEN (SRCTYPE IN ('B', 'C')) THEN G.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ELSE DEFAULT_HO_SITE END, 0 OPENING, CASE WHEN ( (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) >= 0) THEN (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) ELSE 0 END DEBIT, CASE WHEN ( (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) < 0) THEN (0 - (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0))) ELSE 0 END CREDIT FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (P.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMOU U ON (ADMOU_CODE = CODE) Where p.entdt BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND coalesce(g.costapp,'N') = 'N' AND p.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 0 AND p.release_status = 'P') OR (nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 1 AND p.release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) UNION ALL SELECT t1.glcode, t1.glname, t1.slcode, CASE WHEN g.srctype IN ('B','C') THEN g.admsite_code_owner ELSE u.default_ho_site END, gl_opening, 0 debit, 0 credit FROM ( SELECT p1.glcode, p1.glname, p1.slcode, admou_code, sum(coalesce(p1.damount,0)) - sum(coalesce(p1.camount,0)) gl_opening FROM ( SELECT P.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, ADMOU_CODE, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0)) DAMOUNT, SUM (coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) CAMOUNT FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (P.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) Where p.entdt < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND p.ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND coalesce(g.costapp,'N') = 'N' AND p.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 0 AND p.release_status = 'P') OR ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::int = 1 AND p.release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) GROUP BY p.glcode, g.glname, p.admou_code, p.slcode UNION ALL SELECT O.GLCODE, GLNAME, NULL SLCODE, ADMOU_CODE, coalesce (OPDAMT, 0), coalesce (OPCAMT, 0) FROM FINGLOP O INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (O.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) Where o.ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND coalesce(g.costapp,'N') = 'N' AND coalesce(g.slapp,'N') = 'N' AND o.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') UNION ALL SELECT O.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLCODE, ADMOU_CODE, coalesce (OPDAMT, 0), coalesce (OPCAMT, 0) FROM FINSLOP O INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (O.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) Where o.ycode = (SELECT ycode::INTEGER FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND coalesce(g.costapp,'N') = 'N' AND coalesce(g.slapp,'N') = 'Y' AND o.admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') ) P1 GROUP BY P1.GLCODE, p1.glname, admou_code, p1.slcode ) T1 inner join admou u on (t1.admou_code = u.code) inner join fingl g on (t1.glcode = g.glcode) ) t1 inner join fingl gl on (t1.glcode = gl.glcode) inner join ginview.lv_chart_of_accounts grp on (gl.grpcode = grp.code) inner join admsite s on (t1.sitecode = s.code) left outer join finsl sl on (t1.slcode = sl.slcode) Where (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (sl.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (grp.level1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY grp.level1 ,grp.level2 ,grp.level3 ,grp.level4 ,t1.glcode ,t1.glname ,CASE when nullif('@ShowSubledger@','')::int = 1 then t1.slcode end ,CASE when nullif('@ShowSubledger@','')::int = 1 then sl.slname end ,t1.sitecode ,s.name

entity.object_description: This report will show the interest calculation for Bank type ledger for the selected date range.
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT null requestid, uk, glname, glcode, document_date, date (coalesce ( LEAD ( document_date) OVER (PARTITION BY glcode ORDER BY document_date), to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1)) - date(document_date) due_days, interest_rate, debit, credit, ginview.GETFISCALYRDAYSCOUNT(TO_DATE('@CurrentWorkDate@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) yeardays FROM ( SELECT row_number() over() uk, glname, glcode, document_date, interest_rate, SUM (debit) debit, SUM (credit) credit FROM ( SELECT GLNAME, GLCODE, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, case when SIGN (coalesce (BRSAMT, 0))= 1 then coalesce (BRSAMT, 0) else 0 end DEBIT, 0 - case when SIGN (coalesce (BRSAMT, 0))= -1 then coalesce (BRSAMT, 0) else 0 end CREDIT FROM FINGL LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMSITE ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = CODE) Where ADMSITE.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@ConnOUCode@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') AND FINGL.GLCODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@BankNamePDC@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') UNION ALL SELECT GLNAME GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME, FINGL.GLCODE GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, 0 - case when SIGN ( SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0)))= -1 then SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0))else 0 end DEBIT, case when SIGN ( SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0)))= 1 then SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0)) else 0 end CREDIT FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where FINVCHDET.BRSDT IS NOT NULL AND FINVCHDET.YCODE <> 1 AND FINVCHDET.BRSDT < to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND FINVCHMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@ConnOUCode@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') AND FINGL.GLCODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@BankNamePDC@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') GROUP BY FINGL.GLNAME, FINGL.GLCODE, FINGL.INTRATE UNION ALL SELECT GLNAME GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME, FINGL.GLCODE GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, case when SIGN ( SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0)))= 1 then SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0)) else 0 end DEBIT, 0 - case when SIGN ( SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0)))= -1 then SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0)) else 0 end CREDIT FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where FINVCHDET.BRSDT IS NOT NULL AND FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C' AND FINVCHDET.YCODE <> 1 AND FINVCHDET.BRSDT < to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND FINVCHMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@ConnOUCode@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') AND FINGL.GLCODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@BankNamePDC@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') GROUP BY FINGL.GLNAME, FINGL.GLCODE, FINGL.INTRATE UNION ALL SELECT GLNAME GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME, FINGL.GLCODE GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE, BRSDT DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0)) DEBIT, SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0)) CREDIT FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where FINVCHDET.BRSDT IS NOT NULL AND FINVCHDET.YCODE <> 1 AND FINVCHDET.BRSDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND FINVCHMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@ConnOUCode@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') AND FINGL.GLCODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@BankNamePDC@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') GROUP BY FINGL.GLNAME, FINGL.GLCODE, FINVCHDET.BRSDT, FINGL.INTRATE UNION ALL SELECT GLNAME GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME, FINGL.GLCODE GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE, BRSDT DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0)) DEBIT, SUM (coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0)) CREDIT FROM FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE = FINVCHDET.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where FINVCHDET.BRSDT IS NOT NULL AND FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C' AND FINVCHDET.YCODE <> 1 AND FINVCHDET.BRSDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND FINVCHMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@ConnOUCode@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') AND FINGL.GLCODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@BankNamePDC@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') GROUP BY FINGL.GLNAME, FINGL.GLCODE, FINVCHDET.BRSDT, FINGL.INTRATE) q2 GROUP BY glname, glcode, document_date, interest_rate) q1

entity.object_description: This report will show the interest calculation for Subledger (Customer) for the selected date range.
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_INT_CALC_CUST_01*/ SELECT NULL REQUESTID, row_number() over() UK, GLCODE, GLNAME, SUB_LEDGER_NAME SLNAME, SUB_LEDGER_CODE SLCODE, DOCUMENT_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, round((coalesce ( LEAD ( EFFECTIVE_DATE::date) OVER (PARTITION BY sub_ledger_code ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE::date), to_date('@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) - EFFECTIVE_DATE::date),2) due_days, INTEREST_RATE, DEBIT, ABS (CREDIT) credit, GINVIEW.GETFISCALYRDAYSCOUNT(TO_DATE('@CurrentWorkDate@','YYYY-MM-DD')) yeardays FROM ( SELECT GLCODE, GLNAME, SUB_LEDGER_NAME, SUB_LEDGER_CODE, DOCUMENT_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, SUM (DEBIT) DEBIT, SUM (CREDIT) CREDIT FROM ( SELECT FINGL.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLNAME SUB_LEDGER_NAME, FINSL.SLCODE SUB_LEDGER_CODE, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') DOCUMENT_DATE, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') EFFECTIVE_DATE, FINSL.INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) DEBIT, 0 CREDIT FROM FINPOST INNER JOIN FINSL ON (FINPOST.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINPOST.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where (FINSL.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderDueDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N')= 'Y' then case when FINPOST.DUEDT is NULL then case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderChequeDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N')= 'Y' then coalesce ( FINPOST.CHQDT::DATE, coalesce ( FINPOST.DOCDT::DATE, FINPOST.ENTDT::DATE))::DATE else coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT::DATE, FINPOST.ENTDT::DATE) end else FINPOST.DUEDT::date + coalesce(cast(to_number(nullif('@GraceDays@',''),'999999999') as int),0) end else case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderChequeDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N') = 'Y' then coalesce ( FINPOST.CHQDT, coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT, FINPOST.ENTDT)) else coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT, FINPOST.ENTDT)end end < to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( ( FINGL.GLCODE = to_number(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'999999999') AND coalesce (to_number(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> -1) OR coalesce (to_number(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'999999999'), -1) = -1) AND ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) = -1 OR ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) = 0 AND FINSL.agcode IS NULL) OR ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> -1 AND coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> 0 AND FINSL.agcode = to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'))) AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') GROUP BY FINSL.SLNAME, FINSL.SLCODE, FINSL.INTRATE, FINGL.GLCODE, FINGL.GLNAME HAVING SUM ( coalesce (FINPOST.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (FINPOST.CAMOUNT, 0)) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT FINGL.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLNAME SUB_LEDGER_NAME, FINSL.SLCODE SUB_LEDGER_CODE, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') DOCUMENT_DATE, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') EFFECTIVE_DATE, FINSL.INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, 0 DEBIT, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) CREDIT FROM FINPOST INNER JOIN FINSL ON (FINPOST.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINPOST.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where (FINSL.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderDueDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N')= 'Y' then case when FINPOST.DUEDT is NULL then case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderChequeDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N')= 'Y' then coalesce ( FINPOST.CHQDT::DATE, coalesce ( FINPOST.DOCDT::DATE, FINPOST.ENTDT::DATE))else coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT::DATE, FINPOST.ENTDT::DATE)end else FINPOST.DUEDT::date + coalesce(cast(to_number(nullif('@GraceDays@',''),'999999999') as int),0) end else case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderChequeDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N')= 'Y' then coalesce ( FINPOST.CHQDT, coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT, FINPOST.ENTDT)) else coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT, FINPOST.ENTDT) end end < to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( ( FINGL.GLCODE = to_number(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'999999999') AND coalesce (to_number(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> -1) OR coalesce (to_number(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'999999999'), -1) = -1) AND ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) = -1 OR ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) = 0 AND FINSL.agcode IS NULL) OR ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> -1 AND coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> 0 AND FINSL.agcode = to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'))) AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') GROUP BY FINSL.SLNAME, FINSL.SLCODE, FINSL.INTRATE, FINGL.GLCODE, FINGL.GLNAME HAVING SUM ( coalesce (FINPOST.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (FINPOST.CAMOUNT, 0)) < 0 UNION ALL SELECT FINGL.GLCODE, GLNAME, SLNAME SUB_LEDGER_NAME, FINSL.SLCODE SUB_LEDGER_CODE, ENTDT DOCUMENT_DATE, case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderDueDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N')= 'Y' then case when DUEDT is NULL then case when coalesce ( CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderChequeDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N')= 'Y' then coalesce (CHQDT::DATE, coalesce (DOCDT::DATE, ENTDT::DATE)) else coalesce (DOCDT::DATE, ENTDT::DATE) end else DUEDT::DATE + coalesce(cast(to_number(nullif('@GraceDays@',''),'999999999') as int),0) end else case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderChequeDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N')= 'Y' then coalesce (CHQDT, coalesce (DOCDT, ENTDT)) else coalesce (DOCDT, ENTDT) end end EFFECTIVE_DATE, FINSL.INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT FROM FINPOST INNER JOIN FINSL ON (FINPOST.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINPOST.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where (FINSL.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( ( FINGL.GLCODE = to_number(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'999999999') AND coalesce (to_number(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> -1) OR coalesce (to_number(nullif('@ARAPLedger@',''),'999999999'), -1) = -1) AND ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) = -1 OR ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) = 0 AND FINSL.agcode IS NULL) OR ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> -1 AND coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> 0 AND FINSL.agcode = to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'999999999'))) AND case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderDueDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N')= 'Y' then case when FINPOST.DUEDT is NULL then case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderChequeDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N') = 'Y' then coalesce ( FINPOST.CHQDT::DATE, coalesce ( FINPOST.DOCDT::DATE, FINPOST.ENTDT::DATE)) else coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT::DATE, FINPOST.ENTDT::DATE)end else FINPOST.DUEDT::DATE + coalesce(cast(to_number(nullif('@GraceDays@',''),'999999999') as int),0) end else case when coalesce (CASE WHEN to_number('@ConsiderChequeDate@','999999999') = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, 'N') = 'Y' then coalesce ( FINPOST.CHQDT, coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT, FINPOST.ENTDT)) else coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT, FINPOST.ENTDT) end end BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','999999999'))X GROUP BY SUB_LEDGER_NAME, SUB_LEDGER_CODE, DOCUMENT_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, GLCODE, GLNAME)X1

entity.object_description: This report will show the interest calculation for General type ledger for the selected date range.
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_INT_CALC_GL_01*/ SELECT NULL requestid, uk, GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME glname, GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE glcode, document_date, round((coalesce ( LEAD ( document_date::date) OVER (PARTITION BY GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE ORDER BY document_date::date), TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) - document_date::date),3)/*Bug 106856*/ due_days, interest_rate, debit, credit, yeardays FROM ( SELECT row_number() over() uk, GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME, GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE, DOCUMENT_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, SUM (DEBIT) DEBIT, SUM (CREDIT) CREDIT, ginview.GETFISCALYRDAYSCOUNT(TO_DATE('@CurrentWorkDate@','YYYY-MM-DD')) yeardays FROM ( SELECT GLNAME GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME, FINGL.GLCODE GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE, TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, OPDAMT DEBIT, OPCAMT CREDIT FROM FINGLOP INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINGLOP.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where FINGLOP.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND (FINGL.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND FINGLOP.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') UNION ALL SELECT GLNAME GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME, FINGL.GLCODE GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE, TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) DEBIT, 0 CREDIT FROM FINPOST INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINPOST.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where FINPOST.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND (FINGL.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND FINPOST.ENTDT < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') GROUP BY FINGL.GLNAME, FINGL.GLCODE, FINGL.INTRATE HAVING SUM ( coalesce (FINPOST.DAMOUNT, 0) -
