coalesce (FINPOST.CAMOUNT, 0)) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT GLNAME GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME, FINGL.GLCODE GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE, TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, 0 DEBIT, /*Start Bug Id : 110963*/ /*SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) CREDIT*/ ABS(SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0))) CREDIT /*End Bug Id : 110963*/ FROM FINPOST INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINPOST.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where FINPOST.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND (FINGL.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND FINPOST.ENTDT < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') GROUP BY FINGL.GLNAME, FINGL.GLCODE, FINGL.INTRATE HAVING SUM ( coalesce (FINPOST.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (FINPOST.CAMOUNT, 0)) < 0 UNION ALL SELECT GLNAME GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME, FINGL.GLCODE GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE, coalesce (DOCDT::date,ENTDT::date) DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT FROM FINPOST INNER JOIN FINGL ON (FINPOST.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) Where FINPOST.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND (FINGL.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND FINPOST.ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999'))X GROUP BY GENERAL_LEDGER_NAME, GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE, DOCUMENT_DATE, INTEREST_RATE)Z

entity.object_description: This report will show the interest calculation for Subledger (Others) for the selected date range.
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_INT_CALC_SL_01*/ SELECT NULL REQUESTID, row_number() over() UK, SLNAME, SLCODE, DOCUMENT_DATE, round((coalesce ( LEAD ( document_date::date) OVER (PARTITION BY SLCODE ORDER BY document_date::date), TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) - document_date::date),2) due_days, INTEREST_RATE, DEBIT, CREDIT, GINVIEW.GETFISCALYRDAYSCOUNT(TO_DATE('@CurrentWorkDate@','YYYY-MM-DD')) yeardays FROM ( SELECT SLNAME, SLCODE, DOCUMENT_DATE, INTEREST_RATE, SUM (DEBIT) DEBIT, SUM (CREDIT) CREDIT FROM ( SELECT SLNAME, FINSL.SLCODE, TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, coalesce (OPDAMT, 0) DEBIT, coalesce (OPCAMT, 0) CREDIT FROM FINSLOP INNER JOIN FINSL ON (FINSLOP.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where ( ( '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'D' AND FINSLOP.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto)) OR ( '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'C' AND FINSLOP.YCODE = 2)) AND FINSLOP.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (FINSL.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) UNION ALL SELECT SLNAME, FINSL.SLCODE, TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, abs(SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0))) DEBIT, 0 CREDIT FROM FINPOST INNER JOIN FINSL ON (FINPOST.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where ( ( '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'D' AND FINPOST.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto))/*Bug Id 70672*/ OR ( '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'C' AND FINPOST.YCODE > 1)) AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (FINSL.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND 1 = CASE WHEN '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'D' AND coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT::date, FINPOST.ENTDT::date) < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 1 WHEN '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'C' AND coalesce ( FINPOST.CHQDT::date, coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT::date, FINPOST.ENTDT::date)) < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END GROUP BY FINSL.SLNAME, FINSL.SLCODE, FINSL.INTRATE HAVING SUM ( coalesce (FINPOST.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (FINPOST.CAMOUNT, 0)) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT SLNAME, FINSL.SLCODE, TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, 0 DEBIT, abs(SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0))) CREDIT FROM FINPOST INNER JOIN FINSL ON (FINPOST.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where ( ( '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'D' AND FINPOST.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto)) OR ( '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'C' AND FINPOST.YCODE > 1)) AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (FINSL.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND 1 = CASE WHEN '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'D' AND coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT::date, FINPOST.ENTDT::date) < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 1 WHEN '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'C' AND coalesce ( FINPOST.CHQDT::date, coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT::date, FINPOST.ENTDT::date)) < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END GROUP BY FINSL.SLNAME, FINSL.SLCODE, FINSL.INTRATE HAVING SUM ( coalesce (FINPOST.DAMOUNT, 0) - coalesce (FINPOST.CAMOUNT, 0)) < 0 UNION ALL SELECT SLNAME, FINSL.SLCODE, coalesce (DOCDT, ENTDT) DOCUMENT_DATE, INTRATE INTEREST_RATE, coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT FROM FINPOST INNER JOIN FINSL ON (FINPOST.SLCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) Where ( ( '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'D' AND FINPOST.YCODE = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto)) OR ( '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'C' AND FINPOST.YCODE > 1)) AND FINPOST.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (FINSL.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND 1 = CASE WHEN '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'D' AND coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT::date, FINPOST.ENTDT::date) BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 1 WHEN '@ReportTypeIntCalc@' = 'C' AND coalesce ( FINPOST.CHQDT::DATE, coalesce (FINPOST.DOCDT::date, FINPOST.ENTDT::date)) BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)X GROUP BY SLNAME, SLCODE, DOCUMENT_DATE, INTEREST_RATE)Z

entity.object_description: Get all details of the Inventory Status Detail as per selected report parameter. This data source to be used for specific report purpose. Source from Inventory Status Detail for Inventory Purpose
entity.sql_stmt:
/* Formatted on 28-12-2022 11:23:30 (QP5 v5.294) */ /*Inventory Status Detail*/ /*For Bug Id: 108666/Performance Check*/
/* Formatted on 07-06-2023 15:14:54 (QP5 v5.294) */ WITH q1 AS (SELECT icode FROM invitem I WHERE (ccode1 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat1 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode2 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat2 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode3 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat3 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode4 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat4 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode5 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat5 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode6 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat6 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (coalesce (barcode, icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)), q2 AS (SELECT k.ICODE, k.ADMSITE_CODE, k.QTY, K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, ENTDT, k.ENTTYPE, G.SEQ GRP_SEQ, T.SEQ TYPE_SEQ, G.ENTGRPNAME ENTGRPNAME, K.TRANSIT_SOURCE_ADMSITE_CODE, T.ENTTYPE ENTTYPE_main, TS.SHRTNAME, TS.NAME, L.LOCNAME, L.LOCNAME LOCATION_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM invstock k WHERE icode IN (SELECT icode FROM q1)) k inner join (SELECT * FROM INVITEM i WHERE icode IN (SELECT icode FROM q1)) I on (k.ICODE = I.ICODE) inner join ADMSITE S on (k.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code) left outer join INVBATCH_SERIAL B on (K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = b.code) inner join INVENTTYPE T on (K.ENTTYPE = T.ENTTYPE) inner join INVLOC L on (K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) inner join INVENTGRP G on (G.ENTGRPCODE = T.ENTGRPCODE) left outer join ADMSITE TS on (K.TRANSIT_SOURCE_ADMSITE_CODE = TS.CODE) inner join ADMYEAR Y on (K.YCODE = Y.YCODE) WHERE k.icode IN (SELECT icode FROM q1) AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@MRPFrom@','')::int, -1) = -1 AND coalesce (nullif('@MRPTo@','')::int, -1) = -1) OR (I.MRP BETWEEN coalesce (nullif('@MRPFrom@','')::int, -99999999999999) AND coalesce (nullif('@MRPTo@','')::int, 99999999999999))) AND K.ISSECONDARY IS NULL AND K.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( '@SiteTypeDesc@' = 'Organization Site' AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int, -1) = -1 AND s.sitetype = 'OS-OO-CM') OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int <> -1 AND s.code = nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int))) OR ( '@SiteTypeDesc@' = 'Organisation Owned Store Site' AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int, -1) = -1 AND s.sitetype = 'MS-OO-CM') OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int <> -1 AND s.code = nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int))) OR ( '@SiteTypeDesc@' IN ('Customer Owned Store Site') AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int, -1) = -1 AND s.sitetype IN ('MS-CO-CM', 'US-CO-CM')) OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int <> -1 AND s.code = nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int))) OR ( coalesce ('@SiteTypeDesc@', '-1') = '-1' AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int, -1) = -1 AND s.sitetype IN ('OS-OO-CM', 'MS-OO-CM', 'MS-CO-CM', 'US-CO-CM')) OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int <> -1 AND s.code = nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int)))) AND ( ( coalesce ('@LocationWise@', 'N') = 'Y' AND ( coalesce (nullif('@GroupCodeWiseStockPoint@','')::int, -1) = -1 OR ( coalesce (nullif('@GroupCodeWiseStockPoint@','')::int, -1) <> -1 AND K.LOCCODE = nullif('@GroupCodeWiseStockPoint@','')::int))) OR ( coalesce ('@LocationWise@', 'N') = 'N' AND ( coalesce (nullif('@LocationGroupCode@','')::int, -1) = -1 OR ( coalesce (nullif('@LocationGroupCode@','')::int, -1) <> -1 AND K.LOCCODE IN (SELECT LOCCODE FROM INVLOC WHERE INVLOCGRP_CODE = nullif('@LocationGroupCode@','')::int)))))) SELECT NULL REQUESTID, row_number() over() UK, ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, ENTGRPNAME, ENTTYPE, GRP_SEQ INVGRP_SEQ, TYPE_SEQ INVTYPE_SEQ, LOCATION_NAME, ACTUAL_OPENING_STOCK OPENING_STOCK, DURING_STOCK_ADD, DURING_STOCK_MINUS, CLOSING_STOCK, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM ( SELECT ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, ENTGRPNAME, ENTTYPE, GRP_SEQ, TYPE_SEQ, LOCATION_NAME, SUM (coalesce (ACTUAL_OPENING_STOCK, 0)) ACTUAL_OPENING_STOCK, SUM (coalesce (DURING_STOCK_ADD, 0)) DURING_STOCK_ADD, SUM (coalesce (DURING_STOCK_MINUS, 0)) DURING_STOCK_MINUS, ( SUM (coalesce (ACTUAL_OPENING_STOCK, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (DURING_STOCK_ADD, 0))) + SUM (coalesce (DURING_STOCK_MINUS, 0)) CLOSING_STOCK, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM (SELECT ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, coalesce (QTY, 0) ACTUAL_OPENING_STOCK, 0 DURING_STOCK_ADD, 0 DURING_STOCK_MINUS, 0 CLOSING_STOCK, 0 GRP_SEQ, 0 TYPE_SEQ, NULL ENTGRPNAME, 'Opening Stock' ENTTYPE, NULL LOCATION_NAME, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM q2 WHERE ( ENTDT::date < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') OR ( ENTTYPE = 'SOP' AND ENTDT::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) UNION ALL SELECT ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, 0 ACTUAL_OPENING_STOCK, case when SIGN (coalesce (QTY, 0))= 1 then coalesce (QTY, 0) else 0 end DURING_STOCK_ADD, case when SIGN (coalesce (QTY, 0))= -1 then coalesce (QTY, 0) else 0 end DURING_STOCK_MINUS, 0 CLOSING_STOCK, GRP_SEQ, TYPE_SEQ, ENTGRPNAME, case when TRANSIT_SOURCE_ADMSITE_CODE is null then ENTTYPE_main else ENTTYPE_main || ' : ' || coalesce (SHRTNAME, NAME) end ENTTYPE, LOCATION_NAME, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM q2 WHERE ENTDT::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ENTTYPE <> 'SOP') t2 GROUP BY ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, ENTGRPNAME, ENTTYPE, GRP_SEQ, TYPE_SEQ, LOCATION_NAME, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE) t1

entity.object_description: Get all details of the Inventory Status Ledger as per selected report parameter. This data source to be used for specific report purpose. Source from Inventory Status Ledger for Inventory Purpose
entity.sql_stmt:
/* Formatted on 13-06-2023 13:02:01 (QP5 v5.294) */ /*Inventory Status Ledger*/ /*For Bug Id: 108669/Performance Check*/
WITH q1 AS (SELECT icode FROM invitem I WHERE (ccode1 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat1 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode2 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat2 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode3 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat3 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode4 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat4 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode5 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat5 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode6 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat6 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (coalesce (barcode, icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (partyname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)), q2 AS (SELECT K.ICODE, K.ADMSITE_CODE, ENTDT, ENTNO, k.ENTTYPE, k.qty, K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, K.SCHEME_DOCNO, CASE WHEN K.TRANSIT_SOURCE_ADMSITE_CODE = 0 then NULL else K.TRANSIT_SOURCE_ADMSITE_CODE end TRANSIT_SOURCE_ADMSITE_CODE, /*ADO Id : 79753*/ INVENTTYPE.ENTTYPE inv_enttype, COALESCE(TS.SHRTNAME,'') SHRTNAME, /*ADO Id : 79753*/ COALESCE(TS.NAME,'') NAME, /*ADO Id : 79753*/ INVLOC.LOCNAME FROM (SELECT * FROM INVSTOCK WHERE icode IN (SELECT icode FROM q1)) K inner join (SELECT * FROM v_item WHERE icode IN (SELECT icode FROM q1)) i on (K.ICODE = I.ICODE) inner join ADMSITE S on (K.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) left outer join INVBATCH_SERIAL B on (K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = b.code) inner join INVLOC INVLOC on (K.LOCCODE = INVLOC.LOCCODE) inner join ADMYEAR ADMYEAR on (K.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE) inner join INVENTTYPE INVENTTYPE on (K.ENTTYPE = INVENTTYPE.ENTTYPE) inner join INVENTGRP INVENTGRP on (INVENTTYPE.ENTGRPCODE = INVENTGRP.ENTGRPCODE) left outer join ADMSITE TS on (K.TRANSIT_SOURCE_ADMSITE_CODE = TS.CODE) WHERE k.icode IN (SELECT icode FROM q1) AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@MRPFrom@','')::int, -1) = -1 AND coalesce (nullif('@MRPTo@','')::int, -1) = -1) OR (I.MRP BETWEEN nullif('@MRPFrom@','')::int AND nullif('@MRPTo@','')::int)) AND K.ISSECONDARY IS NULL AND K.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER(nullif('@ConnOUCode@',''),'999999999') AND ( ( I.LEV1GRPNAME = nullif('@Division@','') AND coalesce (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( ( I.LEV2GRPNAME = nullif('@Section@','') AND coalesce (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( ( I.GRPNAME = nullif('@Department@','') AND coalesce (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( ( '@SiteTypeDesc@' = 'Organization Site' AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int, -1) = -1 AND s.sitetype = 'OS-OO-CM') OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int <> -1 AND s.code = nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int))) OR ( '@SiteTypeDesc@' = 'Organisation Owned Store Site' AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int, -1) = -1 AND s.sitetype = 'MS-OO-CM') OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int <> -1 AND s.code = nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int))) OR ( '@SiteTypeDesc@' IN ('Customer Owned Store Site') AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int, -1) = -1 AND s.sitetype IN ('MS-CO-CM', 'US-CO-CM')) OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int <> -1 AND s.code = nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int))) OR ( coalesce ('@SiteTypeDesc@', '-1') = '-1' AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int, -1) = -1 AND s.sitetype IN ('OS-OO-CM', 'MS-OO-CM', 'MS-CO-CM', 'US-CO-CM')) OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int <> -1 AND s.code = nullif('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@','')::int)))) AND ( ( coalesce ('@LocationWise@', 'N') = 'Y' AND ( coalesce (nullif('@GroupCodeWiseStockPoint@','')::int, -1) = -1 OR ( coalesce (nullif('@GroupCodeWiseStockPoint@','')::int, -1) <> -1 AND K.LOCCODE = nullif('@GroupCodeWiseStockPoint@','')::int))) OR ( coalesce ('@LocationWise@', 'N') = 'N' AND ( coalesce (nullif('@LocationGroupCode@','')::int, -1) = -1 OR ( coalesce (nullif('@LocationGroupCode@','')::int, -1) <> -1 AND K.LOCCODE IN (SELECT LOCCODE FROM INVLOC WHERE INVLOCGRP_CODE = nullif('@LocationGroupCode@','')::int)))))) SELECT NULL REQUESTID, row_number() over() UK, ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, ENTDT, SEQ, ENTNO, ENTTYPE, LOCATION_NAME, DURING_STOCK_ADD, DURING_STOCK_MINUS, /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE /*End Change*/ FROM ( SELECT ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, ENTDT, SEQ, ENTNO, ENTTYPE, LOCATION_NAME, SUM (DURING_STOCK_ADD) DURING_STOCK_ADD, SUM (DURING_STOCK_MINUS) DURING_STOCK_MINUS, /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE /*End Change*/ FROM (SELECT ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') ENTDT, 1 SEQ, ' ' ENTNO, 'Opening Stock' ENTTYPE, NULL LOCATION_NAME, case when SIGN (coalesce (QTY, 0))= +1 then coalesce (QTY, 0) else 0 end DURING_STOCK_ADD, case when SIGN (coalesce (QTY, 0)) = -1 then coalesce (QTY, 0) else 0 end DURING_STOCK_MINUS, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM q2 WHERE ( ENTDT < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') OR ( ENTTYPE = 'SOP' AND ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) UNION ALL SELECT ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, ENTDT, 2 SEQ, SCHEME_DOCNO, case when TRANSIT_SOURCE_ADMSITE_CODE is NULL then inv_enttype else inv_enttype || ' : ' || coalesce (SHRTNAME, NAME) end ENTTYPE, LOCNAME, coalesce (QTY, 0), 0, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM q2 WHERE ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND coalesce (QTY, 0) > 0 AND ENTTYPE <> 'SOP' UNION ALL SELECT ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, ENTDT, 2 SEQ, SCHEME_DOCNO, case when TRANSIT_SOURCE_ADMSITE_CODE is NULL then inv_ENTTYPE else inv_ENTTYPE || ' : ' || coalesce (SHRTNAME, NAME) end ENTTYPE, LOCNAME, 0, coalesce (QTY, 0), INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM q2 WHERE ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND coalesce (QTY, 0) < 0 AND ENTTYPE <> 'SOP') t1 GROUP BY ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, ENTDT, SEQ, ENTNO, ENTTYPE, LOCATION_NAME, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE) t2

entity.object_description: Get all details of the Inventory Status Summary as per selected report parameter. This data source to be used for specific report purpose. Source from Inventory Status Summary for Inventory Purpose
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_INV_STATUS_SUMMARY_01*/ /* Formatted on 30-03-2023 15:48:27 (QP5 v5.294) */ /*Inventory Status Summary*/ WITH q1 AS ( SELECT icode,UNITNAME,MRP FROM invitem I join invgrp grp on i.grpcode=grp.grpcode WHERE (grp.lev1grpname = '@Division@' or COALESCE('@Division@','-1')='-1') AND (grp.lev2grpname = '@Section@' or COALESCE('@Section@','-1')='-1') AND (grp.grpname = '@Department@' or COALESCE('@Department@','-1')='-1') AND (ccode1 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat1 WHERE (CNAME IN (SELECT unnest ( regexp_matches ('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode2 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat2 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode3 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat3 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode4 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat4 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode5 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat5 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (ccode6 IN (SELECT ccode FROM invcat6 WHERE (CNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ))) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (coalesce (barcode, icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (partyname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (COALESCE (TO_NUMBER(nullif('@MRPFrom@',''),'999999999'), -1) = -1 OR (COALESCE (TO_NUMBER(nullif('@MRPFrom@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> -1 AND MRP >= TO_NUMBER(nullif('@MRPFrom@',''),'999999999'))) AND (COALESCE (TO_NUMBER(nullif('@MRPTo@',''),'999999999'), -1) = -1 OR (COALESCE (TO_NUMBER(nullif('@MRPTo@',''),'999999999'), -1) <> -1 AND MRP <= TO_NUMBER(nullif('@MRPTo@',''),'999999999'))) ) SELECT NULL::text REQUESTID, row_number() over() uk, S.ICODE, UNITNAME, LOCCODE, ADMSITE_CODE, SUM (COALESCE (QTY, 0)) CLOSING_STOCK, /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE /*End Change*/ FROM INVSTOCK S INNER JOIN q1 T ON (S.ICODE = T.ICODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE ST ON (ADMSITE_CODE = ST.CODE) /*LEFT OUTER JOIN INVBATCH_SERIAL B ON (INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = B.CODE)*/ WHERE S.ENTDT::Date <= TO_DATE ('@ASON@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( ( COALESCE (NULLIF ('@SiteTypeDesc@', ''), '-1') = '-1' AND st.sitetype IN ('OS-OO-CM', 'MS-OO-CM', 'MS-CO-CM', 'US-CO-CM')) OR ( COALESCE (NULLIF ('@SiteTypeDesc@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' AND ( ( COALESCE (NULLIF ('@SiteTypeDesc@', ''), '-1') = 'Organization Site' AND st.sitetype = 'OS-OO-CM') OR ( COALESCE (NULLIF ('@SiteTypeDesc@', ''), '-1') = 'Organisation Owned Store Site' AND st.sitetype = 'MS-OO-CM') OR ( COALESCE (NULLIF ('@SiteTypeDesc@', ''), '-1') = 'Customer Owned Store Site' AND st.sitetype IN ('MS-CO-CM', 'US-CO-CM'))))) AND ( (TO_NUMBER (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@', ''), '-1'),'999999999') = -1) OR ( ( TO_NUMBER (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@', ''),'-1'), '999999999') <> -1 AND st.code = TO_NUMBER ( COALESCE (NULLIF ('@SiteTypeDescSiteName@', ''),'-1'),'999999999')))) AND ( COALESCE (TO_NUMBER (NULLIF ('@ConnOUCode@', ''), '999999999'),-1) = -1 OR ( COALESCE (TO_NUMBER (NULLIF ('@ConnOUCode@', ''), '999999999'), -1) <> -1 AND S.ADMOU_CODE = TO_NUMBER (NULLIF ('@ConnOUCode@', ''), '999999999'))) AND ( ( COALESCE ('@LocationWise@'::text, 'N') = 'Y' AND ( COALESCE ( TO_NUMBER ( NULLIF ('@GroupCodeWiseStockPoint@', ''), '999999999'), -1) = -1 OR ( COALESCE ( TO_NUMBER ( NULLIF ('@GroupCodeWiseStockPoint@', ''), '999999999'), -1) <> -1 AND S.LOCCODE = TO_NUMBER ( NULLIF ('@GroupCodeWiseStockPoint@', ''), '999999999')))) OR ( '@LocationWise@'::text = 'N' AND ( COALESCE ( TO_NUMBER (NULLIF ('@LocationGroupCode@', ''), '999999999'), -1) = -1 OR ( COALESCE ( TO_NUMBER ( NULLIF ('@LocationGroupCode@', ''), '999999999'), -1) <> -1 AND S.LOCCODE IN (SELECT LOCCODE FROM INVLOC WHERE INVLOCGRP_CODE = TO_NUMBER ( NULLIF ('@LocationGroupCode@', ''), '999999999')))))) group by S.ICODE, UNITNAME, S.LOCCODE, S.ADMSITE_CODE, S.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE

entity.object_description: Generic Data Source for Item History
entity.sql_stmt:
/* Formatted on 04-04-2023 12:20:59 (QP5 v5.294) */ /*LV_INVENTORY_HISTORY_BATCH*/ /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 91592 Jyotirmoy Inclusion of Item Code (Icode) Filter in Barcode History Report */
SELECT STOCKCODE UK, K.ADMOU_CODE ADMOU_CODE, NAME OU_NAME, K.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, AMOUNT TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, CHANNELTYPE CHANNEL_TYPE, CODCHG COD_CHARGE_AMOUNT, COGS_CODE, COSTAMOUNT COST_AMOUNT, COSTRATE COST_RATE, DISCOUNTAMT DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, ENTCODE ENTRY_CODE, CASE WHEN (K.ENTTYPE = 'SOP') THEN (ENTDT::date + 1) ELSE ENTDT END ENTRY_DATE, K.ENTTYPE ENTTYPE, ENTNAME ENTRY_TYPE_NAME, I.SEQ ENTRY_TYPE_SEQUENCE, ENTGRPNAME ENTRY_GROUP_NAME, G.SEQ ENTRY_GROUP_SEQUENCE, EXTAXAMT EXTRA_TAX_AMOUNT, GWCHG GW_CHARGE_AMOUNT, ICODE ICODE, INVBIN_CODE INVBIN_CODE, INITCAP (ISSECONDARY) IS_SECONDARY, ITEM_REMARKS ITEM_REMARKS, K.LOCCODE LOCCODE, LOCNAME STOCK_POINT_NAME, PROMOAMT PROMO_AMOUNT, PROMOCODE PROMO_CODE, PROMOENDDATE PROMO_END_DATE, PROMONAME PROMO_NAME, PROMONO PROMO_NO, PROMOSTARTDATE PROMO_START_DATE, PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, (SELECT PS.NAME FROM PSITE_STOCKPOINT PS WHERE K.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE = PS.CODE) STORE_STOCK_POINT_NAME, QTY QUANTITY, RATE TRANSACTION_RATE, REFDOCNO REFERENCE_DOCUMENT_NO, REFPCODE REFERENCE_PARTY_CODE, ginview.FNC_REF_PARTY (ENTCODE, K.ENTTYPE, SUBENTTYPE, REFPCODE, REFPRCODE) REFERENCE_PARTY, RESERVE_QTY RESERVE_QUANTITY, CASE WHEN (SCHEME_DOCNO IS NULL) THEN ENTNO::text ELSE SCHEME_DOCNO END ENTRY_NO, SHIPCHG SHIPPING_CHARGE_AMOUNT, STOCKCODE STOCKCODE, SUBENTTYPE SUBENTTYPE, TAXAMT TAX_AMOUNT, TIME CREATED_ON, K.YCODE YCODE, YNAME YRNAME, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM (SELECT * FROM INVSTOCK WHERE ICODE IN (SELECT code FROM ginview.lv_item WHERE barcode IN (SELECT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '') AS col1) OR item_code IN (SELECT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE('@#ItemItemCodeMulti#@', '') AS col1))) K LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMOU O ON (K.ADMOU_CODE = CODE) INNER JOIN INVENTTYPE I ON (K.ENTTYPE = I.ENTTYPE) INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) INNER JOIN ADMYEAR YR ON (K.YCODE = YR.YCODE) INNER JOIN INVENTGRP G ON (I.ENTGRPCODE = G.ENTGRPCODE) WHERE K.ICODE IN (SELECT code FROM ginview.lv_item WHERE barcode IN (SELECT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '') AS col1) OR item_code IN (SELECT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE('@#ItemItemCodeMulti#@', '') AS col1))

entity.object_description: Get all Items
Get All Component Item
Get All Assembly Item
Get Item Costing.
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_ITEM_COSTING_01*/ /* Formatted on 09-12-2022 15:45:27 (QP5 v5.294) */ SELECT NULL requestid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER() uk, document_date, movement_type, stockcode, entry_type_long, entry_type_short, icode, admsite_code, owner_site, document_no, quantity, transaction_rate, transaction_amount, ROUND (cost_rate::NUMERIC, 3) cost_rate, cost_amount, /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE /*End Change*/ FROM (SELECT TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') DOCUMENT_DATE, 'INWARD' MOVEMENT_TYPE, 0 STOCKCODE, 'Opening' Entry_Type_Long, 'OPN' Entry_Type_Short, ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, Owner_Site, NULL DOCUMENT_NO, SUM (Quantity) Quantity, case when SUM (Quantity)= 0 then 0 else SUM (Transaction_Amount) / SUM (Quantity) end Transaction_Rate, SUM (Transaction_Amount) Transaction_Amount, case when SUM (Quantity)= 0 then 0 else SUM (COST_Amount) / SUM (Quantity) end COST_Rate, SUM (COST_Amount) COST_Amount, /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE /*End Change*/ FROM ( SELECT K.ICODE, K.ADMSITE_CODE, NAME OWNER_SITE, SUM (QTY) QUANTITY, SUM (AMOUNT) TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, SUM (COSTAMOUNT) COST_AMOUNT, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE FROM INVSTOCK K INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (K.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (K.ICODE = I.ICODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVBATCH_SERIAL B ON (INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = B.CODE) Where L.LOCTYPE <> 'T' /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ /*End Change*/ AND (coalesce (I.barcode, I.icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( K.ENTDT < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') OR ( K.ENTTYPE = 'SOP' AND K.ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') )) GROUP BY K.ICODE, K.ADMSITE_CODE, S.NAME, /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, B.BATCH_SERIAL_NO, B.MFG_DATE, B.EXP_DATE /*End Change*/ HAVING SUM (K.QTY) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT K.ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, NAME OWNER_SITE, 0 QUANTITY, 0 TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, SUM (DIFF_COST_AMT) COST_AMOUNT, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE FROM INVCOSTADJ K INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (K.ICODE = I.ICODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVBATCH_SERIAL B ON (INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = B.CODE) Where K.LOCCODE IS NULL AND (coalesce (I.barcode, I.icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND K.ADJDT < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY K.ICODE, K.ADMSITE_CODE, S.NAME, K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, B.BATCH_SERIAL_NO, B.MFG_DATE, B.EXP_DATE)X GROUP BY ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, Owner_Site, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE UNION ALL SELECT ENTDT DOCUMENT_DATE, CASE WHEN (SUM (QTY) > 0) THEN 'INWARD' WHEN (SUM (QTY) < 0) THEN 'OUTWARD' END MOVEMENT_TYPE, STOCKCODE STOCKCODE, ENTNAME ENTRY_TYPE_LONG, K.ENTTYPE ENTRY_TYPE_SHORT, K.ICODE, K.ADMSITE_CODE, NAME OWNER_SITE, SCHEME_DOCNO DOCUMENT_NO, SUM (QTY) QUANTITY, K.RATE TRANSACTION_RATE, SUM (AMOUNT) TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, K.COSTRATE COST_RATE, SUM (COSTAMOUNT) COST_AMOUNT, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE FROM INVSTOCK K INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (K.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) INNER JOIN INVENTTYPE E ON (K.ENTTYPE = E.ENTTYPE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (K.ICODE = I.ICODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVBATCH_SERIAL B ON (INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = B.CODE) Where (coalesce (i.barcode, I.icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND K.ENTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND 1 = (CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'GRC' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'GRT' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'STI' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'STO' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S', 'L') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'PRR' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'PRT' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'PRI' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'PIS' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'PRC' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'SAL' AND LOCTYPE IN ('L', 'S', 'W', 'M', 'B')/*Bug Id : 63053 Add 'B' type for SAL Entry Type*/ THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'SRT' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'ADJ' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'MIS' AND LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'M', 'S') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GROUP BY ENTDT, STOCKCODE, ENTNAME, K.ENTTYPE, K.ICODE, K.ADMSITE_CODE, S.NAME, SCHEME_DOCNO, K.RATE, K.COSTRATE, /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, B.BATCH_SERIAL_NO, B.MFG_DATE, B.EXP_DATE /*End Change*/ HAVING SUM (K.QTY) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT ADJDT DOCUMENT_DATE, NULL MOVEMENT_TYPE, 999999999 STOCKCODE, 'Cost adjustment' ENTRY_TYPE_LONG, 'DIF' ENTRY_TYPE_SHORT, K.ICODE, ADMSITE_CODE, NAME OWNER_SITE, NULL DOCUMENT_NO, 0 QUANTITY, 0 TRANSACTION_RATE, 0 TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, 0 COST_RATE, SUM (DIFF_COST_AMT) COST_AMOUNT, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE FROM INVCOSTADJ K INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (K.ICODE = I.ICODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVBATCH_SERIAL B ON (INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = B.CODE) Where (coalesce (i.barcode, I.icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND K.LOCCODE IS NULL AND K.ADJDT BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY ADJDT, K.ICODE, K.ADMSITE_CODE, S.NAME, K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, B.BATCH_SERIAL_NO, B.MFG_DATE, B.EXP_DATE UNION ALL SELECT TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') DOCUMENT_DATE, NULL MOVEMENT_TYPE, 0 STOCKCODE, 'Transit' ENTRY_TYPE_LONG, 'Transit' ENTRY_TYPE_SHORT, K.ICODE, K.ADMSITE_CODE, NAME OWNER_SITE, NULL DOCUMENT_NO, SUM (QTY) QUANTITY, case when SUM (QTY)= 0 then 0 else SUM (AMOUNT) / SUM (QTY) end TRANSACTION_RATE, SUM (AMOUNT) TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, case when SUM (QTY)= 0 then 0 else SUM (COSTAMOUNT) / SUM (QTY) end COST_RATE, SUM (COSTAMOUNT) COST_AMOUNT, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE FROM INVSTOCK K INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (K.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (K.ICODE = I.ICODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVBATCH_SERIAL B ON (INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = B.CODE) Where L.LOCTYPE = 'T' AND K.ENTDT <= TO_DATE('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND (coalesce (i.barcode, I.icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY K.ICODE, K.ADMSITE_CODE, S.NAME, K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, B.BATCH_SERIAL_NO, B.MFG_DATE, B.EXP_DATE HAVING SUM (K.QTY) <> 0)X

entity.object_description: Get available Item Stock within a location for a selected Date
entity.sql_stmt: with seleted_date as (select mcode, dtfr::date fist_date, dtto::date last_date from admmonth where to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') between dtfr::date and dtto::date), SelectedMonths as (select min(monthcode) min_month_code,max(monthcode) max_month_code from stk_book_summary), SelectedSites as (select code,name sitename from admsite s where ((s.code = coalesce(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@','')::int,-1) and coalesce(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@','')::int,-1) <>-1) or (coalesce(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@','')::int,-1)=-1)) and ((s.sitetype = coalesce('@SiteType@','-1') and coalesce('@SiteType@','-1') <> '-1') or (coalesce('@SiteType@','-1')='-1'))), selectedItem as (SELECT code FROM invitem_detail_agg I WHERE (category1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (category2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (category3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (category4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (category5 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (category6 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (barcode IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (division IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (section IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (department IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) select row_number() over () UK, admsite_code, sitename, icode, sum(stock_qty) stock_qty, sum(stock_amount) stock_amount, sum(unsettled_qty) unsettled_qty from (select 'INVSTOCK' src, k.admsite_code, sitename, icode, qty stock_qty, costamount stock_amount, 0 unsettled_qty from invstock k join selecteditem i on (k.icode = i.code) join SelectedSites s on k.admsite_code = s.code join invloc l on k.loccode = l.loccode where l.loctype <> 'T' AND (((select mcode from seleted_date) < (select min_month_code from SelectedMonths) and entdt::date <= to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD')) OR ((select mcode from seleted_date) BETWEEN (select min_month_code from SelectedMonths) AND (select max_month_code from SelectedMonths) AND to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') <> CURRENT_DATE AND entdt::date BETWEEN (select fist_date from seleted_date) AND to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD'))) UNION ALL select 'COSTADJ', k.admsite_code, sitename, icode, 0 stock_qty, diff_cost_amt, 0 unsettled_qty from invcostadj k join selecteditem i on (k.icode = i.code) join SelectedSites s on k.admsite_code = s.code where /*(((select mcode from seleted_date) < (select min_month_code from SelectedMonths) and adjdt::date <= to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD')) OR ((select mcode from seleted_date) BETWEEN (select min_month_code from SelectedMonths) AND (select max_month_code from SelectedMonths) AND adjdt::date BETWEEN (select fist_date from seleted_date) AND to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD')))*/ adjdt::date <= to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL select 'STK_BOOK' src, k.admsite_code, sitename, icode, case when (to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') <> (select last_date from seleted_date) and to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') <> CURRENT_DATE::DATE) then opening_quantity else closing_stock_quantity end closing_stock_quantity, case when (to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') <> (select last_date from seleted_date) and to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') <> CURRENT_DATE::DATE) then opening_amount else closing_stock_amount end closing_stock_amount, 0 unsettled_qty from stk_book_summary K join selecteditem i on (k.icode = i.code) join SelectedSites s on k.admsite_code = s.code where monthcode = (select mcode from seleted_date) UNION ALL select 'PARK', m.admsite_code, sitename, icode, 0 stock_qty, 0 stock_amount, qty unsettled_qty from psite_posbill_park m JOIN psite_posbillitem_park d on m.code=d.psite_posbill_code join selecteditem i on (d.icode = i.code) join SelectedSites s on m.admsite_code = s.code where billdate::date <= to_date('@ASON@','YYYY-MM-DD') ) group by admsite_code, sitename, icode having ( (coalesce('@EffectiveStockQty@','-1') = '-1') or (coalesce('@EffectiveStockQty@','-1') = 'Positive Stock Only' and sum(stock_qty) > 0) or (coalesce('@EffectiveStockQty@','-1') = 'Negative Stock Only' and sum(stock_qty) < 0) or (coalesce('@EffectiveStockQty@','-1') = 'Zero Stock Only' and sum(stock_qty) = 0) )

entity.object_description: Get details of Transaction to be shown as per the selected ledger and date range.
entity.sql_stmt: select null requestid, keyval, postcode, entcode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, entname, entdt entrydate, entno entryno, docno refno, docdt refdate, duedt duedate, chqno chequeno, chqdt chequedate, drawnon, brsdt brsdate, chqlabel cheque_label, created_sitecode owner_sitecode, slcode, nartext, particulars, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ particulars_2, particulars_3, particulars_4, particulars_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ case when PARCODE is null then opening else coalesce ( lag (CLOSING) over (partition by GLCODE order by KEYVAL), 0) end OPENING, debit, credit, closing, parcode, year_month, release_status, enttype from ( select keyval, postcode, entcode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, entname, entdt, entno, docno, docdt, duedt, chqno, chqdt, drawnon, brsdt, chqlabel, created_sitecode, slcode, nartext, particulars, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ particulars_2, particulars_3, particulars_4, particulars_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ opening, debit, credit, SUM (balance) over (partition by glcode order by keyval) closing, lag (keyval) over (partition by glcode order by keyval) parcode, year_month, release_status, enttype from ( select keyval, postcode, entcode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, entname, entdt, entno, docno, docdt, duedt, chqno, chqdt, drawnon, brsdt, chqlabel, created_sitecode, slcode, nartext, particulars, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ particulars_2, particulars_3, particulars_4, particulars_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ opening, debit, credit, (opening + debit - credit) balance, year_month, release_status, enttype from ( select ( (A.GLCODE::text || TO_CHAR (ENTDT::date, 'yyyymmdd')) || a.POSTCODE::text) || coalesce (REF_ADMSITE_CODE, A.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER)::text KEYVAL, a.POSTCODE, ENTCODE, LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3, LEVEL4, A.GLCODE, ENTNAME, ENTDT, SCHEME_DOCNO ENTNO, DOCNO, DOCDT, DUEDT, CHQNO, CHQDT, DRAWNON, BRSDT, A.CHQLABEL, A.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER CREATED_SITECODE, SL.SLCODE, NARTEXT, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ case when p1.postcode is null and p2.POSTCODE is null then ginview.fnc_ledgerdetails ( a.postcode, entcode, a.enttype, a.glcode, damount, camount) when p1.postcode is not null and p2.POSTCODE is null then ginview.fnc_ledgerdetails ( p1.postcode, entcode, a.enttype, a.glcode, damount, camount) else p2.particulars1 end particulars, case when p1.postcode is null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null when p1.postcode is not null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null else p2.particulars2 end particulars_2, case when p1.postcode is null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null when p1.postcode is not null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null else p2.particulars3 end particulars_3, case when p1.postcode is null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null when p1.postcode is not null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null else p2.particulars4 end particulars_4, case when p1.postcode is null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null when p1.postcode is not null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null else p2.particulars5 end particulars_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ 0 OPENING, coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT, TO_CHAR (ENTDT, 'YYYY-MMMON') YEAR_MONTH, case RELEASE_STATUS when 'P' then 'Posted' when 'U' then 'Unposted' when 'R' then 'Reversed' end RELEASE_STATUS, A.ENTTYPE from FINPOST A inner join FINENTTYPE B on (A.ENTTYPE = B.ENTTYPE) inner join FINGL GL on (A.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) left outer join FINSL SL on (A.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) inner join GINVIEW.LV_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS GRP on (GRPCODE = CODE) /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ left outer join ( select distinct postcode from GINVIEW.FINPOST_PARTICULARS_STAGE where DML_TYPE <> 'D') p1 on (a.POSTCODE = p1.POSTCODE) left outer join GINVIEW.FINPOST_PARTICULARS p2 on (a.POSTCODE = p2.POSTCODE) /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ where entdt between to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@', '9G999g999999999999d99') and (gl.glname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) or coalesce (nullif ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (sl.slname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) or coalesce (nullif ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (grp.level1 in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) or coalesce (nullif ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (grp.level2 in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) or coalesce (nullif ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (grp.level3 in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) or coalesce (nullif ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (grp.level4 in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) or coalesce (nullif ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and ( ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 and release_status = 'P') or ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 and release_status in ('P', 'U'))) union all select keyval, postcode::int, entcode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, entname, to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') entdt, entno, docno, docdt::date, duedt::date, chqno, chqdt::date, drawnon, brsdt::date, chqlabel, created_sitecode::int, slcode::int, nartext, particulars, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ null particulars_2, null particulars_3, null particulars_4, null particulars_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ SUM (opening) opening, debit, credit, year_month, release_status, enttype from ( select ( ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (sl.slname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) or coalesce (nullif ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (grp.level1 in ( select coalesce (nullif ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (grp.level2 in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) or coalesce (nullif ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and 0::text) and ( ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 and release_status = 'P') or ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 and release_status in ('P', 'U'))) group by p.glcode::text || TO_CHAR (TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyymmdd') || 0::text, grp.level1, grp.level2, grp.level3, grp.level4, p.glcode, TO_CHAR
