entity.entity_name: Ledger Detail New Debit Credit Format
entity.object_description: Get details of Transaction to be shown as per the selected ledger and date range.
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_LEDGER_DETAIL_NEW_F1_01*/ with TV_DATA AS ( SELECT NULL::text requestid, keyval, postcode, entcode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, entname, entdt entrydate, entno entryno, docno refno, docdt refdate, duedt duedate, chqno chequeno, chqdt chequedate, drawnon, brsdt brsdate, chqlabel cheque_label, created_sitecode owner_sitecode, slcode, nartext, particulars, CASE WHEN PARCODE IS NULL THEN opening ELSE coalesce ( LAG (CLOSING) OVER (PARTITION BY GLCODE ORDER BY KEYVAL), 0) END OPENING, debit, credit, closing, parcode, year_month, release_status, enttype FROM (SELECT keyval, postcode, entcode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, entname, entdt, entno, docno, docdt, duedt, chqno, chqdt, drawnon, brsdt, chqlabel, created_sitecode, slcode, nartext, particulars, opening, debit, credit, SUM (balance) OVER (PARTITION BY glcode ORDER BY keyval) closing, LAG (keyval) OVER (PARTITION BY glcode ORDER BY keyval) parcode, year_month, release_status, enttype FROM (SELECT keyval, postcode, entcode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, entname, entdt, entno, docno, docdt, duedt, chqno, chqdt, drawnon, brsdt, chqlabel, created_sitecode, slcode, nartext, particulars, opening, debit, credit, (opening + debit - credit) balance, year_month, release_status, enttype FROM ( SELECT ( (A.GLCODE::TEXT || to_char(ENTDT::DATE,'yyyymmdd')) || POSTCODE::TEXT) || coalesce (REF_ADMSITE_CODE::TEXT, A.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER::TEXT) KEYVAL, POSTCODE::TEXT, ENTCODE, LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3, LEVEL4, A.GLCODE, ENTNAME, ENTDT::DATE, SCHEME_DOCNO ENTNO, DOCNO, DOCDT::DATE, DUEDT::DATE, CHQNO, CHQDT::DATE, DRAWNON, BRSDT::DATE, A.CHQLABEL, A.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER::TEXT CREATED_SITECODE, SL.SLCODE::TEXT, NARTEXT, ginview.fnc_ledgerdetails (POSTCODE, ENTCODE, A.ENTTYPE, A.GLCODE, DAMOUNT, CAMOUNT) PARTICULARS, 0 OPENING, coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0) DEBIT, coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0) CREDIT, TO_CHAR (ENTDT, 'YYYY-MMMON') YEAR_MONTH, case RELEASE_STATUS when 'P' then 'Posted' when 'U' then 'Unposted' when 'R' then 'Reversed' end RELEASE_STATUS, A.ENTTYPE FROM FINPOST A INNER JOIN FINENTTYPE B ON (A.ENTTYPE = B.ENTTYPE) INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (A.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL SL ON (A.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS GRP ON (GRPCODE = CODE) Where entdt::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (sl.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (grp.level1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( ( '@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@'= 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR ( '@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@' = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) UNION ALL SELECT keyval, postcode::TEXT, entcode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, entname, entdt::DATE, entno, docno, docdt::DATE, duedt::DATE, chqno, chqdt::DATE, drawnon, brsdt::DATE, chqlabel, created_sitecode::TEXT, slcode::TEXT, nartext, particulars, SUM (opening) opening, debit, credit, year_month, release_status, enttype FROM ( SELECT ( P.GLCODE::TEXT || TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyymmdd')) || 0::TEXT KEYVAL, NULL POSTCODE, NULL ENTCODE, LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3, LEVEL4, P.GLCODE, 'OP' ENTNAME, NULL::DATE ENTDT, NULL ENTNO, NULL DOCNO, NULL::DATE DOCDT, NULL::DATE DUEDT, NULL CHQNO, NULL::DATE CHQDT, NULL DRAWNON, NULL::DATE BRSDT, NULL CHQLABEL, NULL CREATED_SITECODE, NULL SLCODE, NULL NARTEXT, NULL PARTICULARS, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) OPENING, 0 DEBIT, 0 CREDIT, TO_CHAR (TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYY-MMMON')::text YEAR_MONTH, NULL RELEASE_STATUS, NULL ENTTYPE FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (P.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL SL ON (P.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS GRP ON (GRPCODE = CODE) Where entdt < to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (sl.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (grp.level1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( ( '@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@' = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR ( '@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@' = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) GROUP BY p.glcode::TEXT || TO_DATE ('@DTFR@','yyyymmdd') || 0::TEXT, grp.level1, grp.level2, grp.level3, grp.level4, p.glcode, TO_CHAR (to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYY-MMMON')::text UNION ALL SELECT p.glcode::TEXT || TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyymmdd') || 0::TEXT keyval, NULL postcode, NULL entcode, grp.level1, grp.level2, grp.level3, grp.level4, p.glcode, 'OP' entname, NULL::DATE entdt, NULL entno, NULL docno, NULL::DATE docdt, NULL::DATE duedt, NULL chqno, NULL::DATE chqdt, NULL drawnon, NULL::DATE brsdt, NULL chqlabel, NULL created_sitecode, NULL slcode, NULL nartext, NULL particulars, SUM (coalesce (opdamt, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (opcamt, 0)) opening, 0 debit, 0 credit, TO_CHAR (to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYY-MMMON')::text year_month, NULL release_status, NULL enttype FROM ( SELECT glcode, slcode, ycode, admou_code, SUM (coalesce (opdamt, 0)) opdamt, SUM (coalesce (opcamt, 0)) opcamt FROM (SELECT glcode, NULL slcode, ycode, admou_code, opdamt, opcamt FROM finglop WHERE glcode IN (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE coalesce ( slapp, 'N') = 'N') AND ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) UNION ALL SELECT glcode, slcode, ycode, admou_code, opdamt, opcamt FROM finslop WHERE glcode IN (SELECT glcode FROM fingl WHERE coalesce ( slapp, 'N') = 'Y') AND ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto))X1 GROUP BY glcode, slcode, ycode, admou_code) p inner join fingl gl on (p.glcode = gl.glcode) left outer join finsl sl on (p.slcode = sl.slcode) inner join ginview.lv_chart_of_accounts grp on (gl.grpcode = grp.code) Where admou_code = TO_NUMBER('@ConnOUCode@','999999999') AND (grp.level1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (sl.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY p.glcode::TEXT || TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyymmdd') || 0::TEXT, grp.level1, grp.level2, grp.level3, grp.level4, p.glcode, TO_CHAR (to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYY-MMMON')::text)Z1 GROUP BY glcode, keyval, postcode, entcode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, entname, entdt::DATE, entno, docno, docdt::DATE, duedt::DATE, chqno, chqdt::DATE, drawnon, brsdt::DATE, chqlabel, created_sitecode, slcode, nartext, particulars, debit, credit, year_month, release_status, enttype)X)Y)Z ) SELECT ROWNO, GLCODE, REQUESTID, KEYVAL, DNARTEXT, DCHEQUENO, DCHEQUEDATE, DDRAWNON, DENTNAME, DENTRYDATE, CRNARTEXT, CRCHEQUENO, CRCHEQUEDATE, CRDRAWNON, CRENTNAME, CRENTRYDATE, DEBIT, B_ROWID, CREDIT FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ROWNO, GLCODE, REQUESTID, KEYVAL, DNARTEXT, DCHEQUENO, DCHEQUEDATE, DDRAWNON, DENTNAME, DENTRYDATE, CRNARTEXT, CRCHEQUENO, CRCHEQUEDATE, CRDRAWNON, CRENTNAME, CRENTRYDATE, DEBIT, B_ROWID, CREDIT FROM (SELECT coalesce (a.rno, b.rno) rowno, coalesce (a.GLCODE, b.GLCODE) GLCODE, coalesce (a.requestid, b.requestid) requestid, coalesce (a.KEYVAL, b.KEYVAL) KEYVAL, a.NARTEXT dnartext, a.CHEQUENO dCHEQUENO, a.CHEQUEDATE dCHEQUEDATE, a.DRAWNON dDRAWNON, a.ENTNAME dENTNAME, a.ENTRYDATE dENTRYDATE, b.NARTEXT crnartext, b.CHEQUENO crCHEQUENO, b.CHEQUEDATE crCHEQUEDATE, b.DRAWNON crDRAWNON, b.ENTNAME crENTNAME, b.ENTRYDATE crENTRYDATE, a.debit, b.GLCODE B_RowID, b.credit FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY tv.requestid, tv.GLCODE ORDER BY tv.ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO) AS rno, tv.* FROM ( SELECT GLCODE, requestid, NARTEXT, CHEQUENO, CHEQUEDATE, DRAWNON, ENTNAME, ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO, MIN (keyval) keyval, SUM (debit) debit FROM TV_DATA tv WHERE debit > 0 GROUP BY GLCODE, requestid, NARTEXT, CHEQUENO, CHEQUEDATE, DRAWNON, ENTNAME, ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO) tv) a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY tv.requestid, tv.GLCODE ORDER BY tv.ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO) AS rno, tv.* FROM ( SELECT GLCODE, requestid, NARTEXT, CHEQUENO, CHEQUEDATE, DRAWNON, ENTNAME, ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO, MIN (keyval) keyval, SUM (credit) credit FROM TV_DATA tv WHERE credit > 0 GROUP BY GLCODE, requestid, NARTEXT, CHEQUENO, CHEQUEDATE, DRAWNON, ENTNAME, ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO) tv) b ON b.GLCODE = a.GLCODE AND b.rno = a.rno --AND b.requestid = a.requestid UNION ALL SELECT coalesce (a.rno, b.rno) rowno, coalesce (a.GLCODE, b.GLCODE) GLCODE, coalesce (a.requestid, b.requestid) requestid, coalesce (a.KEYVAL, b.KEYVAL) KEYVAL, a.NARTEXT dnartext, a.CHEQUENO dCHEQUENO, a.CHEQUEDATE dCHEQUEDATE, a.DRAWNON dDRAWNON, a.ENTNAME dENTNAME, a.ENTRYDATE dENTRYDATE, b.NARTEXT crnartext, b.CHEQUENO crCHEQUENO, b.CHEQUEDATE crCHEQUEDATE, b.DRAWNON crDRAWNON, b.ENTNAME crENTNAME, b.ENTRYDATE crENTRYDATE, a.debit, b.GLCODE B_RowID, b.credit FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY tv.requestid, tv.GLCODE ORDER BY tv.ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO) AS rno, tv.* FROM ( SELECT GLCODE, requestid, NARTEXT, CHEQUENO, CHEQUEDATE, DRAWNON, ENTNAME, ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO, MIN (keyval) keyval, SUM (debit) debit FROM TV_DATA tv WHERE debit > 0 GROUP BY GLCODE, requestid, NARTEXT, CHEQUENO, CHEQUEDATE, DRAWNON, ENTNAME, ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO) tv) a RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY tv.requestid, tv.GLCODE ORDER BY tv.ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO) AS rno, tv.* FROM ( SELECT GLCODE, requestid, NARTEXT, CHEQUENO, CHEQUEDATE, DRAWNON, ENTNAME, ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO, MIN (keyval) keyval, SUM (credit) credit FROM TV_DATA tv WHERE credit > 0 GROUP BY GLCODE, requestid, NARTEXT, CHEQUENO, CHEQUEDATE, DRAWNON, ENTNAME, ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO) tv) b ON b.GLCODE = a.GLCODE AND b.rno = a.rno --AND b.requestid = a.requestid )XZ --Start: BUG 105477 (Opening Added) UNION ALL SELECT coalesce (a.rno, b.rno) rowno, coalesce (a.GLCODE, b.GLCODE) GLCODE, coalesce (a.requestid, b.requestid) requestid, coalesce (a.KEYVAL, b.KEYVAL) KEYVAL, a.NARTEXT dnartext, a.CHEQUENO dCHEQUENO, a.CHEQUEDATE dCHEQUEDATE, a.DRAWNON dDRAWNON, a.ENTNAME dENTNAME, a.ENTRYDATE dENTRYDATE, b.NARTEXT crnartext, b.CHEQUENO crCHEQUENO, b.CHEQUEDATE crCHEQUEDATE, b.DRAWNON crDRAWNON, b.ENTNAME crENTNAME, b.ENTRYDATE crENTRYDATE, a.debit, b.GLCODE B_RowID, b.credit FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY tv.requestid, tv.GLCODE ORDER BY tv.ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO) AS rno, tv.* FROM (SELECT GLCODE, requestid, NARTEXT, CHEQUENO, CHEQUEDATE, DRAWNON, CASE WHEN (opening > 0) THEN 'Opening' ELSE NULL END ENTNAME, ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO, keyval, CASE WHEN (opening > 0) THEN opening ELSE NULL END debit FROM TV_DATA tv WHERE entname = 'OP') tv) a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY tv.requestid, tv.GLCODE ORDER BY tv.ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO) AS rno, tv.* FROM (SELECT GLCODE, requestid, NARTEXT, CHEQUENO, CHEQUEDATE, DRAWNON, CASE WHEN (opening < 0) THEN 'Opening' ELSE NULL END ENTNAME, ENTRYDATE, tv.ENTRYNO, keyval, CASE WHEN (opening < 0) THEN opening ELSE NULL END credit FROM TV_DATA tv WHERE entname = 'OP') tv) b ON b.GLCODE = a.GLCODE AND b.rno = a.rno --End: BUG 105477 (Opening Added) AND b.requestid = a.requestid ) a1 ORDER BY a1.rowno

entity.object_description: Monthly summary of selected Ledgers for given Financial period. Click 'Month' for more details.
entity.sql_stmt: /*Ledger By Month*/ SELECT keyval uk, keyval, year_month, ycode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, CASE WHEN PARCODE IS NULL THEN opening ELSE coalesce ( LAG (CLOSING) OVER (PARTITION BY GLCODE ORDER BY KEYVAL), 0) END opening, debit, credit, parcode, closing FROM ( SELECT keyval, year_month, ycode, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, opening, debit, credit, LAG (keyval) OVER (PARTITION BY glcode ORDER BY keyval) parcode, SUM (balance) OVER (PARTITION BY glcode ORDER BY keyval) closing FROM ( SELECT year_month, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, keyval, ycode, SUM (opening) opening, SUM (debit) debit, SUM (credit) credit, SUM (opening + debit - credit) balance FROM (SELECT t1.keyval, t1.year_month, t1.ycode, level1, level2, level3, level4, t1.glcode, coalesce (opening, 0) opening, coalesce (debit, 0) debit, coalesce (credit, 0) credit FROM ( SELECT GLCODE::text || TO_CHAR (MONSTDT, 'YYYYMM') KEYVAL, TO_CHAR (MONSTDT, 'YYYY-MMMON') YEAR_MONTH, GLCODE, YCODE FROM ADMMONTH CROSS JOIN FINGL WHERE (MONSTDT BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND ( (glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) )) t1 left outer join ( SELECT P.GLCODE::text || TO_CHAR (ENTDT, 'YYYYMM') KEYVAL, TO_CHAR (ENTDT, 'YYYY-MMMON') YEAR_MONTH, ycode, LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3, LEVEL4, P.GLCODE, 0 OPENING, SUM (DAMOUNT) DEBIT, SUM (CAMOUNT) CREDIT FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (P.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS GRP ON (GRPCODE = CODE) Where p.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND p.entdt BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (grp.level1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) GROUP BY p.glcode::text || TO_CHAR (entdt, 'YYYYMM'), TO_CHAR (entdt, 'YYYY-MMMON'), ycode, grp.level1, grp.level2, grp.level3, grp.level4, p.glcode /*ORDER BY p.glcode::text || TO_CHAR (entdt, 'YYYYMM')*/ UNION ALL SELECT P.GLCODE::text || TO_CHAR (TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYYMM') KEYVAL, TO_CHAR (TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYY-MMMON') YEAR_MONTH, YCODE, LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3, LEVEL4, P.GLCODE, SUM (DAMOUNT) - SUM (CAMOUNT) OPENING, 0 DEBIT, 0 CREDIT FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (P.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS GRP ON (GRPCODE = CODE) Where entdt < to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND (grp.level1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) GROUP BY p.glcode::text || TO_CHAR (to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYYMM'), TO_CHAR (to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYY-MMMON'), ycode, grp.level1, grp.level2, grp.level3, grp.level4, p.glcode UNION ALL SELECT P.GLCODE::text || TO_CHAR (TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYYMM') KEYVAL, TO_CHAR (TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYY-MMMON') YEAR_MONTH, YCODE, LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3, LEVEL4, P.GLCODE, SUM (OPDAMT) - SUM (OPCAMT) OPENING, 0 DEBIT, 0 CREDIT FROM FINGLOP P INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (P.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS GRP ON (GRPCODE = GRP.CODE) Where ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND (grp.level1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY p.glcode::text || TO_CHAR (to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYYMM'), TO_CHAR (to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYY-MMMON'), ycode, grp.level1, grp.level2, grp.level3, grp.level4, p.glcode)q1 on (t1.keyval = q1.keyval)) GROUP BY year_month, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, keyval, ycode)q2 )q3

entity.object_description: This report will show transaction summary of all ledgers during a given period. Click 'Ledger' to get more details.
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT null requestid, row_number() over() uk, level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode, SUM (opening) opening, SUM (debit) debit, SUM (credit) credit, SUM (opening + debit - credit) closing FROM ( SELECT LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3, LEVEL4, P.GLCODE, 0 OPENING, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0)) DEBIT, SUM (coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) CREDIT FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (P.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS GRP ON (GRPCODE = CODE) Where p.entdt BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND p.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND (grp.level1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) GROUP BY grp.level1, grp.level2, grp.level3, grp.level4, p.glcode UNION ALL SELECT LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3, LEVEL4, P.GLCODE, SUM (coalesce (DAMOUNT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (CAMOUNT, 0)) OPENING, 0 DEBIT, 0 CREDIT FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (P.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS GRP ON (GRPCODE = CODE) Where p.entdt < to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND p.ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) AND p.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND (grp.level1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND release_status = 'P') OR ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) GROUP BY grp.level1, grp.level2, grp.level3, grp.level4, p.glcode UNION ALL SELECT LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3, LEVEL4, P.GLCODE, SUM (coalesce (OPDAMT, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (OPCAMT, 0)) OPENING, 0 DEBIT, 0 CREDIT FROM FINGLOP P INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (P.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS GRP ON (GRPCODE = GRP.CODE) Where P.ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) AND P.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND (grp.level1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and (grp.level4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#chartofaccountslevel4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY grp.level1, grp.level2, grp.level3, grp.level4, p.glcode) q1 GROUP BY level1, level2, level3, level4, glcode

entity.object_description: Get details of Loyalty Care Transaction History along with point movement. This data source to be used for specific report purpose.
entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_LPCARDPOINT_01*/ SELECT X.requestid, DENSE_RANK () OVER (ORDER BY X.ROW_NUM) uk, X.cardno, X.card_type, X.issuedon, X.psite_customer_code, X.customer_full_name, X.customer_address, X.customer_mobile, X.point_status, X.bill_type, X.bill_no, X.bill_date, X.GENERATEDFRM, X.bill_amount, X.points FROM ( SELECT null requestid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER() ROW_NUM, t1.cardno, lpcard_type.name card_type, lpcard.issuedon, t1.psite_customer_code, RTRIM ( LTRIM ( coalesce (cus.salutation, ' ') || ' ' || coalesce (cus.fname, ' ') || CASE WHEN cus.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (cus.mname, ' ') || CASE WHEN cus.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (cus.lname, ' '))) customer_full_name, cus.address1 || ' ' || cus.address2 || ' ' || cus.address3 customer_address, cus.mobile customer_mobile, point_status, bill_type, bill_no, bill_date, s.name GENERATEDFRM, bill_amount, points FROM (SELECT t3.cardno, t3.psite_customer_code, 'Opening' point_status, NULL bill_type, NULL bill_no, TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') bill_date, NULL admsite_code, 0 bill_amount, coalesce (t1.earnpt, 0) + coalesce (t3.opening, 0) - coalesce (t2.redemppt, 0) points FROM (SELECT opening, lp.cardno, c.code psite_customer_code FROM lpcard_point lp inner join psite_customer c on (lp.cardno = c.lpcardno) WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM lpcard_benefit_point pt WHERE pt.cardno = lp.cardno)) t3 left outer join( SELECT SUM (coalesce (redeempoint, 0)) redemppt, cardno FROM lpredemptiontoken WHERE redeemon::DATE < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY cardno) t2 on (t3.cardno = t2.cardno) left outer join ( SELECT p.lpcardno, p.psite_customer_code, SUM (coalesce (p.lppointsearned, 0)) earnpt FROM psite_posbill p WHERE p.billdate::DATE < TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY p.lpcardno, p.psite_customer_code) t1 on (t3.cardno = t1.lpcardno) UNION ALL SELECT lpcardno, psite_customer_code, point_status, bill_type, billno, billdate, admsite_code, SUM (bill_amount) bill_amount, SUM (pointern) - SUM (pointredm) points FROM (SELECT admsite_code, lpcardno, psite_customer_code, billno, billdate, 'Earned' point_status, coalesce (lppointsearned, 0) pointern, 0 pointredm, coalesce (netamt, 0) bill_amount, 'POS Bill' bill_type FROM psite_posbill WHERE billdate::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT t1.admsite_code, t1.cardno, t2.psite_customer_code, t2.billno, t2.billdate, 'Redeemed' point_status, 0 pointern, coalesce (redeempoint, 0) pointredm, t2.netamt bill_amount, bill_type FROM lpredemptiontoken t1 inner join (SELECT code, billno, billdate, psite_customer_code, coalesce (netamt, 0) netamt, 'POS Bill' bill_type FROM psite_posbill a WHERE a.billdate::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT code, billno, billdate, psite_customer_code, coalesce (netamt, 0), 'POS GV Bill' bill_type FROM psite_posgvbill a WHERE a.billdate::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT code, billno, billdate, psite_customer_code, coalesce (amount, 0), 'POS Depref Bill' bill_type FROM psite_posdeprefbill a WHERE a.billdate::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) t2 on (t1.receive_psite_posbill_code = t2.code))X WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM lpcard_benefit_point pt WHERE pt.cardno = lpcardno) GROUP BY lpcardno, psite_customer_code, bill_type, billno, billdate, point_status, admsite_code) t1 left outer join psite_customer cus on (t1.psite_customer_code = cus.code) left outer join admsite s on (t1.admsite_code = s.code) inner join lpcard on (t1.cardno = lpcard.cardno) inner join lpcard_type on (lpcard.lpcard_type_code = lpcard_type.code) WHERE (t1.cardno IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#RetailCustomerLoyaltyCardNoMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#RetailCustomerLoyaltyCardNoMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#RetailCustomerLoyaltyCardNoMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (RTRIM ( LTRIM ( coalesce (cus.salutation, ' ') || ' ' || coalesce (cus.fname, ' ') || CASE WHEN cus.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (cus.mname, ' ') || CASE WHEN cus.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (cus.lname, ' '))) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#RetailCustomerFullnameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#RetailCustomerFullnameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#RetailCustomerFullnameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) )X

entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() OVER () AS uk, user_ecode, user_name, user_no, user_login_name, user_profile, user_menu_role, user_report_role, user_group, created_by, created_by_eno, created_on, is_extinct, extinct_by, extinct_by_eno, extinct_on, is_apiuser, lock_days, remarks, allow_last_fy_day_mode, last_modified_by, last_modified_eno, last_modified_on FROM ( SELECT h.ecode AS user_ecode, h.fname AS user_name, h.eno AS user_no, h.abbre AS user_login_name, p.profname AS user_profile, r.rlname AS user_menu_role, err.role AS user_report_role, d.deptname AS user_group, cr.created_by, cr.created_by_eno, to_char(cr.created_on, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH12:MI:SS AM'::text) AS created_on, CASE WHEN h.ext = 'Y'::bpchar THEN 'Yes'::text ELSE 'No'::text END AS is_extinct, ex.extinct_by, ex.extinct_by_eno, to_char(ex.extinct_on, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH12:MI:SS AM'::text) AS extinct_on, CASE WHEN h.is_apiuser = 1 THEN 'Yes'::text ELSE 'No'::text END AS is_apiuser, h.locdays AS lock_days, h.rem AS remarks, h.allow_last_fy_day_mode, lm.last_modified_by, lm.last_modified_eno, to_char(lm.last_modified_on, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH12:MI:SS AM'::text) AS last_modified_on FROM hrdemp h LEFT JOIN admprof p ON h.profcode = p.profcode LEFT JOIN admrole r ON h.rlcode = r.rlcode LEFT JOIN hrddept d ON h.deptcode = d.deptcode LEFT JOIN ex_reportrole err ON h.reportrole::text = err.code::text LEFT JOIN ( SELECT h_1.ecode, t.login_user AS created_by, h1.eno AS created_by_eno, t.transaction_date AS created_on FROM aud2_hrdemp h_1 JOIN aud2_transaction t ON t.transaction_id::text = h_1.transaction_id::text JOIN hrdemp h1 ON t.login_user::text = h1.fname::text WHERE h_1.action::text = 'INSERT'::text) cr ON h.ecode = cr.ecode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT h_1.ecode, t.login_user AS extinct_by, h1.eno AS extinct_by_eno, t.transaction_date AS extinct_on FROM aud2_hrdemp h_1 JOIN aud2_transaction t ON t.transaction_id::text = h_1.transaction_id::text JOIN hrdemp h1 ON t.login_user::text = h1.fname::text WHERE ((h_1.ecode, t.transaction_date) IN ( SELECT h_2.ecode, max(t_1.transaction_date) AS transaction_date FROM aud2_hrdemp h_2 JOIN aud2_transaction t_1 ON t_1.transaction_id::text = h_2.transaction_id::text WHERE h_2.action::text = 'UPDATE'::text AND h_2.ext = 'Y'::bpchar GROUP BY h_2.ecode))) ex ON h.ecode = ex.ecode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT h_1.ecode, t.transaction_date AS last_modified_on, e.fname AS last_modified_by, e.eno AS last_modified_eno FROM aud2_hrdemp h_1 JOIN aud2_transaction t ON t.transaction_id::text = h_1.transaction_id::text JOIN hrdemp e ON t.login_user::text = e.fname::text WHERE ((h_1.ecode, t.transaction_date) IN ( SELECT h_2.ecode, max(t_1.transaction_date) AS transaction_date FROM aud2_hrdemp h_2 JOIN aud2_transaction t_1 ON t_1.transaction_id::text = h_2.transaction_id::text WHERE h_2.action::text = 'UPDATE'::text GROUP BY h_2.ecode))) lm ON h.ecode = lm.ecode) a

entity.sql_stmt:
/* Formatted on 04-04-2023 15:15:51 (QP5 v5.294) */ /*LV_INVENTORY_HISTORY*/ /*Refer Bug ID 108435 from Changes Note*/ /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 91592 Jyotirmoy Inclusion of Item Code (Icode) Filter in Barcode History Report */
SELECT row_number() over() UK, /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ ADMOU_CODE, OU_NAME, ADMSITE_CODE, TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, CHANNEL_TYPE, COD_CHARGE_AMOUNT, COGS_CODE, COST_AMOUNT, COST_RATE, DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, ENTRY_CODE, ENTRY_DATE, ENTTYPE, ENTRY_TYPE_NAME, ENTRY_TYPE_SEQUENCE, ENTRY_GROUP_NAME, ENTRY_GROUP_SEQUENCE, EXTRA_TAX_AMOUNT, GW_CHARGE_AMOUNT, ICODE, INVBIN_CODE, IS_SECONDARY, ITEM_REMARKS, LOCCODE, STOCK_POINT_NAME, PROMO_AMOUNT, PROMO_CODE, PROMO_END_DATE, PROMO_NAME, PROMO_NO, PROMO_START_DATE, PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, STORE_STOCK_POINT_NAME, QUANTITY, TRANSACTION_RATE, REFERENCE_DOCUMENT_NO, REFERENCE_PARTY_CODE, REFERENCE_PARTY, RESERVE_QUANTITY, ENTRY_NO, SHIPPING_CHARGE_AMOUNT, STOCKCODE, SUBENTTYPE, TAX_AMOUNT, CREATED_ON, YCODE, YRNAME, /*DECODE (serial_string, NULL, NULL, batch_string) batch_string, DECODE (serial_string, NULL, NULL, serial_string) serial_string*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM ( SELECT x.ADMOU_CODE, x.OU_NAME, x.ADMSITE_CODE, SUM (x.TRANSACTION_AMOUNT) TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, x.CHANNEL_TYPE, SUM (x.COD_CHARGE_AMOUNT) COD_CHARGE_AMOUNT, x.COGS_CODE, SUM (x.COST_AMOUNT) COST_AMOUNT, x.COST_RATE, SUM (x.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT) DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, x.ENTRY_CODE, x.ENTRY_DATE, x.ENTTYPE, x.ENTRY_TYPE_NAME, x.ENTRY_TYPE_SEQUENCE, x.ENTRY_GROUP_NAME, x.ENTRY_GROUP_SEQUENCE, SUM (x.EXTRA_TAX_AMOUNT) EXTRA_TAX_AMOUNT, SUM (x.GW_CHARGE_AMOUNT) GW_CHARGE_AMOUNT, x.ICODE, x.INVBIN_CODE, x.IS_SECONDARY, x.ITEM_REMARKS, x.LOCCODE, x.STOCK_POINT_NAME, SUM (x.PROMO_AMOUNT) PROMO_AMOUNT, x.PROMO_CODE, x.PROMO_END_DATE, x.PROMO_NAME, x.PROMO_NO, x.PROMO_START_DATE, x.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, x.STORE_STOCK_POINT_NAME, SUM (x.QUANTITY) QUANTITY, x.TRANSACTION_RATE, x.REFERENCE_DOCUMENT_NO, x.REFERENCE_PARTY_CODE, x.REFERENCE_PARTY, SUM (x.RESERVE_QUANTITY) RESERVE_QUANTITY, x.ENTRY_NO, SUM (x.SHIPPING_CHARGE_AMOUNT) SHIPPING_CHARGE_AMOUNT, x.STOCKCODE, x.SUBENTTYPE, SUM (x.TAX_AMOUNT) TAX_AMOUNT, x.CREATED_ON, x.YCODE, x.YRNAME, /*Feature 107045 batch serial LISTAGG (b.BATCH_SERIAL_NO || '[' || x.QUANTITY || ']', ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY b.BATCH_SERIAL_NO) batch_string, LISTAGG (b.BATCH_SERIAL_NO, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY b.BATCH_SERIAL_NO) serial_string*/ x.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM (SELECT K.ADMOU_CODE ADMOU_CODE, O.NAME OU_NAME, K.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, K.AMOUNT TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, K.CHANNELTYPE CHANNEL_TYPE, K.CODCHG COD_CHARGE_AMOUNT, K.COGS_CODE, K.COSTAMOUNT COST_AMOUNT, K.COSTRATE COST_RATE, K.DISCOUNTAMT DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, K.ENTCODE ENTRY_CODE, CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE = 'SOP' THEN K.ENTDT::date + 1 ELSE K.ENTDT END ENTRY_DATE, /*Bug Id 107514*/ /*K.ENTDT ENTRY_DATE,*/ K.ENTTYPE ENTTYPE, I.ENTNAME ENTRY_TYPE_NAME, I.SEQ ENTRY_TYPE_SEQUENCE, G.ENTGRPNAME ENTRY_GROUP_NAME, G.SEQ ENTRY_GROUP_SEQUENCE, K.EXTAXAMT EXTRA_TAX_AMOUNT, K.GWCHG GW_CHARGE_AMOUNT, K.ICODE ICODE, K.INVBIN_CODE INVBIN_CODE, INITCAP (K.ISSECONDARY) IS_SECONDARY, K.ITEM_REMARKS ITEM_REMARKS, K.LOCCODE LOCCODE, L.LOCNAME STOCK_POINT_NAME, K.PROMOAMT PROMO_AMOUNT, K.PROMOCODE PROMO_CODE, K.PROMOENDDATE PROMO_END_DATE, K.PROMONAME PROMO_NAME, K.PROMONO PROMO_NO, K.PROMOSTARTDATE PROMO_START_DATE, K.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, (SELECT PS.NAME FROM PSITE_STOCKPOINT PS WHERE K.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE = PS.CODE) STORE_STOCK_POINT_NAME, K.QTY QUANTITY, K.RATE TRANSACTION_RATE, K.REFDOCNO REFERENCE_DOCUMENT_NO, K.REFPCODE REFERENCE_PARTY_CODE, ginview.FNC_REF_PARTY (K.ENTCODE, K.ENTTYPE, K.SUBENTTYPE, K.REFPCODE, REFPRCODE) REFERENCE_PARTY, K.RESERVE_QTY RESERVE_QUANTITY, CASE WHEN K.SCHEME_DOCNO IS NULL THEN K.ENTNO::text ELSE K.SCHEME_DOCNO END ENTRY_NO, K.SHIPCHG SHIPPING_CHARGE_AMOUNT, K.STOCKCODE STOCKCODE, K.SUBENTTYPE SUBENTTYPE, K.TAXAMT TAX_AMOUNT, K.TIME CREATED_ON, K.YCODE YCODE, YR.YNAME YRNAME, K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE /*Feature 107045 batch serial*/ FROM (SELECT * FROM INVSTOCK WHERE ICODE IN (SELECT code FROM ginview.lv_item WHERE barcode IN (SELECT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '') AS col1) OR item_code IN (SELECT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE('@#ItemItemCodeMulti#@', '') AS col1))) K left outer join ADMOU O on (K.ADMOU_CODE = O.CODE) inner join INVENTTYPE I on (K.ENTTYPE = I.ENTTYPE) inner join INVENTGRP G on (I.ENTGRPCODE = G.ENTGRPCODE) inner join INVLOC L on (K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) inner join ADMYEAR YR on (K.YCODE = YR.YCODE) WHERE k.ICODE IN (SELECT code FROM ginview.lv_item WHERE barcode IN (SELECT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '') AS col1) OR item_code IN (SELECT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE('@#ItemItemCodeMulti#@', '') AS col1))) x GROUP BY x.ADMOU_CODE, x.OU_NAME, x.ADMSITE_CODE, x.CHANNEL_TYPE, x.COGS_CODE, x.COST_RATE, x.ENTRY_CODE, x.ENTRY_DATE, x.ENTTYPE, x.ENTRY_TYPE_NAME, x.ENTRY_TYPE_SEQUENCE, x.ENTRY_GROUP_NAME, x.ENTRY_GROUP_SEQUENCE, x.ICODE, x.INVBIN_CODE, x.IS_SECONDARY, x.ITEM_REMARKS, x.LOCCODE, x.STOCK_POINT_NAME, x.PROMO_CODE, x.PROMO_END_DATE, x.PROMO_NAME, x.PROMO_NO, x.PROMO_START_DATE, x.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, x.STORE_STOCK_POINT_NAME, x.TRANSACTION_RATE, x.REFERENCE_DOCUMENT_NO, x.REFERENCE_PARTY_CODE, x.REFERENCE_PARTY, x.ENTRY_NO, x.STOCKCODE, x.SUBENTTYPE, x.CREATED_ON, x.YCODE, x.YRNAME, x.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE) a

entity.entity_name: Real time Stock Point wise Stock
entity.object_description: Complete real time stock of each stock points for each site (for POS site POS stock point will be shown). The total value of stock in this will be same as it is giving in 'Stock Book Summary' cube and to achieve stock point wise stock average cost of item is multiplied with stock point stock quantity. This source is based on 'Stock Point Stock' cube. You need to create/refresh the cube to get the required result. Note : Performance will impact for large data volume.
