entity.sql_stmt: SELECT NULL requestid, row_number() over() UK, entcode, VCHDT, VCHNO, PARTY, CHQNO, MAIN_GLNAME, MAIN_GLCODE, DET_GLNAME, NARRATION, AMOUNT, DRAWNON, ARAP_SLCODE, ARAP_GLCODE, DOCUMENT_REMARKS, DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, ONACCOUNT, INSTRUMENT_NO, INSTRUMENT_DATE FROM ( SELECT FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE ENTCODE, FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT VCHDT, SCHEME_DOCNO VCHNO, SLNAME PARTY, CHQNO || (CASE WHEN (CHQDT IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ( (' [' || TO_CHAR (CHQDT, 'dd/mm/yy')) || ']') END) CHQNO, CASE WHEN ( ('@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C')) THEN DET.GLNAME ELSE MAIN.GLNAME END MAIN_GLNAME, CASE WHEN ( ('@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C')) THEN DET.GLCODE ELSE MAIN.GLCODE END MAIN_GLCODE, CASE WHEN ( ('@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C')) THEN MAIN.GLNAME ELSE DET.GLNAME END DET_GLNAME, CASE WHEN ( ('@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C')) THEN FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE ELSE FINVCHDET.GLCODE END DET_GLCODE, FINVCHDET.NARTEXT NARRATION, case '@paymentrec@' when 'RECEIPT' then case when FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE= 'C' then coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) else coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) end when 'PAYMENT' then coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) else 0 end AMOUNT, DRAWNON DRAWNON, FINVCHDET.SLCODE ARAP_SLCODE, FINVCHDET.GLCODE ARAP_GLCODE, FINVCHMAIN.NARTEXT DOCUMENT_REMARKS, FINVCHMAIN.REFNO DOCUMENT_REFERENCE, INITCAP (coalesce (CASE ISADVANCE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'YES' WHEN 'N' THEN 'NO' END, 'NO')) ONACCOUNT, CASE WHEN (INITCAP (CASE PAYMENT_MODE WHEN 'C' THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN 'H' THEN 'CASH' WHEN 'R' THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' END) LIKE 'Cash%') THEN INITCAP (CASE PAYMENT_MODE WHEN 'C' THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN 'H' THEN 'CASH' WHEN 'R' THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' END) ELSE ( ( (INITCAP (CASE PAYMENT_MODE WHEN 'C' THEN 'CHEQUE' WHEN 'H' THEN 'CASH' WHEN 'R' THEN 'NEFT/RTGS' END) || '#') || CHQNO) || (CASE WHEN (CHQDT IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ( (' [' || TO_CHAR (CHQDT, 'dd/mm/yy')) || ']') END)) END INSTRUMENT_NO, CHQDT INSTRUMENT_DATE FROM FINVCHMAIN FINVCHMAIN INNER JOIN FINGL MAIN ON (FINVCHMAIN.GLCODE = MAIN.GLCODE) INNER JOIN FINVCHDET FINVCHDET ON (FINVCHDET.VCHCODE = FINVCHMAIN.VCHCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL DET ON (FINVCHDET.GLCODE = DET.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL PARTYSL ON (FINVCHDET.SLCODE = PARTYSL.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMCLS ADMCLS ON (PARTYSL.CLSCODE = ADMCLS.CLSCODE) Where finvchmain.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND finvchmain.release_status = 'P') OR ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND finvchmain.release_status IN ('P', 'U'))) AND ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 OR ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND partysl.agcode = to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR (coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = 0 AND partysl.agcode IS NULL)) AND ( ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('B', 'G', 'C', 'P') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'PAYMENT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('B', 'G', 'C', 'R') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('G', 'C') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0) OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('G', 'C', 'R') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('G', 'C', 'R', 'P') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'PAYMENT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('B', 'R', 'C') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('B', 'C', 'P', 'R') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'PAYMENT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('B', 'R', 'G') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('B', 'P', 'G', 'R') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'PAYMENT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('B', 'C') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0) OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('B', 'G') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0) OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('B', 'R') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('B', 'P') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'PAYMENT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('G', 'C') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0) OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('G', 'R') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('G', 'P') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'PAYMENT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('C', 'R') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE IN ('C', 'P') AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'PAYMENT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'B' AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0) OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'G' AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0) OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C' AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0) OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'R' AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') OR ( FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'P' AND to_number('@ARAPVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@GeneralVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@ContraVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND to_number('@APVoucher@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND '@paymentrec@' = 'PAYMENT')) AND ( ( ( '@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT' AND FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C' AND coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) <> 0) OR ( '@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT' AND FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE <> 'C' AND coalesce (FINVCHDET.CAMOUNT, 0) <> 0)) OR ( '@paymentrec@' = 'PAYMENT' AND coalesce (FINVCHDET.DAMOUNT, 0) <> 0)) AND ( ( coalesce (nullif('@Class@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND admcls.CLSNAME = nullif('@Class@','')) OR coalesce (nullif('@Class@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND FINVCHMAIN.VCHDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@CashBank@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND (CASE WHEN ( ('@paymentrec@' = 'RECEIPT') AND (FINVCHMAIN.VCHTYPE = 'C')) THEN DET.GLCODE ELSE MAIN.GLCODE END) = to_number(nullif('@CashBank@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR coalesce (to_number(nullif('@CashBank@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1)/*Bug Id :110064 */ AND (det.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) ) q1 left outer join finsl sl on (q1.ARAP_SLCODE = sl.slcode)/*Bug Id 110064*/ where sl.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text

entity.object_description: This is a report specific source dedicated to produce #Profit and Loss Site Wise (Tabular) # system report. Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
entity.sql_stmt: /*Start BUG 64790*/ WITH RAWTREE AS( WITH recursive GROUPS AS ( SELECT t1.grpcode ,t1.grpname ,t1.seq seqnum ,t1.parcode ,'GRP' || t1.parcode::VARCHAR treeparentcode ,'GRP' as child_type ,'GRP' || t1.grpcode::VARCHAR treechildcode FROM fingrp t1 join fingl g on (g.grpcode=t1.grpcode and g.type in ('I','E')) UNION ALL SELECT t2.grpcode ,t2.grpname ,t2.seq seqnum ,t2.parcode ,'GRP' || t2.parcode::VARCHAR treeparentcode ,'GRP' as child_type ,'GRP' || t2.grpcode::VARCHAR treechildcode FROM fingrp t2 JOIN GROUPS ON GROUPS.parcode = t2.grpcode ) ,GROUPS_N_LEDGERS AS ( SELECT DISTINCT grpcode childcode ,grpname childname ,seqnum ,parcode ,treeparentcode ,child_type ,treechildcode FROM GROUPS UNION ALL SELECT glcode ,glname ,glseq ,grpcode ,'GRP' || GRPCODE::VARCHAR PARENTCODE ,'GL' CHILD_TYPE ,'GL' || GLCODE::VARCHAR CHILDCODE FROM fingl g where type IN ('I','E')) ,SORTED_ORDER AS ( SELECT childcode ,childname ,parcode parentcode ,treeparentcode ,child_type ,treechildcode ,seqnum ,1 LVL ,array [cast(seqnum::text||childcode::text as int)::int] hierchy FROM GROUPS_N_LEDGERS WHERE UPPER(childname) = 'TREE' UNION SELECT T2.childcode ,T2.childname ,T2.parcode parentcode ,T2.treeparentcode ,T2.child_type ,T2.treechildcode ,T2.seqnum ,T1.LVL + 1 LVL ,T1.hierchy || t2.seqnum::INT || T2.childcode::INT FROM GROUPS_N_LEDGERS T2 JOIN SORTED_ORDER T1 ON T1.treechildcode = T2.treeparentcode ) ,DISPLAY_ORDER_TBL AS ( SELECT childcode,childname,treechildcode,parentcode,treeparentcode ,LVL hierarchylevel ,child_type ,SUBSTRING(LPAD(' ', 6 * (LVL - 2), ' ') || childname, 1, 1000) treename ,row_number() OVER ( ORDER BY T1.hierchy ) displayorder FROM SORTED_ORDER T1 WHERE UPPER(childname) <> 'TREE' ) select childcode GLCODE, displayorder display_order, childname GLNAME, level1, level2, level3, level4, level5 from DISPLAY_ORDER_TBL g JOIN GINVIEW.LV_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS coa ON g.parentcode = coa.CODE where child_type ='GL' order by displayorder) /*End BUG 64790*/ select * from ( SELECT NULL requestid, row_number () over () uk, grp.level1 level1, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level2', 'Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level2 END level2, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level3 END level3, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level4 END level4, CASE WHEN '@Level@' = 'With Ledger' THEN t1.glcode END glcode, CASE WHEN '@Level@' = 'With Ledger' THEN t1.glname END glname, t1.sitecode, s.name sitename, SUM (debit) debit, SUM (credit) credit, SUM (debit) - SUM (credit) balance, display_order /*BUG 64790*/ FROM ( SELECT T.GLCODE, GLNAME, T.REF_ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, CASE WHEN ( (COALESCE (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - COALESCE (T.CAMOUNT, 0)) >= 0) THEN (COALESCE (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - COALESCE (T.CAMOUNT, 0)) ELSE 0 END DEBIT, CASE WHEN ( (COALESCE (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - COALESCE (T.CAMOUNT, 0)) < 0) THEN (0 - (COALESCE (T.DAMOUNT, 0) - COALESCE (T.CAMOUNT, 0))) ELSE 0 END CREDIT FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINCOSTTAG T ON (P.POSTCODE = T.POSTCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (T.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) Where p.entdt BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND g.TYPE IN ('I', 'E') AND p.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') and (to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 or ( to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 and p.release_status = 'P'))/*Bug Id : 109776*/ /*Start Changes for Bug 107105*/ UNION ALL SELECT glcode, glname, sitecode, CASE WHEN site_opening >= 0 THEN site_opening ELSE 0 END debit, CASE WHEN site_opening < 0 THEN site_opening * -1 ELSE 0 END credit FROM ( SELECT p1.glcode, p1.glname, p1.sitecode, CASE WHEN (SELECT dtfr FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) = TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN SUM (coalesce (p1.damount, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (p1.camount, 0)) ELSE 0 END site_opening FROM ( SELECT O.GLCODE, GLNAME, ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, COALESCE (o.DAMOUNT, 0) DAMOUNT, COALESCE (o.CAMOUNT, 0) CAMOUNT FROM FINCOSTTAG O INNER JOIN FINGL G ON (O.GLCODE = G.GLCODE) inner join finpost p on (o.postcode = p.postcode) Where g.TYPE IN ('I', 'E') /* Start : BUG 109434 AND o.ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto)*/ AND o.ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND o.entdt < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') /*End: BUG 109434*/ AND (to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99')= 1 or (to_number('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99')=0 and RELEASE_STATUS = 'P'))/*Bug Id : 109776*/ AND o.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99')) P1 GROUP BY p1.glcode, p1.glname, p1.sitecode) q1 /*End Changes for Bug 107105*/ ) t1 inner join fingl gl on (t1.glcode = gl.glcode) inner JOIN RAWTREE grp on (t1.glcode = grp.glcode) /*BUG 64790*/ inner join admsite s on (t1.sitecode = s.code) GROUP BY grp.level1, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level2', 'Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level2 END, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level3', 'Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level3 END, CASE WHEN '@Level@' IN ('Level4', 'With Ledger') THEN grp.level4 END, CASE WHEN '@Level@' = 'With Ledger' THEN t1.glcode END, CASE WHEN '@Level@' = 'With Ledger' THEN t1.glname END, t1.sitecode, s.name, display_order/*BUG 64790*/) a where (to_number('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99')= 1 or (to_number('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','9G999g999999999999d99')=0 and balance <>0))/*Bug Id : 109776*/

entity.object_description: Get store wise summarized settled Sales (Quantity and Amount) till yesterday. The report is also provides MTD, WTD & YTD sales along with comparison analysis.
entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 04-01-2024 14:53:56 (QP5 v5.294) */ with q1_date as ( select (TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1) YDAY, iso_week_start_date::date wtd, iso_week_start_date::date - 7 LWTD, month_start_date::date MTD, date_trunc('month', (to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::date-1) - interval '1 month')::date LMTD, ((to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::date-1) - interval '1 month')::date LMED, FISCAL_YEAR_START_DATE::date YTD, ( select dtfr from admyear where ycode in ( select MAX (ycode) from admyear where ycode <= ( select (ycode - 1) from admyear where ( TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1) between dtfr and dtto))) LYTD, ((to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::date-1) - interval '12 month')::date LYED from ginview.lv_calendar where date_value::date = TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')), q2_data as ( select null datasetid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(), ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, YDAY_QTY, YDAY_AMT, WTD_QTY, WTD_AMT, LWTD_QTY, LWTD_AMT, MTD_QTY, MTD_AMT, LMTD_QTY, LMTD_AMT, YTD_QTY, YTD_AMT, LYTD_QTY, LYTD_AMT from ( select ADMSITE_CODE, 'WS' CHANNELTYPE, SUM (YDAY_QTY) YDAY_QTY, SUM (YDAY_AMT) YDAY_AMT, SUM (WTD_QTY) WTD_QTY, SUM (WTD_AMT) WTD_AMT, SUM (LWTD_QTY) LWTD_QTY, SUM (LWTD_AMT) LWTD_AMT, SUM (MTD_QTY) MTD_QTY, SUM (MTD_AMT) MTD_AMT, SUM (LMTD_QTY) LMTD_QTY, SUM (LMTD_AMT) LMTD_AMT, SUM (YTD_QTY) YTD_QTY, SUM (YTD_AMT) YTD_AMT, SUM (LYTD_QTY) LYTD_QTY, SUM (LYTD_AMT) LYTD_AMT from ( select M.ADMSITE_CODE, SUM ( case when INVDT = ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) YDAY_QTY, SUM ( case when INVDT = ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) YDAY_AMT, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select WTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) WTD_QTY, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select WTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) WTD_AMT, SUM (case when INVDT between ( select LWTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY - 7 from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) LWTD_QTY, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select LWTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY - 7 from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) LWTD_AMT, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select MTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) MTD_QTY, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select MTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) MTD_AMT, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select LMTD from q1_date) and ( select LMED from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) LMTD_QTY, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select LMTD from q1_date) and ( select LMED from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) LMTD_AMT, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select YTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then coalesce (QTY, 0) else 0 end) YTD_QTY, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select YTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) YTD_AMT, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select LYED from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) LYTD_QTY, SUM ( case when INVDT between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select LYED from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) LYTD_AMT from SALINVMAIN M, ADMSITE S, ( select INVCODE, SUM (INVQTY) QTY, SUM (coalesce (TAXAMT, 0)) TAXAMT from SALINVDET group by INVCODE) D where M.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE and M.INVCODE = D.INVCODE and M.INVDT::date between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) and M.SALETYPE = 'O' group by M.ADMSITE_CODE union all select M.ADMSITE_CODE, SUM ( case when RTDT = ( select YDAY from q1_date) then -QTY else 0 end) YDAY_QTY, SUM ( case when RTDT = ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then -1 * coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else -1 * ( coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0)) end else 0 end) YDAY_AMT, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select WTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then -QTY else 0 end) WTD_QTY, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select WTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then -1 * coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else -1 * ( coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0)) end else 0 end) WTD_AMT, SUM (case when RTDT between ( select LWTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY - 7 from q1_date) then -QTY else 0 end) LWTD_QTY, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select LWTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY - 7 from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then -1 * coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else -1 * ( coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0)) end else 0 end) LWTD_AMT, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select MTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then -QTY else 0 end) MTD_QTY, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select MTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then -1 * coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else -1 * ( coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0)) end else 0 end) MTD_AMT, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select LMTD from q1_date) and ( select LMED from q1_date) then -QTY else 0 end) LMTD_QTY, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select LMTD from q1_date) and ( select LMED from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then -1 * coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else -1 * ( coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0)) end else 0 end) LMTD_AMT, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select YTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then -QTY else 0 end) YTD_QTY, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select YTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then -1 * coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else -1 * ( coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0)) end else 0 end) YTD_AMT, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select LYED from q1_date) then -QTY else 0 end) LYTD_QTY, SUM ( case when RTDT between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select LYED from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ( '@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then -1 * coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else -1 * ( coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0)) end else 0 end) LYTD_AMT from SALRTMAIN M inner join ADMSITE S on (M.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) inner join ( select D.RTCODE, QTY, TAXAMT from ( select RTCODE, SUM (QTY) QTY from SALRTDET group by RTCODE) D left outer join ( select RTCODE, SUM (CHGAMT) TAXAMT from SALRTCHG where ISTAX = 'Y' group by RTCODE) C on (D.RTCODE = C.RTCODE)) D on (M.RTCODE = D.RTCODE) where M.RTDT::date between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) and M.SALETYPE = 'O' group by M.ADMSITE_CODE) q1 where (case 'WS' when 'WS' then 'Wholesale' when 'RTL' then 'Retail - Offline' when 'ETL' then 'Retail - Online' end) in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#SaleSourceSourceMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#SaleSourceSourceMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) group by ADMSITE_CODE union all select M.ADMSITE_CODE, coalesce (M.CHANNELTYPE, 'RTL'), SUM ( case when CSDATE = ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) YDAY_QTY, SUM ( case when CSDATE = ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) YDAY_AMT, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select WTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) WTD_QTY, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select WTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) WTD_AMT, SUM (case when CSDATE between ( select LWTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY - 7 from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) LWTD_QTY, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select LWTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY - 7 from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) LWTD_AMT, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select MTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) MTD_QTY, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select MTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) MTD_AMT, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select LMTD from q1_date) and ( select LMED from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) LMTD_QTY, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select LMTD from q1_date) and ( select LMED from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) LMTD_AMT, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select YTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) YTD_QTY, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select YTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) YTD_AMT, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select LYED from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) LYTD_QTY, SUM ( case when CSDATE between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select LYED from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) LYTD_AMT from SALCSMAIN M, ADMSITE S, ( select CSCODE, SUM (TAXAMT) TAXAMT from SALCSDET group by CSCODE) D where M.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE and M.CSCODE = D.CSCODE and M.CSDATE::date between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) and (case coalesce (M.CHANNELTYPE, 'RTL') when 'WS' then 'Wholesale' when 'RTL' then 'Retail - Offline' when 'ETL' then 'Retail - Online' end) in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#SaleSourceSourceMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#SaleSourceSourceMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) group by M.ADMSITE_CODE, coalesce (M.CHANNELTYPE, 'RTL') union all select M.ADMSITE_CODE, coalesce (M.CHANNELTYPE, 'RTL'), SUM ( case when SSDATE = ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) YDAY_QTY, SUM ( case when SSDATE = ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) YDAY_AMT, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select WTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) WTD_QTY, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select WTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) WTD_AMT, SUM (case when SSDATE between ( select LWTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY - 7 from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) LWTD_QTY, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select LWTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY - 7 from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) LWTD_AMT, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select MTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) MTD_QTY, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select MTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) MTD_AMT, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select LMTD from q1_date) and ( select LMED from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) LMTD_QTY, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select LMTD from q1_date) and ( select LMED from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) LMTD_AMT, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select YTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) YTD_QTY, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select YTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) YTD_AMT, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select LYED from q1_date) then QTY else 0 end) LYTD_QTY, SUM ( case when SSDATE between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select LYED from q1_date) then case when TO_NUMBER ('@SalesIncludingTax@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then coalesce (NETAMT, 0) else coalesce (NETAMT, 0) - coalesce (TAXAMT, 0) end else 0 end) LYTD_AMT from SALSSMAIN M, ADMSITE S, ( select SSCODE, SUM (TAXAMT) TAXAMT from SALSSDET group by SSCODE) D where M.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE and M.SSCODE = D.SSCODE and M.SSDATE::date between ( select LYTD from q1_date) and ( select YDAY from q1_date) and (case coalesce (M.CHANNELTYPE, 'RTL') when 'WS' then 'Wholesale' when 'RTL' then 'Retail - Offline' when 'ETL' then 'Retail - Online' end) in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#SaleSourceSourceMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#SaleSourceSourceMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) group by M.ADMSITE_CODE, coalesce (M.CHANNELTYPE, 'RTL')/*End Of Modification by Jyotirmoy|EPIC 106591*/ )q2 where (case CHANNELTYPE when 'WS' then 'Wholesale' when 'RTL' then 'Retail - Offline' when 'ETL' then 'Retail - Online' end) in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#SaleSourceSourceMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#SaleSourceSourceMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g )) select row_number() over() uk, LVL, ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, YDAY_QTY, YDAY_AMT, WTD_QTY, WTD_AMT, LWTD_QTY, LWTD_AMT, MTD_QTY, MTD_AMT, LMTD_QTY, LMTD_AMT, YTD_QTY, YTD_AMT, LYTD_QTY, LYTD_AMT from ( select 'LVL1' LVL, ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, YDAY_QTY, YDAY_AMT, WTD_QTY, WTD_AMT, LWTD_QTY, LWTD_AMT, MTD_QTY, MTD_AMT, LMTD_QTY, LMTD_AMT, YTD_QTY, YTD_AMT, LYTD_QTY, LYTD_AMT from q2_data union all select 'LVL2' LVL, ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, SUM (YDAY_QTY), SUM (YDAY_AMT), SUM (WTD_QTY), SUM (WTD_AMT), SUM (LWTD_QTY), SUM (LWTD_AMT), SUM (MTD_QTY), SUM (MTD_AMT), SUM (LMTD_QTY), SUM (LMTD_AMT), SUM (YTD_QTY), SUM (YTD_AMT), SUM (LYTD_QTY), SUM (LYTD_AMT) from q2_data where TO_NUMBER ('@ShowConsolidatedSaleTF@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 group by ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE)t1

entity.object_description: Get all outstanding details of POS customer
entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 21-06-2025 20:54:55 (QP5 v5.294) */ /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 71599/64805/94723/96538/71575 Jyotirmoy CNopcode column must be include 95932 Jyotirmoy DN no showing blank after adjustment 97425 Jyotirmoy Global CNNO should show if available else CNNO 96340 Jyotirmoy adjustment null check should be removed from all part 96538 Jyotirmoy Adjusted document should be removed from unadjusted part if bill code is blank but adjusted 96416 Jyotirmoy CNopcode column must be include in unadjusted part */ SELECT NULL REQUESTID, row_number() over() uk, a.CUSTOMERID, a.CUSTOMERNAME, a.CUSTOMERADDRESS, a.CUSTOMERMOBILE, a.BILLDATE, a.SEQ, a.BILLTYPE, a.TERMINALID, a.TERMINAL, a.CASHIERID, a.CASHIER, a.BILLNO, a.BILLAMT, a.CNDNNO, a.BILLREMARKS, a.DEBIT, a.CREDIT, a.BALANCE, SUM (a.BALANCE) OVER (PARTITION BY a.customerid, typ, lvl ORDER BY a.customerid, a.TYP, a.lvl, a.BILLDATE, a.seq) RUNING_BALANCE, a.CPGSTINNO, a.CPGSTSTATECODE, a.EMAIL, a.SPOUSENAME, a.TYP, CASE WHEN a.TYP = '2' THEN (TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - a.BILLDATE) END ageing_days, lvl, gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM ( SELECT cndn.customerid, TRIM ( coalesce (c.salutation, ' ') || ' ' || coalesce (c.fname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.mname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.lname, ' ')) customername, TRIM ( coalesce (c.address1, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address2, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address3, ' ')) customeraddress, c.mobile customermobile, cndn.billdate, '0' seq, 'Opening' billtype, NULL terminalid, NULL terminal, NULL cashierid, NULL cashier, NULL billno, null::int billamt, NULL cndnno, 'Opening' billremarks, SUM (dnamount) debit, SUM (cnamount) credit, SUM (dnamount) - SUM (cnamount) balance, c.cp_gstin_no cpgstinno, c.cp_gstin_state_code cpgststatecode, c.email, c.spousename, '1' TYP, 0 lvl, NULL gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM ( SELECT pbcn.psite_customer_code customerid, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') billdate, SUM (pbcn.amount) cnamount, 0 dnamount FROM psite_posbillcn pbcn, admsite s WHERE pbcn.admsite_code = s.code AND pbcn.cndate::date < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY pbcn.psite_customer_code UNION ALL SELECT pbcn.psite_customer_code customerid, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') billdate, 0 cnamount, SUM (CNRAMOUNT) dnamount FROM psite_posbillcn pbcn, admsite s, psite_posbillcnadj cnadj WHERE pbcn.admsite_code = s.code AND pbcn.code = cnadj.globalposbillcncode AND cnadj.cnrdate::date < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY pbcn.psite_customer_code UNION ALL SELECT pbdn.psite_customer_code customerid, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') billdate, 0 cnamount, SUM (pbdn.amount) dnamount FROM psite_posbilldn pbdn, admsite s WHERE pbdn.admsite_code = s.code AND ( pbdn.dna_bill_code IS NULL OR pbdn.dnadate >= TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) /*Bug Id : 111191*/ AND pbdn.dndate < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY pbdn.psite_customer_code UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT psite_customer_code, TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 0 camount, 0 damount FROM (SELECT psite_customer_code FROM (SELECT psite_customer_code FROM psite_posbillcn cn WHERE cn.cndate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT psite_customer_code FROM psite_posbilldn dn WHERE dn.dndate BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) except SELECT psite_customer_code FROM (SELECT cn.psite_customer_code FROM psite_posbillcn cn WHERE cn.cndate::date < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM psite_posbillcnadj cnadj WHERE cn.code = cnadj.globalposbillcncode AND cnadj.cnrdate < TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) UNION ALL SELECT psite_customer_code FROM psite_posbilldn WHERE dndate < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND dna_bill_code IS NULL))) cndn, psite_customer c WHERE cndn.customerid = c.code GROUP BY cndn.customerid, c.salutation, c.fname, c.mname, c.lname, c.address1, c.address2, c.address3, c.mobile, cndn.billdate, c.cp_gstin_no, c.cp_gstin_state_code, c.email, c.spousename UNION ALL SELECT cndn.customerid, TRIM ( coalesce (c.salutation, ' ') || ' ' || coalesce (c.fname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.mname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.lname, ' ')) customername, TRIM ( coalesce (c.address1, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address2, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address3, ' ')) customeraddress, c.mobile customermobile, cndn.billdate, '0' seq, 'Opening Transaction' billtype, NULL terminalid, NULL terminal, NULL cashierid, NULL cashier, 'Not Available' billno, NULL billamt, cndn.cnno cndnno, 'Opening Transaction' billremarks, SUM (dnamount) debit, SUM (cnamount) credit, SUM (dnamount) - SUM (cnamount) balance, c.cp_gstin_no cpgstinno, c.cp_gstin_state_code cpgststatecode, c.email, c.spousename, '1' TYP, 0 lvl, NULL gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM ( SELECT pbcn.psite_customer_code customerid, pbcn.cndate::date billdate, coalesce(pbcn.globalposbillcnno,cnno) cnno,/*97425*/ SUM (pbcn.amount) cnamount, 0 dnamount FROM psite_posbillcn pbcn inner join admsite s on (pbcn.admsite_code = s.code) left outer join psite_posbillcnadj cnadj on (pbcn.code = cnadj.globalposbillcncode) WHERE pbcn.cndate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND psite_posbillcnop_code IS NOT NULL/*71599/64805/94723/96538/71575*/ GROUP BY pbcn.psite_customer_code, pbcn.cndate::date, coalesce(pbcn.globalposbillcnno,cnno)/*97425*/ UNION ALL SELECT pbdn.psite_customer_code customerid, pbdn.dndate::date billdate, pbdn.dnno cnno, 0 cnamount, SUM (pbdn.amount) dnamount FROM psite_posbilldn pbdn, admsite s WHERE pbdn.admsite_code = s.code /*AND pbdn.dna_bill_code IS NULL*//*96340*/ AND pbdn.dndate BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND psite_posbilldnop_code IS NOT NULL/*71599/64805/94723/96538/71575*/ GROUP BY pbdn.psite_customer_code, pbdn.dndate::date, pbdn.dnno) cndn, psite_customer c WHERE cndn.customerid = c.code GROUP BY cndn.customerid, c.salutation, c.fname, c.mname, c.lname, c.address1, c.address2, c.address3, c.mobile, cndn.billdate, c.cp_gstin_no, c.cp_gstin_state_code, c.email, c.spousename, cndn.cnno UNION ALL SELECT pbm.customerid, TRIM ( coalesce (c.salutation, ' ') || ' ' || coalesce (c.fname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.mname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.lname, ' ')) customername, TRIM ( coalesce (c.address1, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address2, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address3, ' ')) customeraddress, c.mobile customermobile, pb.billdate::date billdate, pbm.posbillmopid seq, CASE WHEN pbm.debitamt = pbm.creditamt THEN 'Adjustment' ELSE pb.billtype END billtype, pb.terminalid terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN pbm.cashier = null THEN pb.createdbyid::text ELSE null END cashierid, pb.createdby cashier, pb.billno billno, pb.billamt billamt, pbm.cndnno cndnno, pb.billremarks billremarks, CASE WHEN balance = 0 THEN debitamt WHEN balance > 0 THEN balance ELSE 0 END debit, CASE WHEN balance = 0 THEN creditamt WHEN balance < 0 THEN ABS (balance) ELSE 0 END credit, balance balance, c.cp_gstin_no, c.cp_gstin_state_code, c.email, c.spousename, '1' TYP, 0 lvl, gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM ( SELECT MAX (posbillmopid) posbillmopid, posbillid, customerid, cnno cndnno, /*Bug Id 111663*/ cashier, SUM (CASE WHEN baseamt > 0 THEN baseamt ELSE 0 END) debitamt, SUM ( CASE WHEN baseamt < 0 THEN ABS (baseamt) ELSE 0 END) creditamt, SUM (baseamt) balance FROM (SELECT pbm.code posbillmopid, pbm.psite_posbill_code posbillid, pbm.baseamt, pbcni.psite_customer_code customerid, coalesce(pbcni.globalposbillcnno,cnno) cnno,/*97425*/ NULL cashier FROM psite_posbillmop pbm, psite_posbillcn pbcni WHERE pbm.globalposbillcncode = pbcni.code AND pbcni.psite_customer_code IS NOT NULL AND pbm.moptype = 'CNI' AND pbcni.cndate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT pbm.code posbillmopid, pbm.psite_posbill_code posbillid, pbm.baseamt, pbcnr.psite_customer_code customerid, coalesce(pbcnr.globalposbillcnno,cnno) cnno,/*97425*/ '' cashier FROM psite_posbillmop pbm, psite_posbillcn pbcnr, psite_posbillcnadj cnadj WHERE pbm.globalposbillcncode = pbcnr.code AND pbcnr.psite_customer_code IS NOT NULL AND pbm.moptype = 'CNR' AND pbcnr.code = cnadj.globalposbillcncode AND cnadj.cnrdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND pbm.psite_posbill_code = cnadj.CNR_PSITE_POSBILL_CODE UNION ALL SELECT pbm.code posbillmopid, pbm.psite_posbill_code posbillid, pbm.baseamt, pbdni.psite_customer_code customerid, pbdni.dnno cnno, '' cashier FROM psite_posbillmop pbm, psite_posbilldn pbdni WHERE pbm.psite_posbill_code = pbdni.dni_bill_code AND pbdni.psite_customer_code IS NOT NULL AND pbm.moptype = 'DNI' AND pbdni.dndate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT pbm.code posbillmopid, pbm.psite_posbill_code posbillid, pbm.baseamt, pbdnr.psite_customer_code customerid, pbdnr.dnno cnno,/*95932*/ '' cashier FROM psite_posbillmop pbm, psite_posbilldn pbdnr WHERE pbm.psite_posbilldn_code = pbdnr.code AND pbdnr.psite_customer_code IS NOT NULL AND pbm.moptype = 'DNA' AND pbdnr.dnadate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) Q GROUP BY posbillid, customerid, cashier, cnno) pbm, (SELECT pb.code billid, billno, billdate, NULL terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN pb.netamt > 0 THEN 'Sale' WHEN pb.netamt < 0 THEN 'Return' END billtype, pb.netpayable billamt, NULL createdbyid, pb.createby createdby, pb.remarks billremarks, GSTDOCNO gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM psite_posbill pb UNION ALL SELECT pb.code billid, billno, billdate, NULL terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, 'GVBill' billtype, pb.netamt billamt, NULL createdbyid, pb.createdby createdby, pb.remarks billremarks, NULL gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM psite_posgvbill pb UNION ALL SELECT pb.code billid, billno, billdate, NULL terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN depreftype = 'D' THEN 'Deposit' WHEN depreftype = 'R' THEN 'Refund' END billtype, pb.amount billamt, NULL createdbyid, pb.createby createdby, pb.remarks billremarks, NULL gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM psite_posdeprefbill pb) pb, psite_customer c WHERE pbm.posbillid = pb.billid AND pbm.customerid = c.code UNION ALL /*For Unadjusted Opening of CN AND DN Before Store Operation Start Date- Changes Start*/ SELECT a.customerid, TRIM ( coalesce (c.salutation, ' ') || ' ' || coalesce (c.fname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.mname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.lname, ' ')) customername, TRIM ( coalesce (c.address1, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address2, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address3, ' ')) customeraddress, c.mobile customermobile, billdate::date billdate, a.posbillid seq, a.billtype billtype, NULL terminalid, NULL terminal, NULL cashierid, NULL cashier, NULL billno, a.cnamt + a.dnamt billamt, a.cnno cndnno, NULL billremarks, dnamt debit, cnamt credit, a.cnamt + a.dnamt balance, c.cp_gstin_no, c.cp_gstin_state_code, c.email, c.spousename, '2' typ, 1 lvl, NULL gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM (SELECT pcn.cndate::date billdate, NULL posbillmopid, pcn.code posbillid, 0 dnamt, coalesce (pcn.amount, 0) cnamt, 'Credit Note' Billtype, pcn.psite_customer_code customerid, coalesce(pcn.globalposbillcnno,cnno) cnno,/*97425*/ '' cashier, NULL adjdate FROM psite_posbillcn pcn, admsite s WHERE pcn.AMOUNT <> coalesce (pcn.CNRADJAMOUNT, 0) AND pcn.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code and (pcn.code NOT IN (SELECT GLOBALPOSBILLCNCODE FROM psite_posbillcnadj))/*96538*/ and pcn.PSITE_POSBILLCNOP_CODE is not null/*96416*/ UNION ALL SELECT pdn.dndate::date billdate, NULL posbillmopid, pdn.code posbillid, coalesce (pdn.amount, 0) dnamt, 0 cnamt, 'Debit Note' Billtype, pdn.psite_customer_code customerid, pdn.dnno cnno, '' cashier, NULL adjdate FROM psite_posbilldn pdn, admsite s WHERE dni_bill_code IS NULL AND pdn.ISADJUSTED = 0 /*Bug Id : 111203*/ AND pdn.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code and pdn.PSITE_POSBILLDNOP_CODE is not null/*96416*/) a, psite_customer c /*For Unadjusted Opening of CN AND DN Before Store Operation Start Date- Changes End*/ WHERE a.customerid = c.code UNION ALL SELECT pbm.customerid, TRIM ( coalesce (c.salutation, ' ') || ' ' || coalesce (c.fname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.mname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.lname, ' ')) customername, TRIM ( coalesce (c.address1, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address2, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address3, ' ')) customeraddress, c.mobile customermobile, coalesce (pbm.adjdate::date, pb.billdate::date) billdate, pbm.posbillid seq, pb.billtype, pb.terminalid terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN pbm.cashier = 0::text THEN pb.createdbyid::text ELSE '' END cashierid, pb.createdby cashier, pb.billno billno, pb.billamt billamt, pbm.cndnno cndnno, pb.billremarks billremarks, CASE WHEN balance = 0 THEN debitamt WHEN balance > 0 THEN balance ELSE 0 END debit, CASE WHEN balance = 0 THEN creditamt WHEN balance < 0 THEN ABS (balance) ELSE 0 END credit, balance, c.cp_gstin_no, c.cp_gstin_state_code, c.email, c.spousename, '2' typ, 1 lvl, gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM ( SELECT MAX (posbillmopid) posbillmopid, posbillid, customerid, MAX (cnno) cndnno, cashier, MAX (adjdate) adjdate, SUM (CASE WHEN baseamt > 0 THEN baseamt ELSE 0 END) debitamt, SUM ( CASE WHEN baseamt < 0 THEN ABS (baseamt) ELSE 0 END) creditamt, SUM (baseamt) balance FROM (SELECT NULL billdate, pbm.code posbillmopid, pbm.psite_posbill_code posbillid, pbm.baseamt, pbcni.psite_customer_code customerid, coalesce(pbcni.globalposbillcnno,cnno) cnno,/*97425*/ NULL cashier, NULL adjdate FROM psite_posbillmop pbm, psite_posbillcn pbcni WHERE pbm.globalposbillcncode = pbcni.code AND pbcni.psite_customer_code IS NOT NULL AND pbm.moptype = 'CNI' AND ( coalesce (pbcni.Amount, 0) <> coalesce (pbcni.cnradjamount, 0) OR ( coalesce (pbcni.Amount, 0) = coalesce (pbcni.cnradjamount, 0) AND pbcni.cnrdate::date > TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) /*AND TRUNC (pbcni.cndate) BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')*/ AND pbcni.cndate::date <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT NULL billdate, NULL posbillmopid, pbm.psite_posbill_code posbillid, cnadj.CNRAMOUNT, pbcni.psite_customer_code customerid, coalesce(pbcni.globalposbillcnno,cnno) cnno,/*97425*/ NULL cashier, cnadj.cnrdate adjdate FROM psite_posbillmop pbm, psite_posbillcn pbcni, psite_posbillcnadj cnadj WHERE pbm.globalposbillcncode = pbcni.code AND pbcni.code = cnadj.globalposbillcncode AND pbcni.psite_customer_code IS NOT NULL AND pbm.moptype = 'CNI' AND ( coalesce (pbcni.Amount, 0) <> coalesce (pbcni.cnradjamount, 0) OR ( coalesce (pbcni.Amount, 0) = coalesce (pbcni.cnradjamount, 0) AND pbcni.cnrdate::date > TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) /*AND TRUNC (cnadj.cnrdate) BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')*/ AND pbcni.cndate::date <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT NULL billdate, pbm.code posbillmopid, pbm.psite_posbill_code posbillid, pbm.baseamt, pbdni.psite_customer_code customerid, pbdni.dnno cnno, '' cashier, NULL adjdate FROM psite_posbillmop pbm, psite_posbilldn pbdni WHERE pbm.psite_posbilldn_code = pbdni.code AND pbdni.psite_customer_code IS NOT NULL AND pbm.moptype = 'DNI' AND ( pbdni.IsAdjusted = 0 OR ( pbdni.IsAdjusted = 1 AND pbdni.DNADate::date > TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) /*AND pbdni.dndate BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')*/ AND pbdni.dndate::date <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) Q GROUP BY posbillid, customerid, cashier) pbm, (SELECT pb.code billid, billno, billdate, NULL terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN pb.netamt > 0 THEN 'Sale' WHEN pb.netamt < 0 THEN 'Return' END billtype, pb.netpayable billamt, NULL createdbyid, pb.createby createdby, pb.remarks billremarks, pb.GSTDOCNO gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM psite_posbill pb UNION ALL SELECT pb.code billid, billno, billdate, NULL terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN pb.netamt > 0 THEN 'Sale' WHEN pb.netamt < 0 THEN 'Return' END billtype, pb.netamt billamt, NULL createdbyid, pb.createdby createdby, pb.remarks billremarks, NULL FROM psite_posgvbill pb UNION ALL SELECT pb.code billid, billno, billdate, NULL terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN depreftype = 'D' THEN 'Deposit' WHEN depreftype = 'R' THEN 'Refund' END billtype, pb.amount billamt, NULL createdbyid, pb.createby createdby, pb.remarks billremarks, NULL FROM psite_posdeprefbill pb) pb, psite_customer c WHERE pbm.posbillid = pb.billid AND pbm.customerid = c.code) a WHERE (a.customername IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#RetailCustomerFullnameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#RetailCustomerFullnameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text)

entity.object_description: Get Outstanding Ageing details of POS Customers on a specific Date.
entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 18-12-2025 16:10:34 (QP5 v5.294) */ /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 94723 Jyotirmoy Closing balance is showing wrong in report. */ SELECT NULL REQUESTID, row_number() over() uk, a.CUSTOMERID, a.CUSTOMERNAME, a.CUSTOMERADDRESS, a.CUSTOMERMOBILE, a.BILLDATE::date BILLDATE, a.SEQ, a.BILLTYPE, a.TERMINALID, a.TERMINAL, a.CASHIERID, a.CASHIER, a.BILLNO, a.BILLAMT, a.CNDNNO, a.BILLREMARKS, a.DEBIT, a.CREDIT, a.BALANCE, SUM (a.BALANCE) OVER (PARTITION BY a.customerid, typ, lvl ORDER BY a.customerid, a.TYP, a.lvl, a.BILLDATE::date, a.seq) RUNING_BALANCE, a.CPGSTINNO, a.CPGSTSTATECODE, a.EMAIL, a.SPOUSENAME, a.TYP, CASE WHEN a.TYP = '2' THEN (TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - a.BILLDATE::date) END ageing_days, lvl, gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM (SELECT a.customerid, TRIM ( coalesce (c.salutation, ' ') || ' ' || coalesce (c.fname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.mname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.lname, ' ')) customername, TRIM ( coalesce (c.address1, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address2, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address3, ' ')) customeraddress, c.mobile customermobile, billdate::date billdate, a.posbillid seq, a.billtype billtype, NULL terminalid, NULL terminal, NULL cashierid, NULL cashier, NULL billno, a.cnamt + a.dnamt billamt, a.cnno cndnno, NULL billremarks, dnamt debit, cnamt credit, a.cnamt + a.dnamt balance, c.cp_gstin_no CPGSTINNO, c.cp_gstin_state_code CPGSTSTATECODE, c.email, c.spousename, '2' typ, 1 lvl, NULL gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM (SELECT pcn.cndate::date billdate, NULL posbillmopid, pcn.code posbillid, 0 dnamt, coalesce (pcn.amount, 0) cnamt, 'Credit Note' Billtype, pcn.psite_customer_code customerid, coalesce (pcn.globalposbillcnno, cnno) cnno, /*97425*/ '' cashier, NULL adjdate FROM psite_posbillcn pcn LEFT OUTER JOIN PSITE_POSBILLCNADJ pcna ON (pcn.code = pcna.GLOBALPOSBILLCNCODE) INNER JOIN admsite s ON (pcn.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code) WHERE ( (coalesce (pcn.amount, 0) <> coalesce (pcna.CNRAMOUNT, 0)) OR ( coalesce (pcn.amount, 0) = coalesce (pcna.CNRAMOUNT, 0) AND pcna.CNRDATE::date > TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) AND pcn.cndate::date <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND pcn.PSITE_POSBILLCNOP_CODE IS NOT NULL /*96416*/ UNION ALL SELECT pdn.dndate::date billdate, NULL posbillmopid, pdn.code posbillid, coalesce (pdn.amount, 0) dnamt, 0 cnamt, 'Debit Note' Billtype, pdn.psite_customer_code customerid, pdn.dnno cnno, '' cashier, NULL adjdate FROM psite_posbilldn pdn, admsite s WHERE ( pdn.ISADJUSTED = 0 OR ( pdn.ISADJUSTED = 1 AND pdn.DNADATE::date > TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) AND pdn.DNDATE::date <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND pdn.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code AND pdn.PSITE_POSBILLDNOP_CODE IS NOT NULL /*96416*/ ) a, psite_customer c /*For Unadjusted Opening of CN AND DN Before Store Operation Start Date- Changes End*/ WHERE a.customerid = c.code UNION ALL SELECT pbm.customerid, TRIM ( coalesce (c.salutation, ' ') || ' ' || coalesce (c.fname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.mname, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.mname IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.lname, ' ')) customername, TRIM ( coalesce (c.address1, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address2, ' ') || CASE WHEN c.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END || coalesce (c.address3, ' ')) customeraddress, c.mobile customermobile, coalesce (pbm.adjdate::date, pb.billdate::date) billdate, pbm.posbillid seq, pb.billtype, pb.terminalid terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN pbm.cashier = 0::text THEN pb.createdbyid ELSE '' END cashierid, pb.createdby cashier, pb.billno billno, pb.billamt billamt, pbm.cndnno cndnno, pb.billremarks billremarks, CASE WHEN balance = 0 THEN debitamt WHEN balance > 0 THEN balance ELSE 0 END debit, CASE WHEN balance = 0 THEN creditamt WHEN balance < 0 THEN ABS (balance) ELSE 0 END credit, balance, c.cp_gstin_no, c.cp_gstin_state_code, c.email, c.spousename, '2' typ, 1 lvl, gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM ( SELECT MAX (posbillmopid) posbillmopid, posbillid, customerid, MAX (cnno) cndnno, cashier, MAX (adjdate) adjdate, SUM (CASE WHEN baseamt > 0 THEN baseamt ELSE 0 END) debitamt, SUM ( CASE WHEN baseamt < 0 THEN ABS (baseamt) ELSE 0 END) creditamt, SUM (baseamt) balance FROM (SELECT NULL billdate, pbm.code posbillmopid, pbm.psite_posbill_code posbillid, pbm.baseamt, pbcni.psite_customer_code customerid, coalesce (pbcni.globalposbillcnno, cnno) cnno, /*97425*/ NULL cashier, NULL adjdate FROM psite_posbillmop pbm, psite_posbillcn pbcni WHERE pbm.globalposbillcncode = pbcni.code AND pbcni.psite_customer_code IS NOT NULL AND pbm.moptype = 'CNI' AND ( coalesce (pbcni.Amount, 0) <> coalesce (pbcni.cnradjamount, 0) OR ( coalesce (pbcni.Amount, 0) = coalesce (pbcni.cnradjamount, 0) AND pbcni.cnrdate::date > TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) /*AND TRUNC (pbcni.cndate) BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')*/ AND pbcni.cndate::date <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT NULL billdate, NULL posbillmopid, pbm.psite_posbill_code posbillid, cnadj.CNRAMOUNT, pbcni.psite_customer_code customerid, coalesce (pbcni.globalposbillcnno, cnno) cnno, /*97425*/ NULL cashier, cnadj.cnrdate adjdate FROM psite_posbillmop pbm, psite_posbillcn pbcni, psite_posbillcnadj cnadj WHERE pbm.globalposbillcncode = pbcni.code AND pbcni.code = cnadj.globalposbillcncode AND pbcni.psite_customer_code IS NOT NULL AND pbm.moptype = 'CNI' AND ( coalesce (pbcni.Amount, 0) <> coalesce (pbcni.cnradjamount, 0) OR ( coalesce (pbcni.Amount, 0) = coalesce (pbcni.cnradjamount, 0) AND pbcni.cnrdate::date > TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) /*AND TRUNC (cnadj.cnrdate) BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')*/ AND pbcni.cndate::date <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT NULL billdate, pbm.code posbillmopid, pbm.psite_posbill_code posbillid, pbm.baseamt, pbdni.psite_customer_code customerid, pbdni.dnno cnno, '' cashier, NULL adjdate FROM psite_posbillmop pbm, psite_posbilldn pbdni WHERE pbm.psite_posbilldn_code = pbdni.code AND pbdni.psite_customer_code IS NOT NULL AND pbm.moptype = 'DNI' AND ( pbdni.IsAdjusted = 0 OR ( pbdni.IsAdjusted = 1 AND pbdni.DNADate::date > TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) /*AND pbdni.dndate BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')*/ AND pbdni.dndate::date <= TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) Q GROUP BY posbillid, customerid, cashier) pbm, (SELECT pb.code billid, billno, billdate, NULL terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN pb.netamt > 0 THEN 'Sale' WHEN pb.netamt < 0 THEN 'Return' END billtype, pb.netpayable billamt, NULL createdbyid, pb.createby createdby, pb.remarks billremarks, pb.GSTDOCNO gst_doc_no /*Epic: 109945 | Feature: 109946*/ FROM psite_posbill pb UNION ALL SELECT pb.code billid, billno, billdate, NULL terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN pb.netamt > 0 THEN 'Sale' WHEN pb.netamt < 0 THEN 'Return' END billtype, pb.netamt billamt, NULL createdbyid, pb.createdby createdby, pb.remarks billremarks, NULL FROM psite_posgvbill pb UNION ALL SELECT pb.code billid, billno, billdate, NULL terminalid, pb.terminal terminal, CASE WHEN depreftype = 'D' THEN 'Deposit' WHEN depreftype = 'R' THEN 'Refund' END billtype, pb.amount billamt, NULL createdbyid, pb.createby createdby, pb.remarks billremarks, NULL FROM psite_posdeprefbill pb) pb, psite_customer c WHERE pbm.posbillid = pb.billid AND pbm.customerid = c.code) a WHERE (a.customername IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#RetailCustomerFullnameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#RetailCustomerFullnameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)

with q1 as( SELECT DISTINCT ASSORTMENT_CODE FROM (SELECT promo_code, assortment_code FROM promo_buy pb WHERE promo_code = TO_NUMBER(coalesce(nullif('@PromoName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') UNION ALL SELECT promo_code, get_assortment_code FROM promo_slab WHERE get_assortment_code IS NOT NULL AND promo_code =TO_NUMBER(coalesce(nullif('@PromoName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99'))X), q2 as (SELECT DISTINCT b.admsite_code sitecode FROM promo_master a INNER JOIN psite_promo_assign b ON a.code = b.promo_code inner join admsite s on (b.admsite_code= s.code) where (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) and COALESCE(INSTALLATION_TYPE,' ') <> 'ZPOS'), q3 as (SELECT ASSORTMENTID, ICODE FROM ( SELECT PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.ASSORTMENT_CODE assortmentid, INVITEM.ICODE, COALESCE (INVITEM.BARCODE, INVITEM.ICODE), INVITEM.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE, NULL::numeric, NULL::TEXT, INVITEM.RATE::bigint ) FROM ( SELECT I.ICODE, I.BARCODE, DI.GRPCODE DIVISION_GRPCODE, SE.GRPCODE SECTION_GRPCODE, I.GRPCODE DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE, DI.GRPNAME DIVISION_GRPNAME, SE.GRPNAME SECTION_GRPNAME, DE.GRPNAME DEPARTMENT_GRPNAME, I.INVARTICLE_CODE, A.NAME ARTICLE_NAME, I.CCODE1, I.CCODE2, I.CCODE3, I.CCODE4, I.CCODE5, I.CCODE6, I.CNAME1, I.CNAME2, I.CNAME3, I.CNAME4, JOIN INVARTICLE A ON (INVARTICLE_CODE = CODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP SE ON (DE.PARCODE = SE.GRPCODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP DI ON (SE.PARCODE = DI.GRPCODE) ) INVITEM, PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE WHERE PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.ASSORTMENT_CODE IN (select ASSORTMENT_CODE from q1) AND ( ( PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DIVISION_GRPCODE IS NOT NULL AND INVITEM.DIVISION_GRPCODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE ) OR PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE IS NULL ) AND ( ( PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.INVARTICLE_CODE IS NOT NULL AND INVITEM.INVARTICLE_CODE = INVITEM.DESC6 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC6 ) OR PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC6 IS NULL ) AND ( ( PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_BASIS IS NOT NULL AND '1' = CASE WHEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'R' AND INVITEM.RATE BETWEEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_TO THEN '1' WHEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'M' AND INVITEM.MRP BETWEEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_TO THEN '1' WHEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'W' AND INVITEM.WSP BETWEEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_TO THEN '1' END ) OR PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_BASIS IS NULL ) AND ( ( PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.STOCKINDATE_FROM IS NOT NULL AND INVITEM.GENERATED::DATE BETWEEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.STOCKINDATE_FROM::DATE AND PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.STOCKINDATE_TO::DATE ) OR PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.STOCKINDATE_FROM IS NULL ) EXCEPT SELECT PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.ASSORTMENT_CODE, INVITEM.ICODE, COALESCE PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_TO THEN '1' WHEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'M' AND INVITEM.MRP BETWEEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_TO THEN '1' WHEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'L' AND INVITEM.LISTED_MRP BETWEEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_TO THEN '1' END ) OR PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.PRICE_RANGE_BASIS IS NULL ) AND ( ( PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.STOCKINDATE_FROM IS NOT NULL AND INVITEM.GENERATED::DATE BETWEEN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.STOCKINDATE_FROM::DATE AND PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.STOCKINDATE_TO::DATE ) OR PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.STOCKINDATE_FROM IS NULL ) )X), q4 as(SELECT null::text entity.sql_stmt: /*TV_PRE_PROMO_ANALYSIS_01*/ SELECT NULL REQUESTID, row_number() over() UK, T1.SITECODE, T1.ASSORTMENT_NAME, T1.ASSORTMENT_CODE, T1.promocode, T1.promoname, T1.promono, T1.ICODE, coalesce ( CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER('@ShowBarcode@','999999999') = 1 THEN T1.barcode || ' ' END || CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER('@ShowCategory1@','999999999') = 1 THEN T1.CNAME1 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER('@ShowCategory2@','999999999')= 1 THEN T1.CNAME2 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER('@ShowCategory3@','999999999') = 1 THEN T1.CNAME3 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER('@ShowCategory4@','999999999') = 1 THEN T1.CNAME4 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER('@ShowCategory5@','999999999') = 1 THEN T1.CNAME5 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER('@ShowCategory6@','999999999') = 1 THEN T1.CNAME6 END, 'ALL ITEM') ITEM, T1.status, T1.period, T1.NO_OF_PROMO, /*Start ADO ID: 79467*/ IS_ADDL_PROMO, IS_ADDL_ON_ALL_ASSRT_ITEM, /*End ADO ID: 79467*/ round(coalesce (T2.CLOSINGAMOUNT::NUMERIC, 0::NUMERIC),2) CURRENT_STOCK_COST_AMOUNT, coalesce (T2.CLOSINGSTOCKQTY, 0) CURRENT_STOCK_QTY, coalesce (T2.CLOSINGSTOCKQTY * T1.MRP, 0) CURRENT_STOCK_RSP_AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT SITECODE, ASSORTMENT_NAME, ASSORTMENT_CODE, promocode, promoname, promono, ICODE, barcode, cname1, cname2, cname3, cname4, cname5, cname6, desc1, desc2, desc3, desc4, desc5, desc6, mrp, status, period, /*Start ADO ID: 79467*/ IS_ADDL_PROMO, IS_ADDL_ON_ALL_ASSRT_ITEM, /*End ADO ID: 79467*/ COUNT (*) NO_OF_PROMO FROM (SELECT DISTINCT t2.sitecode, t3.name ASSORTMENT_NAME, t3.code ASSORTMENT_CODE, t2.promocode, t2.promoname, t2.promono, t1.icode, t1.barcode, t1.cname1, t1.cname2, t1.cname3, t1.cname4, t1.cname5, t1.cname6, t1.desc1, t1.desc2, t1.desc3, t1.desc4, t1.desc5, t1.desc6, t1.mrp, t2.status, period, /*Start ADO ID: 79467*/ IS_ADDL_PROMO, IS_ADDL_ON_ALL_ASSRT_ITEM /*End ADO ID: 79467*/ FROM ( SELECT PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.ASSORTMENT_CODE ASSORTMENTID, INVITEM.ICODE, coalesce (BARCODE, INVITEM.ICODE) BARCODE, INVITEM.DIVISION_GRPCODE, INVITEM.SECTION_GRPCODE, INVITEM.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE, INVITEM.DIVISION_GRPNAME, SECTION_GRPNAME, DEPARTMENT_GRPNAME, ARTICLE_NAME, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, INVITEM.CCODE1, INVITEM.CCODE2, INVITEM.CCODE3, INVITEM.CCODE4, INVITEM.CCODE5, INVITEM.CCODE6, INVITEM.DESC1, INVITEM.DESC2, INVITEM.DESC3, INVITEM.DESC4, INVITEM.DESC5, INVITEM.DESC6, INVATTR1_NAME, INVATTR2_NAME, INVATTR3_NAME, INVATTR4_NAME, INVATTR5_NAME, INVATTR6_NAME, CAT1PROMPT, CAT2PROMPT, CAT3PROMPT, CAT4PROMPT, CAT5PROMPT, CAT6PROMPT, MRP, ginview.db_pkg_promotion$get_promoprice (MRP, 1, 'M', NULL, NULL, RATE) FROM PROMO_ASSORTMENT M INNER JOIN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE ON (M.CODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.ASSORTMENT_CODE) INNER JOIN PROMO_BUY B ON (M.CODE = B.ASSORTMENT_CODE) CROSS JOIN (SELECT ICODE, BARCODE, DI.GRPCODE DIVISION_GRPCODE, SE.GRPCODE SECTION_GRPCODE, I.GRPCODE DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE, DI.GRPNAME DIVISION_GRPNAME, SE.GRPNAME SECTION_GRPNAME, DE.GRPNAME DEPARTMENT_GRPNAME, INVARTICLE_CODE, NAME ARTICLE_NAME, CCODE1, CCODE2, CCODE3, CCODE4, CCODE5, CCODE6, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, INVATTR1_NAME, INVATTR2_NAME, INVATTR3_NAME, INVATTR4_NAME, INVATTR5_NAME, INVATTR6_NAME, A.CAT1PROMPT, A.CAT2PROMPT, A.CAT3PROMPT, A.CAT4PROMPT, A.CAT5PROMPT, A.CAT6PROMPT, I.RATE, I.MRP, LISTED_MRP, COSTRATE, I.WSP, GENERATED, DESC1, DESC2, DESC3, DESC4, DESC5, DESC6 FROM INVITEM I INNER JOIN INVGRP DE ON (I.GRPCODE = DE.GRPCODE) INNER JOIN INVARTICLE A ON (INVARTICLE_CODE = CODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP SE ON (DE.PARCODE = SE.GRPCODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP DI ON (SE.PARCODE = DI.GRPCODE)) INVITEM WHERE ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DIVISION_GRPCODE IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DIVISION_GRPCODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DIVISION_GRPCODE)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DIVISION_GRPCODE IS NULL)) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.SECTION_GRPCODE IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.SECTION_GRPCODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.SECTION_GRPCODE)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.SECTION_GRPCODE IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE IS NULL))) AND ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.INVARTICLE_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.INVARTICLE_CODE IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.ICODE IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.ICODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.ICODE)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.ICODE IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE1 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE1 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE1)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE1 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE2 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE2 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE2)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE2 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE3 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE3 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE3)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE3 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE4 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE4 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE4)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE4 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE5 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE5 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE5)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE5 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE6 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE6 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE6)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.CCODE6 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC1 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC1 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC1)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC1 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC2 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC2 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC2)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC2 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC3 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC3 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC3)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC3 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC4 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC4 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC4)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC4 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC5 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC5 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC5)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC5 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC6 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC6 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC6)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_INCLUDE.DESC6 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS IS NOT NULL) AND ('1' = (CASE WHEN ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'R') AND (RATE BETWEEN PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PRICE_RANGE_TO)) THEN '1' WHEN ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'M') AND (MRP BETWEEN PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PRICE_RANGE_TO)) THEN '1' WHEN ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'L') AND (LISTED_MRP BETWEEN PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PRICE_RANGE_TO)) THEN '1' WHEN ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'C') AND (COSTRATE BETWEEN PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PRICE_RANGE_TO)) THEN '1' WHEN ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'W') AND (WSP BETWEEN PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PRICE_RANGE_TO)) THEN '1' END))) OR (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS IS NULL))) AND ( ( (STOCKINDATE_FROM IS NOT NULL) AND (GENERATED::DATE BETWEEN STOCKINDATE_FROM::DATE AND STOCKINDATE_TO::DATE)) OR (STOCKINDATE_FROM IS NULL)) and b.promo_code in (select code from promo_master p where P.name || '[' || P.no || ']' IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#PromotionPromoInfoMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#PromotionPromoInfoMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#PromotionPromoInfoMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) EXCEPT SELECT PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.ASSORTMENT_CODE, INVITEM.ICODE, coalesce (BARCODE, INVITEM.ICODE), INVITEM.DIVISION_GRPCODE, INVITEM.SECTION_GRPCODE, INVITEM.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE, INVITEM.DIVISION_GRPNAME, SECTION_GRPNAME, DEPARTMENT_GRPNAME, ARTICLE_NAME, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, INVITEM.CCODE1, INVITEM.CCODE2, INVITEM.CCODE3, INVITEM.CCODE4, INVITEM.CCODE5, INVITEM.CCODE6, INVITEM.DESC1, INVITEM.DESC2, INVITEM.DESC3, INVITEM.DESC4, INVITEM.DESC5, INVITEM.DESC6, INVATTR1_NAME, INVATTR2_NAME, INVATTR3_NAME, INVATTR4_NAME, INVATTR5_NAME, INVATTR6_NAME, CAT1PROMPT, CAT2PROMPT, CAT3PROMPT, CAT4PROMPT, CAT5PROMPT, CAT6PROMPT, MRP, ginview.db_pkg_promotion$get_promoprice (MRP, 1, 'M', NULL, NULL, RATE) FROM PROMO_ASSORTMENT M INNER JOIN PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE ON (M.CODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.ASSORTMENT_CODE) INNER JOIN PROMO_BUY B ON (M.CODE = B.ASSORTMENT_CODE) CROSS JOIN (SELECT ICODE, BARCODE, DI.GRPCODE DIVISION_GRPCODE, SE.GRPCODE SECTION_GRPCODE, I.GRPCODE DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE, DI.GRPNAME DIVISION_GRPNAME, SE.GRPNAME SECTION_GRPNAME, DE.GRPNAME DEPARTMENT_GRPNAME, INVARTICLE_CODE, NAME ARTICLE_NAME, CCODE1, CCODE2, CCODE3, CCODE4, CCODE5, CCODE6, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, INVATTR1_NAME, INVATTR2_NAME, INVATTR3_NAME, INVATTR4_NAME, INVATTR5_NAME, INVATTR6_NAME, A.CAT1PROMPT, A.CAT2PROMPT, A.CAT3PROMPT, A.CAT4PROMPT, A.CAT5PROMPT, A.CAT6PROMPT, I.RATE, I.MRP, LISTED_MRP, COSTRATE, I.WSP, GENERATED, DESC1, DESC2, DESC3, DESC4, DESC5, DESC6 FROM INVITEM I INNER JOIN INVGRP DE ON (I.GRPCODE = DE.GRPCODE) INNER JOIN INVARTICLE A ON (INVARTICLE_CODE = CODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP SE ON (DE.PARCODE = SE.GRPCODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP DI ON (SE.PARCODE = DI.GRPCODE)) INVITEM WHERE ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DIVISION_GRPCODE IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DIVISION_GRPCODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DIVISION_GRPCODE)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DIVISION_GRPCODE IS NULL)) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.SECTION_GRPCODE IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.SECTION_GRPCODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.SECTION_GRPCODE)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.SECTION_GRPCODE IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DEPARTMENT_GRPCODE IS NULL))) AND ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.INVARTICLE_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.INVARTICLE_CODE IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.ICODE IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.ICODE = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.ICODE)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.ICODE IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE1 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE1 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE1)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE1 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE2 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE2 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE2)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE2 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE3 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE3 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE3)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE3 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE4 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE4 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE4)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE4 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE5 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE5 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE5)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE5 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE6 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.CCODE6 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE6)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.CCODE6 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC1 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC1 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC1)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC1 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC2 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC2 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC2)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC2 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC3 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC3 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC3)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC3 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC4 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC4 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC4)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC4 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC5 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC5 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC5)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC5 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC6 IS NOT NULL) AND (INVITEM.DESC6 = PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC6)) OR (PROMO_ASSORTMENT_EXCLUDE.DESC6 IS NULL))) AND ( ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS IS NOT NULL) AND ('1' = (CASE WHEN ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'R') AND (RATE BETWEEN PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PRICE_RANGE_TO)) THEN '1' WHEN ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'M') AND (MRP BETWEEN PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PRICE_RANGE_TO)) THEN '1' WHEN ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'L') AND (LISTED_MRP BETWEEN PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PRICE_RANGE_TO)) THEN '1' WHEN ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'C') AND (COSTRATE BETWEEN PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PRICE_RANGE_TO)) THEN '1' WHEN ( (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS = 'W') AND (WSP BETWEEN PRICE_RANGE_FROM AND PRICE_RANGE_TO)) THEN '1' END))) OR (PRICE_RANGE_BASIS IS NULL))) AND ( ( (STOCKINDATE_FROM IS NOT NULL) AND (GENERATED::DATE BETWEEN STOCKINDATE_FROM::DATE AND STOCKINDATE_TO::DATE)) OR (STOCKINDATE_FROM IS NULL)) and b.promo_code in (select code from promo_master p where P.name || '[' || P.no || ']' in ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#PromotionPromoInfoMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#PromotionPromoInfoMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#PromotionPromoInfoMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) ) t1 inner join ( SELECT DISTINCT b.admsite_code sitecode, a.name promoname, a.code promocode, a.description promodesc, a.no promono, a.name || '[' || a.no || ']' promo_info, a.promo_summary, pb.assortment_code assortmentid, case b.status when 'A' then 'Approved' when 'U' then 'Unapproved' when 'C' then 'Closed' when 'B' then 'Blocked' end status, '[' || TO_CHAR (b.startdate, 'dd/mm/rr') || ' - ' || TO_CHAR (b.enddate, 'dd/mm/rr') || ']' period /*Start ADO ID: 79467*/ ,CASE WHEN COALESCE(a.IS_TOPUP_PROMO::numeric,0)=0 THEN 'No' ELSE 'Yes' END IS_ADDL_PROMO ,CASE WHEN COALESCE(a.IS_TOPUP_ON_ALL_ASSRT_ITEM::numeric,0)=0 THEN 'No' ELSE 'Yes' END IS_ADDL_ON_ALL_ASSRT_ITEM /*End ADO ID: 79467*/ FROM promo_master a inner join psite_promo_assign b on (a.code = b.promo_code) inner join (SELECT promo_code, assortment_code FROM promo_buy pb UNION ALL SELECT promo_code, get_assortment_code FROM promo_slab WHERE get_assortment_code IS NOT NULL) pb on (a.code = pb.promo_code) /*WHERE CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN b.startdate AND b.enddate*//*Bug ID : 109395*/ /*Bug 107036*/ ) t2 on (t1.assortmentid = t2.assortmentid) inner join promo_assortment t3 on(t1.assortmentid = t3.code) WHERE ( ( t1.DIVISION_GRPNAME = nullif('@Division@','') AND nullif('@Division@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( ( t1.SECTION_GRPNAME = nullif('@Section@','')::TEXT AND nullif('@Section@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( ( t1.DEPARTMENT_GRPNAME = nullif('@Department@','')::TEXT AND nullif('@Department@','')::TEXT <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Department@','')::TEXT, '-1') = '-1') AND ( coalesce (nullif('@MSSiteNamePrePromo@','')::TEXT, '-1') = '-1' OR ( nullif('@MSSiteNamePrePromo@','')::TEXT <> '-1' AND t2.sitecode::TEXT = nullif('@MSSiteNamePrePromo@','')::TEXT)) AND (t1.barcode IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (t2.promo_info IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#PromotionPromoInfoMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#PromotionPromoInfoMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#PromotionPromoInfoMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) )X GROUP BY SITECODE, ASSORTMENT_NAME, ASSORTMENT_CODE, promocode, promoname, promono, ICODE, barcode, cname1, cname2, cname3, cname4, cname5, cname6, desc1, desc2, desc3, desc4, desc5, desc6, mrp, status, period, /*Start ADO ID: 79467*/ IS_ADDL_PROMO, IS_ADDL_ON_ALL_ASSRT_ITEM /*End ADO ID: 79467*/ ) T1 left outer join ( SELECT SITECODE, ICODE, SUM (CLOSINGAMOUNT) CLOSINGAMOUNT, SUM (CLOSINGSTOCKQTY) CLOSINGSTOCKQTY FROM ginview.LV_REALTIME_STOCK GROUP BY SITECODE, ICODE) T2 on (T1.SITECODE = T2.SITECODE AND T1.ICODE = T2.ICODE) /*Bug 107009*/ inner join admsite s on (T1.SITECODE=s.CODE) WHERE s.INSTALLATION_TYPE<>'ZPOS' /*Feature 107188*/

entity.object_description: Get Details of Month wise Budget detail along with actual and deviation.
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk, TYPE, glcode, glname, slcode, slname, costcode, cost_centre, mcode, month_name, SUM (COALESCE (budget_Debit, 0)) budget_Debit, SUM (COALESCE (budget_Credit, 0)) budget_Credit, SUM (COALESCE (acc_damount, 0)) acc_damount, SUM (COALESCE (acc_camount, 0)) acc_camount, SUM (COALESCE (budget_Debit, 0)) -
