SUM (COALESCE (budget_Credit, 0)) budget_balance, SUM (COALESCE (acc_damount, 0)) - SUM (COALESCE (acc_camount, 0)) actual_balance FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (TYPE = 'I') THEN 'Income' WHEN (TYPE = 'E') THEN 'Expenses' END TYPE, BUD.GLCODE, GLNAME, BUD.SLCODE, SLNAME, COSTCODE, ST.name cost_centre, BUD.MCODE, MONTH_NAME, BUDDAMT BUDGET_DEBIT, BUDCAMT BUDGET_CREDIT, 0 ACC_DAMOUNT, 0 ACC_CAMOUNT, GL_SLAPP, BUD.COSTAPP, YCODE, BUD.ADMOU_CODE FROM FINGLBUD BUD INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (BUD.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL SL ON (BUD.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMSITE ST ON (COSTCODE = ST.CODE) INNER JOIN ADMMONTH MON ON (BUD.MCODE = MON.MCODE) WHERE (BUD.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99')) AND (YCODE = to_number('@YearCode@','9G999g999999999999d99')) UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN TYPE = 'I' THEN 'Income' WHEN TYPE = 'E' THEN 'Expenses' END TYPE, bud.glcode, glname, bud.slcode, slname, st.CODE costcode, CASE WHEN f.ref_admsite_code IS NULL THEN st.name ELSE a.name END cost_centre, (SELECT mcode FROM admmonth WHERE bud.ENTDT BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) mcode , (SELECT MONTH_NAME FROM admmonth WHERE bud.ENTDT BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) month_name, 0 budget_Debit, 0 budget_Credit, bud.DAMOUNT acc_damount, bud.camount acc_camount, gl.SLAPP, gl.COSTAPP, bud.YCODE, bud.ADMOU_CODE FROM finpost bud INNER JOIN fingl gl ON bud.glcode = gl.glcode LEFT OUTER JOIN finsl sl ON bud.slcode = sl.slcode LEFT OUTER JOIN admsite st ON bud.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = st.CODE inner join fincosttag f on bud.postcode = f.postcode inner join admsite a on a.code = f.ref_admsite_code WHERE bud.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND bud.ycode = to_number('@YearCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND gl.TYPE IN ('I', 'E'))X GROUP BY TYPE, glcode, glname, slcode, slname, costcode, cost_centre, mcode, month_name, GL_SLAPP, COSTAPP, YCODE

entity.object_description: TBD
entity.sql_stmt: /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 81158 Jyotirmoy YNAME Showing Wrong 86363 Jyotirmoy Previous Year Data Not Showing */ with dt_dtfr as ( select dtfr from admyear where to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto ) SELECT row_number() over() fnc_uk, SLCODE, MODULENAME, DOCUMENT_DATE, DOCUMENT_NO, DOCNO, DOCDT, DC_ORDDT, GROUPNAME, DATE_RANGE, MONTH_NAME, MONTHCODE, DRCR, CHQNO, CHQDT, CHQUE_TYPE, CHQUE_DRAWN_ON, ROUND (NO_OF_DAYS) NO_OF_DAYS, ORDQTY, DQTY, CNLQTY, PENDING_QTY, DC_QTY, SALAMT, SALQTY, RETURNAMT, AMOUNT, PENDING, CHEQUE_AMOUNT, SUM (PENDING) OVER (PARTITION BY SLCODE ORDER BY SLCODE) + SUM (CHEQUE_AMOUNT) OVER (PARTITION BY SLCODE ORDER BY SLCODE) EFFECTIVETOTAL FROM ( SELECT 'Sales Order' MODULENAME, M.PCODE SLCODE, M.ORDDT DOCUMENT_DATE, M.SCHEME_DOCNO DOCUMENT_NO, M.DOCNO, M.DOCDT, NULL DC_ORDDT, NULL GROUPNAME, NULL DATE_RANGE, NULL MONTH_NAME, NULL MONTHCODE, NULL DRCR, NULL CHQNO, NULL::date CHQDT, NULL CHQUE_TYPE, NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON, 0 NO_OF_DAYS, SUM (coalesce (D.ORDQTY, 0)) ORDQTY, SUM (coalesce (D.DQTY, 0)) DQTY, SUM (coalesce (D.CNLQTY, 0)) CNLQTY, SUM ( coalesce (D.ORDQTY, 0) - (coalesce (D.DQTY, 0) + coalesce (D.CNLQTY, 0))) PENDING_QTY, 0 DC_QTY, 0 SALAMT, 0 SALQTY, 0 RETURNAMT, 0 AMOUNT, 0 PENDING, 0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT, null::int chequeamounttotal, null::int pendingamounttotal FROM SALORDMAIN M inner join SALORDDET D on (M.ORDCODE = D.ORDCODE) WHERE (ORDDT BETWEEN (to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') - interval '3 months') and to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99')) GROUP BY M.SCHEME_DOCNO, M.ORDDT, M.DOCNO, M.DOCDT, M.PCODE HAVING SUM (coalesce (D.ORDQTY, 0)) <> SUM (coalesce (D.DQTY, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (D.CNLQTY, 0)) UNION ALL SELECT 'Delivery Issue Pending' MODULENAME, M.PCODE SLCODE, M.DCDT DOCUMENT_DATE, M.SCHEME_DOCNO DOCUMENT_NO, M.DOCNO, NULL DOCDT, ORD.ORDDT ORDDT, NULL GROUPNAME, NULL DATE_RANGE, NULL MONTH_NAME, null::int MONTHCODE, NULL DRCR, NULL CHQNO, NULL::date CHQDT, NULL CHQUE_TYPE, NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON, 0 NO_OF_DAYS, 0 ORDQTY, 0 DQTY, 0 CNLQTY, 0 PENDING_QTY, SUM (coalesce (D.ISQTY, 0)) DC_QTY, 0 SALAMT, 0 SALQTY, 0 RETURNAMT, 0 AMOUNT, 0 PENDING, 0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT, NULL::int chequeamounttotal, NULL::int pendingamounttotal FROM INVDCMAIN M inner join INVDCDET D on (M.DCCODE = D.DCCODE) left outer join SALINVMAIN INV on (M.INVCODE = INV.INVCODE) left outer join SALORDMAIN ORD on (M.ORDCODE = ORD.ORDCODE) WHERE M.DCDT BETWEEN (select dtfr from dt_dtfr) AND to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND (M.INVCODE IS NULL OR INV.INVDT > to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (m.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99')) GROUP BY M.DCDT, M.SCHEME_DOCNO, M.DOCNO, ORD.ORDDT, M.PCODE UNION ALL SELECT 'Sales Analysis (Monthwise)' MODULENAME, PCODE SLCODE, NULL DOCUMENT_DATE, NULL DOCUMENT_NO, NULL DOCNO, NULL DOCDT, NULL ORDDT, NULL GROUPNAME, YEAR_CODE DATE_RANGE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, NULL DRCR, NULL CHQNO, NULL::date CHQDT, NULL CHQUE_TYPE, NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON, 0 NO_OF_DAYS, 0 ORDQTY, 0 DQTY, 0 CNLQTY, 0 PENDING_QTY, 0 DC_QTY, ROUND (SUM (coalesce (AMOUNT, 0)), 2) SALAMT, coalesce (SUM (QTY), 0) SALQTY, 0 RETURNAMT, 0 AMOUNT, 0 PENDING, 0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT, NULL::int chequeamounttotal, NULL::int pendingamounttotal FROM ( SELECT YEAR_CODE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, SUM (coalesce (AMOUNT_INV, 0) - coalesce (AMOUNT_RT, 0)) AMOUNT, SUM (coalesce (QTY_INV, 0) - coalesce (QTY_RT, 0)) QTY, PCODE FROM (SELECT /*TO_CHAR(ADMMONTH.DTFR,'RR')||'-'||TO_CHAR(ADMMONTH.DTTO,'RR') YEAR_CODE,*/ ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, TO_CHAR (SALINVMAIN.INVDT, 'MON') MONTH_NAME, ADMMONTH.MCODE MONTH_CODE, coalesce (SALINVDET.INVAMT, 0) AMOUNT_INV, 0 AMOUNT_RT, coalesce (SALINVDET.INVQTY, 0) QTY_INV, 0 QTY_RT, SALINVMAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN inner join SALINVDET on (SALINVMAIN.INVCODE = SALINVDET.INVCODE) inner join ADMMONTH on (date_trunc('month',invdt) = MONSTDT) inner join ADMYEAR on (SALINVMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE) WHERE SALINVMAIN.INVDT BETWEEN (select dtfr from dt_dtfr) AND to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND (SALINVMAIN.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99')) UNION ALL SELECT /*TO_CHAR(ADMMONTH.DTFR,'RR')||'-'||TO_CHAR(ADMMONTH.DTTO,'RR') YEAR_CODE,*/ ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, TO_CHAR (SALRTMAIN.RTDT, 'MON') MONTH_NAME, ADMMONTH.MCODE MONTH_CODE, 0 AMOUNT_INV, ( coalesce (SALRTDET.RATE, 0) * coalesce (SALRTDET.QTY, 0)) AMOUNT_RT, 0 QTY_INV, coalesce (SALRTDET.QTY, 0) QTY_RT, SALRTMAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN inner join SALRTDET on (SALRTMAIN.RTCODE = SALRTDET.RTCODE) inner join ADMMONTH on (date_trunc('month',rtdt) = MONSTDT) inner join ADMYEAR on (SALRTMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE) WHERE SALRTMAIN.RTDT BETWEEN (select dtfr from dt_dtfr) AND to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99')) a1 GROUP BY YEAR_CODE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, PCODE UNION ALL SELECT YEAR_CODE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, SUM (coalesce (AMOUNT_INV, 0) - coalesce (AMOUNT_RT, 0)) AMOUNT, SUM (coalesce (QTY_INV, 0) - coalesce (QTY_RT, 0)) QTY, PCODE FROM (SELECT /*TO_CHAR(ADMMONTH.DTFR,'RR')||'-'||TO_CHAR(ADMMONTH.DTTO,'RR') YEAR_CODE,*/ ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, TO_CHAR (SALINVMAIN.INVDT, 'MON') MONTH_NAME, ADMMONTH.MCODE MONTH_CODE, coalesce (SALINVDET.INVAMT, 0) AMOUNT_INV, 0 AMOUNT_RT, coalesce (SALINVDET.INVQTY, 0) QTY_INV, 0 QTY_RT, SALINVMAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN inner join SALINVDET on (SALINVMAIN.INVCODE = SALINVDET.INVCODE) inner join ADMMONTH on (date_trunc('month',invdt) = ADMMONTH.MONSTDT) inner join ADMYEAR on (SALINVMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE) WHERE PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND SALINVMAIN.YCODE = (SELECT MAX (YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO)) UNION ALL SELECT ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, TO_CHAR (SALRTMAIN.RTDT, 'MON') MONTH_NAME, ADMMONTH.MCODE MONTH_CODE, 0 AMOUNT_INV, ( coalesce (SALRTDET.RATE, 0) * coalesce (SALRTDET.QTY, 0)) AMOUNT_RT, 0 QTY_INV, coalesce (SALRTDET.QTY, 0) QTY_RT, SALRTMAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN inner join SALRTDET on (SALRTMAIN.RTCODE = SALRTDET.RTCODE) inner join ADMMONTH on (date_trunc('month',rtdt) = ADMMONTH.MONSTDT) inner join ADMYEAR on (SALRTMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE) WHERE SALRTMAIN.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND SALRTMAIN.YCODE = (SELECT MAX (YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO))) b1 GROUP BY YEAR_CODE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, PCODE) c1 GROUP BY YEAR_CODE, MONTH_NAME, MONTH_CODE, PCODE UNION ALL SELECT 'Sales Analysis (Groupwise)' MODULENAME, PCODE SLCODE, NULL DOCUMENT_DATE, NULL DOCUMENT_NO, NULL DOCNO, NULL DOCDT, NULL ORDDT, GROUP_NAME GROUPNAME, YEAR_CODE DATE_RANGE, NULL MONTH_NAME, NULL MONTHCODE, NULL DRCR, NULL CHQNO, NULL::date CHQDT, NULL CHQUE_TYPE, NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON, 0 NO_OF_DAYS, 0 ORDQTY, 0 DQTY, 0 CNLQTY, 0 PENDING_QTY, 0 DC_QTY, ROUND (SUM (coalesce (AMOUNT, 0)), 2) SAL_AMT, SUM (coalesce (QTY, 0)) SAL_QTY, 0 RETURNAMT, 0 AMOUNT, 0 PENDING, 0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT, NULL::int chequeamounttotal, NULL::int pendingamounttotal FROM ( SELECT YEAR_CODE, GROUP_NAME, SUM (coalesce (AMOUNT_INV, 0) - coalesce (AMOUNT_RT, 0)) AMOUNT, SUM (coalesce (QTY_INV, 0) - coalesce (QTY_RT, 0)) QTY, PCODE FROM (SELECT /*TO_CHAR(ADMYEAR.DTFR,'RR')||'-'||TO_CHAR(ADMYEAR.DTTO,'RR') YEAR_CODE,*/ ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, V_ITEM.GRPNAME GROUP_NAME, coalesce (SALINVDET.INVAMT, 0) AMOUNT_INV, 0 AMOUNT_RT, coalesce (SALINVDET.INVQTY, 0) QTY_INV, 0 QTY_RT, SALINVMAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN inner join SALINVDET on (SALINVMAIN.INVCODE = SALINVDET.INVCODE) inner join V_ITEM on (SALINVDET.ICODE = V_ITEM.ICODE) inner join ADMYEAR on (SALINVMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE) WHERE SALINVMAIN.INVDT BETWEEN (select dtfr from dt_dtfr) AND to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND SALINVMAIN.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') UNION ALL SELECT /*TO_CHAR(DTFR,'RR')||'-'||TO_CHAR(DTTO,'RR') YEAR_CODE,*/ ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, V_ITEM.GRPNAME GROUP_NAME, 0 AMOUNT_INV, ( coalesce (SALRTDET.RATE, 0) * coalesce (SALRTDET.QTY, 0)) AMOUNT_RT, 0 QTY_INV, coalesce (SALRTDET.QTY, 0) QTY_RT, SALRTMAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN inner join SALRTDET on (SALRTMAIN.RTCODE = SALRTDET.RTCODE) inner join V_ITEM on (SALRTDET.ICODE = V_ITEM.ICODE) inner join ADMYEAR on (SALRTMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE) WHERE SALRTMAIN.RTDT BETWEEN (select dtfr from dt_dtfr) AND to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND SALRTMAIN.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99')) d1 GROUP BY YEAR_CODE, GROUP_NAME, PCODE UNION ALL SELECT YEAR_CODE, GROUP_NAME, SUM (coalesce (AMOUNT_INV, 0) - coalesce (AMOUNT_RT, 0)) AMOUNT, SUM (coalesce (QTY_INV, 0) - coalesce (QTY_RT, 0)) QTY, PCODE FROM (SELECT /*TO_CHAR(DTFR,'RR')||'-'||TO_CHAR(DTTO,'RR') YEAR_CODE,*/ ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, V_ITEM.GRPNAME GROUP_NAME, coalesce (SALINVDET.INVAMT, 0) AMOUNT_INV, 0 AMOUNT_RT, coalesce (SALINVDET.INVQTY, 0) QTY_INV, 0 QTY_RT, SALINVMAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN inner join SALINVDET on (SALINVMAIN.INVCODE = SALINVDET.INVCODE) inner join V_ITEM on (SALINVDET.ICODE = V_ITEM.ICODE) inner join ADMYEAR on (SALINVMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE) WHERE SALINVMAIN.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND SALINVMAIN.YCODE = (SELECT MAX (YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO)) UNION ALL SELECT /*TO_CHAR(DTFR,'RR')||'-'||TO_CHAR(DTTO,'RR') YEAR_CODE,*/ ADMYEAR.YNAME YEAR_CODE, V_ITEM.GRPNAME GROUP_NAME, 0 AMOUNT_INV, coalesce (SALRTDET.RATE, 0) * coalesce (SALRTDET.QTY, 0) AMOUNT_RT, 0 QTY_INV, coalesce (SALRTDET.QTY, 0) QTY_RT, SALRTMAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN inner join SALRTDET on (SALRTMAIN.RTCODE = SALRTDET.RTCODE) inner join V_ITEM on (SALRTDET.ICODE = V_ITEM.ICODE) inner join ADMYEAR on (SALRTMAIN.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE) WHERE SALRTMAIN.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND SALRTMAIN.YCODE = (SELECT MAX (YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO))) e1 GROUP BY YEAR_CODE, GROUP_NAME, PCODE) f GROUP BY YEAR_CODE, GROUP_NAME, PCODE UNION ALL SELECT 'Sales Return Ratio' MODULENAME, PCODE, NULL DOCUMENT_DATE, NULL DOCUMENT_NO, NULL DOCNO, NULL DOCDT, NULL DC_ORDDT, GRP.GRPNAME GROUPNAME, YNAME DATE_RANGE, NULL MONTH_NAME, NULL MONTHCODE, NULL DRCR, NULL CHQNO, NULL::date CHQDT, NULL CHQUE_TYPE, NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON, 0 NO_OF_DAYS, 0 ORDQTY, 0 DQTY, 0 CNLQTY, 0 PENDING_QTY, 0 DC_QTY, SUM (SALE_AMT) SALE_AMT, 0 SALE_QTY, SUM (RETURN_AMT) RETURN_AMT, 0 AMOUNT, 0 PENDING, 0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT, NULL::int chequeamounttotal, NULL::int pendingamounttotal FROM (SELECT YR.YNAME, DET.ICODE, DET.INVAMT SALE_AMT, 0 RETURN_AMT, MAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN MAIN inner join SALINVDET DET on (MAIN.INVCODE = DET.INVCODE) inner join ADMYEAR YR on (MAIN.YCODE = YR.YCODE) WHERE MAIN.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND MAIN.YCODE IN (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) AND MAIN.INVDT BETWEEN (select dtfr from dt_dtfr) AND to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT YR.YNAME, DET.ICODE, DET.INVAMT SALE_AMT, 0 RETURN_AMT, MAIN.PCODE FROM SALINVMAIN MAIN inner join SALINVDET DET on (MAIN.INVCODE = DET.INVCODE) inner join ADMYEAR YR on (MAIN.YCODE = YR.YCODE) inner join ADMMONTH on (to_char(MAIN.INVDT, 'MON') = ADMMONTH.MONSTDT::text) WHERE MAIN.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND MAIN.YCODE = (SELECT MAX (YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO)) UNION ALL SELECT YR.YNAME, DET.ICODE, 0, (coalesce (DET.QTY, 0) * coalesce (RATE, 0)) RETURN_AMT, MAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN MAIN inner join SALRTDET DET on (MAIN.RTCODE = DET.RTCODE) inner join ADMYEAR YR on (MAIN.YCODE = YR.YCODE) WHERE MAIN.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND MAIN.YCODE IN (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO) AND MAIN.RTDT BETWEEN (select dtfr from dt_dtfr) AND to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT YR.YNAME, DET.ICODE, 0, (coalesce (DET.QTY, 0) * coalesce (RATE, 0)) RETURN_AMT, MAIN.PCODE FROM SALRTMAIN MAIN inner join SALRTDET DET on (MAIN.RTCODE = DET.RTCODE) inner join ADMYEAR YR on (MAIN.YCODE = YR.YCODE) inner join ADMMONTH on (to_char (MAIN.RTDT, 'MON') = ADMMONTH.MONSTDT::text) WHERE MAIN.PCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND MAIN.YCODE = (SELECT MAX (YCODE) FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YCODE < (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN DTFR AND DTTO))) TRAN inner join INVITEM ITEM on (TRAN.ICODE = ITEM.ICODE) inner join INVGRP GRP on (ITEM.GRPCODE = GRP.GRPCODE) GROUP BY YNAME, GRP.GRPNAME, PCODE UNION ALL SELECT 'Adjustment Analysis', B.SUB_LEDGER_CODE SLCODE, NULL DOCUMENT_DATE, NULL DOCUMENT_NO, NULL DOCNO, NULL DOCDT, NULL DC_ORDDT, NULL GROUPNAME, yname DATE_RANGE,/*ADO Id : 81158*/ NULL MONTH_NAME, NULL MONTHCODE, NULL DRCR, NULL CHQNO, NULL::date CHQDT, NULL CHQUE_TYPE, NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON/*,ABS(ROUND(DECODE(NVL(SUM(DECODE(B.DRCR,'Dr',A.AMOUNT,'Cr',-A.AMOUNT)),1) ,0 ,(NVL(SUM(NVL(DECODE(B.DRCR,'Dr',A.AMOUNT,'Cr',-A.AMOUNT),0)*NVL((NVL(A.RECEIPT_DT,to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'))-B.DOCUMENT_DATE),0)),0)) ,(NVL(SUM(NVL(DECODE(B.DRCR,'Dr',A.AMOUNT,'Cr',-A.AMOUNT),0)*NVL((NVL(A.RECEIPT_DT,to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'))-B.DOCUMENT_DATE),0)),0))/NVL(SUM(A.AMOUNT),1))) ) NO_OF_DAYS*/ /*,Abs((NVL(SUM(NVL(DECODE(B.DRCR,'Dr',A.AMOUNT,'Cr',-A.AMOUNT),0)*NVL((NVL(A.RECEIPT_DT,to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'))-B.DOCUMENT_DATE),0)),0))/NVL(SUM(A.AMOUNT),1)) NO_OF_DAYS --Bug 106379*/ /*Bug Id 106997*/ , CEIL ( SUM ( ( ABS (A.RECEIPT_DT::date - b.DOCUMENT_DATE::date) * ABS (A.AMOUNT))) / SUM (ABS (A.AMOUNT))) NO_OF_DAYS /*Bug Id 106997*/ , 0 ORDQTY, 0 DQTY, 0 CNLQTY, 0 PENDING_QTY, 0 DC_QTY, 0 SALAMT, 0 SALQTY, 0 RETURNAMT, 0 AMOUNT, 0 PENDING, 0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT, NULL::int chequeamounttotal, NULL::int pendingamounttotal FROM (SELECT FINTAG.POSTCODE1 POSTING_CODE, FINPOST.ENTDT RECEIPT_DT, coalesce (FINTAG.AMOUNT, 0) AMOUNT FROM FINTAG inner join FINPOST on (FINTAG.POSTCODE2 = FINPOST.POSTCODE) UNION ALL SELECT FINTAG.POSTCODE2, FINPOST.ENTDT, coalesce (FINTAG.AMOUNT, 0) FROM FINTAG inner join FINPOST on (FINTAG.POSTCODE1 = FINPOST.POSTCODE)) A inner join (SELECT A.DOCUMENT_DATE, A.YEAR, A.DRCR, A.POSTING_CODE, A.SUB_LEDGER_CODE FROM V_ADJ A, (SELECT min(ycode) ycode1, max(ycode) ycode2 FROM admyear where (to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') - INTERVAL '2 year')::DATE between dtfr and dtto or to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto) B/*ADO Id : 86363*/ WHERE A.YEAR BETWEEN ycode1 AND B.Ycode2 AND A.SUB_LEDGER_CODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND A.ENTRY_TYPE = 'VDP') B on (A.POSTING_CODE = B.POSTING_CODE) inner join ADMYEAR on (B.YEAR = ADMYEAR.YCODE) GROUP BY yname,/*ADO Id : 81158*/ B.SUB_LEDGER_CODE UNION ALL SELECT 'Outstanding Summary' MODULENAME, FINSL.SLCODE PARTYCODE, CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' THEN DOCUMENT_DATE::date ELSE case when FINSL.DUE_DATE_BASIS = 'E' then DOCUMENT_DATE::date else coalesce (REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE)::date end END DOCUMENT_DATE, DISPLAY_DOCNO DISPLAY_DOCNO, case when REF_NO is NULL then NULL else case when REF_DT is NULL then REF_NO else REF_NO || ' (' || TO_CHAR (REF_DT, 'DD/MM/YY') || ')'end end REF_NO, NULL DOCDT, NULL DC_ORDDT, NULL GROUPNAME, NULL DATE_RANGE, NULL MONTH_NAME, NULL MONTHCODE, DRCR DRCR, NULL CHQNO, NULL::date CHQDT, NULL CHQUE_TYPE, NULL CHQUE_DRAWN_ON, to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') - CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' THEN DOCUMENT_DATE::date ELSE case when FINSL.DUE_DATE_BASIS= 'E' then DOCUMENT_DATE::date else coalesce (REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE)::date end END NO_OF_DAYS, 0 SALES_ORDQTY, 0 SALES_DQTY, 0 SALES_CNLQTY, 0 SALES_PENDING_QTY, 0 DC_QTY, 0 SALAMT, 0 SALQTY, 0 RETURNAMT, SUM ( case DRCR when 'Dr' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) when 'Cr' then 0 - coalesce (AMOUNT, 0)end) AMOUNT, (SUM ( case DRCR when 'Dr' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) when 'Cr' then 0 - coalesce (AMOUNT, 0)end)) + SUM ( CASE WHEN DRCR = 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) <= 0 THEN coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) ELSE 0 - coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) END ELSE CASE WHEN coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) <= 0 THEN 0 - coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) ELSE coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) END END) PENDINGAM, 0 CHEQUE_AMOUNT, NULL::int AS chequeamounttotal, (SUM ( case DRCR when 'Dr' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) when 'Cr' then 0 - coalesce (AMOUNT, 0)end)) + SUM ( CASE WHEN DRCR = 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) <= 0 THEN coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) ELSE 0 - coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) END ELSE CASE WHEN coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) <= 0 THEN 0 - coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) ELSE coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) END END) pendingamounttotal FROM V_ADJ inner join FINSL on (V_ADJ.SUB_LEDGER_CODE = FINSL.SLCODE) inner join FINGL on (V_ADJ.GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE = FINGL.GLCODE) left outer join ( SELECT detail_post_code, SUM (detail_receipt_amt) detail_receipt_amt FROM (SELECT a.postcode1 detail_post_code, CASE WHEN entdt <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') THEN CASE WHEN a.enttype1 = 'VDP' THEN coalesce (a.amount, 0) ELSE case when coalesce (b.damount, 0) = 0 then -a.amount else a.amount end END ELSE 0 END detail_receipt_amt FROM fintag a inner join finpost b on (a.postcode2 = b.postcode) inner join finsl s on (b.slcode = s.slcode) inner join admcls cl on (s.clscode = cl.clscode) WHERE 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND b.entdt <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND case when s.due_date_basis = 'E' then entdt else coalesce (docdt, entdt)end <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END AND b.slcode = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') UNION ALL SELECT a.postcode2 detail_post_code, CASE WHEN entdt <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') THEN CASE WHEN a.enttype2 = 'VDP' THEN ABS (coalesce (a.amount, 0)) ELSE case when coalesce (b.damount, 0)= 0 then -a.amount else a.amount end END ELSE 0 END detail_receipt_amt FROM fintag a inner join finpost b on (a.postcode1 = b.postcode) inner join finsl s on (b.slcode = s.slcode) inner join admcls cl on (s.clscode = cl.clscode) WHERE 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND b.entdt <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND case when s.due_date_basis= 'E' then entdt else coalesce (docdt, entdt) end <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END AND b.slcode = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99')) q1 GROUP BY detail_post_code) adjustment on (V_ADJ.POSTING_CODE = ADJUSTMENT.DETAIL_POST_CODE) WHERE 1 = CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' AND V_ADJ.document_date <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'D' AND case when FINSL.due_date_basis = 'E' then V_ADJ.document_date else coalesce (V_ADJ.ref_dt, V_ADJ.document_date) end <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 END AND FINSL.SLCODE = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND FINGL.SRCTYPE = 'R' GROUP BY CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' THEN DOCUMENT_DATE::date ELSE case when FINSL.DUE_DATE_BASIS = 'E' then DOCUMENT_DATE::date else coalesce (REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE)::date end END, DISPLAY_DOCNO, to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') - CASE WHEN '@DocumentConsiderationDate@' = 'E' THEN DOCUMENT_DATE ELSE case when FINSL.DUE_DATE_BASIS = 'E' then DOCUMENT_DATE else coalesce (REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE) end END, case when REF_NO is NULL then NULL else case when REF_DT is NULL then REF_NO else REF_NO || ' (' || TO_CHAR (REF_DT, 'DD/MM/YY') || ')' end end, DRCR, FINSL.SLCODE HAVING (SUM ( case DRCR when 'Dr' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) when 'Cr' then 0 - coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end)) + SUM ( CASE WHEN DRCR = 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) <= 0 THEN coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) ELSE 0 - coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) END ELSE CASE WHEN coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) <= 0 THEN 0 - coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) ELSE coalesce (DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT, 0) END END) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT 'PDC' MODULENAME, sl.slcode, entdt docdt, NULL DOCUMENT_NO, docno DOCNO, NULL DOCDT, NULL DC_ORDDT, NULL GROUPNAME, NULL DATE_RANGE, NULL MONTH_NAME, NULL MONTHCODE, NULL DRCR, CHQNO CHQNO, CHQDT::date CHQDT, case when coalesce (camount, 0) = 0 then 'Payment' else 'Receipt' end CHQUE_TYPE, drawnon CHQUE_DRAWN_ON, (CHQDT::date - to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')) NO_OF_DAYS, 0 ORDQTY, 0 DQTY, 0 CNLQTY, 0 PENDING_QTY, 0 DC_QTY, 0 SALAMT, 0 SALQTY, 0 RETURNAMT, 0 AMOUNT, 0 PENDING, SUM (damount) - SUM (camount) cheque_amount, 0 chequeamounttotal, null::int AS pendingamounttotal FROM finpost aj inner join finsl sl on (aj.slcode = sl.slcode) inner join fingl gl on (aj.glcode = gl.glcode) inner join admcls ls on (sl.clscode = ls.clscode) left outer join finsl ag on (sl.agcode = ag.slcode) left outer join admcity ct on (sl.bctname = ct.ctname) WHERE (gl.glcode IS NULL OR gl.srctype = 'R') AND aj.chqdt::date > to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND aj.time::date <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND sl.slcode = to_number('@CustomerNameSL@','9G999g999999999999d99') GROUP BY sl.slcode, entdt, chqno, chqdt, case when coalesce (camount, 0)= 0 then 'Payment' else 'Receipt' end, drawnon, docno) q2

entity.object_description: TBD
This is a Report specific sourse dedicated to produce Incoming Logistics Inhand summary. No additional parameter is allowed for creating system/custom report.
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() UK, TRANSPORTER, OP_LGT, OP_LRQTY, NEW_LGT, NEW_LRQTY, ISS_LGT, ISS_LRQTY, CNL_LGT, CNL_LRQTY, CL_LGT, CL_LRQTY FROM ( SELECT TRANSPORTER, SUM (COALESCE (OP_LGT, 0)) OP_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (OP_LRQTY, 0)) OP_LRQTY, SUM (COALESCE (NEW_LGT, 0)) NEW_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (NEW_LRQTY, 0)) NEW_LRQTY, SUM (COALESCE (ISS_LGT, 0)) ISS_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (ISS_LRQTY, 0)) ISS_LRQTY, SUM (COALESCE (CNL_LGT, 0)) CNL_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (CNL_LRQTY, 0)) CNL_LRQTY, SUM (COALESCE (CL_LGT, 0)) CL_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (CL_LRQTY, 0)) CL_LRQTY FROM ( SELECT TR.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, COUNT (LGTCODE) OP_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0)) OP_LRQTY, 0 NEW_LGT, 0 NEW_LRQTY, 0 ISS_LGT, 0 ISS_LRQTY, 0 CNL_LGT, 0 CNL_LRQTY, 0 CL_LGT, 0 CL_LRQTY FROM INVLGTNOTE L INNER JOIN FINSL TR ON (L.TRPCODE = TR.SLCODE) WHERE L.LGTTYPE = 'I' AND L.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.TRPCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), L.TRPCODE)) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( LGTSTATUS = 'O' AND LGTDT < to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') OR ( LGTSTATUS = 'C' AND LGTDT < to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND CANCELLEDON :: DATE >= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ISSUEDON IS NULL OR ( ISSUEDON IS NOT NULL AND ISSUEDON ::DATE >= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')))) OR ( LGTSTATUS = 'I' AND LGTDT < to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ISSUEDON ::DATE >= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')))) GROUP BY TR.SLNAME UNION ALL SELECT TR.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, 0 OP_LGT, 0 OP_LRQTY, COUNT (LGTCODE) NEW_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0)) NEW_LRQTY, 0 ISS_LGT, 0 ISS_LRQTY, 0 CNL_LGT, 0 CNL_LRQTY, 0 CL_LGT, 0 CL_LRQTY FROM INVLGTNOTE L INNER JOIN FINSL TR ON (L.TRPCODE = TR.SLCODE) WHERE L.LGTTYPE = 'I' AND L.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.TRPCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), L.TRPCODE)) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND LGTDT = to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY TR.SLNAME UNION ALL SELECT TR.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, 0 OP_LGT, 0 OP_LRQTY, 0 NEW_LGT, 0 NEW_LRQTY, COUNT (LGTCODE) ISS_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0)) ISS_LRQTY, 0 CNL_LGT, 0 CNL_LRQTY, 0 CL_LGT, 0 CL_LRQTY FROM INVLGTNOTE L INNER JOIN FINSL TR ON (L.TRPCODE = TR.SLCODE) WHERE L.LGTTYPE = 'I' AND L.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.TRPCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), L.TRPCODE)) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( LGTSTATUS = 'C' AND LGTDT <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ISSUEDON ::DATE = to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ISSUEDON IS NOT NULL) OR ( LGTSTATUS = 'I' AND LGTDT <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ISSUEDON ::DATE = to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'))) GROUP BY TR.SLNAME UNION ALL SELECT TR.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, 0 OP_LGT, 0 OP_LRQTY, 0 NEW_LGT, 0 NEW_LRQTY, 0 ISS_LGT, 0 ISS_LRQTY, COUNT (LGTCODE) CNL_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0)) CNL_LRQTY, 0 CL_LGT, 0 CL_LRQTY FROM INVLGTNOTE L INNER JOIN FINSL TR ON (L.TRPCODE = TR.SLCODE) WHERE L.LGTTYPE = 'I' AND L.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.TRPCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), L.TRPCODE)) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND L.LGTSTATUS = 'C' AND LGTDT <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND CANCELLEDON ::DATE = to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') /*Commented as per Bug ID 27658*//*Comment Removed as Per Bug Id 109824*/ --AND CANCELLEDON ::DATE <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')/*Commented as per Bug ID 109824*/ AND ISSUEDON IS NULL /*Commented as per Bug ID 27658*//*Comment Removed as Per Bug Id 109824*/ GROUP BY TR.SLNAME UNION ALL SELECT TR.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, 0 OP_LGT, 0 OP_LRQTY, 0 NEW_LGT, 0 NEW_LRQTY, 0 ISS_LGT, 0 ISS_LRQTY, 0 CNL_LGT, 0 CNL_LRQTY, COUNT (LGTCODE) CL_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0)) CL_LRQTY FROM INVLGTNOTE L INNER JOIN FINSL TR ON (L.TRPCODE = TR.SLCODE) WHERE L.LGTTYPE = 'I' AND L.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.TRPCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), L.TRPCODE)) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( LGTSTATUS = 'O' AND LGTDT <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')) OR ( LGTSTATUS = 'C' AND LGTDT <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND CANCELLEDON ::DATE > to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ISSUEDON IS NULL OR ( ISSUEDON IS NOT NULL AND ISSUEDON ::DATE > to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')))) OR ( LGTSTATUS = 'I' AND LGTDT <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ISSUEDON ::DATE > to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'))) GROUP BY TR.SLNAME) S1 GROUP BY TRANSPORTER) S2

entity.object_description: This is a Report specific sourse dedicated to produce Incoming Logistics Issue summary. No additional parameter is allowed for creating system/custom report.
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() UK, TRANSPORTER, OP_LGT, OP_LRQTY, ISS_LGT, ISS_LRQTY, RCV_LGT, RCV_LRQTY, CNL_LGT, CNL_LRQTY, CL_LGT, CL_LRQTY FROM ( SELECT TRANSPORTER, SUM (COALESCE (OP_LGT, 0)) OP_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (OP_LRQTY, 0)) OP_LRQTY, SUM (COALESCE (ISS_LGT, 0)) ISS_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (ISS_LRQTY, 0)) ISS_LRQTY, SUM (COALESCE (RCV_LGT, 0)) RCV_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (RCV_LRQTY, 0)) RCV_LRQTY, SUM (COALESCE (CNL_LGT, 0)) CNL_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (CNL_LRQTY, 0)) CNL_LRQTY, SUM (COALESCE (CL_LGT, 0)) CL_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (CL_LRQTY, 0)) CL_LRQTY FROM ( SELECT TR.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, COUNT (LGTCODE) OP_LGT, SUM ( COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0) - COALESCE (GINVIEW.DB_FUN_LR_QTY ( L.LGTCODE, to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'), L.ENTTYPE, L.GATEIN_APPL, 'O', 'Q'), 0)) OP_LRQTY, 0 ISS_LGT, 0 ISS_LRQTY, 0 RCV_LGT, 0 RCV_LRQTY, 0 CNL_LGT, 0 CNL_LRQTY, 0 CL_LGT, 0 CL_LRQTY FROM INVLGTNOTE L INNER JOIN FINSL TR ON (L.TRPCODE = TR.SLCODE) WHERE L.LGTTYPE = 'I' AND L.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.TRPCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), L.TRPCODE)) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( LGTSTATUS = 'I' AND ISSUEDON ::DATE < to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')) OR ( LGTSTATUS = 'C' AND ISSUEDON IS NOT NULL AND CANCELLEDON ::DATE >= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ISSUEDON ::DATE < to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'))) AND COALESCE (GINVIEW.DB_FUN_LR_QTY (L.LGTCODE, to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'), L.ENTTYPE, L.GATEIN_APPL, 'O', 'Q'), 0) <> COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0) GROUP BY TR.SLNAME UNION ALL SELECT TR.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, 0 OP_LGT, 0 OP_LRQTY, COUNT (LGTCODE) ISS_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0)) ISS_LRQTY, 0 RCV_LGT, 0 RCV_LRQTY, 0 CNL_LGT, 0 CNL_LRQTY, 0 CL_LGT, 0 CL_LRQTY FROM INVLGTNOTE L INNER JOIN FINSL TR ON (L.TRPCODE = TR.SLCODE) WHERE L.LGTTYPE = 'I' AND L.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.TRPCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), L.TRPCODE)) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( LGTSTATUS = 'I' AND ISSUEDON ::DATE = to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')) OR ( LGTSTATUS = 'C' AND ISSUEDON IS NOT NULL AND CANCELLEDON ::DATE >= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ISSUEDON ::DATE = to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'))) GROUP BY TR.SLNAME UNION ALL SELECT TR.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, 0 OP_LGT, 0 OP_LRQTY, 0 ISS_LGT, 0 ISS_LRQTY, SUM (COALESCE (GINVIEW.DB_FUN_LR_QTY (L.LGTCODE, to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'), L.ENTTYPE, L.GATEIN_APPL, 'R', 'C'), 0)) RCV_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (GINVIEW.DB_FUN_LR_QTY (L.LGTCODE, to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'), L.ENTTYPE, L.GATEIN_APPL, 'R', 'Q'), 0)) RCV_LRQTY, 0 CNL_LGT, 0 CNL_LRQTY, 0 CL_LGT, 0 CL_LRQTY FROM INVLGTNOTE L INNER JOIN FINSL TR ON (L.TRPCODE = TR.SLCODE) WHERE L.LGTTYPE = 'I' AND L.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.TRPCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), L.TRPCODE)) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND LGTSTATUS = 'I' GROUP BY TR.SLNAME UNION ALL SELECT TR.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, 0 OP_LGT, 0 OP_LRQTY, 0 ISS_LGT, 0 ISS_LRQTY, 0 RCV_LGT, 0 RCV_LRQTY, COUNT (LGTCODE) CNL_LGT, SUM (COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0)) CNL_LRQTY, 0 CL_LGT, 0 CL_LRQTY FROM INVLGTNOTE L INNER JOIN FINSL TR ON (L.TRPCODE = TR.SLCODE) WHERE L.LGTTYPE = 'I' AND L.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.TRPCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), L.TRPCODE)) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND LGTSTATUS = 'C' AND CANCELLEDON ::DATE = to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ISSUEDON IS NOT NULL GROUP BY TR.SLNAME UNION ALL SELECT TR.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, 0 OP_LGT, 0 OP_LRQTY, 0 ISS_LGT, 0 ISS_LRQTY, 0 RCV_LGT, 0 RCV_LRQTY, 0 CNL_LGT, 0 CNL_LRQTY, COUNT (LGTCODE) CL_LGT, SUM ( COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0) - COALESCE (GINVIEW.DB_FUN_LR_QTY ( L.LGTCODE, to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'), L.ENTTYPE, L.GATEIN_APPL, 'C', 'Q'), 0)) CL_LRQTY FROM INVLGTNOTE L INNER JOIN FINSL TR ON (L.TRPCODE = TR.SLCODE) WHERE L.LGTTYPE = 'I' AND L.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( to_number(coalesce(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND L.TRPCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), L.TRPCODE)) OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Transporter@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( LGTSTATUS = 'I' AND ISSUEDON ::DATE <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')) OR ( LGTSTATUS = 'C' AND ISSUEDON IS NOT NULL AND CANCELLEDON ::DATE > to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ISSUEDON ::DATE <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'))) AND COALESCE (GINVIEW.DB_FUN_LR_QTY (L.LGTCODE, to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd'), L.ENTTYPE, L.GATEIN_APPL, 'C', 'Q'), 0) <> COALESCE (L.QTY1, 0) GROUP BY TR.SLNAME) S1 GROUP BY TRANSPORTER) S2

select row_number() over() UK, 'Outgoing' LGTTYPE_DESC, case when D.ENTTYPE = 'SIM' then 'Sales Invoice / Consignment Transfer' when D.ENTTYPE = 'PRT' then 'Purchase Return Invoice' when D.ENTTYPE = 'STO' then 'Site Transfer Out' when D.ENTTYPE = 'PTO' then 'Package Transfer - Out' when D.ENTTYPE = 'PRI' then 'Wip Material Issue' end type, D.ENTTYPE ENTTYPE, D.ENTNO ENTNO, D.DISPLAY_ENTNO DISPLAY_ENTNO, D.ENTDT ENTDT, D.ENT_AMOUNT NETAMT, D.LGTCODE ENT_LGTCODE, D.SCHEME_DOCNO SCHEME_DOCNO, D.QTY QTY, D.SLNAME SLNAME, D.TRPCODE TRPCODE, P.SLNAME TRANSPORTER, ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE from ( select M.RTCODE ENTCODE, RTNO ENTNO, RTDT ENTDT, LGTCODE LGTCODE, 'PRT' ENTTYPE, M.NETAMT ENT_AMOUNT, GINVIEW.Db_Fun_Display_Docno ('PRM'::text, M.YCODE::int, M.RTNO::text, null::text) DISPLAY_ENTNO, SCHEME_DOCNO, SUM (QTY) QTY, P.SLNAME SLNAME, null CMPCODE, TRPCODE TRPCODE, ADMSITE_CODE from PURRTMAIN M inner join PURRTDET D on (M.RTCODE = D.RTCODE) inner join FINSL P on (M.pcode = P.slcode) where M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@', '9G999g999999999999d99') and ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 or ( M.ADMSITE_CODE = coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) and coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1)) and ( coalesce (nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', ''), '-1') = '-1' or ( nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', '') <> '-1' and nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', '') = 'Purchase Return Invoice')) and P.OUT_LGT_APPL = 'Y' and LGTCODE is null group by M.RTCODE, RTNO, RTDT, LGTCODE, M.NETAMT, GINVIEW.Db_Fun_Display_Docno ('PRM'::text, M.YCODE::int, M.RTNO::text, null::text), SCHEME_DOCNO, P.SLNAME, TRPCODE, ADMSITE_CODE union all select M.INVCODE, INVNO, INVDT, LGTCODE, 'SIM', NETAMT, GINVIEW.Db_Fun_Display_Docno ('SIM'::text, M.YCODE::int, M.INVNO::text, M.SCHEME_DOCNO::text) DISPLAY_ENTNO, SCHEME_DOCNO, SUM (coalesce (INVQTY, 0)) QTY, case when PCODE is null then S.NAME else P.SLNAME end SLNAME, null CPMCODE, coalesce (M.trpcode, P.TRPCODE) TRPCODE, ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER from SALINVMAIN M inner join SALINVDET D on (M.INVCODE = D.INVCODE) left outer join FINSL P on (M.PCODE = P.SLCODE) inner join ADMSITE S on (M.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) where M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@', '9G999g999999999999d99') and LGTCODE is null and ( ( M.PCODE is not null and P.OUT_LGT_APPL = 'Y' ) or ( M.PCODE is null and (M.ADMSITE_CODE, M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER) in ( select ADMSITE_CODE, REPLN_ADMSITE_CODE from ADMSITE_OU OU where OU.EXT = 'N' and OU.OUT_LGT_APPL = 'Y') and ( (S.SITETYPE = 'OS-OO-CM' and S.OUT_LGT_APPL = 'Y' ) or (S.SITETYPE = 'MS-OO-CM')))) and ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 or ( M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) and coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1)) and ( coalesce (nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', ''), '-1') = '-1' or ( nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', '') <> '-1' and nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', '') = 'Sales Invoice / Consignment Transfer')) group by M.INVCODE, INVNO, INVDT, LGTCODE, NETAMT, GINVIEW.Db_Fun_Display_Docno ('SIM'::text, M.YCODE::int, M.INVNO::text, M.SCHEME_DOCNO::text), SCHEME_DOCNO, case when PCODE is null then S.NAME else P.SLNAME end, P.TRPCODE, M.TRPCODE, ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER union all select M.STFCODE, M.STFNO, M.STFDT, M.OUTLGTCODE, 'STO', SUM (coalesce (D.QTY, 0) * coalesce (I.MRP, 0)), GINVIEW.Db_Fun_Display_Docno ('STO'::text, M.YCODE::int, M.STFNO::text, null::text) DISPLAY_ENTNO, SCHEME_DOCNO SCHEME_DOCNO, SUM (coalesce (D.QTY, 0)) QTY, P.SLNAME SLNAME, null CMPCODE, TRPCODE TRPCODE, ADMSITE_CODE from INVSTFMAIN M inner join INVSTFDET D on (M.STFCODE = D.STFCODE) inner join INVITEM I on (D.ICODE = I.ICODE) inner join FINSL P on (M.SLCODE = P.SLCODE) where M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@', '9G999g999999999999d99') and ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 or ( M.ADMSITE_CODE = coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) and coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1)) and ( coalesce (nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', ''), '-1') = '-1' or ( nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', '') <> '-1' and nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', '') = 'Site Transfer Out')) and P.OUT_LGT_APPL = 'Y' and M.OUTLGTCODE is null group by M.STFCODE, M.STFNO, M.STFDT, M.OUTLGTCODE, M.YCODE, M.SCHEME_DOCNO, M.SLCODE, TRPCODE, P.SLNAME, ADMSITE_CODE union all select M.CODE ENTCODE, M.ENTNO ENTNO, M.WIP_DATE ENTDT, M.LGTCODE LGTCODE, 'PRI' ENTTYPE, SUM (coalesce (D.QTY, 0) * coalesce (I.MRP, 0)) ENTTYPE, GINVIEW.Db_Fun_Display_Docno ('PRI'::text, M.YCODE::int, M.ENTNO::text, null::text) DISPLAY_ENTNO, M.WIPTXNNO SCHEME_DOCNO, SUM (coalesce (D.QTY, 0)) QTY, P.SLNAME SLNAME, null CMPCODE, P.TRPCODE TRPCODE, M.ADMSITE_CODE from PRDWIPMAIN M inner join PRDWIPDET D on (M.CODE = D.WIPTXN_CODE) inner join INVITEM I on (D.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = I.ICODE) left outer join FINSL P on (M.PCODE = P.SLCODE) where M.WIPTXN_TYPE = 'I' and M.LGTCODE is not null and M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@', '9G999g999999999999d99') and ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 or ( M.ADMSITE_CODE = coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) and coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OS_MS_Sitename@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1)) and ( coalesce (nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', ''), '-1') = '-1' or ( nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', '') <> '-1' and nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', '') = 'Wip Material Issue')) group by M.CODE, M.ENTNO, M.WIP_DATE, M.LGTCODE, M.LGTRECQTY, M.YCODE, M.WIPTXNNO, P.SLNAME, P.TRPCODE, ADMSITE_CODE) D left outer join FINSL P on (D.TRPCODE = P.SLCODE) where ( coalesce (nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', ''), '-1') = '-1' or (case when D.ENTTYPE = 'SIM' then 'Sales Invoice / Consignment Transfer' when D.ENTTYPE = 'PRT' then 'Purchase Return Invoice' when D.ENTTYPE = 'STO' then 'Site Transfer OUT' when D.ENTTYPE = 'PRI' then 'Wip Material Issue' end = nullif('@LogisticsOutEntryType@', ''))) and D.ENTDT between to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and ( (D.TRPCODE = to_number(nullif('@Transporter@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') and to_number(nullif('@Transporter@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1) or coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Transporter@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) order by D.ENTDT desc

entity.object_description: View to get all the Sales Order Status Details .
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() UK ,COALESCE(PARTYNAME, SITE_NAME) PARTYNAME ,SITE_NAME ,ORDNO ,ORDDT ,INO_GROUP ,ICODE ,ITEM ,PENDING_QTY ,PEND_ORD_QTY ,STOCK_QTY ,CASE WHEN COALESCE (PEND_ORD_QTY, 0) > COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) THEN CASE WHEN COALESCE (PENDING_QTY, 0) <= COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) AND COALESCE (PENDING_QTY, 0) > 0 THEN COALESCE (PENDING_QTY, 0) ELSE CASE WHEN COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) > 0 THEN COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) ELSE 0 END END ELSE 0 END OPTIONAL_QTY, CASE WHEN COALESCE(PEND_ORD_QTY,0) <= COALESCE(STOCK_QTY,0) THEN CASE WHEN COALESCE(PENDING_QTY,0) <= COALESCE(STOCK_QTY,0) THEN CASE WHEN COALESCE(PENDING_QTY,0) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE COALESCE(PENDING_QTY,0) END ELSE COALESCE(STOCK_QTY,0) END ELSE 0 END CONFIRMED_QTY ,SRC.NAME OWNER_SITE ,HOLD_ORD FROM ( SELECT PARTYNAME ,SITE_NAME ,ORDNO ,ORDDT ,INO_GROUP ,T1.ICODE ,ITEM ,PENDING_QTY ,PEND_ORD_QTY ,CASE WHEN PENDING_QTY < 0 THEN 0 ELSE CLOSINGSTOCKQTY END STOCK_QTY ,OWNER_SITE ,HOLD_ORD FROM (SELECT PARTYNAME ,SITE_NAME ,ADMSITE_CODE ,ORDNO ,ORDDT ,INO_GROUP ,ICODE ,ITEM ,PENDING_QTY ,(SELECT SUM ( COALESCE (OQTY, ORDQTY) - COALESCE (CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (DQTY, 0)) FROM SALORDDET, salordmain WHERE SALORDMAIN.ORDCODE = SALORDDET.ORDCODE and ICODE = T1.ICODE and SALORDMAIN.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = t1.OWNER_SITE AND COALESCE (SALORDDET.ORDQTY, 0) - COALESCE (SALORDDET.CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (SALORDDET.DQTY, 0) != 0) PEND_ORD_QTY ,OWNER_SITE ,HOLD_ORD FROM ( SELECT P.SLNAME PARTYNAME, 'Destination Site :' || S.NAME||CASE S.SITETYPE WHEN 'OS-OO-CM' THEN ' [ Org Site ]' ELSE NULL END SITE_NAME, M.ADMSITE_CODE, M.SCHEME_DOCNO ORDNO, M.ORDDT ORDDT, I.CNAME1 INO_GROUP, I.ICODE ICODE, concat(CNAME1,' ',CNAME2,' ',CNAME3,' ',CNAME4,' ',CNAME5,' ',CNAME6) ITEM, CASE '@QuantityBasis@' WHEN 'Original' THEN SUM(COALESCE(D.OQTY,COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0)) - COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.DQTY,0)) WHEN 'Amended' THEN SUM(COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.DQTY,0)) ELSE NULL END PENDING_QTY, M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER OWNER_SITE, INITCAP(M.ISHOLD) HOLD_ORD, S.SITETYPE SITETYPE FROM SALORDMAIN M LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL P ON (PCODE = P.SLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) INNER JOIN SALORDDET D ON (D.ORDCODE = M.ORDCODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (D.ICODE = I.ICODE) wHERE ( (to_number(coalesce(nullif('@SourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@SourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR (to_number(coalesce(nullif('@SourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1 AND (( M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND M.ADMOU_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR M.ADMOU_CODE IS NULL)) ) AND M.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE AND '@IncludeOrderBy@' = 'ITEM' AND ((to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND P.SLCODE = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ((to_number(coalesce(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( (to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.AGCODE = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1 ) AND ( (( '@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '1|#|Y' ) AND M.ISHOLD IN ('Y', 'N')) OR ('@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '0|#|N' AND M.ISHOLD = 'N') ) AND ( (nullif('@Mode@','') = 'Outright' AND M.SALETYPE = 'O') OR (nullif('@Mode@','') = 'Consignment' AND M.SALETYPE = 'C') OR nullif('@Mode@','') = '-1' ) AND M.ORDDT <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY P.SLNAME , 'Destination Site :' || S.NAME||CASE S.SITETYPE WHEN 'OS-OO-CM' THEN ' [ Org Site ]' ELSE NULL END, M.ADMSITE_CODE, M.SCHEME_DOCNO, M.ORDDT, I.CNAME1, I.ICODE, concat(CNAME1,' ',CNAME2,' ',CNAME3,' ',CNAME4,' ',CNAME5,' ',CNAME6), M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, INITCAP(M.ISHOLD) , S.SITETYPE /*HAVING ( ( '@QuantityBasis@' = 'Original' AND SUM(COALESCE(D.OQTY,COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0)) - COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.DQTY,0)) != 0) OR ( '@QuantityBasis@' = 'Amended' AND SUM(COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.DQTY,0)) != 0 ) )*//*Bug Id : 109731*/ UNION ALL SELECT P.SLNAME PARTYNAME, 'Destination Site :' || S.NAME||CASE S.SITETYPE WHEN 'OS-OO-CM' THEN ' [ Org Site ]' ELSE NULL END SITE_NAME, M.ADMSITE_CODE, M.SCHEME_DOCNO ORDNO, M.ORDDT ORDDT, PARENT.GRPNAME||' - '||COALESCE(G.GRPNAME,'?????') INO_GROUP, I.ICODE ICODE, concat(CNAME1,' ',CNAME2,' ',CNAME3,' ',CNAME4,' ',CNAME5,' ',CNAME6) ITEM, CASE '@QuantityBasis@' WHEN 'Original' THEN SUM(COALESCE(D.OQTY,COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0)) - COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.DQTY,0)) WHEN 'Amended' THEN SUM(COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.DQTY,0)) ELSE NULL END PENDING_QTY, M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER OWNER_SITE, INITCAP(M.ISHOLD) HOLD_ORD, S.SITETYPE SITETYPE FROM SALORDMAIN M LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL P ON (PCODE = P.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) INNER JOIN SALORDDET D ON (D.ORDCODE = M.ORDCODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (D.ICODE = I.ICODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVGRP G ON (I.GRPCODE = G.GRPCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVGRP PARENT ON (G.PARCODE = PARENT.GRPCODE) WHERE '@IncludeOrderBy@' = 'GROUP' AND ( (to_number(coalesce(nullif('@SourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@SourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR (to_number(coalesce(nullif('@SourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1 AND (( M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND M.ADMOU_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR M.ADMOU_CODE IS NULL)) ) AND ((to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND P.SLCODE = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ((to_number(coalesce(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( (to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.AGCODE = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1 ) AND ( (( '@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '1|#|Y') AND M.ISHOLD IN ('Y', 'N')) OR ('@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '0|#|N' AND M.ISHOLD = 'N') ) AND ( (nullif('@Mode@','') = 'Outright' AND M.SALETYPE = 'O') OR (nullif('@Mode@','') = 'Consignment' AND M.SALETYPE = 'C') OR nullif('@Mode@','') = '-1' ) AND M.ORDDT <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY P.SLNAME, 'Destination Site :' || S.NAME||CASE S.SITETYPE WHEN 'OS-OO-CM' THEN ' [ Org Site ]' ELSE NULL END, M.ADMSITE_CODE, M.SCHEME_DOCNO, M.ORDDT , PARENT.GRPNAME||' - '||COALESCE(G.GRPNAME,'?????'), I.ICODE , concat(CNAME1,' ',CNAME2,' ',CNAME3,' ',CNAME4,' ',CNAME5,' ',CNAME6), M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, INITCAP(M.ISHOLD), S.SITETYPE /*HAVING ( ('@QuantityBasis@' = 'Original' AND SUM(COALESCE(D.OQTY,COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0)) - COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.DQTY,0)) != 0) OR ('@QuantityBasis@' = 'Amended' AND SUM(COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0) - COALESCE(D.DQTY,0)) != 0) )*//*Bug Id : 109731*/ ) t1 WHERE (('@IncludePendingItems@' = '1|#|Y') or (COALESCE(PENDING_QTY, 0) = 0 and '@IncludePendingItems@' = '0|#|N' ))/*Bug Id : 109731*/ ) T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT K.ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, K.ICODE, SUM (K.QTY) CLOSINGSTOCKQTY FROM INVSTOCK_ONHAND K, INVLOC L WHERE K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE AND LOCTYPE IN ('M','W') AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@WarehouseOnlyStockPoint@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND K.LOCCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@WarehouseOnlyStockPoint@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@WarehouseOnlyStockPoint@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) GROUP BY K.ADMSITE_CODE, K.ICODE) T2 ON T1.OWNER_SITE = T2.SITECODE AND T1.ICODE = T2.ICODE ) T3 ,ADMSITE SRC WHERE T3.OWNER_SITE = SRC.CODE

entity.object_description: View to get all the Sales Order Status Summary .
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() UK, PARTYNAME, SITE_NAME, CREDIT_LIMIT, CREDIT_RATING, SALES_ORDER_NO, PENDING_QTY, PEND_ORD_QTY, STOCK_QTY, OPTIONAL_QTY, CONFIRMED_QTY FROM ( SELECT PARTYNAME, SITE_NAME, CREDIT_LIMIT, CREDIT_RATING, SALES_ORDER_NO, SUM (PENDING_QTY) PENDING_QTY, SUM (PEND_ORD_QTY) PEND_ORD_QTY, SUM (STOCK_QTY) STOCK_QTY, SUM (OPTIONAL_QTY) OPTIONAL_QTY, SUM (CONFIRMED_QTY) CONFIRMED_QTY FROM ( SELECT COALESCE (PARTYNAME, SITE_NAME) PARTYNAME, SITE_NAME, CREDIT_LIMIT, CREDIT_RATING, SALES_ORDER_NO, ICODE, SUM (PENDING_QTY) PENDING_QTY, SUM (PEND_ORD_QTY) PEND_ORD_QTY, SUM (STOCK_QTY) STOCK_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN COALESCE (PEND_ORD_QTY, 0) > COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) THEN CASE WHEN COALESCE (PENDING_QTY, 0) <= COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) AND COALESCE (PENDING_QTY, 0) > 0 THEN COALESCE (PENDING_QTY, 0) ELSE CASE WHEN COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) > 0 THEN COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) ELSE 0 END END ELSE 0 END) OPTIONAL_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN COALESCE (PEND_ORD_QTY, 0) <= COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) THEN CASE WHEN COALESCE (PENDING_QTY, 0) <= COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) THEN CASE WHEN COALESCE (PENDING_QTY, 0) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE COALESCE (PENDING_QTY, 0) END ELSE COALESCE (STOCK_QTY, 0) END ELSE 0 END) CONFIRMED_QTY FROM ( SELECT PARTYNAME, SITE_NAME, CREDIT_LIMIT, CREDIT_RATING, SALES_ORDER_NO, T1.ICODE, SUM (PENDING_QTY) PENDING_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (PEND_ORD_QTY, 0)) PEND_ORD_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN PENDING_QTY < 0 THEN 0 ELSE CLOSINGSTOCKQTY END) STOCK_QTY FROM (SELECT PARTYNAME, SITE_NAME, ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, CREDIT_LIMIT, CREDIT_RATING, SALES_ORDER_NO, ICODE, PENDING_QTY, (SELECT SUM ( COALESCE (OQTY, ORDQTY) - COALESCE (CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (DQTY, 0)) FROM salordmain m ,SALORDDET d WHERE m.ordcode = d.ordcode and ICODE = T1.ICODE and M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER=t1.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER/*Join Added Bug Id : 109734*/ AND COALESCE (ORDQTY, 0) - COALESCE (CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (DQTY, 0) != 0) PEND_ORD_QTY FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN P.SLNAME IS NULL THEN S.NAME || ' (Org Site)' ELSE NULL END PARTYNAME, M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, SITE.NAME SITE_NAME, D.ICODE ICODE, COALESCE (P.CRAMT, 0) CREDIT_LIMIT, CR.CRNAME CREDIT_RATING, M.SCHEME_DOCNO SALES_ORDER_NO, CASE WHEN '@QuantityBasis@' = 'Original' THEN SUM ( COALESCE ( D.OQTY, COALESCE ( D.ORDQTY, 0)) - COALESCE (D.CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.DQTY, 0)) WHEN '@QuantityBasis@' = 'Amended' THEN SUM ( COALESCE (D.ORDQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.DQTY, 0)) ELSE NULL END PENDING_QTY FROM SALORDMAIN M LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL P ON (PCODE = P.SLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE SITE ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = SITE.CODE) INNER JOIN SALORDDET D ON (D.ORDCODE = M.ORDCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SALCREDITRATING CR ON (P.CRCODE = CR.CRCODE) WHERE ( ( to_number(coalesce(nullif('@SourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@SourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR ( to_number(coalesce(nullif('@SourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1 AND ( ( M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND M.ADMOU_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR M.ADMOU_CODE IS NULL))) AND M.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE AND ( to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1 OR ( to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND P.SLCODE = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99'))) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.AGCODE = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ( '@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '1|#|Y' AND M.ISHOLD IN ('Y', 'N')) OR ( '@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '0|#|N' AND M.ISHOLD = 'N')) AND ( ( nullif('@Mode@','') = 'Outright' AND M.SALETYPE = 'O') OR ( nullif('@Mode@','') = 'Consignment' AND M.SALETYPE = 'C') OR nullif('@Mode@','') = '-1') AND M.ORDDT <= to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY CASE WHEN P.SLNAME IS NULL THEN S.NAME || ' (Org Site)' ELSE NULL END, M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, SITE.NAME, D.ICODE, COALESCE (P.CRAMT, 0), CR.CRNAME, M.SCHEME_DOCNO ) T1 WHERE ( ('@IncludePendingItems@' = '1|#|Y') or (COALESCE (PENDING_QTY, 0) = 0 and '@IncludePendingItems@' = '0|#|N')))/*Bug Id : 109734*/ T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT K.ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, K.ICODE, SUM (K.QTY) CLOSINGSTOCKQTY FROM INVSTOCK_ONHAND K INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE WHERE LOCTYPE IN ('M', 'W') AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@WarehouseOnlyStockPoint@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND K.LOCCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@WarehouseOnlyStockPoint@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@WarehouseOnlyStockPoint@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) GROUP BY K.ADMSITE_CODE, K.ICODE) T2 ON T1.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = T2.SITECODE AND T1.ICODE = T2.ICODE GROUP BY PARTYNAME, SITE_NAME, CREDIT_LIMIT, CREDIT_RATING, T1.SALES_ORDER_NO, T1.ICODE) s GROUP BY COALESCE (PARTYNAME, SITE_NAME), SITE_NAME, CREDIT_LIMIT, CREDIT_RATING, SALES_ORDER_NO, icode) s GROUP BY PARTYNAME, SITE_NAME, CREDIT_LIMIT, CREDIT_RATING, SALES_ORDER_NO) s

entity.object_description: Open Invoice (Payment Pending)
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk ,t.* from ( select no_of_days ,STATUS ,sitecode ,sitename ,shortname ,document_code ,party_code ,party ,document_date::DATE ,document_no ,ref_no ,document_type ,amount ,adjusted ,(amount + adjusted) pending ,DOCDATE::DATE ,DUE_DATE::DATE /*Bug 107065*/ FROM ( SELECT to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - ( CASE WHEN (DUE_DATE_BASIS = 'E') THEN DOCUMENT_DATE::DATE ELSE coalesce(REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE)::DATE END ) NO_OF_DAYS ,RELEASE_STATUS STATUS ,SITECODE ,SITENAME ,shortname ,DOCUMENT_CODE ,SLCODE PARTY_CODE ,SLNAME PARTY ,CASE WHEN (DUE_DATE_BASIS = 'E') THEN DOCUMENT_DATE::DATE ELSE coalesce(REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE)::DATE END DOCUMENT_DATE ,DISPLAY_DOCNO DOCUMENT_NO ,REF_NO ,ENTRY_TYPE DOCUMENT_TYPE ,SUM(CASE drcr WHEN 'Dr' THEN coalesce(amount, 0) WHEN 'Cr' THEN coalesce(amount, 0)*-1 END) AMOUNT , SUM(CASE drcr WHEN 'Dr' THEN CASE WHEN coalesce(detail_receipt_amt, 0) <= 0 THEN coalesce(detail_receipt_amt, 0) ELSE coalesce(detail_receipt_amt, 0)*-1 END ELSE CASE WHEN coalesce(detail_receipt_amt, 0) <= 0 THEN coalesce(detail_receipt_amt, 0)*-1 ELSE coalesce(detail_receipt_amt, 0) END END) ADJUSTED ,REF_DT DOCDATE ,DUE_DT DUE_DATE FROM (select RELEASE_STATUS ,DOCUMENT_CODE ,ENTRY_TYPE ,SLCODE ,SLNAME ,DUE_DATE_BASIS ,REF_DT ,DOCUMENT_DATE ,DISPLAY_DOCNO ,REF_NO ,DRCR ,AMOUNT ,DUE_DT ,POSTING_CODE from V_ADJ AJ JOIN FINGL GL on (GENERAL_LEDGER_CODE = GLCODE and SRCTYPE = 'R') JOIN (SELECT SLCODE,SLNAME,DUE_DATE_BASIS FROM FINSL WHERE (coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1')::int = -1 or (coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1')::int <> -1 and slcode = coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1')::int) )) SL ON (SUB_LEDGER_CODE = SLCODE) where ENTRY_TYPE IN ( 'PIM' ,'PRM' ,'PSM' ) AND (ADMOU_CODE = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::INT) AND (CASE WHEN (DUE_DATE_BASIS = 'E') THEN DOCUMENT_DATE ELSE coalesce(REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE) END)::date <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) AJ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ENTCODE1 , DETAIL_POST_CODE ,SUM(detail_receipt_amt) DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT FROM ( SELECT ENTCODE1, POSTCODE1 DETAIL_POST_CODE ,CASE WHEN (ENTDT <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) THEN ( CASE WHEN (ENTTYPE1 = 'VDP') THEN coalesce(AMOUNT, 0) ELSE ( CASE WHEN (coalesce(DAMOUNT, 0) = 0) THEN (0- AMOUNT) ELSE AMOUNT END ) END ) ELSE 0 END DETAIL_RECEIPT_AMT FROM (select POSTCODE1, ENTCODE1, ENTTYPE1, AMOUNT, POSTCODE2, ENTCODE2 FROM FINTAG UNION ALL select POSTCODE2, ENTCODE2, ENTTYPE2, AMOUNT, POSTCODE1, ENTCODE1 FROM FINTAG ) A INNER JOIN FINPOST B ON (ENTCODE2::VARCHAR= ENTCODE AND POSTCODE2 = POSTCODE) INNER JOIN FINSL S ON (B.SLCODE = S.SLCODE) WHERE ( ( CASE WHEN (DUE_DATE_BASIS = 'E') THEN ENTDT ELSE coalesce(DOCDT, ENTDT) END ) <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) AND (ADMOU_CODE = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::INT) ) X GROUP BY ENTCODE1, DETAIL_POST_CODE ) ADJUSTMENT ON (DOCUMENT_CODE = ENTCODE1::VARCHAR AND POSTING_CODE = DETAIL_POST_CODE) INNER JOIN ( SELECT 'PIM' ENTTYPE ,ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE ,NAME SITENAME ,SHRTNAME SHORTNAME ,INVCODE::VARCHAR ENTCODE FROM PURINVMAIN M INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = CODE) WHERE (ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') OR (coalesce(to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1)) AND (M.ADMOU_CODE = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::INT) UNION ALL SELECT 'PRM' ENTTYPE ,ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE ,NAME SITENAME ,SHRTNAME SHORTNAME ,RTCODE::VARCHAR RTCODE FROM PURRTMAIN M INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = CODE) WHERE (ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') OR (coalesce(to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1)) AND (M.ADMOU_CODE = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::INT) UNION ALL SELECT 'PSM' ENTTYPE ,ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER SITECODE ,NAME SITENAME ,SHRTNAME SHORTNAME ,SRVCODE::VARCHAR SRVCODE FROM PURSRVMAIN M INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = CODE) WHERE (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') OR (coalesce(to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1)) AND (M.ADMOU_CODE = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::INT) ) T ON ( aj.document_code = t.entcode AND aj.entry_type = t.enttype ) GROUP BY CASE WHEN (DUE_DATE_BASIS = 'E') THEN DOCUMENT_DATE::DATE ELSE coalesce(REF_DT, DOCUMENT_DATE)::DATE END ,RELEASE_STATUS ,SITECODE ,SITENAME ,SHORTNAME ,DOCUMENT_CODE ,SLCODE ,SLNAME ,DISPLAY_DOCNO ,REF_NO ,ENTRY_TYPE ,REF_DT ,DUE_DT /*Bug 107065*/ )T1)T WHERE ( coalesce(to_number(nullif('@ShowPendingAboveValue@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), - 1) = - 1 OR ( to_number(nullif('@ShowPendingAboveValue@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') <> - 1 AND (pending * - 1) > to_number(nullif('@ShowPendingAboveValue@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') ) ) AND ( coalesce(to_number(nullif('@ShowPendingAboveDays@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), - 1) = - 1 OR ( to_number(nullif('@ShowPendingAboveDays@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') <> - 1 AND NO_OF_DAYS > to_number(nullif('@ShowPendingAboveDays@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') ) )

entity.object_description: Open GRT : Debit Note Pending
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() UK, COALESCE (ST.SHRTNAME, ST.NAME) Site, case when P.ABBRE is null then P.SLNAME ELSE P.SLNAME || ' {' || P.ABBRE || '}' END Supplier, GRTM.GRTNO, PRT.RTCODE Rtcode, GRTM.SCHEME_DOCNO Ret_No, GRTM.GRTDT Ret_Date, GRTM.GRTCODE Grtcode, CASE WHEN GRCM.SCHEME_DOCNO IS NULL THEN '(Adhoc)' ELSE GRCM.SCHEME_DOCNO || ' (' || TO_CHAR (GRCM.GRCDT, 'DD/MM/YY') || ')' END Receive_No, SUM (COALESCE (GRTD.QTY, 0)) Qty, COALESCE (GRTM.NETAMT, 0) Amt, SUM ( CASE WHEN GRCD.ICODE IS NULL THEN COALESCE (GRTD.QTY, 0) ELSE (COALESCE (GRCD.RTQTY, 0) - COALESCE (GRCD.ACQTY, 0) + COALESCE (GRCD.RCINVQTY, 0) - COALESCE (GRCD.RTINVQTY, 0)) END ) Pending_Qty, (SELECT STRING_AGG (INVOICE_INFO, '; ' ORDER BY INVOICE_INFO) INVOICE_INFO FROM (SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN (PURM.SCHEME_DOCNO IS NULL) THEN NULL::TEXT ELSE ( ( (PURM.SCHEME_DOCNO || ' (') || TO_CHAR (INVDT, 'DD/MM/YYYY')) || ')') END INVOICE_INFO FROM INVGRTMAIN GRTM1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MAIN.INVGRCMAIN GRCM1 ON (GRTM1.GRCCODE = GRCM1.GRCCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN MAIN.PURINVDET PURD ON (GRCM1.GRCCODE = PURD.GRCCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN MAIN.PURINVMAIN PURM ON (PURD.INVCODE = PURM.INVCODE) WHERE GRTCODE = GRTM.GRTCODE) S1) INVOICE_INFO FROM INVGRTMAIN GRTM INNER JOIN INVGRTDET GRTD ON (GRTM.GRTCODE = GRTD.GRTCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVGRCDET GRCD ON (GRTM.GRCCODE = GRCD.GRCCODE) INNER JOIN FINSL P ON (GRTM.PCODE = P.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PURRTMAIN PRT ON (GRTM.RTCODE = PRT.RTCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVGRCMAIN GRCM ON (GRTM.GRCCODE= GRCM.GRCCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL A ON (P.AGCODE = A.SLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE ST ON (GRTM.ADMSITE_CODE = ST.CODE) WHERE ( GRCD.ICODE IS NULL OR GRTD.ICODE = GRCD.ICODE) AND ( GRTD.INVGRCDET_CODE IS NULL OR GRCD.CODE = GRTD.INVGRCDET_CODE) AND ( GRTM.GRCCODE IS NULL OR ( GRTM.GRCCODE IS NOT NULL AND GRTM.GRCCODE IN (SELECT GRCM.GRCCODE FROM INVGRCMAIN GRCM WHERE GRCM.WHETHER_CONSIGNMENT = 'N'))) AND GRTM.GRTDT::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( (to_number(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND GRTM.ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'),-1) = -1 AND ( ( GRTM.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND GRTM.ADMOU_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR (GRTM.ADMOU_CODE IS NULL)))) and ((coalesce(nullif('@SiteType@',''),'-1')='MS-OO-CM' and GRTM.AUTH_ECODE is not null) or (coalesce(nullif('@SiteType@',''),'-1')<> 'MS-OO-CM' and (st.sitetype = coalesce(nullif('@SiteType@',''),'-1') and coalesce(nullif('@SiteType@',''),'-1') <> '-1' or coalesce(nullif('@SiteType@',''),'-1')='-1'))) AND ST.SITETYPE <> 'MS-CO-OM-TS' AND (P.SLCODE = to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') OR to_number(coalesce(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( GRTM.RTCODE IS NULL OR PRT.RTDT > to_date('@ASON@','yyyy-mm-dd')) GROUP BY COALESCE (ST.SHRTNAME, ST.NAME), CASE WHEN P.ABBRE IS NULL THEN P.SLNAME ELSE P.SLNAME || ' {' || P.ABBRE || '}' END, PRT.RTCODE, GRTM.GRTNO, GRTM.SCHEME_DOCNO, GRTM.GRTDT, GRTM.GRTCODE, GRCM.SCHEME_DOCNO, GRCM.GRCDT, COALESCE (GRTM.NETAMT, 0) HAVING SUM ( CASE WHEN GRCD.ICODE IS NULL THEN COALESCE (GRTD.QTY, 0) ELSE ( COALESCE (GRCD.RTQTY, 0) - COALESCE (GRCD.ACQTY, 0) + COALESCE (GRCD.RCINVQTY, 0) - COALESCE (GRCD.RTINVQTY, 0)) END ) > 0 ORDER BY 1, GRTM.GRTNO

entity.object_description: Report Specific DataSource
entity.sql_stmt: with po_data as ( select pm.admsite_code, pm.pcode, PM.ORDCODE, PM.SCHEME_DOCNO, PM.ORDDT, PM.DTFR, PM.DTTO, PD.ICODE, SUM (PD.ORDQTY) ORDER_QTY, /*Bug Id : 68749*/ SUM (PD.OQTY) ORIGINAL_ORDER_QTY, /*Bug Id : 68749*/ SUM (PD.CNLQTY) as CANCEL_QTY, SUM (PD.RCQTY) RECEIVE_QTY from purordmain pm inner join purorddet pd on (pm.ordcode = pd.ordcode) where PM.ORDDT::date between to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') group by pm.admsite_code, pm.pcode, PM.ORDCODE, PM.SCHEME_DOCNO, PM.ORDDT, PM.DTFR, PM.DTTO, PD.ICODE ), grc_data as ( select grccode, grcno, grcdt, po_ordcode, icode, poicode, case when icode<>poicode then string_agg(icode,', ') over (partition by PO_ORDCODE,GRCCODE,poicode) else null end alternate_barcode, acqty from (select GM.GRCCODE as GRCCODE, GM.SCHEME_DOCNO as GRCNO, GM.GRCDT as GRCDT, GD.ORDCODE as PO_ORDCODE, GD.ICODE, GD.ICODE as POICODE, /*002*/ sum(GD.ACQTY) as ACQTY from INVGRCMAIN GM inner join INVGRCDET GD on GM.GRCCODE = GD.GRCCODE where GD.ORDCODE is not null and GD.POICODE is null group by GM.GRCCODE, GM.SCHEME_DOCNO, GM.GRCDT, GD.ORDCODE, GD.ICODE union all select GM.GRCCODE, GM.SCHEME_DOCNO, GM.GRCDT, GD.ORDCODE, GD.ICODE, GD.POICODE, /*002*/ sum(GD.ACQTY) ACQTY from INVGRCMAIN GM inner join INVGRCDET GD on GM.GRCCODE = GD.GRCCODE where GD.ORDCODE is not null and GD.POICODE is not null group by GM.GRCCODE, GM.SCHEME_DOCNO, GM.GRCDT, GD.ORDCODE, GD.ICODE, GD.POICODE)), inv_data as ( select IM.SCHEME_DOCNO as INVNO, IM.INVDT as INVDT, ID.GRCCODE as IV_GRCCODE, ID.ICODE, SUM (qty) pi_qty /*002*/ from PURINVMAIN IM inner join PURINVDET ID on IM.INVCODE = ID.INVCODE where ID.GRCCODE is not null group by IM.SCHEME_DOCNO, IM.INVDT, ID.GRCCODE, ID.ICODE ), po_set as ( select admsite_code, pcode, ordcode, scheme_docno po_no, orddt, dtfr, dtto, ORDER_QTY, ORIGINAL_ORDER_QTY, cancel_qty, case when grc.grcno is not null then GRC.ACQTY else RECEIVE_QTY end receive_qty, grccode, grcno, grcdt, coalesce(poicode,po.icode) poicode, alternate_barcode from po_data po left outer join (select grccode, grcno, grcdt, po_ordcode, poicode, alternate_barcode, sum(acqty) acqty from grc_data group by grccode, grcno, grcdt, po_ordcode, poicode, alternate_barcode) grc on (po.ORDCODE = grc.PO_ORDCODE and po.icode = grc.POICODE)), inv_set as ( select grccode, po_ordcode, poicode, invno, invdt, sum(pi_qty) pi_qty from grc_data grc left outer join inv_data inv on (GRC.GRCCODE = INV.IV_GRCCODE and GRC.ICODE = INV.ICODE) group by grccode, po_ordcode, poicode, invno, invdt) select row_number() over() uk, ST.NAME as SITE_NAME, CUST_VEN.SLNAME as VENDOR_NAME, ITEM.DIVISION as DIVISION, ITEM.SECTION as section, ITEM.DEPARTMENT as DEPARTMENT, ITEM.BARCODE as BARCODE, ITEM.ITEM_CODE as ITEMCODE, admsite_code, pcode, po_no, orddt PO_DATE, ORDER_QTY, ORIGINAL_ORDER_QTY, cancel_qty, receive_qty, p.grccode, grcno GRC_NO, grcdt GRC_DATE, alternate_barcode, invno PI_NO, invdt PI_DATE, pi_qty from po_set p left outer join inv_set i on (p.ordcode = i.po_ordcode and p.poicode = i.poicode and p.grccode = i.grccode) inner join ginview.LV_ITEM ITEM on ITEM.code = p.poICODE inner join ADMSITE ST on p.ADMSITE_CODE = ST.CODE inner join FINSL CUST_VEN on p.PCODE = CUST_VEN.SLCODE WHERE ( p.ADMSITE_CODE = COALESCE ( TO_NUMBER (NULLIF ('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) OR COALESCE ( TO_NUMBER (NULLIF ('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND ( p.PCODE = COALESCE ( TO_NUMBER (NULLIF ('@VendorName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) OR COALESCE ( TO_NUMBER (NULLIF ('@VendorName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND ( ITEM.DIVISION = COALESCE (NULLIF ('@Division@', ''), '-1') OR COALESCE (NULLIF ('@Division@', ''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( ITEM.SECTION = COALESCE (NULLIF ('@Section@', ''), '-1') OR COALESCE (NULLIF ('@Section@', ''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( ITEM.DEPARTMENT = COALESCE (NULLIF ('@Department@', ''), '-1') OR COALESCE (NULLIF ('@Department@', ''), '-1') = '-1') AND p.ORDDT::date between TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT row_number() over() UK, NAME SITENAME, SLNAME VENDORNAME, PCODE PARTY_CODE, PM.ORDCODE ORDCODE, ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, PM.SCHEME_DOCNO PO_NO, DOCNO PO_DOC_NO, ORDDT PO_DATE, DTFR PO_VALID_FROM, DTTO PO_VALID_TO, PM.AGCODE PO_AGENT_CODE, PM.TRPCODE PO_TRP_CODE, STAT PO_STATUS, PM.NETAMT PO_NET_AMOUNT, ORDQTY , CNLQTY, ORIGINAL_ORDQTY, RECEIVE_QTY, PENDING_ORDER_QTY, GRCCODE, GRC.SCHEME_DOCNO GRC_NO, ACQTY GRC_RECEIVE_QTY, GRCDT GRC_DATE, /*Start Bug : 60209*/ CASE WHEN GRC.GRCDT IS NULL AND PM.DTTO > current_DATE THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN COALESCE(PM.DTTO,PM.ORDDT) >= GRC.GRCDT THEN 'ON TIME' ELSE 'DELAYED' END END RECEIVE_TYPE, /*End Bug : 60209*/ INV.SCHEME_DOCNO PI_NO, INVDT PI_DATE, INV.NETAMT PI_NET_AMT, INV.GRSAMT PI_GROSS_AMT, INV.CHGAMT PI_CHARGE_AMT FROM PURORDMAIN PM INNER JOIN ( SELECT ORDCODE, SUM (COALESCE (ORDQTY, 0)) ORDQTY, SUM (COALESCE (CNLQTY, 0)) CNLQTY, SUM (COALESCE (OQTY, 0)) ORIGINAL_ORDQTY, SUM (COALESCE (RCQTY, 0)) RECEIVE_QTY, (SUM (COALESCE (ORDQTY, 0)) - SUM (COALESCE (CNLQTY, 0))) - SUM (COALESCE (RCQTY, 0)) PENDING_ORDER_QTY FROM PURORDDET PD GROUP BY ORDCODE) PD ON (PM.ORDCODE = PD.ORDCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT GM.GRCCODE GRCCODE, SCHEME_DOCNO SCHEME_DOCNO, GM.GRCDT GRCDT, GD.ORDCODE PO_ORDCODE, SUM (ACQTY) ACQTY FROM INVGRCMAIN GM INNER JOIN INVGRCDET GD ON (GM.GRCCODE = GD.GRCCODE) WHERE GD.ORDCODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY GM.GRCCODE, SCHEME_DOCNO, GM.GRCDT, GD.ORDCODE) GRC ON (PM.ORDCODE = PO_ORDCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE ST ON (ADMSITE_CODE = CODE) INNER JOIN FINSL CUST_VEN ON (PCODE = CUST_VEN.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MAX (SCHEME_DOCNO) SCHEME_DOCNO, MAX (INVDT) INVDT, GRCCODE IV_GRCCODE, MAX (IM.NETAMT) NETAMT, MAX (IM.GRSAMT) GRSAMT, MAX (CHGAMT) CHGAMT FROM PURINVMAIN IM INNER JOIN PURINVDET ID ON (IM.INVCODE = ID.INVCODE) WHERE GRCCODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY GRCCODE) INV ON (GRCCODE = IV_GRCCODE) WHERE ( ( ( (ADMSITE_CODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR (COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = (-1))) AND ( (PCODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR (COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = (-1)))) AND ORDDT::date >= to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd')) AND ORDDT::date <= to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY ORDCODE

entity.object_description: View to get all the Charge wise Ledger information for the Sales Invoice done.
entity.sql_stmt:
/* ADO Id Developed By Issue 81022 Tanmoy Performance Issue */
WITH slcode AS (SELECT code FROM ginview.lv_customer_supplier WHERE ( ( name || ' (' || ALIAS || ')' = COALESCE (NULLIF ('@VendorNameString@', ''), '-1') AND COALESCE (NULLIF ('@VendorNameString@', ''), '-1') <> '-1') OR COALESCE (NULLIF ('@VendorNameString@', ''), '-1') = '-1')) SELECT row_number() over() uk, SUMMARY_GLNAME, SUM (SUMMARY_GRSAMT) SUMMARY_GRSAMT, ROUND (COALESCE (SUM (COALESCE (SUMMARY_CHGAMT, 0)), 0), 2) SUMMARY_CHGAMT, SUM (SUMMARY_GRSAMT) + SUM (SUMMARY_CHGAMT) SUMMARY_NETAMT FROM (SELECT FINGL.GLNAME SUMMARY_GLNAME, COALESCE (SALINVMAIN.GRSAMT, 0) SUMMARY_GRSAMT, 0 SUMMARY_CHGAMT FROM SALINVMAIN SALINVMAIN INNER JOIN FINGL ON (SALINVMAIN.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (SALINVMAIN.PCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMCITY ON (FINSL.BCTNAME = ADMCITY.CTNAME) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL AGENT ON (SALINVMAIN.AGCODE = AGENT.SLCODE) INNER JOIN SALINVDET D ON (salinvmain.INVCODE = D.INVCODE) INNER JOIN MAIN.INVITEM_DETAIL_AGG I ON (D.ICODE = I.CODE) WHERE SALINVMAIN.INVDT BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SALINVMAIN.SALETYPE = 'O' AND ((COALESCE (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') OR ((COALESCE ( nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') <> '-1') AND (DIVISION = COALESCE ( nullif('@Division@',''), '-1')))) AND ((COALESCE (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') OR ((COALESCE ( nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') <> '-1') AND (SECTION = COALESCE ( nullif('@Section@',''), '-1')))) AND ((COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1') OR ((COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') <> '-1') AND (DEPARTMENT = COALESCE ( nullif('@Department@',''), '-1')))) AND ( ( TO_NUMBER (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''), '9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND SALINVMAIN.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = TO_NUMBER (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''), '9G999g999999999999d99')) OR ( TO_NUMBER (nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''), '9G999g999999999999d99') = -1 AND SALINVMAIN.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER IN (SELECT CODE FROM ADMSITE ADMSITE WHERE EXT = 'N' AND ADMSITE.PSITE_ADMCMPTAX_CODE ::TEXT = CASE WHEN nullif('@TaxRegion@','') = '-1' THEN ADMSITE.PSITE_ADMCMPTAX_CODE ::TEXT ELSE nullif('@TaxRegion@','') END))) AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND SALINVMAIN.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 AND ( ( SALINVMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND SALINVMAIN.ADMOU_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR SALINVMAIN.ADMOU_CODE IS NULL))) AND (SALINVMAIN.PCODE in (select code from slcode)) AND ( ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DestinationSiteOutRight@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND (COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DestinationSiteOutRight@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = SALINVMAIN.ADMSITE_CODE)) OR (COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DestinationSiteOutRight@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1))) AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DynamicLedger@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DynamicLedger@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = SALINVMAIN.GLCODE) OR COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DynamicLedger@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND ( ( ( COALESCE (nullif('@State@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND COALESCE (nullif('@State@',''), '-1') = ADMCITY.STNAME) OR COALESCE (nullif('@State@',''), '-1') = '-1')) AND ( ( COALESCE (nullif('@DynamicAgentSalinv@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND COALESCE (nullif('@DynamicAgentSalinv@',''), '-1') = AGENT.SLNAME) OR COALESCE (nullif('@DynamicAgentSalinv@',''), '-1') = '-1' OR ( nullif('@DynamicAgentSalinv@','') = 'No Agent' AND SALINVMAIN.AGCODE IS NULL)) UNION ALL SELECT FINGL.GLNAME SUMMARY_GLNAME, 0 SUMMARY_GRSAMT, SALINVCHG.CHGAMT SUMMARY_CHGAMT FROM SALINVMAIN SALINVMAIN INNER JOIN SALINVCHG ON (SALINVMAIN.INVCODE = SALINVCHG.INVCODE) INNER JOIN FINGL ON (SALINVCHG.GLCODE = FINGL.GLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL ON (SALINVMAIN.PCODE = FINSL.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL AGENT ON (SALINVMAIN.AGCODE = AGENT.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMCITY ON (FINSL.BCTNAME = ADMCITY.CTNAME) INNER JOIN SALINVDET D ON (salinvmain.INVCODE = D.INVCODE) INNER JOIN MAIN.INVITEM_DETAIL_AGG I ON (D.ICODE = I.CODE) WHERE SALINVMAIN.INVDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND SALINVMAIN.SALETYPE = 'O' AND ((COALESCE (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') OR ((COALESCE ( nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') <> '-1') AND (DIVISION = COALESCE ( nullif('@Division@',''), '-1')))) AND ((COALESCE (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') OR ((COALESCE ( nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') <> '-1') AND (SECTION = COALESCE ( nullif('@Section@',''), '-1')))) AND ((COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1') OR ((COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') <> '-1') AND (DEPARTMENT = COALESCE ( nullif('@Department@',''), '-1')))) AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND SALINVMAIN.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 AND ( ( SALINVMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND SALINVMAIN.ADMOU_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR SALINVMAIN.ADMOU_CODE IS NULL))) AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND SALINVMAIN.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 AND SALINVMAIN.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER IN (SELECT CODE FROM ADMSITE ADMSITE WHERE EXT = 'N' AND ADMSITE.PSITE_ADMCMPTAX_CODE::TEXT = CASE WHEN COALESCE ( nullif('@TaxRegion@',''), '-1') = '-1' THEN ADMSITE.PSITE_ADMCMPTAX_CODE ::TEXT ELSE nullif('@TaxRegion@','') END))) AND (SALINVMAIN.PCODE in (select code from slcode)) AND ( ( to_number(nullif('@DestinationSiteOutRight@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DestinationSiteOutRight@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = SALINVMAIN.ADMSITE_CODE) OR COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DestinationSiteOutRight@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) =
