-1) AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DynamicLedger@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DynamicLedger@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = SALINVCHG.GLCODE) OR COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DynamicLedger@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND ( ( ( COALESCE (nullif('@State@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND COALESCE (nullif('@State@',''), '-1') = ADMCITY.STNAME) OR COALESCE (nullif('@State@',''), '-1') = '-1')) AND ( ( COALESCE (nullif('@DynamicAgentSalinv@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND COALESCE (nullif('@DynamicAgentSalinv@',''), '-1') = AGENT.SLNAME) OR COALESCE (nullif('@DynamicAgentSalinv@',''), '-1') = '-1' OR ( nullif('@DynamicAgentSalinv@','') = 'No Agent' AND SALINVMAIN.AGCODE IS NULL))) s GROUP BY SUMMARY_GLNAME

entity.object_description: Get all Sales Order quantity details
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() UK, M.ORDCODE ORDCODE, I.BARCODE BARCODE, M.ORDDT ORDER_DATE, CUS.SLNAME || '[' || CUS.SLID || ']' CUSTOMER_NAME, M.DOCNO DOCUMENT_NO, M.DOCDT DOCUMENT_DATE, AG.SLNAME AGENT_NAME, M.AGRATE AGENT_RATE, M.DUEDT DUE_DATE, INITCAP (ISHOLD) ONHOLD, M.REM REMARKS, M.SCHEME_DOCNO ORDER_NO, RF.NAME || '[' || RF.SHRTNAME || ']' REFERENCE_SITE, OW.NAME || '[' || OW.SHRTNAME || ']' OWNER_SITE, I.UOM UNIT, CASE WHEN ( '@IsCategory1@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory2@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory3@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory4@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory5@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory6@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '0|#|N') THEN 'ALL ITEM' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.BARCODE END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory1@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY1 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory2@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY2 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory3@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY3 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory4@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY4 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory5@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY5 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory6@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY6 || ' ' END END ITEM_NAME, SUM ( CASE '@QuantityBasis@' WHEN 'Original' THEN COALESCE (D.OQTY, COALESCE (D.ORDQTY, 0)) WHEN 'Amended' THEN COALESCE (D.ORDQTY, 0) ELSE 0 END) ORDERED_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (D.DQTY, 0)) DELIVERED_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (D.CNLQTY, 0)) CANCELED_QTY, SUM ( CASE '@QuantityBasis@' WHEN 'Original' THEN COALESCE (D.OQTY, COALESCE (D.ORDQTY, 0)) - COALESCE (D.CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.DQTY, 0) WHEN 'Amended' THEN COALESCE (D.ORDQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.DQTY, 0) ELSE 0 END) PENDING_QTY /*FROM SALORDMAIN M, SALORDDET D, ginview.LV_ITEM I LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL CUS ON M.PCODE = CUS.SLCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN FINTRADEGRP TD ON M.SALTRADEGRP_CODE = TD.CODE, ADMSITE OW LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMSITE RF ON M.ADMSITE_CODE = RF.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL AG ON M.AGCODE = AG.SLCODE WHERE M.ORDCODE = D.ORDCODE AND D.ICODE = I.ITEM_CODE AND M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = OW.CODE*/ FROM SALORDMAIN M INNER JOIN SALORDDET D ON (M.ORDCODE = D.ORDCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL CUS ON (PCODE = CUS.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINTRADEGRP TD ON (M.SALTRADEGRP_CODE = TD.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMSITE OW ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = OW.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMSITE RF ON (ADMSITE_CODE = RF.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL AG ON (M.AGCODE = AG.SLCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (ICODE = ITEM_CODE) WHERE M.ORDDT <= to_date('@OrdersUptoDated@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( COALESCE (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1' OR ( COALESCE (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND I.DIVISION = COALESCE (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1'))) AND ( COALESCE (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1' OR ( COALESCE (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND I.SECTION = COALESCE (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1'))) AND ( COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1' OR ( COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND I.DEPARTMENT = COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1'))) AND ( ( ('@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '1|#|Y') AND M.ISHOLD IN ('Y', 'N')) OR ('@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '0|#|N' AND M.ISHOLD = 'N')) AND ( ('@Mode@' = 'Outright' AND M.SALETYPE = 'O') OR ('@Mode@' = 'Consignment' AND M.SALETYPE = 'C') OR '@Mode@' = '-1') AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@AllSourceSite@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@AllSourceSite@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@AllSourceSite@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 AND ( ( M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND M.ADMOU_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR M.ADMOU_CODE IS NULL))) AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND ( (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.AGCODE = to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( ('@IncludeOverdueDetailsOnly@' = '1|#|Y' AND M.DUEDT < to_date('@OrdersUptoDated@','yyyy-mm-dd')) OR '@IncludeOverdueDetailsOnly@' = '0|#|N') AND M.YCODE IN (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YNAME = '@CurrentFiscalYear@') GROUP BY M.ORDCODE, I.BARCODE, M.ORDDT, CUS.SLNAME || '[' || CUS.SLID || ']', M.DOCNO, M.DOCDT, AG.SLNAME, M.AGRATE, M.DUEDT, INITCAP (ISHOLD), M.REM, M.SCHEME_DOCNO, RF.NAME || '[' || RF.SHRTNAME || ']', OW.NAME || '[' || OW.SHRTNAME || ']', I.UOM, CASE WHEN ( '@IsCategory1@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory2@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory3@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory4@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory5@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory6@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '0|#|N') THEN 'ALL ITEM' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.BARCODE END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory1@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY1 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory2@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY2 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory3@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY3 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory4@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY4 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory5@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY5 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN '@IsCategory6@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY6 || ' ' END END;

entity.object_description: Get all Sales Order in Matrix Format
Get all Sales Order in Matrix Format
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() UK, M.ORDCODE ORDCODE, I.BARCODE BARCODE, M.ORDDT ORDER_DATE, M.PCODE PCODE, CUS.SLNAME CUSTOMER_NAME, M.DOCNO DOCUMENT_NO, M.DOCDT DOCUMENT_DATE, M.AGCODE AGCODE, AG.SLNAME AGENT_NAME, M.AGRATE AGENT_RATE, M.DUEDT DUE_DATE, INITCAP (STAT) STATUS, M.REM REMARKS, CR.FNAME || ' [' || CR.ENO || ']' CREATED_BY, M.TIME CREATED_ON, M.SCHEME_DOCNO ORDER_NO, M.ADMOU_CODE ADMOU_CODE, M.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, RF.NAME || ' [' || RF.SHRTNAME || ']' REFERENCE_SITE, INITCAP (M.PRICETYPE) PRICE_TYPE, M.DISCOUNT_FACTOR DISCOUNT_FACTOR, M.PRICE_ROUNDOFF PRICE_ROUND_OFF, INITCAP (M.ROUNDOFF_LIMIT) PRICE_ROUND_OFF_LIMIT, M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, OW.NAME || ' [' || OW.SHRTNAME || ']' OWNER_SITE, INITCAP (M.INCL_VAT_IN_DIST) PRICE_INCLUSION_OF_TAX, INITCAP (M.DISCOUNT_MODE) PRICE_MODE, INITCAP (M.DISCOUNT_BASIS) PRICE_BASIS, M.GRSAMT GROSS_AMOUNT, M.CHGAMT CHARGE_AMOUNT, M.NETAMT NET_AMOUNT, TAX.TAX_CHARGE_AMOUNT, TAX.OTHER_CHARGE_AMOUNT, TD.NAME TRADE_GROUP_NAME, INITCAP (M.CMPTAX_CODE_BASIS) TAX_BASED_ON, LA.FNAME || ' [' || LA.ENO || ']' LAST_ACCESSED_BY, M.LAST_ACCESS_TIME LAST_ACCESSED_ON, INITCAP (ISHOLD) ON_HOLD, HB.FNAME || ' [' || HB.ENO || ']' HELD_BY, M.HELDON HELD_ON, INITCAP (M.RESERVE_INV) AGAINST_RESERVATION, M.PCODE CUSTOMER_CODE, AU.FNAME || ' [' || AU.ENO || ']' AUTHORIZED_BY, M.AUTHORIZATIONTIME AUTHORIZED_ON, M.ISHOLD, M.NETAMT, M.SALETYPE, CASE WHEN '@IsCategory1@' || '@IsCategory2@' || '@IsCategory3@' || '@IsCategory4@' || '@IsCategory5@' || '@IsCategory6@' || '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '0|#|N0|#|N0|#|N0|#|N0|#|N0|#|N0|#|N' THEN 'ALL ITEM' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.BARCODE END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category1' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory1@'= '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY1 ELSE ' ' END END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category2' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory2@'='1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY2 ELSE ' ' END END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category3' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory3@'= '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY3 ELSE ' ' END END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category4' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory4@'= '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY4 ELSE ' ' END END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category5' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory5@'= '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY5 ELSE ' ' END END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category6' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory6@'= '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY6 ELSE ' ' END END END ITEM, CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category1' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY1, 'Blank') WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category2' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY2, 'Blank') WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category3' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY3, 'Blank') WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category4' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY4, 'Blank') WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category5' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY5, 'Blank') WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category6' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY6, 'Blank') END MATCOL, SUM ( CASE WHEN '@QuantityBasis@' = 'Amended' THEN D.ORDQTY ELSE COALESCE (D.OQTY, D.ORDQTY) END) - SUM (COALESCE (CNLQTY, 0)) - SUM (COALESCE (DQTY, 0)) OQTY FROM SALORDMAIN M INNER JOIN SALORDDET D ON (M.ORDCODE = D.ORDCODE) INNER JOIN ginview.LV_ITEM I ON (D.ICODE = I.ITEM_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP AU ON (M.AUTHORCODE = AU.ECODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL CUS ON (M.PCODE = CUS.SLCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL AG ON (M.AGCODE = AG.SLCODE) INNER JOIN HRDEMP CR ON (M.ECODE = CR.ECODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINTRADEGRP TD ON (M.SALTRADEGRP_CODE = TD.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP LA ON (M.LAST_ACCESS_ECODE = LA.ECODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP HB ON (M.HELDBY = HB.ECODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE OW ON (M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = OW.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMSITE RF ON (M.ADMSITE_CODE = RF.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ORDCODE, SUM ( CASE WHEN ISTAX = 'Y' THEN COALESCE (CHGAMT, 0) ELSE 0 END) TAX_CHARGE_AMOUNT, SUM ( CASE WHEN ISTAX = 'N' THEN COALESCE (CHGAMT, 0) ELSE 0 END) OTHER_CHARGE_AMOUNT FROM SALORDCHG GROUP BY ORDCODE) TAX ON (M.ORDCODE = TAX.ORDCODE) WHERE M.ORDDT <= to_date('@OrdersUptoDated@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( COALESCE (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1' OR ( COALESCE (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND I.DIVISION = COALESCE (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1'))) AND ( COALESCE (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1' OR ( COALESCE (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND I.SECTION = COALESCE (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1'))) AND ( COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1' OR ( COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND I.DEPARTMENT = COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1'))) AND ( ( ('@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '1|#|Y') AND M.ISHOLD IN ('Y', 'N')) OR ('@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '0|#|N' AND M.ISHOLD = 'N')) AND ( (nullif('@Mode@','') = 'Outright' AND M.SALETYPE = 'O') OR (nullif('@Mode@','') = 'Consignment' AND M.SALETYPE = 'C') OR nullif('@Mode@','') = '-1') AND ( (to_number(coalesce(nullif('@AllSourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(coalesce (nullif('@AllSourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR ( to_number(coalesce (nullif('@AllSourceSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1 AND ( (M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND M.ADMOU_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR M.ADMOU_CODE IS NULL))) AND ( (to_number(coalesce (nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(coalesce (nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(coalesce (nullif('@DestinationSite@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND ( (to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.AGCODE = to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR to_number(nullif('@Agent@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1) AND M.YCODE IN (SELECT YCODE FROM ADMYEAR WHERE YNAME = '@CurrentFiscalYear@') GROUP BY row_number() over(), M.ORDCODE, I.BARCODE, M.ORDDT, M.PCODE, CUS.SLNAME, M.DOCNO, M.DOCDT, M.AGCODE, AG.SLNAME, M.AGRATE, M.DUEDT, INITCAP (STAT), M.REM, CR.FNAME || ' [' || CR.ENO || ']', M.TIME, M.SCHEME_DOCNO, M.ADMOU_CODE, M.ADMSITE_CODE, RF.NAME || ' [' || RF.SHRTNAME || ']', INITCAP (M.PRICETYPE), M.DISCOUNT_FACTOR, M.PRICE_ROUNDOFF, INITCAP (M.ROUNDOFF_LIMIT), M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, OW.NAME || ' [' || OW.SHRTNAME || ']', INITCAP (M.INCL_VAT_IN_DIST), INITCAP (M.DISCOUNT_MODE), INITCAP (M.DISCOUNT_BASIS), M.GRSAMT, M.CHGAMT, M.NETAMT, TAX.TAX_CHARGE_AMOUNT, TAX.OTHER_CHARGE_AMOUNT, TD.NAME, INITCAP (M.CMPTAX_CODE_BASIS), LA.FNAME || ' [' || LA.ENO || ']', M.LAST_ACCESS_TIME, INITCAP (ISHOLD), HB.FNAME || ' [' || HB.ENO || ']', M.HELDON, INITCAP (M.RESERVE_INV), OW.SHRTNAME, M.ADMOU_CODE, M.AGCODE, AG.SLNAME, M.PCODE, AU.FNAME || ' [' || AU.ENO || ']', M.AUTHORIZATIONTIME, M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, M.ADMSITE_CODE, M.ISHOLD, M.NETAMT, M.ORDCODE, M.ORDDT, M.SALETYPE, M.SCHEME_DOCNO, CASE WHEN '@IsCategory1@' || '@IsCategory2@' || '@IsCategory3@' || '@IsCategory4@' || '@IsCategory5@' || '@IsCategory6@' || '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '0|#|N0|#|N0|#|N0|#|N0|#|N0|#|N0|#|N' THEN 'ALL ITEM' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.BARCODE END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category1' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory1@'= '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY1 ELSE ' ' END END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category2' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory2@'= '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY2 ELSE ' ' END END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category3' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory3@'= '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY3 ELSE ' ' END END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category4' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory4@'= '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY4 ELSE ' ' END END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category5' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory5@' = '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY5 ELSE ' ' END END || CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category6' THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN '@IsCategory6@'= '1|#|Y' THEN I.CATEGORY6 ELSE ' ' END END END, CASE WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category1' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY1, 'Blank') WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category2' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY2, 'Blank') WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category3' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY3, 'Blank') WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category4' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY4, 'Blank') WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category5' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY5, 'Blank') WHEN '@SelectCategory@' = 'Category6' THEN COALESCE (I.CATEGORY6, 'Blank') END ORDER BY M.ORDDT, M.SCHEME_DOCNO

entity.object_description: View to get all the Sales Order Planning
entity.sql_stmt: /* ADO ID Developed By Issue 95242 Jyotirmoy Allow Planning logic removed. 95242 Jyotirmoy LV_ITEM_SNAP to be converted to INVITEM_DETAIL_AGG. */ SELECT row_number() over() UK, T1.ICODE, T1.LOCNAME, T1.ITEM_NAME, T1.JOBBER_STOCK, T1.WAREHOUSE_STOCK, T1.PENDING_WIP, T1.PENDING_SALORD_QTY, T1.PENDING_PURORD_QTY, T1.PENDING_CONSUMPTION, T1.PENDING_PRODUCTION, T1.BALANCE_QTY FROM ( SELECT ICODE, LOCNAME, CASE WHEN ( '@IsCategory1@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory2@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory3@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory4@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory5@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory6@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '0|#|N') THEN 'ALL ITEM' ELSE concat(CASE WHEN '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '1|#|Y' THEN COALESCE (BARCODE, icode) END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory1@' = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(CNAME1 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory2@' = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(CNAME2 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory3@' = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(CNAME3 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory4@' = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(CNAME4 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory5@' = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(CNAME5 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory6@' = '1|#|Y' THEN CNAME6 end) end ITEM_NAME, SUM (COALESCE (WIP, 0)) JOBBER_STOCK, SUM (COALESCE (WAREHOUSE_STOCK, 0)) WAREHOUSE_STOCK, SUM (COALESCE (WIP, 0)) PENDING_WIP, SUM (COALESCE (PENDING_SALORD_QTY, 0)) PENDING_SALORD_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (PENDING_PURORD_QTY, 0)) PENDING_PURORD_QTY, SUM (PENDING_CONSUMPTION) PENDING_CONSUMPTION, SUM (PENDING_PRODUCTION) PENDING_PRODUCTION, ( SUM (COALESCE (WAREHOUSE_STOCK, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (JOBBER_STOCK, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (WIP, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (PENDING_PRODUCTION, 0)) + SUM (COALESCE (PENDING_PURORD_QTY, 0)) - SUM (COALESCE (PENDING_CONSUMPTION, 0)) - SUM (COALESCE (PENDING_SALORD_QTY, 0))) BALANCE_QTY FROM (SELECT I.ICODE ICODE, I.BARCODE, NULL LOCNAME, I.CNAME1 CNAME1, I.CNAME2 CNAME2, I.CNAME3 CNAME3, I.CNAME4 CNAME4, I.CNAME5 CNAME5, I.CNAME6 CNAME6, 0 JOBBER_STOCK, 0 WAREHOUSE_STOCK, 0 PENDING_CONSUMPTION, 0 PENDING_PRODUCTION, COALESCE (AVAILABLE_TO_FORWARD, 0) WIP, 0 WIP_QTY_JOBBER, 0 PENDING_SALORD_QTY, 0 PENDING_PURORD_QTY FROM PRDLOTOPERATION M inner join INVITEM I on (M.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = I.ICODE) UNION ALL SELECT I.ICODE ICODE, I.BARCODE, NULL LOCNAME, I.CNAME1 CNAME1, I.CNAME2 CNAME2, I.CNAME3 CNAME3, I.CNAME4 CNAME4, I.CNAME5 CNAME5, I.CNAME6 CNAME6, 0 JOBBER_STOCK, 0 WAREHOUSE_STOCK, 0 PENDING_CONSUMPTION, 0 PENDING_PRODUCTION, 0 WIP, 0 WIP_QTY_JOBBER, ( COALESCE (D.ORDQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.DQTY, 0)) PENDING_SALORD_QTY, 0 PENDING_PURORD_QTY FROM SALORDMAIN M inner join SALORDDET D on (M.ORDCODE=D.ORDCODE) inner join INVITEM I on (D.ICODE = I.ICODE) WHERE ( COALESCE (D.ORDQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.DQTY, 0)) <> 0 AND M.ORDDT <= to_date('@CurrentWorkDate@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ( to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1 AND M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR ( to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = -1 AND ( ( M.ADMOU_CODE <> -1 AND M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99')) OR M.ADMOU_CODE = -1))) AND ( ( m.pcode = to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') AND to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1) OR COALESCE(to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'),-1) = -1) AND ( ( '@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '1|#|Y' AND M.ISHOLD IN ('Y', 'N')) OR ( M.ISHOLD = 'N' AND '@IncludeHeldOrder@' = '0|#|N')) UNION ALL SELECT I.ICODE ICODE, I.BARCODE, NULL LOCNAME, I.CNAME1 CNAME1, I.CNAME2 CNAME2, I.CNAME3 CNAME3, I.CNAME4 CNAME4, I.CNAME5 CNAME5, I.CNAME6 CNAME6, 0 JOBBER_STOCK, 0 WAREHOUSE_STOCK, 0 PENDING_CONSUMPTION, 0 PENDING_PRODUCTION, 0 WIP, 0 WIP_QTY_JOBBER, 0 PENDING_SALORD_QTY, ( COALESCE (D.ORDQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.RCQTY, 0)) PENDING_PURORD_QTY FROM PURORDMAIN M inner join PURORDDET D on (M.ORDCODE=D.ORDCODE) inner join INVITEM I on (D.ICODE = I.ICODE) WHERE ( COALESCE (D.ORDQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.CNLQTY, 0) - COALESCE (D.RCQTY, 0)) <> 0 AND M.ORDDT <= to_date('@CurrentWorkDate@','yyyy-mm-dd') /*AND COALESCE (M.TEMPLATE_FLG, 'N') = 'NO'*/ AND COALESCE (M.TEMPLATE_FLG, 'N') = 'N' AND ( ( m.pcode = to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') AND to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1) OR COALESCE(to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'),-1) = -1) AND ( ( M.ADMOU_CODE <> -1 AND M.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99')) OR (M.ADMOU_CODE = -1)) UNION ALL SELECT I.ICODE ICODE, I.BARCODE, L.LOCNAME LOCNAME, I.CNAME1 CNAME1, I.CNAME2 CNAME2, I.CNAME3 CNAME3, I.CNAME4 CNAME4, I.CNAME5 CNAME5, I.CNAME6 CNAME6, 0 JOBBER_STOCK, COALESCE (S.QTY, 0) WAREHOUSE_STOCK, 0 PENDING_CONSUMPTION, 0 PENDING_PRODUCTION, 0 WIP, 0 WIP_QTY_JOBBER, 0 PENDING_SALORD_QTY, 0 PENDING_PURORD_QTY /* FROM INVSTOCK_ONHAND S INNER JOIN ICOALESCEOC L ON (S.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (S.ICODE = I.ICODE) INNER JOIN ICOALESCEOCGRP G ON (L.ICOALESCEOCGRP_CODE = G.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMSITE A ON (S.ADMSITE_CODE = A.CODE) */ FROM INVSTOCK_ONHAND S INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (S.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (S.ICODE = I.ICODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMSITE A ON (S.ADMSITE_CODE = A.CODE) INNER JOIN INVLOCGRP G ON (INVLOCGRP_CODE = G.CODE) WHERE L.LOCTYPE = 'W' /*AND G.ALLOW_PLANNING = 'N' ADO ID : 95242*/ AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@LocationGroup@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND G.CODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@LocationGroup@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@LocationGroup@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND ( ( A.ADMOU_CODE <> -1 AND A.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99')) OR (A.ADMOU_CODE = -1)) UNION ALL SELECT I.ICODE ICODE, I.BARCODE, NULL LOCNAME, I.CNAME1 CNAME1, I.CNAME2 CNAME2, I.CNAME3 CNAME3, I.CNAME4 CNAME4, I.CNAME5 CNAME5, I.CNAME6 CNAME6, 0 JOBBER_STOCK, 0 WAREHOUSE_STOCK, ( COALESCE (JB.QTY, 0) - ( COALESCE (JB.CANCEL_QTY, 0) + COALESCE (JB.ALTERNATE_CNL_QTY, 0)) - COALESCE (JB.ISSUED_QTY, 0) + COALESCE (JB.RETURN_QTY, 0) + COALESCE (JB.WASTAGE_QTY, 0)) PENDING_CONSUMPTION, 0 PENDING_PRODUCTION, 0 WIP_QTY, 0 WIP_QTY_JOBBER, 0 PENDING_SALORD_QTY, 0 PENDING_PURORD_QTY FROM PRDJOBBOM JB INNER JOIN PRDJOBMAIN M ON (JB.JOBCODE = M.CODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (JB.COMPONENT_ICODE = I.ICODE) WHERE JB.COMPONENT_ICODE <> JB.ASSEMBLY_ICODE AND M.JOB_DATE <= to_date('@CurrentWorkDate@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ( m.pcode = to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') AND to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1) OR COALESCE(to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'),-1) = -1) UNION ALL SELECT I.ICODE ICODE, I.BARCODE, NULL LOCNAME, I.CNAME1 CNAME1, I.CNAME2 CNAME2, I.CNAME3 CNAME3, I.CNAME4 CNAME4, I.CNAME5 CNAME5, I.CNAME6 CNAME6, 0 JOBBER_STOCK, 0 WAREHOUSE_STOCK, 0 PENDING_CONSUMPTION, COALESCE (D.P_QTY, 0) PENDING_PRODUCTION, 0 WIP_QTY, 0 WIP_QTY_JOBBER, 0 PENDING_SALORD_QTY, 0 PENDING_PURORD_QTY FROM PRDJOBDET D INNER JOIN PRDJOBMAIN M on (D.JOBCODE = M.CODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (D.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = I.ICODE) WHERE M.JOB_DATE <= to_date('@CurrentWorkDate@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ( m.pcode = to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') AND to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') <> -1) OR COALESCE(to_number(nullif('@VendorName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'),-1) = -1) UNION ALL SELECT I.ICODE ICODE, I.BARCODE, L.LOCNAME LOCNAME, I.CNAME1 CNAME1, I.CNAME2 CNAME2, I.CNAME3 CNAME3, I.CNAME4 CNAME4, I.CNAME5 CNAME5, I.CNAME6 CNAME6, COALESCE (S.QTY, 0) JOBBER_STOCK, 0 WAREHOUSE_STOCK, 0 PENDING_CONSUMPTION, 0 PENDING_PRODUCTION, 0 WIP, 0 WIP_QTY_JOBBER, 0 PENDING_SALORD_QTY, 0 PENDING_PURORD_QTY FROM INVSTOCK_ONHAND S INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (S.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (S.ICODE = I.ICODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMSITE A ON (S.ADMSITE_CODE = A.CODE) INNER JOIN INVLOCGRP G ON (INVLOCGRP_CODE = G.CODE) WHERE /*G.ALLOW_PLANNING = 'N' ADO ID : 95242*/ ( ( A.ADMOU_CODE <> -1 AND A.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99')) OR (A.ADMOU_CODE = -1)) AND ( ( COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@LocationGroup@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND G.CODE = COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@LocationGroup@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1)) OR COALESCE (to_number(nullif('@LocationGroup@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND L.LOCTYPE = 'M') S1 GROUP BY ICODE, LOCNAME, CASE WHEN ( '@IsCategory1@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory2@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory3@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory4@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory5@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsCategory6@' = '0|#|N' AND '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '0|#|N') THEN 'ALL ITEM' ELSE concat(CASE WHEN '@IsBarcodeApplicable@' = '1|#|Y' THEN COALESCE (BARCODE, icode) END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory1@' = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(CNAME1 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory2@' = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(CNAME2 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory3@' = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(CNAME3 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory4@' = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(CNAME4 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory5@' = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(CNAME5 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN '@IsCategory6@' = '1|#|Y' THEN CNAME6 end) END) t1, main.invitem_detail_agg i WHERE t1.icode = i.code AND ( (i.division = nullif('@Division@','') AND nullif('@Division@','') <> '-1') OR COALESCE (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.section = nullif('@Section@','') AND nullif('@Section@','') <> '-1') OR COALESCE (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.department = nullif('@Department@','') AND nullif('@Department@','') <> '-1') OR COALESCE (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( '@IncludeZeroBalanceRecords@' = 'Y' OR ('@IncludeZeroBalanceRecords@' = 'N' AND COALESCE (BALANCE_QTY, 0) <> 0)) AND ( (nullif('@BalanceBasis@','') = 'P' AND COALESCE (BALANCE_QTY, 0) > 0) OR (nullif('@BalanceBasis@','') = 'N' AND COALESCE (BALANCE_QTY, 0) < 0) OR nullif('@BalanceBasis@','') = '-1')

entity.sql_stmt: SELECT NULL requestid, row_number() over() UK, ADMSITE_CODE, JRCCODE, LOTCODE, LOTNO Plan_No, /*Start Bug Id : 111344*/ /*SUM (coalesce (LOTQTY, 0)) Plan_Qty*/ coalesce (LOTQTY, 0) Plan_Qty, /*End Bug Id : 111344*/ ITEMGROUP Item_Group, item_desc Item_Description, ICODE, OPERATION_SEQ, PROCESS, UOM, JRCNO Receipt_No, SUM (coalesce (JRCQTY, 0)) JRCQTY, SUM (coalesce (SERVICE_COST, 0)) SERVICE_COST, SUM (coalesce (MATERIAL_COST, 0)) MATERIAL_COST, SUM (coalesce (SERVICE_COST, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (MATERIAL_COST, 0)) Total_Cost FROM ( SELECT coalesce (PRDLOTMAIN.LOTNO, 'Adhoc') LOTNO, LOTQTY, PRDWIPTRANS.JRCNO JRCNO, i.grpname ITEMGROUP, CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowBarcode@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN coalesce (i.barcode, i.icode) || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory1@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN i.cname1 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory2@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN i.cname2 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory3@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN i.cname3 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory4@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN i.cname4 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory5@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN i.cname5 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory6@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN i.cname6 END item_desc, i.icode, PRDPR.PRNAME PROCESS, ORDDET.OPERATION_SEQ, i.UNITNAME UOM, coalesce (D.QTY, 0) JRCQTY, (coalesce (D.QTY, 0) * coalesce (D.JOB_RATE, 0)) SERVICE_COST, (SELECT SUM ( coalesce (CONSUME_RATE, 0) * coalesce (CONSUME_QTY, 0)) FROM PRDJRCBOM T WHERE T.JRCCODE = D.JRCCODE AND T.JRCDET_CODE = D.CODE AND T.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = D.ASSEMBLY_ICODE) MATERIAL_COST, PRDWIPTRANS.ADMSITE_CODE, PRDWIPTRANS.CODE JRCCODE, D.LOTCODE FROM PRDJRCMAIN PRDWIPTRANS inner join PRDJRCDET D on (PRDWIPTRANS.CODE = D.JRCCODE) left outer join ( SELECT M.CODE, LOTNO, SUM (coalesce (QTY, 0)) LOTQTY FROM PRDLOTMAIN M INNER JOIN PRDLOTDET D ON (M.CODE = LOTCODE) WHERE (ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99')) GROUP BY M.CODE, LOTNO) PRDLOTMAIN on (D.LOTCODE = PRDLOTMAIN.CODE) inner join v_item i on(D.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = i.ICODE) inner join PRDJOBDET ORDDET on (D.JOBDET_CODE = ORDDET.CODE) inner join PRDPR on (PRDWIPTRANS.PRCODE = PRDPR.PRCODE) WHERE PRDWIPTRANS.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND PRDWIPTRANS.ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND (prdlotmain.lotno IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#JobReceiptRefWplanPlanNoMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#JobReceiptRefWplanPlanNoMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#JobReceiptRefWplanPlanNoMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (prdwiptrans.jrcno IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#JobReceiptRefWplanJobReceiptNoMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#JobReceiptRefWplanJobReceiptNoMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#JobReceiptRefWplanJobReceiptNoMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) )q1 GROUP BY ADMSITE_CODE, JRCCODE, LOTCODE, LOTNO, JRCNO, /*Start Bug Id : 111344*/ coalesce (LOTQTY, 0), /*End Bug Id : 111344*/ ITEMGROUP, item_desc, icode, OPERATION_SEQ, PROCESS, UOM

entity.sql_stmt: SELECT NULL requestid, row_number() over() UK, LOCCODE, INVLOCGRP_CODE, case when to_number('@ShowConsolidatedGroup@','9G999g999999999999d99')= 0 then GROUPNAME end item_group_name, CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowBarcode@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN barcode || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory1@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname1 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory2@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname2 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory3@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname3 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory4@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname4 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory5@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname5 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory6@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname6 END item_description, ICODE, SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) STOCK, SUM ( coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PRDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0)) PENDING_CONSUMPTION, SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) - SUM ( coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PRDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0)) PENDING_QTY FROM ( SELECT INVLOC.LOCCODE, INVLOCGRP_CODE, ( ( (INVGRP.LEV1GRPNAME || '-') || INVGRP.LEV2GRPNAME) || '-') || INVGRP.GRPNAME GROUPNAME, coalesce (BARCODE, I.ICODE) BARCODE, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, coalesce (QTY, 0) STOCK, 0 ORDIS_QTY, 0 PRDIS_QTY, 0 ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0 WASTAGE_QTY, 0 RETURN_QTY, INVSTOCK_ONHAND.ICODE ICODE FROM INVSTOCK_ONHAND INNER JOIN V_ITEM I ON (INVSTOCK_ONHAND.ICODE = I.ICODE) INNER JOIN INVLOC ON (INVSTOCK_ONHAND.LOCCODE = INVLOC.LOCCODE) INNER JOIN INVLOCGRP ON (INVLOCGRP_CODE = INVLOCGRP.CODE) INNER JOIN INVARTICLE ON (ARTICLECODE = INVARTICLE.CODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP ON (INVARTICLE.GRPCODE = INVGRP.GRPCODE) Where (I.CNAME1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.CNAME2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.CNAME3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.CNAME4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.CNAME5 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.CNAME6 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (coalesce (I.barcode, I.icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.partyname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( (i.LEV1GRPNAME = nullif('@Division@','') AND nullif('@Division@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.LEV2GRPNAME = nullif('@Section@','') AND nullif('@Section@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.GRPNAME = nullif('@Department@','') AND nullif('@Department@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@StockPointAll@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 AND coalesce (nullif('@StockPointGroupAll@',''), '-1') = '-1') OR ( coalesce (nullif('@StockPointGroupAll@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@StockPointAll@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 AND INVLOCGRP.NAME = nullif('@StockPointGroupAll@',''))) OR ( coalesce (nullif('@StockPointGroupAll@',''), '-1') = '-1' AND ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@StockPointAll@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND INVLOC.LOCCODE = to_number(nullif('@StockPointAll@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')))) UNION ALL SELECT LOCCODE, INVLOCGRP_CODE, ( ( (INVGRP.LEV1GRPNAME || '-') || INVGRP.LEV2GRPNAME) || '-') || INVGRP.GRPNAME GROUPNAME, coalesce (BARCODE, ICODE) BARCODE, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, 0 STOCK, coalesce (QTY, 0) ORDIS_QTY, coalesce (ISSUED_QTY, 0) PRDIS_QTY, coalesce (CANCEL_QTY, 0) + coalesce (ALTERNATE_CNL_QTY, 0) ORDCNLIS_QTY, coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0) WASTAGE_QTY, coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) RETURN_QTY, COMPONENT_ICODE ICODE FROM PRDJOBBOM INNER JOIN V_ITEM I ON (COMPONENT_ICODE = ICODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVLOC ON (ISSUE_LOCCODE = LOCCODE) INNER JOIN PRDJOBMAIN ON (PRDJOBMAIN.CODE = JOBCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVLOCGRP ON (INVLOCGRP_CODE = INVLOCGRP.CODE) INNER JOIN INVARTICLE ON (ARTICLECODE = INVARTICLE.CODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP ON (INVARTICLE.GRPCODE = INVGRP.GRPCODE) Where (I.CNAME1 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory1Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.CNAME2 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory2Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.CNAME3 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory3Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.CNAME4 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory4Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.CNAME5 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory5Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.CNAME6 IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemCategory6Multi#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (coalesce (I.barcode, I.icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (I.partyname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemVendorMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND PRDJOBMAIN.JOB_DATE <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( (i.LEV1GRPNAME = nullif('@Division@','') AND nullif('@Division@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.LEV2GRPNAME = nullif('@Section@','') AND nullif('@Section@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.GRPNAME = nullif('@Department@','') AND nullif('@Department@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND PRDJOBMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@StockPointAll@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 AND coalesce (nullif('@StockPointGroupAll@',''), '-1') = '-1') OR ( coalesce (nullif('@StockPointGroupAll@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@StockPointAll@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 AND INVLOCGRP.NAME = nullif('@StockPointGroupAll@',''))) OR ( coalesce (nullif('@StockPointGroupAll@',''), '-1') = '-1' AND ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@StockPointAll@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND INVLOC.LOCCODE = to_number(nullif('@StockPointAll@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')))))q1 GROUP BY LOCCODE, INVLOCGRP_CODE, ICODE, case when to_number('@ShowConsolidatedGroup@','9G999g999999999999d99') =0 then GROUPNAME end, CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowBarcode@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN barcode || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory1@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname1 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory2@','9G999g999999999999d99')= 1 THEN cname2 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory3@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname3 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory4@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname4 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory5@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname5 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory6@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname6 END HAVING ABS (SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0))) + ABS ( SUM ( coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PRDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0))) + ABS ( SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) - SUM ( coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PRDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0))) <> 0 AND ( coalesce ('@SelectOperator@', '-1') = '-1' OR ( ( coalesce ('@SelectOperator@', '-1') = '.=' AND ( SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) - SUM ( coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PRDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0))) = coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OperatorValue@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0)) OR ( coalesce ('@SelectOperator@', '-1') = '<>' AND ( SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) - SUM ( coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PRDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0))) <> coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OperatorValue@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0)) OR ( coalesce ('@SelectOperator@', '-1') = '>' AND ( SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) - SUM ( coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PRDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0))) > coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OperatorValue@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0)) OR ( coalesce ('@SelectOperator@', '-1') = '>=' AND ( SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) - SUM ( coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PRDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0))) >= coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OperatorValue@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0)) OR ( coalesce ('@SelectOperator@', '-1') = '<' AND ( SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) - SUM ( coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PRDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0))) < coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OperatorValue@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0)) OR ( coalesce ('@SelectOperator@', '-1') = '<=' AND ( SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) - SUM ( coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PRDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (ORDCNLIS_QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0))) <= coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OperatorValue@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), 0))))

coalesce ( lag (CLOSING) over (partition by Q_SITECODE, LOTNO order by KEYVAL), 0) end OPENING, MATERIAL_ISSUE, MATERIAL_RETURN, MATERIAL_WASTAGE, SERVICE_COST, IN_PRC_PRD, IN_PRC_CNS, FG_RCPT, SFG_RCPT, LOTCODE, CLOSING from ( select Q_SITECODE::text || TXN_DATE::timestamp , 'yyyymmdd' keyval, lag (Q_SITECODE::text || TXN_DATE) over (partition by Q_SITECODE order by Q_SITECODE) parcode, by SITENAME, Q_SITECODE, LOTNO, LOTCODE order by case when '@ReportBasisMD@' = 'D' then DATE_TXN_DATE end, case when '@ReportBasisMD@' = 'M' then case when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'APR' then 1 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'MAY' then 2 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'JUN' then 3 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'JUL' then 4 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'AUG' then 5 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'SEP' then 6 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'OCT' then 7 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'NOV' then 8 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'DEC' then 9 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'JAN' then 10 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'FEB' then 11 when SUBSTR (TXN_DATE, 1, 3) = 'MAR' then 12 end end) CLOSING from ( select SITENAME, Q_SITECODE, LOTNO, TXN_DATE, DATE_TXN_DATE, SUM (coalesce (OPENING, 0)) (OPENING, 0) + coalesce (MATERIAL_ISSUE, 0) + coalesce (MATERIAL_RETURN, 0) + coalesce (MATERIAL_WASTAGE, 0) + coalesce (SERVICE_COST, 0) + coalesce (IN_PRC_PRD, 0) + coalesce (IN_PRC_CNS, 0) + coalesce (FG_RCPT, 0) + coalesce (SFG_RCPT, 0)) CLOSING from ( select SITENAME, SITECODE Q_SITECODE, LOTNO, case '@ReportBasisMD@' when 'D' then TO_CHAR (TXN_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') when 'M' then TO_CHAR (TXN_DATE, 'MON-YY') end TXN_DATE, case '@ReportBasisMD@' when 'D' then TO_CHAR (TXN_DATE, 'YYMMDD') when 'M' then TO_CHAR (TXN_DATE, 'YYMM') end DATE_TXN_DATE, 0 OPENING, SUM (coalesce (ISS_COM_TXN, 0)) MATERIAL_ISSUE, SUM (coalesce (RET_COM_TXN, 0)) MATERIAL_RETURN, SUM (coalesce (WAS_COM_TXN, 0)) MATERIAL_WASTAGE, SUM (coalesce (REC_SER_TXN, 0)) SERVICE_COST, SUM (coalesce (REC_PSD_TXN, 0)) + (ISS_PSD_TXN, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (CNS_REC_SER_TXN, 0)) IN_PRC_CNS, SUM (coalesce (FG_REC_SER_TXN, 0)) FG_RCPT, SUM (coalesce (WCL_PSD_TXN, 0)) SFG_RCPT, LOTCODE from ( select case when coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 then 'ALL' else NAME end SITENAME, M.ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, case when to_number(nullif('@LotPlanWiseBreak@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then LOTNO end LOTNO, case when to_number(nullif('@LotPlanWiseBreak@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then LM.CODE end LOTCODE, TXN_DATE, SUM ( case when TXN_TYPE = 'ISS' then case when ITEM_TYPE = 'COM' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end end) ISS_COM_TXN, SUM ( case when TXN_TYPE = 'RET' then case when ITEM_TYPE = 'COM' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end end) RET_COM_TXN, SUM ( case when TXN_TYPE = 'WAS' then case when ITEM_TYPE = 'COM' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end end) WAS_COM_TXN, SUM ( case when TXN_TYPE = 'REC' then case when ITEM_TYPE = 'SER' then coalesce (SRV_AMOUNT, 0) end end) REC_SER_TXN, SUM ( case when TXN_TYPE = 'REC' then case when ITEM_TYPE = 'PSD' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end end) REC_PSD_TXN, SUM ( case when TXN_TYPE = 'RET' then case when ITEM_TYPE = 'PSD' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end end) RET_PSD_TXN, SUM ( case when TXN_TYPE = 'ISS' then case when ITEM_TYPE = 'ASS' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end end) ISS_ASS_TXN, SUM ( case when = 'REC' then case when ITEM_TYPE = 'ASS' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end end end) REC_ASS_TXN, SUM ( case when TXN_TYPE = 'RET' then case when ITEM_TYPE = 'ASS' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end end) (AMOUNT, 0) end end) REC_PSD_TXN, SUM ( case when TXN_TYPE = 'RET' then case when ITEM_TYPE = 'PSD' then coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) end end) RET_PSD_TXN, SUM ( case when TXN_TYPE = 'ISS' then case when ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1 then 'ALL' else NAME end SITENAME, M.ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, case when to_number(nullif('@LotPlanWiseBreak@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 then LOTNO end (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) and TXN_DATE < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (lm.lotno in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) or coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 and M.ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99')) or coalesce
