entity.sql_stmt: SELECT null requestid, row_number() over() uk, GROUPCODE item_group_code, GROUPNAME item_group_name, CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowBarcode@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN barcode || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory1@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname1 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory2@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname2 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory3@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname3 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory4@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname4 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory5@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname5 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory6@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname6 END item_description, ITEM_CODE icode, SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) stock_in_hand, SUM (coalesce (PENDING_CONSUMPTION, 0)) PENDING_CONSUMPTION, SUM (coalesce (PENDING_REQ, 0)) PENDING_REQ, SUM (coalesce (PENDING_PURORD, 0)) PENDING_PURORD, SUM (coalesce (BALANCE_QTY, 0)) BALANCE_QTY FROM ( SELECT GROUPCODE, GROUPNAME, ITEM_CODE, BARCODE, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, SUM (coalesce (STOCK, 0)) STOCK, SUM (coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0)) PENDING_CONSUMPTION, SUM (coalesce (PENDING_REQ, 0)) PENDING_REQ, SUM (coalesce (PENDING_PURORD, 0)) PENDING_PURORD, SUM ( coalesce (STOCK, 0) + coalesce (PENDING_PURORD, 0) - coalesce (ORDIS_QTY, 0) - coalesce (PENDING_REQ, 0)) BALANCE_QTY, DESC3 FROM ( SELECT INVGRP.GRPCODE GROUPCODE, ( ( (INVGRP.LEV1GRPNAME || '-') || INVGRP.LEV2GRPNAME) || '-') || INVGRP.GRPNAME GROUPNAME, I.ICODE ITEM_CODE, coalesce (BARCODE, I.ICODE) BARCODE, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, coalesce (QTY, 0) STOCK, 0 ORDIS_QTY, 0 PENDING_REQ, 0 PENDING_PURORD, INVSTOCK_ONHAND.ICODE, DESC3 FROM INVSTOCK_ONHAND INNER JOIN V_ITEM I ON (INVSTOCK_ONHAND.ICODE = I.ICODE) INNER JOIN INVLOC ON (INVSTOCK_ONHAND.LOCCODE = INVLOC.LOCCODE) INNER JOIN INVLOCGRP ON (INVLOCGRP_CODE = INVLOCGRP.CODE) INNER JOIN INVARTICLE ON (ARTICLECODE = INVARTICLE.CODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP ON (INVARTICLE.GRPCODE = INVGRP.GRPCODE) Where INVLOC.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( (i.LEV1GRPNAME = nullif('@Division@','') AND nullif('@Division@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.LEV2GRPNAME = nullif('@Section@','') AND nullif('@Section@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.GRPNAME = nullif('@Department@','') AND nullif('@Department@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND INVLOC.LOCTYPE <> 'L' AND ( coalesce ('@StockPointGroupAll@', '-1') = '-1' OR ( coalesce ('@StockPointGroupAll@', '-1') <> '-1' AND INVLOCGRP.NAME = '@StockPointGroupAll@')) UNION ALL SELECT INVGRP.GRPCODE GROUPCODE, ( ( (INVGRP.LEV1GRPNAME || '-') || INVGRP.LEV2GRPNAME) || '-') || INVGRP.GRPNAME GROUPNAME, ICODE, coalesce (BARCODE, ICODE) BARCODE, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, 0 STOCK, ( ( (coalesce (QTY, 0) + coalesce (RETURN_QTY, 0)) - (coalesce (CANCEL_QTY, 0) + coalesce (ALTERNATE_CNL_QTY, 0))) - coalesce (ISSUED_QTY, 0)) + coalesce (WASTAGE_QTY, 0) ORDIS_QTY, 0 PENDING_REQ, 0 PENDING_PURORD, COMPONENT_ICODE ICODE, DESC3 DESC3 FROM PRDJOBBOM INNER JOIN V_ITEM I ON (COMPONENT_ICODE = ICODE) INNER JOIN PRDJOBMAIN ON (PRDJOBMAIN.CODE = JOBCODE) INNER JOIN FINSL ON (FINSL.SLCODE = PCODE) INNER JOIN INVARTICLE ON (ARTICLECODE = INVARTICLE.CODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP ON (INVARTICLE.GRPCODE = INVGRP.GRPCODE) Where PRDJOBMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND PRDJOBMAIN.JOB_DATE <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( (i.LEV1GRPNAME = nullif('@Division@','') AND nullif('@Division@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.LEV2GRPNAME = nullif('@Section@','') AND nullif('@Section@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.GRPNAME = nullif('@Department@','') AND nullif('@Department@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1') UNION ALL SELECT INVGRP.GRPCODE GROUPCODE, ( ( (INVGRP.LEV1GRPNAME || '-') || INVGRP.LEV2GRPNAME) || '-') || INVGRP.GRPNAME GROUPNAME, I.ICODE, coalesce (BARCODE, I.ICODE) BARCODE, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, 0 STOCK, 0 ORDIS_QTY, coalesce (RQQTY, 0) - coalesce (ISQTY, 0) PENDING_REQ, 0 PENDING_PURORD, INVREQDET.ICODE, DESC3 DESC3 FROM INVREQDET INNER JOIN INVREQMAIN ON (INVREQDET.REQCODE = INVREQMAIN.REQCODE) INNER JOIN V_ITEM I ON (I.ICODE = INVREQDET.ICODE) INNER JOIN INVARTICLE ON (ARTICLECODE = CODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP ON (INVARTICLE.GRPCODE = INVGRP.GRPCODE) Where INVREQMAIN.REQDT <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( (i.LEV1GRPNAME = nullif('@Division@','') AND nullif('@Division@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.LEV2GRPNAME = nullif('@Section@','') AND nullif('@Section@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.GRPNAME = nullif('@Department@','') AND nullif('@Department@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1') UNION ALL SELECT INVGRP.GRPCODE GROUPCODE, ( ( (INVGRP.LEV1GRPNAME || '-') || INVGRP.LEV2GRPNAME) || '-') || INVGRP.GRPNAME GROUPNAME, I.ICODE, coalesce (BARCODE, I.ICODE) BARCODE, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, 0 STOCK, 0 ORDIS_QTY, 0 PENDING_REQ, (coalesce (ORDQTY, 0) - coalesce (RCQTY, 0)) - coalesce (CNLQTY, 0) PENDING_PURORD, PURORDDET.ICODE ICODE, DESC3 DESC3 FROM PURORDDET INNER JOIN V_ITEM I ON (PURORDDET.ICODE = I.ICODE) INNER JOIN PURORDMAIN ON (PURORDDET.ORDCODE = PURORDMAIN.ORDCODE) INNER JOIN INVARTICLE ON (ARTICLECODE = INVARTICLE.CODE) INNER JOIN INVGRP ON (INVARTICLE.GRPCODE = INVGRP.GRPCODE) Where PURORDMAIN.ORDDT <= to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PURORDMAIN.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( (i.LEV1GRPNAME = nullif('@Division@','') AND nullif('@Division@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.LEV2GRPNAME = nullif('@Section@','') AND nullif('@Section@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.GRPNAME = nullif('@Department@','') AND nullif('@Department@','') <> '-1') OR coalesce (nullif('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1'))q1 GROUP BY GROUPCODE, GROUPNAME, ITEM_CODE, BARCODE, CNAME1, CNAME2, CNAME3, CNAME4, CNAME5, CNAME6, DESC3)q2 WHERE ( (coalesce ('@ShowBalanceAPN@', '-1') = 'P' AND BALANCE_QTY >= 0) OR (coalesce ('@ShowBalanceAPN@', '-1') = 'N' AND BALANCE_QTY < 0) OR (coalesce ('@ShowBalanceAPN@', '-1') = '-1')) GROUP BY GROUPCODE, GROUPNAME, ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowBarcode@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN barcode || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory1@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname1 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory2@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname2 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory3@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname3 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory4@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname4 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory5@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname5 || ' ' END || CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory6@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN cname6 END

entity.object_description: TBD
entity.sql_stmt: /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 87465 Ripan Total Receive Qty and No. of Item Received is showing wrong */ SELECT NULL REQUESTID, row_number() over () UK, lotno ,schedule_date ,plan_mode ,Route_Group ,lot_remarks ,no_of_assembly_item ,Total_Assembly_Qty ,joborder_prcode jobord_prcode ,operation_seq ,JOB_DATE ,JOBNO ,jober ,ref_no ,ref_dt ,JOB_TYPE ,joborder_remarks ,no_of_item_order ,item_order_qty ,total_cancell_qty ,Cancellation_Details ,jobrc_prcode ,jrcno ,jrc_date ,refno ,ref_date ,docno ,docdt ,WHETHER_CHARGEABLE ,service_invoice_no ,service_invoice_date ,no_of_item_receive ,total_receive ,lotcode ,jobcode ,JRCCODE ,PCODE ,ADMSITE_CODE FROM (SELECT lotno ,schedule_date ,plan_mode ,Route_Group ,lot.REMARKS lot_remarks ,no_of_assembly_item ,Total_Assembly_Qty ,joborder_prcode ,operation_seq ,JOB_DATE ,JOBNO ,jober ,ref_no ,ref_dt ,JOB_TYPE ,joborder_remarks ,no_of_item_order ,item_order_qty ,total_cancell_qty ,Cancellation_Details ,jobrc_prcode ,jrcno ,jrc_date ,refno ,ref_date ,docno ,docdt ,WHETHER_CHARGEABLE ,service_invoice_no ,service_invoice_date ,no_of_item_receive ,total_receive ,LOT.lotcode ,jobcode ,JRCCODE ,PCODE ,lot.ADMSITE_CODE FROM ( SELECT lm.lotno ,lm.schedule_date ,CASE lm.PLAN_MODE WHEN 'M' THEN 'Master' WHEN 'A' THEN 'Adhoc' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Transfer Order' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Sales Order' END plan_mode ,rg.GRPNAME Route_Group ,lm.REMARKS ,ld.no_of_assembly_item ,ld.Total_Assembly_Qty ,ld.lotcode ,lm.admsite_code FROM prdlotmain lm ,prdroutegrp rg ,( SELECT lotcode ,count(assembly_icode) no_of_assembly_item ,sum(qty) Total_Assembly_Qty FROM prdlotdet /*1*/WHERE coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'WP' GROUP BY lotcode ) ld WHERE /*1*/coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'WP' AND lm.routegrp_code = rg.code AND lm.code = ld.lotcode AND lm.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND ( ( ( coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 AND lm.admsite_code = NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT ) OR coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) = - 1 ) ) AND lm.schedule_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') ) lot LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jord.prcode joborder_prcode ,operation_seq ,pcode ,jord.jobcode ,admsite_code ,JOB_DATE ,JOBNO ,jober ,ref_no ,ref_dt ,JOB_TYPE ,remarks joborder_remarks ,no_of_item_order ,item_order_qty ,jord.lotcode joborder_lotcode ,total_cancell_qty ,Cancellation_Details ,jrc.prcode jobrc_prcode ,jrcno ,jrccode ,jrc_date ,refno ,ref_date ,docno ,docdt ,whether_chargeable ,service_invoice_no ,service_invoice_date ,no_of_item_receive ,total_receive FROM ( SELECT jm.prcode ,jd.operation_seq ,jm.pcode ,JM.CODE jobcode ,jm.admsite_code ,jm.JOB_DATE ,jm.JOBNO ,sl.slname jober ,jm.ref_no ,jm.ref_dt ,CASE jm.jobtype WHEN 'LS' THEN 'LotBased Standard' WHEN 'LN' THEN 'LotBased NonStandard' WHEN 'AS' THEN 'Adhoc New' WHEN 'AN' THEN 'Adhoc Reprocess' END JOB_TYPE ,jm.remarks ,no_of_item_order ,item_order_qty ,jd.lotcode ,coalesce(total_cancell_qty, 0) total_cancell_qty ,Cancellation_Details FROM prdjobmain jm ,finsl sl ,( SELECT jobcode ,d.lotcode ,d.operation_seq ,count(assembly_icode) no_of_item_order ,sum(qty) item_order_qty ,sum(total_cancell_qty) total_cancell_qty ,max(Cancellation_Details) Cancellation_Details FROM prdjobdet d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prdjobdet_code ,lotcode ,sum(qty) total_cancell_qty FROM prdjobcnldet /*1*/WHERE coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'WP' GROUP BY prdjobdet_code ,lotcode ) jc ON ( d.code = jc.prdjobdet_code AND d.lotcode = jc.lotcode ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.prdjobdet_code ,d.lotcode ,string_agg('CNL No. : ' || m.cnlno || '| Date : ' || m.cnldt || '| Ref Doc No. : ' || DOCNO || '| CNL Qty : ' || cast(d.qty AS TEXT), ', ' ORDER BY d.prdjobdet_code) cancellation_details FROM prdjobcnlmain m ,prdjobcnldet d WHERE m.code = d.cnlcode /*1*/AND coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'WP' GROUP BY d.prdjobdet_code ,d.lotcode ) jcd ON ( d.code = jcd.prdjobdet_code AND d.lotcode = jcd.lotcode ) GROUP BY d.jobcode ,d.lotcode ,d.operation_seq ) jd WHERE jm.pcode = sl.slcode AND jm.code = jd.jobcode AND jd.lotcode IN ( SELECT lm.code FROM prdlotmain lm WHERE lm.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND ( ( ( coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 AND lm.admsite_code = NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT ) OR coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) = - 1 ) ) AND lm.schedule_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') ) ) jord LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prcode ,jrcno ,m.code jrccode ,jrc_date ,refno ,ref_date ,m.docno ,m.docdt ,CASE WHETHER_CHARGEABLE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' END WHETHER_CHARGEABLE ,srv.scheme_docno service_invoice_no ,srv.srvdt service_invoice_date ,no_of_item_receive ,total_receive ,jobcode ,lotcode /*Against bug 87465*/ FROM prdjrcmain m LEFT JOIN pursrvmain srv ON (m.srvcode = srv.srvcode) JOIN ( SELECT a.jrccode ,a.jobcode ,b.lotcode /*Against bug 87465*/ ,count(a.assembly_icode) no_of_item_receive ,sum(a.qty) total_receive FROM prdjrcdet a ,prdjobdet b WHERE /*1*/ coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'WP' AND a.jobdet_code = b.code AND b.lotcode IN ( SELECT lm.code FROM prdlotmain lm WHERE lm.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND ( ( ( coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 AND lm.admsite_code = NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT ) OR coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) = - 1 ) ) AND lm.schedule_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') ) GROUP BY a.jrccode ,a.jobcode ,b.lotcode /*Against bug 87465*/ ) d ON (m.code = d.jrccode) ) jrc ON ( jord.jobcode = jrc.jobcode AND jord.prcode = jrc.prcode and jord.lotcode = jrc.lotcode /*Against bug 87465*/ ) ) t1 ON (lot.lotcode = t1.joborder_lotcode) UNION ALL SELECT coalesce(lotno, 'Not Applicable') lotno ,schedule_date ,plan_mode ,Route_Group ,lot.REMARKS lot_remarks ,no_of_assembly_item ,Total_Assembly_Qty ,joborder_prcode ,operation_seq ,JOB_DATE ,JOBNO ,jober ,ref_no ,ref_dt ,JOB_TYPE ,joborder_remarks ,no_of_item_order ,item_order_qty ,total_cancell_qty ,Cancellation_Details ,jobrc_prcode ,jrcno ,jrc_date ,refno ,ref_date ,docno ,docdt ,WHETHER_CHARGEABLE ,service_invoice_no ,service_invoice_date ,no_of_item_receive ,total_receive ,LOT.lotcode ,jobcode ,JRCCODE ,PCODE ,ADMSITE_CODE FROM ( SELECT lm.lotno ,lm.schedule_date ,CASE lm.PLAN_MODE WHEN 'M' THEN 'Master' WHEN 'A' THEN 'Adhoc' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Transfer Order' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Sales Order' END plan_mode ,rg.GRPNAME Route_Group ,lm.REMARKS ,ld.no_of_assembly_item ,ld.Total_Assembly_Qty ,ld.lotcode FROM prdlotmain lm ,prdroutegrp rg ,( SELECT lotcode ,count(assembly_icode) no_of_assembly_item ,sum(qty) Total_Assembly_Qty FROM prdlotdet /*2*/ WHERE coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JO' GROUP BY lotcode ) ld WHERE lm.routegrp_code = rg.code AND lm.code = ld.lotcode AND lm.code IN ( SELECT d.lotcode FROM prdjobdet d ,prdjobmain m ,finsl sl WHERE /*2*/ coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JO' AND d.jobcode = m.code AND m.pcode = sl.slcode AND m.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND ( ( ( coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 AND m.admsite_code = NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT ) OR coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) = - 1 ) ) AND (sl.SLNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND m.job_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') ) ) lot RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT jord.prcode joborder_prcode ,operation_seq ,pcode ,jord.jobcode ,admsite_code ,JOB_DATE ,JOBNO ,jober ,ref_no ,ref_dt ,JOB_TYPE ,remarks joborder_remarks ,no_of_item_order ,item_order_qty ,jord.lotcode joborder_lotcode ,total_cancell_qty ,Cancellation_Details ,jrc.prcode jobrc_prcode ,jrcno ,jrccode ,jrc_date ,refno ,ref_date ,docno ,docdt ,whether_chargeable ,service_invoice_no ,service_invoice_date ,no_of_item_receive ,total_receive FROM ( SELECT jm.prcode ,jd.operation_seq ,jm.pcode ,JM.CODE jobcode ,jm.admsite_code ,jm.JOB_DATE ,jm.JOBNO ,sl.slname jober ,jm.ref_no ,jm.ref_dt ,CASE jm.jobtype WHEN 'LS' THEN 'LotBased Standard' WHEN 'LN' THEN 'LotBased NonStandard' WHEN 'AS' THEN 'Adhoc New' WHEN 'AN' THEN 'Adhoc Reprocess' END JOB_TYPE ,jm.remarks ,no_of_item_order ,item_order_qty ,jd.lotcode ,coalesce(total_cancell_qty, 0) total_cancell_qty ,Cancellation_Details FROM prdjobmain jm ,finsl sl ,( SELECT jobcode ,d.lotcode ,d.operation_seq ,count(assembly_icode) no_of_item_order ,sum(qty) item_order_qty ,sum(total_cancell_qty) total_cancell_qty ,max(Cancellation_Details) Cancellation_Details FROM prdjobdet d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prdjobdet_code ,lotcode ,sum(qty) total_cancell_qty FROM prdjobcnldet /*2*/WHERE coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JO' GROUP BY prdjobdet_code ,lotcode ) jc ON ( d.code = jc.prdjobdet_code AND d.lotcode = jc.lotcode ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.prdjobdet_code ,d.lotcode ,STRING_AGG( 'CNL No. : ' || m.cnlno || ' | Date : ' || TO_CHAR(m.cnldt, 'DD-MM-YYYY') || ' | Ref Doc No. : ' || DOCNO::varchar || ' | CNL Qty : ' || d.qty::varchar, ', ' ORDER BY d.prdjobdet_code ) AS cancellation_details FROM prdjobcnlmain m ,prdjobcnldet d WHERE /*2*/ coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JO' AND m.code = d.cnlcode GROUP BY d.prdjobdet_code ,d.lotcode ) jcd ON ( d.code = jcd.prdjobdet_code AND d.lotcode = jcd.lotcode ) GROUP BY d.jobcode ,d.lotcode ,d.operation_seq ) jd WHERE /*2*/ coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JO' AND jm.pcode = sl.slcode AND jm.code = jd.jobcode AND jm.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND ( ( ( coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 AND jm.admsite_code = NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT ) OR coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) = - 1 ) ) AND (sl.SLNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND jm.job_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') ) jord LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prcode ,jrcno ,m.code jrccode ,jrc_date ,refno ,ref_date ,m.docno ,m.docdt ,CASE WHETHER_CHARGEABLE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' END WHETHER_CHARGEABLE ,srv.scheme_docno service_invoice_no ,srv.srvdt service_invoice_date ,no_of_item_receive ,total_receive ,jobcode FROM prdjrcmain m LEFT JOIN pursrvmain srv ON (m.srvcode = srv.srvcode) JOIN ( SELECT a.jrccode ,a.jobcode ,count(a.assembly_icode) no_of_item_receive ,sum(a.qty) total_receive FROM prdjrcdet a WHERE /*2*/ coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JO' AND a.jobcode IN ( SELECT code FROM prdjobmain jm ,finsl sl WHERE /*2*/ coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JO' AND jm.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND jm.pcode = sl.slcode AND (sl.SLNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( ( ( coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 AND jm.admsite_code = NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT ) OR coalesce(NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, - 1) = - 1 ) ) AND jm.job_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') ) GROUP BY a.jrccode ,a.jobcode ) d ON (m.code = d.jrccode) WHERE /*2*/ coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JO' ) jrc ON ( jord.jobcode = jrc.jobcode AND jord.prcode = jrc.prcode ) ) t1 ON (lot.lotcode = t1.joborder_lotcode) UNION ALL SELECT COALESCE (lotno, 'Not Applicable') lotno, schedule_date, plan_mode, Route_Group, lot.REMARKS lot_remarks, no_of_assembly_item, Total_Assembly_Qty, joborder_prcode, operation_seq, JOB_DATE, JOBNO, jober, ref_no, ref_dt, JOB_TYPE, joborder_remarks, no_of_item_order, item_order_qty, total_cancell_qty, Cancellation_Details, jobrc_prcode, jrcno, jrc_date, refno, ref_date, docno, docdt, WHETHER_CHARGEABLE, service_invoice_no, service_invoice_date, no_of_item_receive, total_receive, LOT.lotcode, jobcode, JRCCODE, PCODE, ADMSITE_CODE FROM (SELECT lm.lotno, lm.schedule_date, CASE lm.PLAN_MODE WHEN 'M' THEN 'Master' WHEN 'A' THEN 'Adhoc' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Transfer Order' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Sales Order' END plan_mode, rg.GRPNAME Route_Group, lm.REMARKS, ld.no_of_assembly_item, ld.Total_Assembly_Qty, ld.lotcode FROM prdlotmain lm, prdroutegrp rg, ( SELECT lotcode, COUNT (assembly_icode) no_of_assembly_item, SUM (qty) Total_Assembly_Qty FROM prdlotdet /*3*/WHERE coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JR' GROUP BY lotcode) ld WHERE /*3*/coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JR' AND lm.routegrp_code = rg.code AND lm.code = ld.lotcode AND lm.code IN (SELECT d.lotcode FROM prdjrcdet d, prdjrcmain m, finsl sl WHERE /*3*/coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JR' AND d.jrccode = m.code AND m.pcode = sl.slcode AND m.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND ( ( ( COALESCE (NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, -1) <> -1 AND m.admsite_code = NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT) OR COALESCE (NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, -1) = -1)) AND (sl.SLNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND m.jrc_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD'))) lot RIGHT JOIN (SELECT jord.prcode joborder_prcode, operation_seq, pcode, jord.jobcode, jrc.admsite_code, JOB_DATE, JOBNO, jober, ref_no, ref_dt, JOB_TYPE, remarks joborder_remarks, no_of_item_order, item_order_qty, jord.lotcode joborder_lotcode, total_cancell_qty, Cancellation_Details, jrc.prcode jobrc_prcode, jrcno, jrccode, jrc_date, refno, ref_date, docno, docdt, whether_chargeable, service_invoice_no, service_invoice_date, no_of_item_receive, total_receive FROM (SELECT jm.prcode, jd.operation_seq, jm.pcode, JM.CODE jobcode, jm.admsite_code, jm.JOB_DATE, jm.JOBNO, sl.slname jober, jm.ref_no, jm.ref_dt, CASE jm.jobtype WHEN 'LS' THEN 'LotBased Standard' WHEN 'LN' THEN 'LotBased NonStandard' WHEN 'AS' THEN 'Adhoc New' WHEN 'AN' THEN 'Adhoc Reprocess' END JOB_TYPE, jm.remarks, no_of_item_order, item_order_qty, jd.lotcode, COALESCE (total_cancell_qty, 0) total_cancell_qty, Cancellation_Details FROM prdjobmain jm, finsl sl, ( SELECT jobcode, d.lotcode, d.operation_seq, COUNT (assembly_icode) no_of_item_order, SUM (qty) item_order_qty, SUM (total_cancell_qty) total_cancell_qty, MAX (Cancellation_Details) Cancellation_Details FROM prdjobdet d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prdjobdet_code, lotcode, SUM (qty) total_cancell_qty FROM prdjobcnldet /*3*/WHERE coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JR' GROUP BY prdjobdet_code, lotcode) jc ON (d.code = jc.prdjobdet_code AND d.lotcode = jc.lotcode) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.prdjobdet_code, d.lotcode, string_agg ( 'CNL No. : ' || m.cnlno || '| Date : ' || to_char(m.cnldt,'DD-MM-YYYY') || '| Ref Doc No. : ' || DOCNO::VARCHAR || '| CNL Qty : ' || d.qty::VARCHAR, ', ' ORDER BY d.prdjobdet_code) cancellation_details FROM prdjobcnlmain m, prdjobcnldet d WHERE /*3*/coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JR' AND m.code = d.cnlcode GROUP BY d.prdjobdet_code, d.lotcode) jcd ON (d.code = jcd.prdjobdet_code AND d.lotcode = jcd.lotcode) WHERE coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JR' GROUP BY d.jobcode, d.lotcode, d.operation_seq) jd WHERE jm.pcode = sl.slcode AND jm.code = jd.jobcode AND jm.code IN (SELECT d.jobcode FROM prdjrcdet d, prdjrcmain m, finsl sl WHERE /*3*/coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JR' AND d.jrccode = m.code AND m.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND m.pcode = sl.slcode AND ( ( ( COALESCE (NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, -1) <> -1 AND m.admsite_code = NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT) OR COALESCE (NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, -1) = -1)) AND (sl.SLNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND m.jrc_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD'))) jord RIGHT JOIN (SELECT prcode, jrcno, m.code jrccode, jrc_date, refno, ref_date, m.docno, m.docdt, CASE WHETHER_CHARGEABLE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' END WHETHER_CHARGEABLE, srv.scheme_docno service_invoice_no, srv.srvdt service_invoice_date, no_of_item_receive, total_receive, jobcode, m.admsite_code, lotcode FROM prdjrcmain m LEFT JOIN pursrvmain srv ON (m.srvcode = srv.srvcode) JOIN finsl sl ON (m.pcode = sl.slcode) JOIN ( SELECT a.jrccode, a.jobcode ,a.lotcode, /*Against bug 87465*/ COUNT (a.assembly_icode) no_of_item_receive, SUM (a.qty) total_receive FROM prdjrcdet a /*3*/ WHERE coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JR' GROUP BY a.jrccode, a.jobcode,a.lotcode /*Against bug 87465*/ ) d ON (m.code = d.jrccode) WHERE /*3*/coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JR' AND m.admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND ( ( ( COALESCE (NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, -1) <> -1 AND m.admsite_code = NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT) OR COALESCE (NULLIF('@OrgSiteName@','')::INT, -1) = -1)) AND (sl.SLNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#CustomerVendorNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND m.jrc_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) jrc ON (jord.jobcode = jrc.jobcode AND jord.prcode = jrc.prcode and jord.lotcode =jrc.lotcode /*Against bug 87465*/ ) WHERE /*3*/coalesce(NULLIF('@DateBasis@',''), 'WP') = 'JR' ) t1 ON (lot.lotcode = t1.joborder_lotcode) )

entity.object_description: TBD
entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 16-01-2023 14:58:16 (QP5 v5.294) */ SELECT NULL requestid, row_number() over() UK, ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, COMPONENT_ICODE, PRCODE, LOTCODE, ITEM COMPONENT_ITEM_DESCRIPTION, OPERATION_SEQ, SUB_ASSEMBLY_ITEM_CODE, sub_assembly_item, ass_syb, SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE= 'Component' then ( coalesce (ISS_COM, 0) + coalesce (RET_COM, 0) + coalesce (WAS_COM, 0) + coalesce (REC_COM, 0)) else coalesce (PSD_QTY, 0)end) WIP_QTY, SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE= 'Component' then coalesce (COMP_AMOUNT, 0) else coalesce (PEND_AMOUNT, 0) end) AMOUNT, ROUND ( case when SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE = 'Component' then ( coalesce (ISS_COM, 0) + coalesce (RET_COM, 0) + coalesce (WAS_COM, 0) + coalesce (REC_COM, 0)) else coalesce (PSD_QTY, 0) end) = 0 then 0 else SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE = 'Component' then coalesce (COMP_AMOUNT, 0) else coalesce (PEND_AMOUNT, 0) end) / SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE = 'Component' then ( coalesce (ISS_COM, 0) + coalesce (RET_COM, 0) + coalesce (WAS_COM, 0) + coalesce (REC_COM, 0)) else coalesce (PSD_QTY, 0) end) end, 2) AVG_RATE, ITEM_TYPE, /*Start Changes Feature 107045 batch serial*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE /*End Changes Feature 107045 batch serial*/ FROM ( SELECT TR.ADMSITE_CODE, COMPONENT_ICODE, PRCODE, coalesce (LOTNO, 'ADHOC') LOTNO, MAIN.CODE LOTCODE, OPERATION_SEQ, concat(CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowBarcode@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(coalesce (BARCODE, I.ICODE),' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory1@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(CNAME1,' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory2@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(CNAME2,' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory3@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(CNAME3,' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory4@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(CNAME4,' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory5@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(CNAME5,' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory6@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN CNAME6 END) ITEM, COM_SAITEM_CODE SUB_ASSEMBLY_ITEM_CODE, SAINAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_ITEM, NULL ASS_SYB, case when TXN_TYPE = 'ISS' then coalesce (TXN_QTY, 0) end ISS_COM, case when TXN_TYPE = 'RET' then coalesce (TXN_QTY, 0) end RET_COM, case when TXN_TYPE = 'WAS' then coalesce (TXN_QTY, 0) end WAS_COM, case when TXN_TYPE = 'REC' then coalesce (TXN_QTY, 0) end REC_COM, 0 PSD_QTY, 'Component' ITEM_TYPE, coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) COMP_AMOUNT, 0 PEND_AMOUNT, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE FROM PRDWIPTRANS TR LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDLOTMAIN MAIN ON (LOTCODE = MAIN.CODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (COMPONENT_ICODE = I.ICODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE ON (TR.ADMSITE_CODE = ADMSITE.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRD_SAITEM SA ON (COM_SAITEM_CODE = SA.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVBATCH_SERIAL B ON (INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = B.CODE) Where TR.TXN_DATE <= TO_DATE ('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TXN_TYPE IN ('ISS', 'RET', 'WAS', 'REC') AND ITEM_TYPE = 'COM' AND '@WIPItemType@' IN ('-1', 'C') AND TR.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( to_number(nullif('@ShowClosedLot@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 OR ( to_number(nullif('@ShowClosedLot@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND coalesce (MAIN.IS_CLOSED, 'N') <> 'Y')) AND ( ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND TR.ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND ( ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Process@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND TR.prcode = to_number(nullif('@Process@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Process@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND (main.lotno IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (sa.sainame IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubAssemblyItemItemNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubAssemblyItemItemNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubAssemblyItemItemNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( to_number(nullif('@ConsiderAdhocJobOrder@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 OR ( to_number(nullif('@ConsiderAdhocJobOrder@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND TR.LOTCODE IS NOT NULL)) UNION ALL SELECT TR.ADMSITE_CODE, COMPONENT_ICODE, PRCODE, coalesce (LOTNO, 'ADHOC') LOTNO, MAIN.CODE LOTCODE, OPERATION_SEQ OPERATION_SEQ, concat(CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowBarcode@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(coalesce (BARCODE, I.ICODE),' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory1@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(CNAME1,' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory2@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(CNAME2,' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory3@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(CNAME3,' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory4@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(CNAME4,' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory5@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN concat(CNAME5,' ') END ,CASE WHEN (to_number('@ShowCategory6@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1) THEN CNAME6 END) ITEM, COM_SAITEM_CODE SUB_ASSEMBLY_ITEM_CODE, SAINAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_ITEM, NULL ASS_SYB, 0 ISS_COM, 0 RET_COM, 0 WAS_COM, 0 REC_COM, coalesce (TXN_QTY, 0) PSD_QTY, 'In-Process' ITEM_TYPE, 0, coalesce (AMOUNT, 0) PEND_AMOUNT, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE FROM PRDWIPTRANS TR LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDLOTMAIN MAIN ON (LOTCODE = MAIN.CODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON (COMPONENT_ICODE = I.ICODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE ON (TR.ADMSITE_CODE = ADMSITE.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRD_SAITEM SA ON (COM_SAITEM_CODE = SA.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVBATCH_SERIAL B ON (INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = B.CODE) Where ITEM_TYPE IN ('PSD', 'ASS') AND TR.TXN_DATE <= TO_DATE ('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND '@WIPItemType@' IN ('-1', 'P') AND TR.ADMOU_CODE = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ( to_number(nullif('@ShowClosedLot@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 OR ( to_number(nullif('@ShowClosedLot@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND coalesce (MAIN.IS_CLOSED, 'N') <> 'Y')) AND ( ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND TR.ADMSITE_CODE = to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR coalesce (to_number(nullif('@OrgSiteName@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND ( ( coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Process@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) <> -1 AND TR.prcode = to_number(nullif('@Process@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99')) OR coalesce (to_number(nullif('@Process@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'), -1) = -1) AND (main.lotno IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (sa.sainame IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubAssemblyItemItemNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#SubAssemblyItemItemNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubAssemblyItemItemNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( to_number(nullif('@ConsiderAdhocJobOrder@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 OR ( to_number(nullif('@ConsiderAdhocJobOrder@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND TR.LOTCODE IS NOT NULL))) Z GROUP BY ADMSITE_CODE, COMPONENT_ICODE, PRCODE, LOTCODE, OPERATION_SEQ, ITEM, SUB_ASSEMBLY_ITEM_CODE, sub_assembly_item, ass_syb, ITEM_TYPE, /*Start Changes Feature 107045 batch serial*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE /*End Changes Feature 107045 batch serial*/ HAVING ( ( to_number(nullif('@ShowFractionValue@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND ( ( to_number(nullif('@ShowItemZeroQty@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE= 'Component' then ( coalesce (ISS_COM, 0) + coalesce (RET_COM, 0) + coalesce (WAS_COM, 0) + coalesce (REC_COM, 0)) else coalesce (PSD_QTY, 0) end) >= 1) OR ( to_number(nullif('@ShowItemZeroQty@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND ( SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE= 'Component' then ( coalesce (ISS_COM, 0) + coalesce (RET_COM, 0) + coalesce (WAS_COM, 0) + coalesce (REC_COM, 0)) else coalesce (PSD_QTY, 0) end) >= 1 OR ROUND ( SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE = 'Component' then coalesce (COMP_AMOUNT, 0) else coalesce (PEND_AMOUNT, 0) end), 2) >= 1)))) OR ( to_number(nullif('@ShowFractionValue@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND ( ( to_number(nullif('@ShowItemZeroQty@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 AND SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE = 'Component' then ( coalesce (ISS_COM, 0) + coalesce (RET_COM, 0) + coalesce (WAS_COM, 0) + coalesce (REC_COM, 0)) else coalesce (PSD_QTY, 0) end) <> 0) OR ( to_number(nullif('@ShowItemZeroQty@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND ( SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE= 'Component' then ( coalesce (ISS_COM, 0) + coalesce (RET_COM, 0) + coalesce (WAS_COM, 0) + coalesce (REC_COM, 0)) else coalesce (PSD_QTY, 0) end)) <> 0 OR ROUND ( SUM ( case when ITEM_TYPE= 'Component' then coalesce (COMP_AMOUNT, 0) else coalesce (PEND_AMOUNT, 0) end), 2) <> 0))))

entity.object_description: Get Details of Sale & Stock of Retail Store. This data source to be used for specific report purpose.
entity.sql_stmt: /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 88626 Tanmoy Performance Issue 91739 Jyotirmoy Batch Serial Code Inclusion */ WITH SelectedItems AS ( SELECT code FROM main.invitem_detail_agg WHERE ( division = nullif('@Division@', '') OR coalesce(nullif('@Division@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) AND ( section = nullif('@Section@', '') OR coalesce(nullif('@Section@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) AND ( department = nullif('@Department@', '') OR coalesce(nullif('@Department@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) ) ,SelectedSites AS ( SELECT CODE FROM admsite s WHERE ( ( nullif('@SiteTypeMSOS@', '') IN ( 'MS-OO-CM' ,'MS-CO-CM' ,'MS-CO-OM-TS' ,'OS-OO-CM' ) AND ( ( coalesce(to_number(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteNameMSOS@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), - 1) = - 1 AND sitetype = nullif('@SiteTypeMSOS@', '') ) OR ( to_number(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteNameMSOS@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') <> - 1 AND s.code = to_number(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteNameMSOS@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') ) ) ) OR ( coalesce(nullif('@SiteTypeMSOS@', ''), '-1') = '-1' AND ( ( coalesce(to_number(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteNameMSOS@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99'), - 1) = - 1 AND sitetype IN ( 'MS-OO-CM' ,'MS-CO-CM' ,'MS-CO-OM-TS' ,'OS-OO-CM' ) ) OR ( to_number(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteNameMSOS@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') <> - 1 AND s.code = to_number(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteNameMSOS@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') ) ) ) ) ) SELECT NULL requestid ,admsite_code::TEXT || icode uk ,admsite_code ,icode ,invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ ,salqty saleqty ,stkqty ,closing_transit_quantity ,unsettled_sale_qty ,unsettled_stk_qty FROM ( SELECT t1.admsite_code ,t1.icode ,invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ ,SUM(t1.salqty) salqty ,SUM(t1.stkqty) stkqty ,SUM(closing_transit_quantity) closing_transit_quantity ,SUM(unsettled_sale_qty) unsettled_sale_qty ,SUM(unsettled_stk_qty) unsettled_stk_qty FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE ,ICODE ,case when nullif('@ShowBatchSerialF@','')::int = 1 then d.invbatch_serial_code else null end invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ ,SUM(D.QTY) SALQTY ,0 STKQTY ,0 CLOSING_TRANSIT_QUANTITY ,0 UNSETTLED_SALE_QTY ,0 UNSETTLED_STK_QTY FROM SALCSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALCSDET D ON (M.CSCODE = D.CSCODE) JOIN SelectedItems i ON (D.ICODE = i.CODE) JOIN SelectedSites s ON (m.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code) WHERE ( ( coalesce(m.CHANNELTYPE, 'RTL') = '@RetailChannelType@' AND coalesce('@RetailChannelType@', '-1') <> '-1' ) OR coalesce('@RetailChannelType@', '-1') = '-1' ) /*Feature 107852*/ AND m.csdate BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY m.admsite_code ,d.icode ,d.invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE ,ICODE ,case when nullif('@ShowBatchSerialF@','')::int = 1 then d.invbatch_serial_code else null end invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ ,SUM(D.QTY) SALQTY ,0 STKQTY ,0 CLOSING_TRANSIT_QUANTITY ,0 UNSETTLED_SALE_QTY ,0 UNSETTLED_STK_QTY FROM SALSSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALSSDET D ON (M.SSCODE = D.SSCODE) JOIN SelectedItems i ON (D.ICODE = i.CODE) JOIN SelectedSites s ON (m.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code) WHERE ( ( coalesce(m.CHANNELTYPE, 'RTL') = '@RetailChannelType@' AND coalesce('@RetailChannelType@', '-1') <> '-1' ) OR coalesce('@RetailChannelType@', '-1') = '-1' ) /*Feature 107852*/ AND m.ssdate BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY m.admsite_code ,d.icode ,d.invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ UNION ALL /*SELECT K.ADMSITE_CODE ,ICODE ,0 SALQTY ,SUM(CASE WHEN loctype <> 'T' THEN k.qty ELSE 0 END) STKQTY ,SUM(CASE WHEN loctype = 'T' THEN k.qty ELSE 0 END) CLOSING_TRANSIT_QUANTITY ,0 UNSETTLED_SALE_QTY ,0 UNSETTLED_STK_QTY FROM INVSTOCK K JOIN SelectedItems i ON (K.ICODE = i.CODE) JOIN SelectedSites s ON (K.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code) INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) WHERE k.entdt <= TO_DATE('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY k.admsite_code ,k.icode*/ SELECT ADMSITE_CODE ,ICODE ,invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ ,0 SALQTY ,sum(STKQTY) STKQTY ,sum(CLOSING_TRANSIT_QUANTITY) CLOSING_TRANSIT_QUANTITY ,0 UNSETTLED_SALE_QTY ,0 UNSETTLED_STK_QTY FROM ( SELECT K.ADMSITE_CODE ,ICODE ,case when nullif('@ShowBatchSerialF@','')::int = 1 then k.invbatch_serial_code else null end invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ ,SUM(CASE WHEN LOCTYPE <> 'T' THEN K.QTY ELSE 0 END) STKQTY ,SUM(CASE WHEN LOCTYPE = 'T' THEN K.QTY ELSE 0 END) CLOSING_TRANSIT_QUANTITY FROM INVSTOCK_ONHAND K JOIN SelectedItems i ON (K.ICODE = i.CODE) JOIN SelectedSites s ON (K.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code) INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) GROUP BY K.ADMSITE_CODE ,ICODE ,case when nullif('@ShowBatchSerialF@','')::int = 1 then k.invbatch_serial_code else null end/*91739*/ HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN LOCTYPE <> 'T' THEN K.QTY ELSE 0 END) <> 0 OR SUM(CASE WHEN LOCTYPE = 'T' THEN K.QTY ELSE 0 END) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT K.ADMSITE_CODE ,ICODE ,case when nullif('@ShowBatchSerialF@','')::int = 1 then K.invbatch_serial_code else null end invbatch_serial_code ,0 - SUM(CASE WHEN LOCTYPE <> 'T' THEN K.QTY ELSE 0 END) STKQTY ,0 - SUM(CASE WHEN LOCTYPE = 'T' THEN K.QTY ELSE 0 END) CLOSING_TRANSIT_QUANTITY FROM INVSTOCK K JOIN SelectedItems i ON (K.ICODE = i.CODE) JOIN SelectedSites s ON (K.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code) INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) WHERE K.ENTDT BETWEEN (to_date('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) AND CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY K.ADMSITE_CODE ,K.ICODE ,case when nullif('@ShowBatchSerialF@','')::int = 1 then k.invbatch_serial_code else null end/*91739*/ HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN LOCTYPE <> 'T' THEN K.QTY ELSE 0 END) <> 0 or SUM(CASE WHEN LOCTYPE = 'T' THEN K.QTY ELSE 0 END) <> 0 ) t GROUP BY ADMSITE_CODE ,ICODE ,invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ UNION ALL SELECT PB.ADMSITE_CODE ,ICODE ,invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ ,0 SALQTY ,0 STKQTY ,0 CLOSING_TRANSIT_QUANTITY ,SUM(QTY) UNSETTLED_SALE_QTY ,0 UNSETTLED_STK_QTY FROM PSITE_POSBILL_PARK PB INNER JOIN PSITE_POSBILLITEM_PARK PBI ON (PB.CODE = PSITE_POSBILL_CODE) JOIN SelectedItems i ON (PBI.ICODE = i.CODE) JOIN SelectedSites s ON (PB.ADMSITE_CODE = s.code) WHERE pb.billdate::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ('@RetailChannelType@' = '-1') OR ('@RetailChannelType@' = 'RTL') ) /*BUG ID 109482*/ GROUP BY pb.admsite_code ,pbi.icode ,invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ ) t1 GROUP BY t1.admsite_code ,t1.icode ,invbatch_serial_code/*91739*/ HAVING ( (SUM(salqty) + SUM(unsettled_sale_qty)) <> 0 OR SUM(closing_transit_quantity) <> 0 OR (SUM(stkqty) - SUM(unsettled_stk_qty)) <> 0 ) ) q1 WHERE ( ( to_number('@ShowSoldItemsOnly@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 AND ( salqty <> 0 OR unsettled_sale_qty <> 0 ) ) OR to_number('@ShowSoldItemsOnly@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 )

entity.object_description: Get all the informations of AP Voucher Transaction with Adjustment details in single data source. This data source specifically designed for Document Report
entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 23-02-2024 11:22:04 (QP5 v5.294) */ with apvch as ( select M.VCHCODE, M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, M.VCHDT VOUCHER_DATE, CRE.FNAME || ' [' || CRE.ENO || ']' CREATED_BY, M.TIME CREATED_ON, M.GLCODE CB_GLCODE, G.GLNAME CASH_BANK_LEDGER, MDY.FNAME || ' [' || MDY.ENO || ']' LAST_ACCESSED_BY, M.LAST_ACCESS_TIME LAST_ACCESSED_ON, M.NARTEXT REMARKS, M.SCHEME_DOCNO VOUCHER_NO, M.REFNO HEADER_REFERENCE, RLS.FNAME || ' [' || RLS.ENO || ']' RELEASED_BY, INITCAP ( case when M.RELEASE_STATUS = 'P' then 'POSTED' when M.RELEASE_STATUS = 'U' then 'UNPOSTED' when M.RELEASE_STATUS = 'R' then 'REVERSED' end) RELEASE_STATUS, M.ADMOU_CODE, M.RELEASE_TIME RELEASED_ON, INITCAP ( case when M.ISADVANCE = 'N' then 'NO' when M.ISADVANCE = 'Y' then 'YES' else 'NO' end) ONACCOUNTPAYMENT, D.REFNO DETAIL_REFERENCE, D.GLCODE ARAP_GLCODE, GD.GLNAME ARAP_Ledger, D.SLCODE ARAP_SLCODE, S.SLNAME ARAP_Sub_Ledger, S.BEMAIL ARAP_SL_BILLING_EMAIL, S.BEMAIL2 ARAP_SL_BILLING_EMAIL2, S.SEMAIL ARAP_SL_SHIPPING_EMAIL, S.SEMAIL2 ARAP_SL_SHIPPING_EMAIL2, D.CHQNO INSTRUMENT_NO, D.CHQDT INSTRUMENT_DATE, D.DRAWNON INSTRUMENT_DRAWN_ON, D.DAMOUNT AMOUNT, D.BRSDT BRS_DATE, coalesce (D.ADJAMT, 0) ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT, D.CHQLABEL CHEQUE_LABEL, D.NARTEXT NARRATION, INITCAP ( case when D.PAYMENT_MODE = 'C' then 'CHEQUE' when D.PAYMENT_MODE = 'R' then 'NEFT OR RTGS' when D.PAYMENT_MODE = 'H' then 'CASH' else 'CHEQUE' end) PAYMENT_MODE, D.REF_ADMSITE_CODE DETAIL_REF_ADMSITE_CODE, INITCAP ( case when D.ISREVERSAL = 'Y' then 'YES' when D.ISREVERSAL = 'N' then 'NO' end) ISREVERSAL, 'VDP' ENTTYPE, D.TDS_RATE TDS_Rate, INITCAP ( case D.TDS_APP when 'Y' then 'YES' when 'N' then 'NO' end) TDS_Applicable, D.TDSSECTION TDS_Section, D.TDS_APPAMT TDS_APPLICABLE_Amount, D.TDSAMT TDS_AMOUNT, D.GRS_AMT Gross_Payable_Amount, CHQ.BOOKNO CHEQUE_BOOK_NO, case when M.RELEASE_STATUS in ('P', 'U') then 'Yes' when M.RELEASE_STATUS = 'P' then 'No' end INCLUDEUNPOSTEDRECORDS, M.UDFSTRING01 FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING01, M.UDFSTRING02 FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING02, M.UDFSTRING03 FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING03, M.UDFSTRING04 FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING04, M.UDFSTRING05 FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING05, M.UDFSTRING06 FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING06, M.UDFSTRING07 FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING07, M.UDFSTRING08 FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING08, M.UDFSTRING09 FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING09, M.UDFSTRING10 FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING10, M.UDFNUM01 FINVCHMAIN_UDFNUM01, M.UDFNUM02 FINVCHMAIN_UDFNUM02, M.UDFNUM03 FINVCHMAIN_UDFNUM03, M.UDFNUM04 FINVCHMAIN_UDFNUM04, M.UDFNUM05 FINVCHMAIN_UDFNUM05, M.UDFDATE01 FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE01, M.UDFDATE02 FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE02, M.UDFDATE03 FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE03, M.UDFDATE04 FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE04, M.UDFDATE05 FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE05 from ( select * from FINVCHMAIN where (vchcode in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@DocumentId@', '[^|~|]+', 'g'))::bigint as col1) or coalesce (nullif ('@DocumentId@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text)) M inner join ( select * from FINVCHDET where (vchcode in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@DocumentId@', '[^|~|]+', 'g'))::bigint as col1) or coalesce (nullif ('@DocumentId@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text)) D on M.VCHCODE = D.VCHCODE inner join HRDEMP CRE on M.ECODE = CRE.ECODE inner join FINGL G on M.GLCODE = G.GLCODE inner join FINGL GD on D.GLCODE = GD.GLCODE left outer join FINSL S on D.SLCODE = S.SLCODE left outer join HRDEMP MDY on M.LAST_ACCESS_ECODE = MDY.ECODE left outer join HRDEMP RLS on M.RELEASE_ECODE = RLS.ECODE left outer join FINCHQMAIN CHQ on D.BOOKCODE = CHQ.BOOKCODE where M.VCHTYPE in ('P', 'B') and (M.vchcode in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@DocumentId@', '[^|~|]+', 'g'))::bigint as col1) or coalesce (nullif ('@DocumentId@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text)), site_data as ( select ST.CODE SITECODE, ST.NAME NAME, ST.SHRTNAME SHORT_CODE, ST.ADDRESS ADDRESS, ST.CTNAME CITY, B.STNAME STATE, B.DIST DISTRICT, ST.PIN PINCODE, ST.OPH1 PHONE1, ST.OPH2 PHONE2, ST.OPH3 PHONE3, ST.EMAIL1 EMAIL1, ST.EMAIL2 EMAIL2, case when SITETYPE like '%OO-CM' or SITETYPE = 'MS-CO-CM' then SIN.GSTIN_NO else ST.CP_GSTIN_NO end GST_IDENTIFICATION_NO, case when SITETYPE like '%OO-CM' or SITETYPE = 'MS-CO-CM' then SIN.ADMGSTSTATE_CODE else ST.CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE end GST_STATE_CODE, case when SITETYPE like '%OO-CM' or SITETYPE = 'MS-CO-CM' then STA.NAME else STA1.NAME end GST_STATE_NAME, case when ST.SITETYPE like '%OM%' then case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then F.SLNAME else ST.SHIP_LEGAL_NAME end else O.NAME end Shipping_Company_Name, case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then ST.ADDRESS else ST.SHIP_ADDRESS end Shipping_Address, case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then ST.CTNAME else ST.SHIP_CTNAME end Shipping_CITY, case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then ST.PIN else ST.SHIP_PIN end Shipping_Pincode, case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then ST.OPH1 else ST.SHIP_OPH1 end Shipping_Phone1, case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then ST.OPH2 else ST.SHIP_OPH2 end Shipping_Phone2, case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then ST.OPH3 else ST.SHIP_OPH3 end Shipping_Phone3, case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then ST.EMAIL1 else ST.SHIP_EMAIL1 end Shipping_Email1, case when ST.SITETYPE like '%CM' then SIN.GSTIN_NO else case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then ST.CP_GSTIN_NO else ST.SHIP_CP_GSTIN_NO end end Shipping_GST_Identification_No, case when ST.SITETYPE like '%CM' then SIN.ADMGSTSTATE_CODE else case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then ST.CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE else ST.SHIP_CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE end end Shipping_GST_State_Code, case when ST.SITETYPE like '%CM' then STA.NAME else case when ISBILLINGSHIPPINGSAME = 'Y' then STA1.NAME else STA2.NAME end end Shipping_GST_State_Name, ST.WEBSITE website from ADMSITE ST left outer join FINSL F on ST.SLCODE = F.SLCODE left outer join ADMCITY B on ST.CTNAME = B.CTNAME left outer join ADMOU O on ST.ADMOU_CODE = O.CODE left outer join ADMGSTIN SIN on ST.ADMGSTIN_CODE = SIN.CODE left outer join ADMGSTSTATE STA on SIN.ADMGSTSTATE_CODE = STA.CODE left outer join ADMGSTSTATE STA1 on ST.CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE = STA1.CODE left outer join ADMGSTSTATE STA2 on ST.SHIP_CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE = STA2.CODE) select row_number() over() uk, VCHCODE, ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, VOUCHER_DATE, q1.CREATED_BY, q1.CREATED_ON, CB_GLCODE CASH_BANK_GLCODE, CASH_BANK_LEDGER, LAST_ACCESSED_BY, LAST_ACCESSED_ON, REMARKS, VOUCHER_NO, HEADER_REFERENCE, RELEASED_BY, RELEASE_STATUS, ADMOU_CODE, RELEASED_ON, ONACCOUNTPAYMENT, DETAIL_REFERENCE, ARAP_GLCODE, ARAP_LEDGER, ARAP_SLCODE, INSTRUMENT_NO, INSTRUMENT_DATE, INSTRUMENT_DRAWN_ON, AMOUNT, BRS_DATE, ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT, CHEQUE_LABEL, NARRATION, PAYMENT_MODE, DETAIL_REF_ADMSITE_CODE, ISREVERSAL, ENTTYPE, TDS_RATE, TDS_APPLICABLE, TDS_SECTION, TDS_APPLICABLE_AMOUNT, TDS_AMOUNT, GROSS_PAYABLE_AMOUNT, CHEQUE_BOOK_NO, INCLUDEUNPOSTEDRECORDS, FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING01, FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING02, FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING03, FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING04, FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING05, FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING06, FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING07, FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING08, FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING09, FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING10, FINVCHMAIN_UDFNUM01, FINVCHMAIN_UDFNUM02, FINVCHMAIN_UDFNUM03, FINVCHMAIN_UDFNUM04, FINVCHMAIN_UDFNUM05, FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE01, FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE02, FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE03, FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE04, FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE05, ADJ_ENTRY_TYPE, ADJ_REFERENCE_NO ADJ_REF_NO, ADJ_REFERENCE_DATE ADJ_REF_DATE, ADJ_REFERENCE_TYPE ADJ_REF_TYPE, ADJ_REFERENCE_NAME ADJ_REF_NAME, ADJ_REFERENCE_NARTEXT ADJ_REF_NARTEXT, ADJ_ACTUAL, ADJ_PENDING, ADJ_ADJUSTMENT, ADJ_REFDETAIL, ADJ_REFERENCE_DOC_NO ADJ_REF_DOC_NO, ADJ_REFERENCE_DOC_DATE ADJ_REF_DOC_DATE, ADJ_REFERENCE_DUE_DATE ADJ_REF_DUE_DATE, ADJ_REFERENCE_INSTRUMENT_DATE ADJ_REF_INSTRUMENT_DATE, ADJ_REF_INSTRUMENT_DRAWNON, ADJ_REFERENCE_INSTRUMENT_NO ADJ_REF_INSTRUMENT_NO, ADJ_ADDITIONAL_REFDETAIL, ADJ_REFERENCE_REFSITE_SHRTNAME ADJ_REF_REFSITE_SHRTNAME, ADJ_REFERENCE_REFSITE_NAME ADJ_REF_REFSITE_NAME, ou.NAME ORGUNIT_NAME, ou.WEBSITE ORGUNIT_WEBSITE, ou.CINNO ORGUNIT_CIN, os.NAME OWNER_SITE_NAME, os.SHORT_CODE OWNER_SITE_SHORT_CODE, os.ADDRESS OWNER_SITE_ADDRESS, os.CITY OWNER_SITE_CITY, os.PINCODE OWNER_SITE_PINCODE, os.PHONE1 OWNER_SITE_PHONE1, os.PHONE2 OWNER_SITE_PHONE2, os.PHONE3 OWNER_SITE_PHONE3, os.EMAIL1 OWNER_SITE_EMAIL1, os.EMAIL2 OWNER_SITE_EMAIL2, OS.GST_IDENTIFICATION_NO OWNER_SITE_GSTIN_NO, OS.GST_STATE_CODE OWNER_SITE_GST_STATE_CODE, OS.GST_STATE_NAME OWNER_SITE_GST_STATE_NAME, os.website OWNER_SITE_WEBSITE, os.state OWNER_SITE_STATE, CUST_NAME sl_NAME, CUST_BILLING_ADDRESS sl_BILLING_ADDRESS, CUST_BILLING_CITY sl_BILLING_CITY, CUST_BILLING_EMAIL1 sl_BILLING_EMAIL1, CUST_BILLING_EMAIL2 sl_BILLING_EMAIL2, CUST_BILLING_PINCODE sl_BILLING_PINCODE, CUST_GSTIN_NO SL_GST_IDENTIFICATION_NO, CUST_GST_STATE_NAME sl_GST_STATE_NAME, CUST_GST_STATE_CODE sl_GST_STATE_CODE, CUST_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO sl_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO, CUST_BANK_IFSC_CODE sl_BANK_IFSC_CODE, CUST_BANK_MICR_CODE sl_BANK_MICR_CODE, CUST_BANK_NAME sl_BANK_NAME, CUST_BANK_RTGS_CODE sl_BANK_RTGS_CODE, CUST_BANK_CHEQUE_LABEL sl_BANK_CHEQUE_LABEL, CUST_IDENTITY_NO SL_IDENTITY_NO, CUST_ALIAS SL_ALIAS, CUST_GST_REGISTRATION_DATE SL_GST_REGISTRATION_DATE from ( select ap.VCHCODE, ap.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER, ap.VOUCHER_DATE, ap.CREATED_BY, ap.CREATED_ON, ap.CB_GLCODE, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING02, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING03, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING04, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING05, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING06, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING07, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFSTRING08, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE02, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE03, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE04, ap.FINVCHMAIN_UDFDATE05, adj.ENTRY_CODE ADJ_ENTRY_CODE, adj.ENTRY_TYPE ADJ_ENTRY_TYPE, adj.REFERENCE_NO ADJ_REFERENCE_NO, adj.ACTUAL ADJ_ACTUAL, adj.PENDING ADJ_PENDING, adj.ADJUSTMENT ADJ_ADJUSTMENT, adj.REFDETAIL ADJ_REFDETAIL, adj.REFERENCE_DOC_NO ADJ_REFERENCE_DOC_NO, adj.REFERENCE_DOC_DATE ADJ_REFERENCE_DOC_DATE, adj.REFERENCE_DUE_DATE ADJ_REFERENCE_DUE_DATE, adj.REFERENCE_INSTRUMENT_DATE ADJ_REFERENCE_INSTRUMENT_DATE, adj.REFERENCE_INSTRUMENT_DRAWNON ADJ_REF_INSTRUMENT_DRAWNON, adj.REFERENCE_INSTRUMENT_NO ADJ_REFERENCE_INSTRUMENT_NO, adj.ADDITIONAL_REFDETAIL ADJ_ADDITIONAL_REFDETAIL, adj.REFERENCE_REFSITE_SHRTNAME ADJ_REFERENCE_REFSITE_SHRTNAME, adj.REFERENCE_REFSITE_NAME ADJ_REFERENCE_REFSITE_NAME, adj.REFERENCE_OWNER_SHRTNAME ADJ_REFERENCE_OWNER_SHRTNAME, adj.REFERENCE_OWNER_SITE ADJ_REFERENCE_OWNER_SITE from apvch ap inner join ( select A.POSTCODE1, A.ENTCODE1 ENTRY_CODE, A.ENTTYPE1 ENTRY_TYPE, B.SCHEME_DOCNO REFERENCE_NO, B.ENTDT REFERENCE_DATE, A.ENTTYPE2 REFERENCE_TYPE, C.ENTNAME REFERENCE_NAME, b.NARTEXT REFERENCE_NARTEXT, A.SLCODE ARAP_SLCODE, B.DAMOUNT - B.CAMOUNT ACTUAL, B.DAMOUNT - B.CAMOUNT - A.AMOUNT PENDING, A.AMOUNT ADJUSTMENT, concat(concat(concat(concat(concat(concat(concat(concat(concat(concat(concat(concat(concat(concat('[ Against '::text, db_fun_display_docno(b.enttype::text, b.ycode, b.scheme_docno::bpchar::text, b.scheme_docno::bpchar::text)), ' Dated: '::text), to_char(b.entdt, 'DD-MM-YYYY'::text)), ', (Doc No.: '::text), b.docno::text), ' Doc. dt.: '::text), to_char(b.docdt, 'DD-MM-YYYY'::text)), ' Doc Amt: Rs. '::text), to_char( case when coalesce(b.damount, 0::numeric) = 0::numeric then coalesce(b.camount, 0::numeric) else coalesce(b.damount, 0::numeric) end, 'FM9999999999990.00'::text)), '), '::text), ' Adjusted Amt: Rs. '::text), to_char(a.amount, 'FM9999999999990.00'::text)), case when b.nartext is null then null::text else concat(concat(' (Remarks: '::text, b.nartext::text), ')'::text) end), ' ]'::text) REFDETAIL, B.DOCNO REFERENCE_DOC_NO, B.DOCDT REFERENCE_DOC_DATE, B.DUEDT REFERENCE_DUE_DATE, B.CHQDT REFERENCE_INSTRUMENT_DATE, B.DRAWNON REFERENCE_INSTRUMENT_DRAWNON, B.CHQNO REFERENCE_INSTRUMENT_NO,
