SUM(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY <> 0 THEN m.NETPAYABLE ELSE 0 END) +SUM(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY = 0 THEN m.NETPAYABLE ELSE 0 END) Total_Amount from salcsmain m join appuser u on m.ecode = u.ID join admsite s on m.admsite_code = s.code join ADMCMP ON s.cmpcode = ADMCMP.CMPCODE LEFT JOIN FINSL SL ON m.PCODE=SL.SLCODE LEFT JOIN connected_app ca on (s.admou_code = ca.admou_code AND u.CONNECTED_APP_ID = ca.code) LEFT JOIN mdconnected_app mca on (ca.app_id = mca.APP_ID) JOIN ( select m.CSCODE, COUNT(case when SALCSDET.QTY > 0 THEN SALCSDET.CODE ELSE NULL END) Sale_Bill_Item_Count, SUM(case when SALCSDET.QTY > 0 THEN SALCSDET.QTY ELSE 0 END) SALE_QTY, COUNT(case when SALCSDET.QTY < 0 THEN SALCSDET.CODE ELSE NULL END) Return_Bill_Item_Count, 0-SUM(case when SALCSDET.QTY < 0 THEN SALCSDET.QTY ELSE 0 END) RETURN_QTY FROM SALCSDET join salcsmain m on SALCSDET.cscode=m.cscode where m.csdate::date between TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY m.CSCODE ) DET ON m.CSCODE = DET.CSCODE WHERE ((COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'RTL' AND S.INSTALLATION_TYPE = 'ZPOS') OR (COALESCE(CHANNELTYPE,'RTL') = 'RTL' AND s.SITETYPE='OS-OO-CM') OR (COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'ETL')) and m.csdate::date between TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY ADMCMP.CMPNAME, ADMCMP.CMPINIT, case when COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'RTL' then 'Retail' else 'E-Commerce' end, CASE WHEN COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'RTL' THEN CASE WHEN S.INSTALLATION_TYPE = 'ZPOS' THEN 'POS (Z)' ELSE 'ERP' END ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN 'OMS (BT)' ELSE 'External' END END, CASE WHEN COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'RTL' THEN CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE ILIKE '%OO%' THEN 'Company' ELSE 'Franchisee' END ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 0 THEN SL.SLNAME WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN SL.SLNAME WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') <> 'BT' THEN U.FULLNAME END END, CASE WHEN COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'RTL' AND S.INSTALLATION_TYPE='ZPOS' THEN 'Zwing' WHEN COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'ETL' AND U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN 'BT' ELSE 'ERP' END, CASE WHEN COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'RTL' THEN case when S.INSTALLATION_TYPE='ZPOS' THEN CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE LIKE '%OO%' THEN 'Retail via Company Owned Stores' Else 'Retail (SOR) via Franchisee Stores' END else 'Retail via Company HO' end ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN 'Ecommerce via Ginesys OMS' Else 'Ecommerce via 3rd Party APIs/ UI' END END UNION ALL select ADMCMP.CMPNAME, ADMCMP.CMPINIT, case when COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'RTL' then 'Retail' else 'E-Commerce' end Sale_Type, CASE WHEN S.INSTALLATION_TYPE = 'ZPOS' THEN 'POS (Z)' ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN 'OMS (BT)' ELSE 'External' END END Sale_Source, CASE WHEN S.INSTALLATION_TYPE='ZPOS' THEN CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE ILIKE '%OO%' THEN 'Company' ELSE 'Franchisee' END ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 0 THEN SL.SLNAME WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN SL.SLNAME WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') <> 'BT' THEN U.FULLNAME END END Channels, CASE WHEN S.INSTALLATION_TYPE='ZPOS' THEN 'Zwing' ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN 'BT' ELSE 'ERP' END END Data_Source, CASE WHEN S.INSTALLATION_TYPE='ZPOS' THEN CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE LIKE '%OO%' THEN 'Retail via Company Owned Stores' Else 'Retail (SOR) via Franchisee Stores' END ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN 'Ecommerce via Ginesys OMS' Else 'Ecommerce via 3rd Party APIs/ UI' END END Description, COUNT(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY <> 0 THEN m.SSCODE ELSE NULL END) Sale_Bill_Count, SUM(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY <> 0 THEN Sale_Bill_Item_Count+RETURN_Bill_Item_Count else Sale_Bill_Item_Count end) Sale_Bill_Item_Count, SUM(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY <> 0 THEN Sale_qty-Return_qty else Sale_qty end) Sale_qty, SUM(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY <> 0 THEN m.NETPAYABLE ELSE 0 END) Sale_amount, COUNT(case when SALE_QTY = 0 THEN m.SSCODE ELSE NULL END) Return_Bill_Count, SUM(case when SALE_QTY = 0 THEN RETURN_Bill_Item_Count else 0 end) Return_Bill_Item_Count, SUM(case when SALE_QTY = 0 THEN Return_qty else 0 end ) Return_qty, 0-SUM(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY = 0 THEN m.NETPAYABLE ELSE 0 END) Return_amount, COUNT(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY <> 0 THEN m.SSCODE ELSE NULL END) + COUNT(case when SALE_QTY = 0 THEN m.SSCODE ELSE NULL END) Total_Bill_Count, SUM(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY <> 0 THEN Sale_Bill_Item_Count+RETURN_Bill_Item_Count else Sale_Bill_Item_Count end) +SUM(case when SALE_QTY = 0 THEN RETURN_Bill_Item_Count else 0 end) Total_Bill_Item_Count, SUM(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY <> 0 THEN Sale_qty-Return_qty else Sale_qty end) -SUM(case when SALE_QTY = 0 THEN Return_qty else 0 end ) Total_qty, SUM(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY <> 0 THEN m.NETPAYABLE ELSE 0 END) +SUM(CASE WHEN SALE_QTY = 0 THEN m.NETPAYABLE ELSE 0 END) Total_Amount from salssmain m join appuser u on m.ecode = u.ID join admsite s on m.admsite_code = s.code join ADMCMP ON s.cmpcode = ADMCMP.CMPCODE LEFT JOIN FINSL SL ON m.PCODE=SL.SLCODE LEFT JOIN connected_app ca on (s.admou_code = ca.admou_code AND u.CONNECTED_APP_ID = ca.code) LEFT JOIN mdconnected_app mca on (ca.app_id = mca.APP_ID) JOIN (select SSCODE, COUNT(case when SALSSDET.QTY > 0 THEN SALSSDET.CODE ELSE NULL END) Sale_Bill_Item_Count, SUM(case when SALSSDET.QTY > 0 THEN SALSSDET.QTY ELSE 0 END) SALE_QTY, COUNT(case when SALSSDET.QTY < 0 THEN SALSSDET.CODE ELSE NULL END) Return_Bill_Item_Count, 0-SUM(case when SALSSDET.QTY < 0 THEN SALSSDET.QTY ELSE 0 END) RETURN_QTY FROM SALSSDET GROUP BY SSCODE) DET ON m.SSCODE = DET.SSCODE WHERE ((COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'RTL' AND S.SITETYPE ='US-CO-OM-TS') OR (COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'ETL') AND S.SITETYPE LIKE '%TS') and m.ssdate::date between TO_DATE('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY ADMCMP.CMPNAME, ADMCMP.CMPINIT, case when COALESCE(channeltype,'RTL') = 'RTL' then 'Retail' else 'E-Commerce' end, CASE WHEN S.INSTALLATION_TYPE = 'ZPOS' THEN 'POS (Z)' ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN 'OMS (BT)' ELSE 'External' END END, CASE WHEN S.INSTALLATION_TYPE='ZPOS' THEN CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE ILIKE '%OO%' THEN 'Company' ELSE 'Franchisee' END ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 0 THEN SL.SLNAME WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN SL.SLNAME WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') <> 'BT' THEN U.FULLNAME END END, CASE WHEN S.INSTALLATION_TYPE='ZPOS' THEN 'Zwing' ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN 'BT' ELSE 'ERP' END END, CASE WHEN S.INSTALLATION_TYPE='ZPOS' THEN CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE LIKE '%OO%' THEN 'Retail via Company Owned Stores' Else 'Retail (SOR) via Franchisee Stores' END ELSE CASE WHEN U.IS_APIUSER = 1 AND COALESCE(MCA.SHORTCODE,'XX') = 'BT' THEN 'Ecommerce via Ginesys OMS' Else 'Ecommerce via 3rd Party APIs/ UI' END END )T1

SELECT row_number() over() UK, SOURCE, CHANNELTYPE FROM (SELECT 'Retail - Online' SOURCE, 'ETL' CHANNELTYPE UNION ALL SELECT 'Retail - Offline' SOURCE, 'RTL' CHANNELTYPE UNION ALL SELECT 'Wholesale' SOURCE, 'WS' CHANNELTYPE)a

entity.object_description: TBD
entity.sql_stmt: WITH ITEM_MASTER AS ( SELECT i.image_name ,i.barcode ,i.code ,i.wsp ,i.MRP ,i.standard_rate ,i.category1 ,i.category2 ,i.category3 ,i.category4 ,i.category5 ,i.category6 FROM main.invitem_detail_agg i WHERE ( ( i.vendor_code = coalesce(NULLIF('@SubLedger@', '')::INT, - 1) AND COALESCE(NULLIF('@SubLedger@', '')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@SubLedger@', '')::INT, - 1) = - 1 ) AND ( ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@PriceTypeMRPWSP@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' AND ( ( NULLIF('@PriceTypeMRPWSP@', '') = 'WSP' AND i.wsp BETWEEN COALESCE(NULLIF('@PriceFrom@', '')::INT, 0) AND COALESCE(NULLIF('@PriceTo@', '')::INT, 9999999999999) ) OR ( NULLIF('@PriceTypeMRPWSP@', '') = 'MRP' AND i.mrp BETWEEN COALESCE(NULLIF('@PriceFrom@', '')::INT, 0) AND COALESCE(NULLIF('@PriceTo@', '')::INT, 9999999999999) ) OR ( NULLIF('@PriceTypeMRPWSP@', '') = 'Standard Rate' AND i.standard_rate BETWEEN COALESCE(NULLIF('@PriceFrom@', '')::INT, 0) AND COALESCE(NULLIF('@PriceTo@', '')::INT, 9999999999999) ) ) ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@PriceTypeMRPWSP@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) AND ( ( i.division = COALESCE(NULLIF('@Division@', ''), '-1') AND COALESCE(NULLIF('@Division@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@Division@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) AND ( ( i.section = COALESCE(NULLIF('@Section@', ''), '-1') AND COALESCE(NULLIF('@Section@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@Section@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) AND ( ( i.department = COALESCE(NULLIF('@Department@', ''), '-1') AND COALESCE(NULLIF('@Department@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@Department@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) ) ,FILTERED_DATA AS ( SELECT row_number() OVER () rn ,i.image_name ,CONCAT ( i.barcode::TEXT ,CHR(10) ,'Sale : ' ,salqty::TEXT ,', Stk : ' ,stkqty::TEXT ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowSaleThrough@','')::INT = 1 THEN CONCAT ( 'ST : ' ,saltrhu::TEXT ) END ,CHR(10) ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowPriceTypeBoolean@','')::INT = 1 THEN CONCAT ( NULLIF('@PriceTypeMRPWSP@','') ,' : ' ) END ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowPriceTypeBoolean@','')::INT = 1 AND NULLIF('@PriceTypeMRPWSP@','') = 'WSP' THEN CONCAT ( i.wsp::TEXT ,CHR(10) ) END ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowPriceTypeBoolean@','')::INT = 1 AND NULLIF('@PriceTypeMRPWSP@','') = 'MRP' THEN CONCAT ( i.MRP::TEXT ,CHR(10) ) END ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowPriceTypeBoolean@','')::INT = 1 AND NULLIF('@PriceTypeMRPWSP@','') = 'Standard Rate' THEN CONCAT ( i.standard_rate::TEXT ,CHR(10) ) END ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowItemBoolean@','')::INT = 1 THEN 'Item : ' END ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowItemBoolean@','')::INT = 1 AND NULLIF('@ShowCategory1@','')::INT = 1 THEN CONCAT ( i.category1 ,CHR(10) ) END ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowItemBoolean@','')::INT = 1 AND NULLIF('@ShowCategory2@','')::INT = 1 THEN CONCAT ( i.category2 ,CHR(10) ) END ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowItemBoolean@','')::INT = 1 AND NULLIF('@ShowCategory3@','')::INT = 1 THEN CONCAT ( i.category3 ,CHR(10) ) END ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowItemBoolean@','')::INT = 1 AND NULLIF('@ShowCategory4@','')::INT = 1 THEN CONCAT ( i.category4 ,CHR(10) ) END ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowItemBoolean@','')::INT = 1 AND NULLIF('@ShowCategory5@','')::INT = 1 THEN CONCAT ( i.category5 ,CHR(10) ) END ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowItemBoolean@','')::INT = 1 AND NULLIF('@ShowCategory6@','')::INT = 1 THEN CONCAT ( i.category6 ,CHR(10) ) END ) item_desc FROM ( SELECT icode ,SUM(salqty) salqty ,SUM(stkqty) stkqty ,CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowSaleThrough@', '')::INT = 1 THEN CASE WHEN SUM(opnqty) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE round(SUM(salqty) / SUM(opnqty), 2) END END saltrhu FROM ( SELECT k.icode ,CASE WHEN k.enttype IN ('SAL','SRT') AND k.entdt BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN qty ELSE 0 END salqty ,CASE WHEN k.entdt <= TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND COALESCE(NULLIF('@ShowSaleThrough@', '')::INT, 0) = 1 THEN qty ELSE 0 END opnqty ,CASE WHEN k.entdt <= TO_DATE('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN qty ELSE 0 END stkqty FROM invstock k JOIN ITEM_MASTER i ON (k.icode = i.code) JOIN invloc l ON ( k.loccode = l.loccode AND l.loctype <> 'T' ) JOIN admsite s ON ( k.admsite_code = s.code AND sitetype IN ( 'OS-OO-CM' ,'MS-OO-CM' ,'MS-CO-CM' ) ) WHERE (( k.admsite_code = coalesce(NULLIF('@SiteNameSaleSum@', '')::INT, - 1) AND COALESCE(NULLIF('@SiteNameSaleSum@', '')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 ) or (COALESCE(NULLIF('@SiteNameSaleSum@', '')::INT, - 1) = - 1)) AND k.entdt <= GREATEST(TO_DATE('@ASON@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND k.admou_code = NULLIF('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT ) S1 GROUP BY icode HAVING ( SUM(salqty) <> 0 AND SUM(stkqty) <> 0 ) ) k JOIN ITEM_MASTER i ON (k.icode = i.code) ) SELECT row_group uk ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN image_name ELSE NULL END) img_name1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN item_desc ELSE NULL END) img_desc1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN image_name ELSE NULL END) img_name2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN item_desc ELSE NULL END) img_desc2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN image_name ELSE NULL END) img_name3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN item_desc ELSE NULL END) img_desc3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 4 THEN image_name ELSE NULL END) img_name4 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 4 THEN item_desc ELSE NULL END) img_desc4 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 5 THEN image_name ELSE NULL END) img_name5 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 5 THEN item_desc ELSE NULL END) img_desc5 FROM ( SELECT rn ,((rn - 1) / 5) + 1 AS row_group ,((rn - 1) % 5) + 1 AS pos ,image_name ,item_desc FROM FILTERED_DATA ) t1 GROUP BY row_group

entity.object_description: Complete Sale Information considering all the selling points and its type. This is legacy data object related with earlier Company Sale Analysis.
entity.sql_stmt: select /* NAME: sq_company_sale PURPOSE: REVISIONS: Rev. Date Author Description --------- ---------- ---------------------- --------------------------------------------------- XXX XX/XX/XXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 001 23/07/2024 Tanmoy Adak Migration of CUBE$COMPANYSALE */ t.*, row_number() over() UK from (select current_timestamp REPORT_DATE, 'Retail Sale' sale_mode, 'Store' channel_type, case when C.SITETYPE like '%OO-CM' then 'Owned Store Sale' else 'Franchise (Consignment) Sale' end sub_channel_type, case when coalesce(C.ISPOS,'N')= 'N' then 'Unmanaged' when coalesce(C.ISPOS,'N')= 'Y' then 'Managed' end store_type, case when b.qty >= 0 then 'Sales' else 'Sales Return' end sale_type, A.CSDATE entry_date, A.ADMSITE_CODE sitecode, A.PCODE slcode, B.ICODE, coalesce(B.QTY,0) QTY, coalesce(B.MRP,0) RSP, coalesce(B.RATE,0) Rate, coalesce(B.GRSAMT,0) Gross_Amount, coalesce(B.DISCOUNT,0) Discount_Amount, coalesce(B.EXTAXAMT,0) Extra_Tax_Amount, coalesce(B.SHIPCHG,0) Shipment_Charges, coalesce(B.CODCHG,0) COD_Charges, coalesce(B.GWCHG,0) Gift_Wrap_Charges, coalesce(B.NETAMT,0) Net_Amount, coalesce(B.SITE_COSTRATE,0) COGS, coalesce(B.TAXAMT,0) Tax_Amount, coalesce(B.PROMOAMT,0) Promo_Discount, b.remarks Item_Remarks, coalesce(B.TAXABLEAMT,0) TAXABLEAMT, A.OWNER_GSTIN_NO, A.OWNER_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, A.CP_GSTIN_NO, A.CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, B.HSN_SAC_CODE, B.IGSTRATE, B.IGSTAMT, B.CGSTRATE, B.CGSTAMT, B.SGSTRATE, B.SGSTAMT, B.CESSRATE, B.CESSAMT, 0 other_chg from SALCSMAIN A join SALCSDET B on A.CSCODE = B.CSCODE join ADMSITE C on A.ADMSITE_CODE = C.CODE left join FINSL D on A.PCODE = D.SLCODE where A.CHANNELTYPE = 'RTL' and A.CSDATE::date between to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') union all select current_timestamp REPORT_DATE, 'Retail Sale' , 'E-commerce' , case when C.SITETYPE like '%OO-CM' then 'Fulfilled by Seller' else 'Fulfilled by Marketplace' end , 'Not Applicable' , case when b.qty >= 0 then 'Sales' else 'Sales Return' end , A.CSDATE , A.ADMSITE_CODE , A.PCODE SLCODE, B.ICODE, coalesce(B.QTY, 0) QTY, coalesce(B.MRP, 0) RSP, coalesce(B.RATE, 0) Rate, coalesce(B.GRSAMT, 0) , coalesce(B.DISCOUNT, 0) , coalesce(B.EXTAXAMT, 0) "Extra Tax Amount", coalesce(B.SHIPCHG, 0) , coalesce(B.CODCHG, 0) , coalesce(B.GWCHG, 0) , coalesce(B.NETAMT, 0) , coalesce(B.SITE_COSTRATE, 0) COGS, coalesce(B.TAXAMT, 0) , coalesce(B.PROMOAMT, 0) , b.remarks , coalesce(B.TAXABLEAMT, 0), A.OWNER_GSTIN_NO, A.OWNER_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, A.CP_GSTIN_NO, A.CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, B.HSN_SAC_CODE, B.IGSTRATE, B.IGSTAMT, B.CGSTRATE, B.CGSTAMT, B.SGSTRATE, B.SGSTAMT, B.CESSRATE, B.CESSAMT, 0 other_chg from SALCSMAIN A join SALCSDET B on A.CSCODE = B.CSCODE join ADMSITE C on A.ADMSITE_CODE = C.CODE left join FINSL D on A.PCODE = D.SLCODE where A.CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL' and A.CSDATE::date between to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') union all select current_timestamp REPORT_DATE, 'Wholesale', 'Warehouse Sale' , case when coalesce(C.ISSECONDARY, 'N') = 'Y' then 'Outright' else 'Shop in Shop' end , 'Not Applicable', 'Sales' , A.INVDT , A.ADMSITE_CODE sitecode, A.PCODE, B.ICODE, B.INVQTY, B.MRP, B.RATE, 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , B.INVAMT , B.SITE_COSTRATE COGS, B.TAXAMT , 0 , b.rem , coalesce(TAX.TAXABLEAMT, INVQTY * RATE), A.OWNER_GSTIN_NO, A.OWNER_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, A.CP_GSTIN_NO, A.CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, B.HSN_SAC_CODE, TAX.IGSTRATE, TAX.IGSTAMT, TAX.CGSTRATE, TAX.CGSTAMT, TAX.SGSTRATE, TAX.SGSTAMT, TAX.CESSRATE, TAX.CESSAMT, ROUND(B.INVQTY * OTH.OTHER_CHG, 2) OTHER_CHG from SALINVMAIN A join SALINVDET B on A.INVCODE = B.INVCODE join ADMSITE C on A.ADMSITE_CODE = C.CODE left join FINSL D on (A.PCODE = D.SLCODE /*AND C.SLCODE = D.SLCODE*/ ) left join( select INVCODE, SALINVDET_CODE , APPAMT TAXABLEAMT , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'CGST' then RATE else 0 end) CGSTRATE , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'CGST' then CHGAMT else 0 end) CGSTAMT , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'SGST' then RATE else 0 end) SGSTRATE , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'SGST' then CHGAMT else 0 end) SGSTAMT , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'IGST' then RATE else 0 end) IGSTRATE , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'IGST' then CHGAMT else 0 end) IGSTAMT , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'CESS' then RATE else 0 end) CESSRATE , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'CESS' then CHGAMT else 0 end) CESSAMT from SALINVCHG_ITEM where source = 'G' group by INVCODE, SALINVDET_CODE , APPAMT ) TAX on (B.INVCODE = TAX.INVCODE and B.CODE = TAX.SALINVDET_CODE) left join ( select M.INVCODE, ROUND(SUM(CHGAMT)/ SUM(QTY), 6) OTHER_CHG from ( select INVCODE, SUM(CHGAMT) CHGAMT from SALINVCHG where ISTAX = 'N' and OPERATION_LEVEL = 'H' group by INVCODE ) M , ( select INVCODE, SUM(INVQTY) QTY from SALINVDET group by INVCODE ) D where M.INVCODE = D.INVCODE group by M.INVCODE ) OTH on (A.INVCODE = OTH.INVCODE) where D.SALETYPE = 'O' and A.INVDT::date between to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') union all select current_timestamp REPORT_DATE, 'Wholesale' , 'Warehouse Sale' , case when coalesce(C.ISSECONDARY, 'N') = 'Y' then 'Outright' else 'Shop in Shop' end , 'Not Applicable' , 'Sales Return' , A.RTDT , A.ADMSITE_CODE sitecode, A.PCODE, B.ICODE, 0-B.QTY, B.MRP, B.RATE, 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0-(coalesce(B.QTY, 0)* coalesce(B.RATE, 0)) , B.SITE_COSTRATE COGS, 0-CHG.TAX_AMOUNT , 0 , b.rem , 0-coalesce(TAX.TAXABLEAMT, (coalesce(B.QTY, 0)* coalesce(B.RATE, 0))), A.OWNER_GSTIN_NO, A.OWNER_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, A.CP_GSTIN_NO, A.CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, B.HSN_SAC_CODE, TAX.IGSTRATE, 0-TAX.IGSTAMT, TAX.CGSTRATE, 0-TAX.CGSTAMT, TAX.SGSTRATE, 0-TAX.SGSTAMT, TAX.CESSRATE, 0-TAX.CESSAMT, ROUND(B.QTY * OTH.OTHER_CHG, 2) OTHER_CHG from SALRTMAIN A join SALRTDET B on A.RTCODE = B.RTCODE join ADMSITE C on A.ADMSITE_CODE = C.CODE left join FINSL D on ( A.PCODE = D.SLCODE /*AND C.SLCODE = D.SLCODE*/ ) left join ( select SALRTCHG_ITEM.RTCODE, SALRTCHG_ITEM.SALRTDET_CODE, SUM(coalesce (SALRTCHG_ITEM.CHGAMT, 0)) TAX_AMOUNT from SALRTCHG_ITEM where coalesce(SALRTCHG_ITEM.ISTAX, 'N') = 'Y' and SALRTCHG_ITEM.RTCODE in ( select RTCODE from SALRTMAIN where RTDT between to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) group by SALRTCHG_ITEM.RTCODE, SALRTCHG_ITEM.SALRTDET_CODE ) CHG on (B.RTCODE = CHG.RTCODE and B.code = CHG.SALRTDET_CODE) left join ( select RTCODE, SALRTDET_CODE , APPAMT TAXABLEAMT , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'CGST' then RATE else 0 end) CGSTRATE , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'CGST' then CHGAMT else 0 end) CGSTAMT , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'SGST' then RATE else 0 end) SGSTRATE , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'SGST' then CHGAMT else 0 end) SGSTAMT , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'IGST' then RATE else 0 end) IGSTRATE , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'IGST' then CHGAMT else 0 end) IGSTAMT , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'CESS' then RATE else 0 end) CESSRate , SUM(case when GST_COMPONENT = 'CESS' then CHGAMT else 0 end) CESSAMT from SALRTCHG_ITEM where source = 'G' group by RTCODE, SALRTDET_CODE , APPAMT ) TAX on ( B.RTCODE = TAX.RTCODE and B.CODE = TAX.SALRTDET_CODE) left join( select M.RTCODE, ROUND(SUM(CHGAMT)/ SUM(QTY), 6) OTHER_CHG from ( select RTCODE, SUM(CHGAMT) CHGAMT from SALRTCHG where ISTAX = 'N' and OPERATION_LEVEL = 'H' group by RTCODE ) M , ( select RTCODE, SUM(QTY) QTY from SALRTDET group by RTCODE ) D where M.RTCODE = D.RTCODE group by M.RTCODE ) OTH on (B.RTCODE = OTH.RTCODE) where D.SALETYPE = 'O' and A.RTDT::date between to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) t

entity.object_description: Get consolidated details of GST Transactions (HSN/SAC wise)
entity.sql_stmt: select /* NAME: sq_composite_gst_trnx PURPOSE: REVISIONS: Rev. Date Author Description --------- ---------- ---------------------- --------------------------------------------------- XXX XX/XX/XXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 001 28/05/2024 Dipankar Mandal Migration as per new logic */ row_number() over() uk, ENTRY_SOURCE, ENTRY_SITE, ENTRY_DATE, case when '@CPGSTINSource@' = 'M' then ENTRY_NO else TRNX_ENTRY_NO end ENTRY_NO, ENTRY_TRADETYPE, ENTRY_NETVALUE, case when '@CPGSTINSource@' = 'M' then REF_DOC_NO else TRNX_REF_DOC_NO end REF_DOC_NO, REF_DOC_DATE, GST_APPLICABILITY, case when '@CPGSTINSource@' = 'M' then ETIN else TRNX_ETIN end ETIN, OWNER_GSTIN_NO, OWNER_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, OWNER_GSTIN_STATE_NAME, OWNER_GSTIN_REGISTRATION_DATE, DOCUMENT_STATUS, case when '@CPGSTINSource@' = 'M' then CP_GSTIN_NO else TRNX_CP_GSTIN_NO end CP_GSTIN_NO, case when '@CPGSTINSource@' = 'M' then CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE else TRNX_CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE end CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, CP_GSTIN_STATE_NAME, case when '@CPGSTINSource@' = 'M' then CP_GST_REGISTRATION_STATUS else TRNX_CP_GST_REG_STATUS end CP_GST_REGISTRATION_STATUS, CP_GSTIN_REGISTRATION_DATE, case when '@CPGSTINSource@' = 'M' then CP_NAME else TRNX_CP_NAME end CP_NAME, case when '@CPGSTINSource@' = 'M' then CP_PAN else TRNX_CP_PAN end CP_PAN, CP_CONTACT_PERSON, case when '@CPGSTINSource@' = 'M' then CP_MOBILE else TRNX_CP_MOBILES end CP_MOBILE, case when '@CPGSTINSource@' = 'M' then CP_EMAIL else TRNX_CP_MAIL end CP_EMAIL, CP_CLASS, CP_AGENT_NAME, CP_AGENT_CLASS, ORIGINAL_INV_ENT_NO, ORIGINAL_INV_ENT_DT, ORIGINAL_INV_ENT_NETVALUE, ORIGINAL_INV_REFNO, ORIGINAL_INV_REFDT, DNCN_REASON, case when '@HSNSACSource@' = 'M' then HSN_SAC_CODE else TRNX_HSN_SAC_CODE end HSN_SAC_CODE, case when '@HSNSACSource@' = 'M' then HSN_SAC_DESC else TRNX_HSN_SAC_DESC end HSN_SAC_DESC, UOM, CGST_RATE, SGST_RATE, IGST_RATE, CESS_RATE, TOTAL_TAXRATE, QUANTITY, TAXABLE_AMOUNT, CGST_AMOUNT, SGST_AMOUNT, IGST_AMOUNT, CESS_AMOUNT, NET_AMOUNT, INPUT_ELIGIBILITY, INPUT_CGST_AMOUNT, INPUT_SGST_AMOUNT, INPUT_IGST_AMOUNT, INPUT_CESS_AMOUNT, TRNX_OWNER_GSTIN_NO, TRNX_OWNER_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, TRNX_OWNER_GSTIN_STATE_NAME, TRNX_OWNER_GSTIN_REG_DATE, TRNX_CP_GSTIN_NO, TRNX_CP_GSTIN_STATE_CODE, TRNX_CP_GSTIN_STATE_NAME, TRNX_CP_GSTIN_REG_DATE, TRNX_CP_GST_REG_STATUS, TRNX_CP_NAME, TRNX_CP_PAN, TRNX_CP_MAIL, TRNX_HSN_SAC_CODE, TRNX_HSN_SAC_DESC, TRNX_ENTRY_NO, TRNX_REF_DOC_NO, TRNX_ETIN, TRNX_CP_MOBILES, TRNX_HSN_SAC_ID, HSN_SAC_ID from COMPOSITE_GST where ENTRY_DATE between to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')

entity.object_description: Get Details of Sales Order and Transfer Order in one place. This is query based data source.
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk, ADMYEAR.YNAME ACCOUNTING_PERIOD, M.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE_SRC, M.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE_DES, M.PCODE CUSTOMER_CODE, M.AGCODE, A.SLNAME AGENT_NAME, A.ABBRE AGENT_ALIAS, M.TRPCODE, T.SLNAME TRANSPORTER_NAME, M.SCHEME_DOCNO ORDER_NO, M.ORDDT::DATE ORDER_DATE, M.DOCNO ORDER_DOC_NO, M.DOCDT::DATE ORDER_DOC_DATE, M.DUEDT::DATE ORDER_DUE_DATE, M.REM ORDER_REMARKS, CASE M.STAT WHEN 'T' THEN 'Total Delivered' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Part Delivered' WHEN 'N' THEN 'Not Delivered' END ORDER_STATUS, CASE WHEN M.AUTHORCODE IS NULL THEN 'NO' ELSE 'YES' END IS_AUTHORISED, AUTHOR.FNAME || ' [' || AUTHOR.ENO || ']' AUTHORISED_BY, HRDEMP.FNAME || ' [' || HRDEMP.ENO || ']' PREPARED_BY, M.TIME PREPARED_TIME, D.ICODE BARCODE, D.REM ORDER_ITEM_REMARKS, COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0) ORDER_QTY, COALESCE(D.OQTY,COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0)) ORIGNAL_QTY, COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0)- COALESCE(D.OQTY,COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0)) AMENDED_QTY, COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0) CANCELLED_QTY, COALESCE(D.DQTY,0) DELIVERED_QTY, COALESCE(D.INVQTY,0) INVOICED_QTY, COALESCE(D.OQTY,COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0)) - COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0) -COALESCE(D.DQTY,0) PENDING_ON_ORIGINAL_QTY, COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0)-COALESCE(D.CNLQTY,0)-COALESCE(D.DQTY,0) PENDING_ON_AMMENDED_QTY, COALESCE(D.RATE,0) ORDER_RATE, M.POS_REMARKS POS_ORDER_MAIN_REMARKS, D.POS_REMARKS POS_ORDER_ITEM_REMARKS, CASE WHEN M.SALETYPE = 'O' THEN 'Sales Order' WHEN M.SALETYPE = 'C' THEN 'Transfer Order' END order_type, COALESCE(D.FACTOR,0) ITEM_DISCOUNT_FACTOR, COALESCE(D.DISCOUNT,0) ITEM_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, COALESCE(D.BASIC_RATE,0) ITEM_BASIC_RATE, COALESCE(D.ROUNDOFF,0) ITEM_ROUNDOFF, COALESCE(D.CHGAMT,0) ITEM_CHARGE_AMOUNT, L.PRICELISTNAME PRICELIST_NAME, CASE WHEN COALESCE(M.INCL_VAT_IN_DIST,'N') = 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN COALESCE(M.INCL_VAT_IN_DIST,'N') = 'N' THEN 'No' END INCLUDE_TAX, SALTERMMAIN.SALTERMNAME SALES_TERM_NAME, CASE WHEN M.ISHOLD = 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN M.ISHOLD = 'N' THEN 'No' END IS_HOLD, H.FNAME || ' [' || H.ENO || ']' HELD_BY, M.HELDON HELD_ON, TAX.TAXABLEAMT TAXABLE_AMOUNT, IGSTRATE, IGSTAMT , CGSTRATE, CGSTAMT , SGSTRATE, SGSTAMT , CESSRATE, CESSAMT, COALESCE(D.BASIC_RATE,0) * COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0) ITEM_GROSS_AMOUNT, M.ADMOU_CODE ADMOU_CODE, INITCAP (CASE WHEN COALESCE(M.PRICETYPE,'M') = 'M' THEN 'RSP' WHEN M.PRICETYPE = 'L' THEN 'MRP' WHEN M.PRICETYPE = 'W' THEN 'WSP' WHEN M.PRICETYPE = 'C' THEN 'EFFECTIVE RATE (LAST LANDING COST)' WHEN M.PRICETYPE = 'R' THEN 'STANDARD RATE' WHEN M.PRICETYPE = 'B' THEN 'BASIC RATE (LAST PURCHASE)' END) PRICE_TYPE, M.DISCOUNT_FACTOR DOC_DISCOUNT_FACTOR, M.PRICE_ROUNDOFF DOC_PRICE_ROUND_OFF, INITCAP(CASE WHEN COALESCE (M.ROUNDOFF_LIMIT, 'N') = 'N' THEN 'NO' WHEN COALESCE (M.ROUNDOFF_LIMIT, 'N') = 'Y' THEN 'YES' END) PRICE_ROUND_OFF_LIMIT, CASE WHEN COALESCE(M.DISCOUNT_MODE,'U') = 'U' THEN 'MARKUP' WHEN COALESCE(M.DISCOUNT_MODE,'U') = 'D' THEN 'MARKDOWN' END DOC_PRICE_MODE, CASE WHEN COALESCE(M.DISCOUNT_BASIS,'N') = 'B' THEN 'ON BASE PRICE' WHEN COALESCE(M.DISCOUNT_BASIS,'N') = 'N' THEN 'ON NET PRICE' END DOC_PRICE_BASIS, M.GRSAMT DOC_GROSS_AMOUNT, M.CHGAMT DOC_CHARGE_AMOUNT, M.NETAMT DOC_NET_AMOUNT, CASE WHEN OTX.DOC_OTHER_CHARGE_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL THEN OTX.DOC_OTHER_CHARGE_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END DOC_OTHER_CHARGE_AMOUNT, FINTRADEGRP.NAME TRADE_GROUP_NAME, PS.ORDERNO POS_ORDER_NO, PS.ORDERDATE::DATE POS_ORDER_DATE, M.AUTHORIZATIONTIME AUTHORIZED_ON, M.RESERVE_INV AGAINST_RESERVATION, X.SCHEME_DOCNO_DATE CHALLAN_NO, D.RESERVE_QTY RESERVED_QUANTITY, B.PICK_LIST_QUANTITY, C.PICK_CONFIRM_QUANTITY, COALESCE(TAX1.ITEM_TAX_AMOUNT,0) ITEM_TAX_AMOUNT, COALESCE(TAX1.ITEM_TAX_RATE,0) ITEM_TAX_RATE, COALESCE(D.NETAMT,(COALESCE(D.RATE,0) * COALESCE(D.ORDQTY,0))) + COALESCE(D.CHGAMT,0)+ COALESCE (D.TAXAMT, 0) ITEM_NET_AMOUNT, D.RSP ORDER_RSP, D.POS_CNLQTY POS_ORDER_CANCELLED_QTY, D.POS_CANCELLATIONREMARKS POS_ORDER_CANCELLED_REM, D.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, M.ORDCODE ORDCODE FROM SALORDMAIN M INNER JOIN SALORDDET D ON M.ORDCODE = D.ORDCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL A ON M.AGCODE = A.SLCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL T ON M.TRPCODE = T.SLCODE INNER JOIN ADMYEAR ON M.YCODE = ADMYEAR.YCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP ON M.ECODE = HRDEMP.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP AUTHOR ON M.AUTHORCODE = AUTHOR.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SALPRICELISTMAIN L ON M.PRICELISTCODE = L.PRICELISTCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SALTERMMAIN ON M.SALTERMCODE = SALTERMMAIN.SALTERMCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP H ON M.HELDBY = H.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN FINTRADEGRP ON M.SALTRADEGRP_CODE = FINTRADEGRP.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PSITE_POSORDER PS ON M.PSITE_POSORDER_CODE = PS.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT SALORDDET_CODE, TAXABLE_AMOUNT TAXABLEAMT, SUM (CGST_RATE) CGSTRATE, SUM (CGST_AMOUNT) CGSTAMT, SUM (SGST_RATE) SGSTRATE, SUM (SGST_AMOUNT) SGSTAMT, SUM (IGST_RATE) IGSTRATE, SUM (IGST_AMOUNT) IGSTAMT, SUM (CESS_Rate) CESSRATE, SUM (CESS_AMOUNT) CESSAMT FROM (SELECT SALORDDET_CODE, APPAMT TAXABLE_AMOUNT, RATE CGST_RATE, SUM (CHGAMT) CGST_AMOUNT, 0 SGST_RATE, 0 SGST_AMOUNT, 0 IGST_RATE, 0 IGST_AMOUNT, 0 CESS_RATE, 0 CESS_AMOUNT FROM SALORDCHG_ITEM WHERE GST_COMPONENT = 'CGST' GROUP BY SALORDDET_CODE, APPAMT, RATE UNION ALL SELECT SALORDDET_CODE, APPAMT TAXABLE_AMOUNT, 0 CGST_RATE, 0 CGST_AMOUNT, RATE SGST_RATE, SUM (CHGAMT) SGST_AMOUNT, 0 IGST_RATE, 0 IGST_AMOUNT, 0 CESS_RATE, 0 CESS_AMOUNT FROM SALORDCHG_ITEM WHERE GST_COMPONENT = 'SGST' GROUP BY SALORDDET_CODE, APPAMT, RATE UNION ALL SELECT SALORDDET_CODE, APPAMT TAXABLE_AMOUNT, 0 CGST_RATE, 0 CGST_AMOUNT, 0 SGST_RATE, 0 SGST_AMOUNT, RATE IGST_RATE, SUM (CHGAMT) IGST_AMOUNT, 0 CESS_RATE, 0 CESS_AMOUNT FROM SALORDCHG_ITEM WHERE GST_COMPONENT = 'IGST' GROUP BY SALORDDET_CODE, APPAMT, RATE UNION ALL SELECT SALORDDET_CODE, APPAMT TAXABLE_AMOUNT, 0 CGST_RATE, 0 CGST_AMOUNT, 0 SGST_RATE, 0 SGST_AMOUNT, 0 IGST_RATE, 0 IGST_AMOUNT, RATE CESS_RATE, SUM (CHGAMT) CESS_AMOUNT FROM SALORDCHG_ITEM WHERE GST_COMPONENT = 'CESS' GROUP BY SALORDDET_CODE, APPAMT, RATE) GROUP BY SALORDDET_CODE, TAXABLE_AMOUNT) TAX ON D.CODE = TAX.SALORDDET_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT SALORDDET_CODE, SUM (COALESCE (CHGAMT,0)) DOC_OTHER_CHARGE_AMOUNT FROM SALORDCHG_ITEM WHERE ISTAX = 'N' GROUP BY SALORDDET_CODE) OTX ON D.CODE = OTX.SALORDDET_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ORDDET_CODE, SUM (PICKLIST_QTY) PICK_LIST_QUANTITY FROM INVRESERVEDET GROUP BY ORDDET_CODE) B ON D.CODE = B.ORDDET_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ORDDET_CODE, SUM (CONFIRM_QTY) PICK_CONFIRM_QUANTITY FROM INVPICKLISTDET GROUP BY ORDDET_CODE) C ON D.CODE = C.ORDDET_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT SALORDDET_CODE, SUM (COALESCE (CHGAMT,0)) ITEM_TAX_AMOUNT, RATE ITEM_TAX_RATE FROM SALORDCHG_ITEM WHERE ISTAX = 'Y' GROUP BY SALORDDET_CODE,RATE) TAX1 ON D.CODE = TAX1.SALORDDET_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.icode , d.ordcode, string_agg((m.SCHEME_DOCNO || ',' || m.DCDT::DATE), ' | ' order by SCHEME_DOCNO) SCHEME_DOCNO_DATE from invdcmain m inner join invdcdet d on (m.dccode = d.dccode) group by d.icode, d.ordcode) X ON (X.ORDCODE = d.ORDCODE and d.icode = x.icode) WHERE M.ORDDT::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')

entity.object_description: Inventory in-transit will be shown with respect to sent / To be received Site. This data is suitable to get as on date transit data.
entity.sql_stmt: With selected_sitecode as (SELECT CODE FROM admsite WHERE name IN ( SELECT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '')) OR COALESCE(length('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@'), 0) = 0) select /* NAME: sq_intransit_summary PURPOSE: REVISIONS: Rev. Date Author Description --------- ---------- ---------------------- --------------------------------------------------- XXX XX/XX/XXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 001 08/07/2024 Tanmoy Adak Migration of CUBE$INTRNSUM */ row_number() over() UK, to_char(current_timestamp,'DD-MM-YYYY hh:mi:ss AM') REPORT_DATE, to_char(to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD'),'DD-MM-YYYY') START_DATE, to_char(to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD'),'DD-MM-YYYY') END_DATE, transfer_type TRANSFERTYPE, SRC_SITE_CODE SRC_SITECODE, DES_SITE_CODE DES_SITECODE, out_no SENT_DOCUMENT_NO, to_char(out_date,'DD-MM-YYYY') SENT_DOCUMENT_DATE, packet_no PACKETNO, PACKET_barcode PACKETBARCODE, (current_date - out_date) TRANSIT_DAYS, out_line_sent_qty SENDQTY, out_line_sent_amt SENDAMT from ( select * from sitetosite_outward_data where out_date <= to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) o inner join selected_sitecode ss on o.src_site_code=ss.code left join ( select * from sitetosite_inward_data where in_date <= to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD'))i on o.out_line_code = i.out_line_code where i.out_line_code is null

entity.object_description: Get three types of conversion information in one place in this data source. This is query based data source.
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk, SITECODE, ENTRY_TYPE, ENTRY_SUB_TYPE, ENTRY_DATE, ENTRY_NO, ENTRY_DOCNO, PROCESS, JOBBER, JOBBER_ALIAS, PREVIOUS_ENTRY_NO, SERVICE_INVOICE_NO, SERVICE_INVOICE_DATE, STOCKPOINT, PREPARED_BY, BARCODE, LINEITEM_SEQ, ENTRY_QTY, ENTRY_SERVICE_RATE, ENTRY_SERVICE_AMOUNT, ENTRY_RATE, ENTRY_REMARKS, LINEITEM_REMARKS, PREPARED_ON, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_ON, AUTHORIZED_BY, AUTHORIZED_ON, UDFSTRING01, UDFSTRING02, UDFSTRING03, UDFSTRING04, UDFSTRING05, UDFSTRING06, UDFSTRING07, UDFSTRING08, UDFSTRING09, UDFSTRING10, UDFNUM01, UDFNUM02, UDFNUM03, UDFNUM04, UDFNUM05, UDFDATE01, UDFDATE02, UDFDATE03, UDFDATE04, UDFDATE05, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, PCODE FROM ( SELECT PRDORD.ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, CASE WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'P' THEN 'Production' WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'C' THEN 'Bundle' WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'H' THEN 'Split' END ENTRY_TYPE, CASE WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'P' THEN 'Production' WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'C' THEN 'Receive' WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'H' THEN 'New' END ENTRY_SUB_TYPE, PRDORD.ORDDT::DATE ENTRY_DATE, PRDORD.SCHEME_DOCNO ENTRY_NO, PRDORD.DOCNO ENTRY_DOCNO, PRDPR.PRNAME PROCESS, FINSL.SLNAME JOBBER, FINSL.ABBRE JOBBER_ALIAS, PORD.ORDNO PREVIOUS_ENTRY_NO, PURSRVMAIN.SCHEME_DOCNO SERVICE_INVOICE_NO, PURSRVMAIN.SRVDT::DATE SERVICE_INVOICE_DATE, COALESCE(PS.NAME,INVLOC.LOCNAME) STOCKPOINT, HRDEMP.FNAME PREPARED_BY, PRDRC.ICODE BARCODE, PRDRC.SEQ LINEITEM_SEQ, COALESCE(PRDRC.QTY, 0) ENTRY_QTY, COALESCE(PRDRC.SRVRATE, 0) ENTRY_SERVICE_RATE, COALESCE(PRDRC.SRVAMT, 0) ENTRY_SERVICE_AMOUNT, COALESCE(PRDRC.RATE, 0) ENTRY_RATE, PRDORD.REM ENTRY_REMARKS, PRDRC.rem LINEITEM_REMARKS, PRDORD.TIME PREPARED_ON, HRDEMP.FNAME LAST_MODIFIED_BY, PRDORD.LAST_ACCESS_TIME LAST_MODIFIED_ON, AU.FNAME AUTHORIZED_BY, PRDORD.AUTH_TIME AUTHORIZED_ON, PRDORD.UDFSTRING01, PRDORD.UDFSTRING02, PRDORD.UDFSTRING03, PRDORD.UDFSTRING04, PRDORD.UDFSTRING05, PRDORD.UDFSTRING06, PRDORD.UDFSTRING07, PRDORD.UDFSTRING08, PRDORD.UDFSTRING09, PRDORD.UDFSTRING10, PRDORD.UDFNUM01, PRDORD.UDFNUM02, PRDORD.UDFNUM03, PRDORD.UDFNUM04, PRDORD.UDFNUM05, PRDORD.UDFDATE01, PRDORD.UDFDATE02, PRDORD.UDFDATE03, PRDORD.UDFDATE04, PRDORD.UDFDATE05, PRDRC.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, PRDORD.PCODE PCODE FROM PRDORD INNER JOIN PRDRC ON PRDORD.ORDCODE = PRDRC.ORDCODE INNER JOIN PRDPR ON PRDORD.PRCODE = PRDPR.PRCODE INNER JOIN FINSL ON PRDORD.PCODE = FINSL.SLCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDORD PORD ON PRDORD.PRVORDCODE = PORD.ORDCODE INNER JOIN HRDEMP ON PRDORD.ECODE = HRDEMP.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PURSRVMAIN ON PRDORD.SRVCODE = PURSRVMAIN.SRVCODE INNER JOIN INVLOC ON PRDRC.LOCCODE = INVLOC.LOCCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP LM ON PRDORD.LAST_ACCESS_ECODE = LM.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP AU ON PRDORD.AUTH_ECODE = AU.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PSITE_STOCKPOINT PS ON PS.CODE = PRDRC.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE WHERE PRDORD.ORDDT::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT PRDORD.ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, CASE WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'P' THEN 'Production' WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'C' THEN 'Bundle' WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'H' THEN 'Split' END ENTRY_TYPE, CASE WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'P' THEN 'Consumption' WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'C' THEN 'Issue' WHEN PRDPR.PRTYPE = 'H' THEN 'Old' END ENTRY_SUB_TYPE, PRDORD.ORDDT::DATE ENTRY_DATE, PRDORD.SCHEME_DOCNO ENTRY_NO, PRDORD.DOCNO ENTRY_DOCNO, PRDPR.PRNAME PROCESS, FINSL.SLNAME JOBBER, FINSL.ABBRE JOBBER_ALIAS, PORD.ORDNO PREVIOUS_ENTRY_NO, PURSRVMAIN.SCHEME_DOCNO SERVICE_INVOICE_NO, PURSRVMAIN.SRVDT::DATE SERVICE_INVOICE_DATE, COALESCE(PS.NAME,INVLOC.LOCNAME) STOCKPOINT, HRDEMP.FNAME PREPARED_BY, PRDIS.ICODE BARCODE, PRDIS.SEQ LINEITEM_SEQ, COALESCE(PRDIS.QTY, 0) ENTRY_QTY, 0 ENTRY_SERVICE_RATE, 0 ENTRY_SERVICE_AMOUNT, PRDIS.COSTRATE ENTRY_RATE, PRDORD.REM ENTRY_REMARKS, PRDIS.rem LINEITEM_REMARKS, PRDORD.TIME PREPARED_ON, HRDEMP.FNAME LAST_MODIFIED_BY, PRDORD.LAST_ACCESS_TIME LAST_MODIFIED_ON, AU.FNAME AUTHORIZED_BY, PRDORD.AUTH_TIME AUTHORIZED_ON, PRDORD.UDFSTRING01, PRDORD.UDFSTRING02, PRDORD.UDFSTRING03, PRDORD.UDFSTRING04, PRDORD.UDFSTRING05, PRDORD.UDFSTRING06, PRDORD.UDFSTRING07, PRDORD.UDFSTRING08, PRDORD.UDFSTRING09, PRDORD.UDFSTRING10, PRDORD.UDFNUM01, PRDORD.UDFNUM02, PRDORD.UDFNUM03, PRDORD.UDFNUM04, PRDORD.UDFNUM05, PRDORD.UDFDATE01, PRDORD.UDFDATE02, PRDORD.UDFDATE03, PRDORD.UDFDATE04, PRDORD.UDFDATE05, PRDIS.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, PRDORD.PCODE PCODE FROM PRDORD INNER JOIN PRDIS ON PRDORD.ORDCODE = PRDIS.ORDCODE INNER JOIN PRDPR ON PRDORD.PRCODE = PRDPR.PRCODE INNER JOIN FINSL ON PRDORD.PCODE = FINSL.SLCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDORD PORD ON PRDORD.PRVORDCODE = PORD.ORDCODE INNER JOIN HRDEMP ON PRDORD.ECODE = HRDEMP.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PURSRVMAIN ON PRDORD.SRVCODE = PURSRVMAIN.SRVCODE INNER JOIN INVLOC ON PRDIS.LOCCODE = INVLOC.LOCCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP LM ON PRDORD.LAST_ACCESS_ECODE = LM.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN HRDEMP AU ON PRDORD.AUTH_ECODE = AU.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PSITE_STOCKPOINT PS ON PS.CODE = PRDIS.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE WHERE PRDORD.ORDDT::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') )

entity.object_description: Get order item wise material requirement. Details for each component items like Required Qty, Issued Qty, Consumed Qty, Cancel Qty, Tolerance, Shrinkage etc is displayed. Note : Performance will impact for large data volume
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk, A.JOBNO job_no, A.JOB_DATE::DATE, A.REF_NO, CASE WHEN A.JOBTYPE = 'AS' THEN 'ADHOC STANDARD' WHEN A.JOBTYPE = 'LS' THEN 'LOT BASE STANDARD' WHEN A.JOBTYPE = 'LN' THEN 'LOT BASE NON-STANDARD' END JOB_TYPE, A.REMARKS MAIN_REMARK, CASE WHEN A.IS_CLOSED = 'Y' THEN 'YES' WHEN A.IS_CLOSED = 'N' THEN 'NO' END IS_CLOSED, A.CLOSE_DATE::DATE, C.OPERATION_SEQ, CASE WHEN C.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'P' THEN 'PUSH' WHEN C.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'O' THEN 'PULL ON ORDER' WHEN C.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'C' THEN 'PULL ON COMPLETION' END SUPPLY_TYPE, CASE WHEN C.ISMANDATORY = 'Y' THEN 'YES' WHEN C.ISMANDATORY = 'N' THEN 'NO' END IS_MANDATORY, CASE WHEN C.COMPONENT_TYPE = 'S' THEN 'STANDARD' WHEN C.COMPONENT_TYPE = 'N' THEN 'NON-STANDARD' WHEN C.COMPONENT_TYPE = 'A' THEN 'ALTERED' END COMPONENT_TYPE, C.QTY JOB_BOM_QTY, round(C.BOM_QTY,3) BOM_QTY, C.TOLERANCE, C.SHRINKAGE, C.ISSUED_QTY ISSUED_QTY, C.RETURN_QTY RETURNED_QTY, C.WASTAGE_QTY WASTED_QTY, C.CANCEL_QTY CANCELLED_QTY, C.REMARKS BOM_REMARK, A.CODE PRDJOB_CODE, B.LOTCODE PRDPLAN_CODE, B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE BARCODE, C.COMPONENT_ICODE, C.ALT_GRPCODE ALT_GROUP_CODE, ADMSITE.CODE SITECODE, CASE WHEN C.ISSUE_ASSEMBLY_ITEM = 'O' THEN 'On Order' WHEN C.ISSUE_ASSEMBLY_ITEM = 'P' THEN 'Push/Manual' WHEN C.ISSUE_ASSEMBLY_ITEM = 'N' THEN 'None' END ISSUE_ASSEMBLY_ITEM, C.CONSUMED_QTY, C.SHORT_EXCESS_QTY, A.PRCODE, PRD_SAITEM.SAINAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_NAME, PRD_SAITEM.SHORT_NAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_SHORT_NAME, L1.WORKING_PLAN_NO, L1.WORKING_PLAN_DATE, M.MASTER_PLAN_NO, M.MASTER_PLAN_DATE, M.SALES_ORDER_NO, M.SALES_ORDER_DATE, C.ALTERNATE_CNL_QTY ALTERNATE_CANCEL_QTY, M.SALES_ORDER_SCHEME_DOCNO, L.LOCNAME ISSUE_STOCKPOINT FROM PRDJOBMAIN A INNER JOIN PRDJOBDET B ON A.CODE = B.JOBCODE INNER JOIN PRDJOBBOM C ON B.CODE = C.PRDJOBDET_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN INVLOC L ON C.ISSUE_LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE ON A.ADMSITE_CODE = ADMSITE.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRD_SAITEM ON B.ASS_SAITEM_CODE = PRD_SAITEM.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT D.LOTCODE, D.ASSEMBLY_ICODE, D.PRDMPLANALLOC_CODE, M.LOTNO WORKING_PLAN_NO, M.SCHEDULE_DATE WORKING_PLAN_DATE FROM PRDLOTMAIN M INNER JOIN PRDLOTDET D ON M.CODE = D.LOTCODE) L1 ON B.LOTCODE = L1.LOTCODE AND B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = L1.ASSEMBLY_ICODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT A.CODE, A.ASSEMBLY_ICODE, M.PLANNO MASTER_PLAN_NO, M.SCHEDULE_DATE MASTER_PLAN_DATE, S.ORDNO SALES_ORDER_NO, S.ORDDT SALES_ORDER_DATE, S.SCHEME_DOCNO SALES_ORDER_SCHEME_DOCNO FROM PRDMPLANALLOC A INNER JOIN PRDMPLANDET B ON A.PRDMPLANDET_CODE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDMPLANMAIN M ON B.PLANCODE = M.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SALORDMAIN S ON M.ORDCODE = S.ORDCODE) M ON L1.PRDMPLANALLOC_CODE = M.CODE AND L1.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = M.ASSEMBLY_ICODE WHERE A.JOB_DATE::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')

entity.object_description: Get Job Order Item details. Information for Assembly item Order Qty, Cancel Qty, Receive Qty and Pending Qty for each assembly item in the order can be verified. Pending quantity as on given date can also be checked for a given assembly item. Note : Performance will impact for large data volume
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk, A.JOBNO JOB_NO, A.JOB_DATE::DATE, A.REF_NO, CASE WHEN A.JOBTYPE = 'AS' THEN 'ADHOC' WHEN A.JOBTYPE = 'AN' THEN 'REPROCESS' WHEN A.JOBTYPE = 'LS' THEN 'LOT BASE STANDARD' WHEN A.JOBTYPE = 'LN' THEN 'LOT BASE NON-STANDARD' END JOB_TYPE, A.REMARKS MAIN_REMARK, CASE WHEN A.IS_CLOSED = 'Y' THEN 'YES' WHEN A.IS_CLOSED = 'N' THEN 'NO' END IS_CLOSED, A.CLOSE_DATE::DATE, B.OPERATION_SEQ, B.QTY JOB_QTY, B.JOB_RATE, B.P_QTY PENDING_QTY, B.O_QTY ORIGINAL_QTY, B.COMPLETED_QTY, B.CNL_QTY CANCELLED_QTY, B.REMARKS DET_REMARK, B.CONSIDER_IN_WIP, B.DUEDT::DATE DUE_DATE, B.PREV_OPERATION_SEQ, A.CODE PRDJOB_CODE, B.LOTCODE PRDPLAN_CODE, A.PCODE PARTY_CODE, A.PRCODE PROCESS_CODE, B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE BARCODE, B.PREV_PRCODE PREV_PROCESS_CODE, ADMSITE.CODE SITECODE, PRD_SAITEM.SAINAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_NAME, PRD_SAITEM.SHORT_NAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_SHORT_NAME, L.WORKING_PLAN_NO, L.WORKING_PLAN_DATE::DATE, M.MASTER_PLAN_NO, M.MASTER_PLAN_DATE, M.SALES_ORDER_NO, M.SALES_ORDER_SCHEME_DOCNO, M.SALES_ORDER_DATE::DATE, INVLOC.LOCNAME JOBBER_WIP_STOCK_POINT, W.NAME WIP_TRACK, JR.RC_QTY DTTO_COMPLETED_QTY, JC.CNL_QTY DTTO_CNL_QTY, (COALESCE (B.QTY, 0) - COALESCE (JR.RC_QTY, 0) - COALESCE (JC.CNL_QTY, 0)) DTTO_PEND_QTY, H.FNAME CREATED_BY, B.ALTERNATE_QTY ALTERNATE_COMPLETED_QTY, A.REF_DT::DATE REF_DATE FROM PRDJOBMAIN A INNER JOIN PRDJOBDET B ON A.CODE = B.JOBCODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE ON A.ADMSITE_CODE = ADMSITE.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN INVLOC ON A.JOBBER_LOCCODE = INVLOC.LOCCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRD_SAITEM ON B.ASS_SAITEM_CODE = PRD_SAITEM.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRD_WIPTRACK W ON A.PRD_WIPTRACK_CODE = W.CODE INNER JOIN HRDEMP H ON A.ECODE = H.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT D.LOTCODE, D.ASSEMBLY_ICODE, D.PRDMPLANALLOC_CODE, M.LOTNO WORKING_PLAN_NO, M.SCHEDULE_DATE WORKING_PLAN_DATE FROM PRDLOTMAIN M INNER JOIN PRDLOTDET D ON M.CODE = D.LOTCODE) L ON B.LOTCODE = L.LOTCODE AND B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = L.ASSEMBLY_ICODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT A.CODE, A.ASSEMBLY_ICODE, M.PLANNO MASTER_PLAN_NO, M.SCHEDULE_DATE MASTER_PLAN_DATE, S.ORDNO SALES_ORDER_NO, S.ORDDT SALES_ORDER_DATE, S.SCHEME_DOCNO SALES_ORDER_SCHEME_DOCNO FROM PRDMPLANALLOC A INNER JOIN PRDMPLANDET B ON A.PRDMPLANDET_CODE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDMPLANMAIN M ON B.PLANCODE = M.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SALORDMAIN S ON M.ORDCODE = S.ORDCODE) M ON L.PRDMPLANALLOC_CODE = M.CODE AND L.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = M.ASSEMBLY_ICODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT SUM (RD.QTY) RC_QTY, RD.JOBDET_CODE JOBDET_CODE FROM PRDJRCMAIN RM INNER JOIN PRDJRCDET RD ON RM.CODE = RD.JRCCODE AND RM.JRC_DATE <= to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY RD.JOBDET_CODE) JR ON B.CODE = JR.JOBDET_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT SUM (CD.QTY) CNL_QTY, CD.PRDJOBDET_CODE PRDJOBDET_CODE FROM PRDJOBCNLMAIN CM INNER JOIN PRDJOBCNLDET CD ON CM.CODE = CD.CNLCODE AND CM.CNLDT <= to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY CD.PRDJOBDET_CODE) JC ON B.CODE = JC.PRDJOBDET_CODE WHERE A.JOB_DATE::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')

entity.object_description: Get Job Receipt details. Information for Job Receipt details like Process Name, Jobber, Assembly item, Receive Qty for each assembly item in the receipt can be verified. Service Rate and Amount for the Receipt is also reflected here. Note : Performance will impact for large data volume
entity.sql_stmt: select row_number() over() uk, A.JRCNO JRC_NO, A.JRC_DATE::DATE, A.REFNO REF_NO, A.REF_DATE::DATE, A.DOCNO DOC_NO, A.DOCDT::DATE DOC_DATE, A.REMARKS MAIN_REMARK, B.QTY*COALESCE(B.JOB_RATE,0) SERVICE_AMOUNT, B.QTY RECEIVE_QTY, B.JOB_RATE RECEIVE_RATE, B.RECEIVE_LOCCODE RECEIVE_LOCATION_CODE, B.REMARKS DET_REMARK, A.CODE PRDJRC_CODE, B.JOBCODE PRDJOB_CODE, B.LOTCODE PRDPLAN_CODE, A.PCODE PARTY_CODE, A.PRCODE PROCESS_CODE, A.SRVCODE SRV_CODE, B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE BARCODE, ADMSITE.CODE SITECODE, B.JOB_ASSEMBLY_ICODE ORDER_ITEM_BARCODE, B.COSTRATE FINISHED_GOODS_FIFO_COST, B.RATE FINISHED_GOODS_COST, PRD_SAITEM.SAINAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_NAME, PRD_SAITEM.SHORT_NAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_SHORT_NAME, L.WORKING_PLAN_NO , L.WORKING_PLAN_DATE::DATE, M.MASTER_PLAN_NO, M.MASTER_PLAN_DATE::DATE, M.SALES_ORDER_NO, M.SALES_ORDER_DATE::DATE, PRDJOBMAIN.JOBNO JOB_ORDER_NO, PRDJOBMAIN.JOB_DATE::DATE JOB_ORDER_DATE, S.SCHEME_DOCNO TAGGED_SERVICE_INVOICE_NO, S.SRVDT::DATE TAGGED_SERVICE_INVOICE_DATE, CASE WHEN COALESCE(A.SRVCODE,0) = 0 THEN 'Pending' ELSE 'Invoice' END STATUS, S.FNAME PREPARED_BY, S.DOCNO TAGGED_SERVICE_INVOICE_REF_NO, CASE WHEN PRDJOBMAIN.JOBTYPE = 'LS' THEN 'PlanBased Standard' WHEN PRDJOBMAIN.JOBTYPE = 'LN' THEN 'PlanBased NonStandard' WHEN PRDJOBMAIN.JOBTYPE = 'AS' THEN 'Adhoc' WHEN PRDJOBMAIN.JOBTYPE = 'AN' THEN 'Reprocess' ELSE 'Others' END JOB_TYPE, PRDJOBDET.CONSIDER_IN_WIP IS_WIP, E.FNAME JRC_CREATED_BY, A.TIME JRC_CREATED_ON, G.GATEINNO GATEINNO, G.GATEINDT GATEINDT, G.GATEINQTY GATEINQTY, LGT.LGTNO LGTNO, LGT.QTY1 LGTQTY, LGT.LGTDT LGTDT FROM PRDJRCMAIN A INNER JOIN PRDJRCDET B ON A.CODE = B.JRCCODE INNER JOIN PRDJOBDET ON B.JOBDET_CODE = PRDJOBDET.CODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE ON A.ADMSITE_CODE = ADMSITE.CODE INNER JOIN HRDEMP E ON A.ECODE = E.ECODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT S.SRVCODE,S.SCHEME_DOCNO,DOCNO,S.SRVDT,H.FNAME FROM PURSRVMAIN S INNER JOIN HRDEMP H ON S.ECODE = H.ECODE ) S ON A.SRVCODE = S.SRVCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRD_SAITEM ON B.ASS_SAITEM_CODE = PRD_SAITEM.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDJOBMAIN ON B.JOBCODE = PRDJOBMAIN.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT D.LOTCODE ,D.ASSEMBLY_ICODE ,D.PRDMPLANALLOC_CODE ,M.LOTNO WORKING_PLAN_NO ,M.SCHEDULE_DATE WORKING_PLAN_DATE FROM PRDLOTMAIN M INNER JOIN PRDLOTDET D ON M.CODE = D.LOTCODE) L ON B.LOTCODE = L.LOTCODE AND B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = L.ASSEMBLY_ICODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT A.CODE ,A.ASSEMBLY_ICODE ,M.PLANNO MASTER_PLAN_NO ,M.SCHEDULE_DATE MASTER_PLAN_DATE ,S.ORDNO SALES_ORDER_NO ,S.ORDDT SALES_ORDER_DATE FROM PRDMPLANALLOC A INNER JOIN PRDMPLANDET B ON A.PRDMPLANDET_CODE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDMPLANMAIN M ON B.PLANCODE = M.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SALORDMAIN S ON M.ORDCODE = S.ORDCODE) M ON L.PRDMPLANALLOC_CODE = M.CODE AND L.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = M.ASSEMBLY_ICODE LEFT OUTER JOIN INVGATEIN G ON A.INVGATEIN_CODE = G.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN INVLGTNOTE LGT ON G.LGTCODE = LGT.LGTCODE WHERE A.JRC_DATE::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')

select /* NAME: sq_pos_executive_summary PURPOSE: REVISIONS: Rev. Date Author Description --------- ---------- ---------------------- --------------------------------------------------- XXX XX/XX/XXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 001 27/08/2024 Tanmoy Adak Migration as per new logic */ row_number() over() UK, sitecode, entry_date, entry_seq, entry_type, entry_group, value_char, value_number, displayvalue from pos_executive_summary where entry_date::date between to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD') and sitecode IN (SELECT CODE FROM admsite WHERE name IN (SELECT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '')) OR COALESCE(length('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@'), 0) = 0)

entity.object_description: Complete movement of inventory between sites will be shown to produce comprehensive picture of all site to site inventory movement. It is suitable to produce a detail report of Transit inventory as well.
entity.sql_stmt: select ROW_NUMBER () OVER() UK , /*Against Bug 87232*/ OTW.transfer_mode , OTW.out_code , OTW.out_line_code , INW.in_code , INW.in_line_icode , OTW.transfer_type TRANSFER_TYPE , OTW.src_site_code SRC_SITECODE , OTW.des_site_code DES_SITECODE , OTW.out_no SENT_DOCUMENT_NO , OTW.out_date::DATE SENT_DOCUMENT_DATE , OTW.packet_no PACKET_NO , OTW.packet_barcode PACKET_BARCODE , case when INW.in_code is null then 'IN-TRANSIT' else 'RECEIVED' end PACKET_STATUS , INW.in_no RECEIVED_DOCUMENT_NO , INW.in_date::TIMESTAMP RECEIVED_DOCUMENT_DATE , /*Against Bug 87232*/ case when INW.in_date::DATE is not null then INW.in_date::DATE - OTW.out_date::DATE else CURRENT_DATE::DATE - OTW.out_date::DATE end TRANSIT_DAYS , OTW.out_line_icode BARCODE , coalesce (OTW.out_line_sent_qty, 0) SEND_QTY , coalesce (INW.in_line_receive_qty, 0) RECEIVE_QTY , coalesce (INW.in_line_damage_qty, 0) DAMAGE_QTY , coalesce (INW.in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0) SHORTEXCESS_QTY , coalesce (OTW.out_line_sent_amt, 0) SEND_AMOUNT , coalesce (INW.in_line_receive_amt, 0) RECEIVE_AMOUNT , coalesce (INW.in_line_damage_amt, 0) DAMAGE_AMOUNT , coalesce (INW.in_line_shortexcess_amt, 0) SHORTEXCESS_AMOUNT , OTW.out_line_remarks PACKET_ITEM_REMARKS , OTW.out_transporter INVOICE_TRANSPORTER , OTW.out_remarks INVOICE_REMARKS , OTW.packet_doc_remarks PACKET_DOCUMENT_REMARKS , OTW.out_auth_status AUTHORIZATION_STATUS , OTW.out_auth_by AUTHORIZATION_BY , OTW.out_auth_on::date AUTHORIZATION_TIME , OTW.out_docno DOCUMENT_NO , OTW.packet_out_stockpoint SRC_STOCK_POINT , INW.in_stockpoint DEST_STOCK_POINT , OTW.out_line_chgamt SENT_LINE_LEVEL_CHG , INW.in_line_chargeamt RECEIVE_LINE_LEVEL_CHG , OTW.out_reason REASON , OTW.out_vehicle_no VEHICLENO , OTW.out_logistic_no LOGISTIC_NO , OTW.out_logistic_date LOGISTIC_DATE , OTW.out_line_hsn_code HSN_CODE , OTW.out_line_hsn_sac_id HSN_SAC_ID , OTW.out_line_hsn_description HSN_DESCRIPTION , coalesce (OTW.out_line_taxable_amt, 0) TAXABLE_AMOUNT , OTW.out_line_cgst_rate CGST_RATE , coalesce (OTW.out_line_cgst_amt, 0) CGST_AMOUNT , OTW.out_line_sgst_rate SGST_RATE , coalesce (OTW.out_line_sgst_amt, 0) SGST_AMOUNT , OTW.out_line_igst_rate IGST_RATE , coalesce (OTW.out_line_igst_amt, 0) IGST_AMOUNT , OTW.out_line_cess_rate CESS_RATE , coalesce (OTW.out_line_cess_amt, 0) CESS_AMOUNT , OTW.out_line_cost_rate COSTRATE , coalesce (OTW.out_line_cost_amt, 0) COSTAMOUNT , INW.in_line_rate , OTW.out_gstdocno GSTDOCNO , OTW.out_ewaybillno EWAYBILLNO , OTW.out_ewaybillvalidupto EWAYBILLVALIDUPTO , OTW.out_ewaybillgeneratedon EWAYBILLGENERATEDON from sitetosite_outward_data OTW left join sitetosite_inward_data INW on OTW.out_line_code = INW.out_line_code where OTW.out_date::DATE between TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')

entity.object_description: Complete movement of inventory between sites will be shown to produce comprehensive picture of all site to site inventory movement. It is suitable to produce a summary report of Transit inventory as well.
entity.sql_stmt: with dta as ( select row_number() over() UK, OTW.transfer_mode, OTW.out_code , OTW.out_line_code , INW.in_code , INW.in_line_icode, OTW.transfer_type, OTW.src_site_code src_site_code, OTW.des_site_code des_site_code, OTW.out_no out_no, OTW.out_date::DATE out_date, OTW.packet_no PACKET_NO, OTW.packet_barcode PACKET_BARCODE, case when INW.in_code is null then 'IN-TRANSIT' else 'RECEIVED' end status, INW.in_no in_no, INW.in_date::DATE in_date, case when INW.in_date::DATE is not null then INW.in_date::DATE - OTW.out_date::DATE else CURRENT_DATE::DATE - OTW.out_date::DATE end TRANSIT_DAYS, OTW.out_line_icode, coalesce (OTW.out_line_sent_qty, 0) out_line_sent_qty, coalesce (INW.in_line_receive_qty, 0) in_line_receive_qty, coalesce (INW.in_line_damage_qty, 0) in_line_damage_qty, coalesce (INW.in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0) in_line_shortexcess_qty, coalesce (OTW.out_line_sent_amt, 0) out_line_sent_amt, coalesce (INW.in_line_receive_amt, 0) in_line_receive_amt, coalesce (INW.in_line_damage_amt, 0) in_line_damage_amt, coalesce (INW.in_line_shortexcess_amt, 0) in_line_shortexcess_amt, OTW.out_line_remarks, OTW.out_transporter, OTW.out_remarks, OTW.packet_doc_remarks, OTW.out_auth_status, OTW.out_auth_by, OTW.out_auth_on::date out_auth_on, OTW.out_docno, OTW.packet_out_stockpoint, INW.in_stockpoint, OTW.out_line_chgamt, INW.in_line_chargeamt, OTW.out_reason, OTW.out_vehicle_no, OTW.out_logistic_no, OTW.out_logistic_date, OTW.out_line_hsn_code, OTW.out_line_hsn_sac_id, OTW.out_line_hsn_description, coalesce (OTW.out_line_taxable_amt, 0) out_line_taxable_amt, OTW.out_line_cgst_rate, coalesce (OTW.out_line_cgst_amt, 0) out_line_cgst_amt, OTW.out_line_sgst_rate, coalesce (OTW.out_line_sgst_amt, 0) out_line_sgst_amt, OTW.out_line_igst_rate, coalesce (OTW.out_line_igst_amt, 0) out_line_igst_amt, OTW.out_line_cess_rate, coalesce (OTW.out_line_cess_amt, 0) out_line_cess_amt, OTW.out_line_cost_rate, coalesce (OTW.out_line_cost_amt, 0) out_line_cost_amt, INW.in_line_rate , OTW.out_gstdocno, OTW.out_ewaybillno, OTW.out_ewaybillvalidupto, OTW.out_ewaybillgeneratedon from sitetosite_outward_data OTW left join sitetosite_inward_data INW on OTW.out_line_code = INW.out_line_code where OTW.out_date::DATE between TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) select row_number() over() UK, out_auth_status AUTHORIZATION_STATUS, LVL, TRANSFER_TYPE, src_site_code SRC_SITECODE, des_site_code DES_SITECODE, out_line_sent_amt SEND_AMOUNT, in_line_receive_amt RECEIVE_AMOUNT, in_line_damage_amt DAMAGE_AMOUNT, in_line_shortexcess_amt SHORTEXCESS_AMOUNT, IN_TRANSIT_AMOUNT , SEND_GST_AMOUNT, out_line_sent_qty SEND_QTY, in_line_receive_qty RECEIVE_QTY, in_line_damage_qty DAMAGE_QTY, in_line_shortexcess_qty SHORTEXCESS_QTY, IN_TRANSIT_QTY, NO_OF_SENT_DOCUMENT, NO_OF_COMP_RECEIVE_DOCUMENT, NO_OF_PART_RECEIVE_DOCUMENT, NO_OF_PENDING_RECEIVE_DOCUMENT, out_line_taxable_amt TAXABLE_AMOUNT, out_line_cgst_amt CGST_AMOUNT, out_line_sgst_amt SGST_AMOUNT, out_line_igst_amt IGST_AMOUNT, out_line_cess_amt CESS_AMOUNT, TOTAL_TAX, NETAMOUNT, AVERAGE, MAX_LEAD_DATE, MIN_LEAD_DATE, NO_OF_DOCUMENT_ABOVE_AVG, NO_OF_DOCUMENT_ON_AVG, NO_OF_DOCUMENT_BELOW_AVG, out_transporter INVOICE_TRANSPORTER, NO_OF_DOCUMENT, DOC_AMOUNT from ( select out_auth_status, 1 lvl, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, SUM (out_line_sent_amt) out_line_sent_amt, SUM (in_line_receive_amt) in_line_receive_amt, SUM (in_line_damage_amt) in_line_damage_amt, SUM (in_line_shortexcess_amt) in_line_shortexcess_amt, SUM (in_transit_amount) in_transit_amount, SUM (send_gst_amount) send_gst_amount, SUM (out_line_sent_qty) out_line_sent_qty, SUM (in_line_receive_qty) in_line_receive_qty, SUM (in_line_damage_qty) in_line_damage_qty, SUM (in_line_shortexcess_qty) in_line_shortexcess_qty, SUM (in_transit_qty) in_transit_qty, COUNT (distinct out_no) no_of_sent_document, SUM (case when status = 'COMP' then 1 else 0 end) no_of_comp_receive_document, SUM (case when status = 'PART' then 1 else 0 end) no_of_part_receive_document, SUM (case when status = 'PEND' then 1 else 0 end) no_of_pending_receive_document, 0 out_line_taxable_amt, 0 out_line_cgst_amt, 0 out_line_sgst_amt, 0 out_line_igst_amt, 0 out_line_cess_amt, 0 total_tax, 0 netamount, 0 average, 0 max_lead_date, 0 min_lead_date, 0 no_of_document_above_avg, 0 no_of_document_on_avg, 0 no_of_document_below_avg, null out_transporter, 0 no_of_document, 0 doc_amount from ( select out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, out_no, case when SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_qty, 0)) = SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) then 'COMP' when SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) <> 0 and SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_qty, 0)) > SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) then 'PART' when SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) = 0 then 'PEND' end status, SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_amt, 0)) out_line_sent_amt, SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_amt, 0)) in_line_receive_amt, SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_amt, 0)) in_line_damage_amt, SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_amt, 0)) in_line_shortexcess_amt, SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_amt, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_amt, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_amt, 0)) in_transit_amount, SUM (coalesce (out_line_cgst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_sgst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_igst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_cess_amt, 0)) send_gst_amount, SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_qty, 0)) out_line_sent_qty, SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) in_line_receive_qty, SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) in_line_damage_qty, SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) in_line_shortexcess_qty, SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_qty, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) - SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) in_transit_qty from dta group by out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, out_no) group by out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code union all select out_auth_status, 2 lvl, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, 0 out_line_sent_amt, 0 in_line_receive_amt, 0 in_line_damage_amt, 0 in_line_shortexcess_amt, 0 in_transit_amount, 0 send_gst_amount, 0 out_line_sent_qty, 0 in_line_receive_qty, 0 in_line_damage_qty, 0 in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0 in_transit_qty, 0 no_of_sent_document, 0 no_of_comp_receive_document, 0 no_of_part_receive_document, 0 no_of_pending_receive_document, SUM (coalesce (out_line_taxable_amt, 0)) out_line_taxable_amt, SUM (coalesce (out_line_cgst_amt, 0)) out_line_cgst_amt, SUM (coalesce (out_line_sgst_amt, 0)) out_line_sgst_amt, SUM (coalesce (out_line_igst_amt, 0)) out_line_igst_amt, SUM (coalesce (out_line_cess_amt, 0)) out_line_cess_amt, SUM (coalesce (out_line_cgst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_sgst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_igst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_cess_amt, 0)) total_tax, SUM (coalesce (out_line_taxable_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_cgst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_sgst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_igst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_cess_amt, 0)) netamount, 0 average, 0 max_lead_date, 0 min_lead_date, 0 no_of_document_above_avg, 0 no_of_document_on_avg, 0 no_of_document_below_avg, null out_transporter, 0 no_of_document, 0 doc_amount from dta group by out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code union all select out_auth_status, 3 lvl, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, 0 out_line_sent_amt, 0 in_line_receive_amt, 0 in_line_damage_amt, 0 in_line_shortexcess_amt, 0 in_transit_amount, 0 send_gst_amount, 0 out_line_sent_qty, 0 in_line_receive_qty, 0 in_line_damage_qty, 0 in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0 in_transit_qty, 0 no_of_sent_document, 0 no_of_comp_receive_document, 0 no_of_part_receive_document, 0 no_of_pending_receive_document, 0 out_line_taxable_amt, 0 out_line_cgst_amt, 0 out_line_sgst_amt, 0 out_line_igst_amt, 0 out_line_cess_amt, 0 total_tax, 0 netamount, average, max_lead_date, min_lead_date, GINVIEW.fnc_site2site_summary (transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, 'ABOVE AVG', average) no_of_document_above_avg, GINVIEW.fnc_site2site_summary (transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, 'ON AVG', average) no_of_document_on_avg, GINVIEW.fnc_site2site_summary (transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, 'BELOW AVG', average) no_of_document_below_avg, null out_transporter, 0 no_of_document, 0 doc_amount from ( select out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, ROUND (SUM (no_of_days) / COUNT (out_no), 2) average, MAX (no_of_days) max_lead_date, MIN (no_of_days) min_lead_date from ( select out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, out_no, ( in_date - out_date) no_of_days, case when SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_qty, 0)) = SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) then 'COMP' when SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM ( coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) <> 0 and SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_qty, 0)) > SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM ( coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) then 'PART' when SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) = 0 then 'PEND' end status from dta group by out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, out_no, ( in_date - out_date)) t1 where status in ('COMP', 'PART') group by out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code) t1 union all select out_auth_status, 4 lvl, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, 0 out_line_sent_amt, 0 in_line_receive_amt, 0 in_line_damage_amt, 0 in_line_shortexcess_amt, 0 in_transit_amount, 0 send_gst_amount, 0 out_line_sent_qty, 0 in_line_receive_qty, 0 in_line_damage_qty, 0 in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0 in_transit_qty, 0 no_of_sent_document, 0 no_of_comp_receive_document, 0 no_of_part_receive_document, 0 no_of_pending_receive_document, 0 out_line_taxable_amt, 0 out_line_cgst_amt, 0 out_line_sgst_amt, 0 out_line_igst_amt, 0 out_line_cess_amt, 0 total_tax, 0 netamount, 0 average, 0 max_lead_date, 0 min_lead_date, 0 no_of_document_above_avg, 0 no_of_document_on_avg, 0 no_of_document_below_avg, out_transporter, COUNT (distinct out_no) no_of_document, SUM (doc_amount) doc_amount from ( select out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, out_transporter, out_no, SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_cgst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_sgst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_igst_amt, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (out_line_cess_amt, 0)) doc_amount, case when SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_qty, 0)) = SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) then 'COMP' when SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) <> 0 and SUM (coalesce (out_line_sent_qty, 0)) > SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) then 'PART' when SUM (coalesce (in_line_receive_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_damage_qty, 0)) + SUM (coalesce (in_line_shortexcess_qty, 0)) = 0 then 'PEND' end status from dta group by out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, out_transporter, out_no) where status = 'PEND' group by out_auth_status, transfer_type, src_site_code, des_site_code, out_transporter)

entity.object_description: Get Complete Movement of Non-Inventory Items of all sites including the stock value (based on transaction rate) of the stock.
entity.sql_stmt: select /* NAME: sq_stkmove_noninv PURPOSE: REVISIONS: Rev. Date Author Description --------- ---------- ---------------------- --------------------------------------------------- XXX XX/XX/XXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 001 23/07/2024 Tanmoy Adak Migration from Oracle to PG */ row_number() over() UK, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP report_date, BARCODE, SITECODE, SUM (COALESCE (OPENING_STOCK_QTY, 0)) OPENING_STOCK_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (GOODS_RECEIVE_QTY, 0)) GOODS_RECEIVE_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (GOODS_RETURN_QTY, 0)) GOODS_RETURN_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (SND_SALE_QTY, 0)) SND_SALE_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (SND_SALE_RETURN_QTY, 0)) SND_SALE_RETURN_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (SND_NET_SALE_QTY, 0)) SND_NET_SALE_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (SETTLED_RETAIL_SALE_QTY, 0)) SETTLED_RETAIL_SALE_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (UNSETTLED_RETAIL_SALE_QTY, 0)) UNSETTLED_RETAIL_SALE_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (CONVERSION_ISSUE_QTY, 0)) CONVERSION_ISSUE_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (CONVERSION_RECEIVE_QTY, 0)) CONVERSION_RECEIVE_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (SITE_TRANSFER_IN_QTY, 0)) SITE_TRANSFER_IN_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (SITE_TRANSFER_OUT_QTY, 0)) SITE_TRANSFER_OUT_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (ADJUSTMENT_QTY, 0)) ADJUSTMENT_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (MISC_ISSUE_QTY, 0)) MISC_ISSUE_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (INTRASITE_TRANSFER_IN_QTY, 0)) INTRASITE_TRANSFER_IN_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (INTRASITE_TRANSFER_OUT_QTY, 0)) INTRASITE_TRANSFER_OUT_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (CLOSING_STOCK_QTY, 0)) CLOSING_STOCK_QTY, SUM (COALESCE (TRANSIT_QTY, 0)) TRANSIT_QTY FROM ( SELECT K.ICODE BARCODE, K.ADMSITE_CODE SITECODE, K.LOCCODE, SUM ( CASE WHEN (L.LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'L', 'S')) AND (K.ENTDT < to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY ELSE 0 END) + SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('SOP') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY ELSE 0 END) OPENING_STOCK_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('GRC') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) GOODS_RECEIVE_QTY, 0 - SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('GRT') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) GOODS_RETURN_QTY, 0 - SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('SAL') AND (L.LOCTYPE = 'L') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) SND_SALE_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('SRT') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) SND_SALE_RETURN_QTY, 0 - SUM ( CASE WHEN ( ( K.ENTTYPE IN ('SAL') AND (L.LOCTYPE = 'L')) OR K.ENTTYPE IN ('SRT')) AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) SND_NET_SALE_QTY, 0 - SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('SAL') AND (L.LOCTYPE <> 'L') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) SETTLED_RETAIL_SALE_QTY, 0 UNSETTLED_RETAIL_SALE_QTY, 0 - SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('PIS') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) CONVERSION_ISSUE_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('PRC') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) CONVERSION_RECEIVE_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN ( K.ENTTYPE IN ('STI') AND L.LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'S')) AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) SITE_TRANSFER_IN_QTY, 0 - SUM ( CASE WHEN ( K.ENTTYPE IN ('STO') AND L.LOCTYPE IN ('L', 'S')) AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) SITE_TRANSFER_OUT_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN ( (K.ENTTYPE = 'ADJ' AND K.SUBENTTYPE IS NULL) OR (K.SUBENTTYPE IN ('ADI', 'ADO', 'ASI', 'ASO', 'ACO', 'ACI'))) AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) ADJUSTMENT_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('MIS') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) MISC_ISSUE_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('WTI') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) INTRASITE_TRANSFER_IN_QTY, 0 - SUM ( CASE WHEN K.ENTTYPE IN ('WTO') AND (K.ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) INTRASITE_TRANSFER_OUT_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN (L.LOCTYPE IN ('W', 'L', 'S')) AND (K.ENTDT <= to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) CLOSING_STOCK_QTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN (L.LOCTYPE IN ('T')) AND (K.ENTDT <= to_date('@DTTO@','YYYY-MM-DD')) THEN K.QTY END) TRANSIT_QTY FROM (SELECT 'SOP' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, OPDATE::date - 1 ENTDT, ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, LOCCODE LOCCODE, PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, OQTY QTY FROM INVITEMOP TRD INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'MIS' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, TRM.MISCDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.LOCCODE LOCCODE, TRM.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY * -1 QTY FROM INVMISCDET TRD INNER JOIN INVMISCMAIN TRM ON TRD.MISCCODE = TRM.MISCCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND TRD.QTY <> 0 AND ( TRM.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE IS NULL OR ( TRM.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE IS NOT NULL AND TRM.AUTH_ECODE IS NOT NULL)) UNION ALL SELECT 'ADJ' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, TRM.STKADJDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.LOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY QTY FROM INVSTKADJDET TRD INNER JOIN INVSTKADJMAIN TRM ON TRD.STKADJCODE = TRM.STKADJCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'WTO' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, TRM.STFDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.OUTLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY * -1 QTY FROM INVSTFDET TRD INNER JOIN INVSTFMAIN TRM ON TRD.STFCODE = TRM.STFCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'WTI' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, TRM.STFDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.INLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY QTY FROM INVSTFDET TRD INNER JOIN INVSTFMAIN TRM ON TRD.STFCODE = TRM.STFCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'STO' ENTTYPE, 'ISO' SUBENTTYPE, TRM.STFDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OUT ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.STORE_LOCCODE_OUT LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.STFQTY * -1 QTY FROM INVSITESTFDET TRD INNER JOIN INVSITESTFMAIN TRM ON TRD.STFCODE = TRM.STFCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'STI' ENTTYPE, 'ISI' SUBENTTYPE, TRM.STFDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_IN ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.STORE_LOCCODE_IN LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.STFQTY QTY FROM INVSITESTFDET TRD INNER JOIN INVSITESTFMAIN TRM ON TRD.STFCODE = TRM.STFCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'WTO' ENTTYPE, 'PUT' SUBENTTYPE, TRM.DOCDATE ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.OUTLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY * -1 QTY FROM INVPUTDET TRD INNER JOIN INVPUTMAIN TRM ON TRD.INVPUTMAIN_CODE = TRM.CODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'WTI' ENTTYPE, 'PUT' SUBENTTYPE, TRM.DOCDATE ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.INLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY QTY FROM INVPUTDET TRD INNER JOIN INVPUTMAIN TRM ON TRD.INVPUTMAIN_CODE = TRM.CODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'WTO' ENTTYPE, 'TAK' SUBENTTYPE, TRM.DOCDATE ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.OUTLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY * -1 QTY FROM INVTAKEDET TRD INNER JOIN INVTAKEMAIN TRM ON TRD.INVTAKEMAIN_CODE = TRM.CODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'WTI' ENTTYPE, 'TAK' SUBENTTYPE, TRM.DOCDATE ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.INLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY QTY FROM INVTAKEDET TRD INNER JOIN INVTAKEMAIN TRM ON TRD.INVTAKEMAIN_CODE = TRM.CODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'PIS' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, TRM.ORDDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRD.LOCCODE LOCCODE, TRD.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY * -1 QTY FROM PRDIS TRD INNER JOIN PRDORD TRM ON TRD.ORDCODE = TRM.ORDCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND ( TRD.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE IS NULL OR ( TRD.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE IS NOT NULL AND TRM.AUTH_ECODE IS NOT NULL)) UNION ALL SELECT 'PRC' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, TRM.ORDDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRD.LOCCODE LOCCODE, TRD.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY QTY FROM PRDRC TRD INNER JOIN PRDORD TRM ON TRD.ORDCODE = TRM.ORDCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND ( TRD.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE IS NULL OR ( TRD.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE IS NOT NULL AND TRM.AUTH_ECODE IS NOT NULL)) UNION ALL SELECT 'GRC' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, TRM.GRCDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_IN ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.LOCCODE LOCCODE, TRM.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.ACQTY QTY FROM INVGRCDET TRD INNER JOIN INVGRCMAIN TRM ON TRD.GRCCODE = TRM.GRCCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND TRD.ACQTY <> 0 AND ( TRM.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE IS NULL OR ( TRM.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE IS NOT NULL AND TRM.AUTH_ECODE IS NOT NULL)) UNION ALL SELECT 'GRT' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, TRM.GRTDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.LOCCODE LOCCODE, TRM.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY * -1 QTY FROM INVGRTDET TRD INNER JOIN INVGRTMAIN TRM ON TRD.GRTCODE = TRM.GRTCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND TRD.QTY <> 0 AND ( TRM.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE IS NULL OR ( TRM.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE IS NOT NULL AND TRM.AUTH_ECODE IS NOT NULL)) UNION ALL SELECT 'DCO' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, TRM.DCDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.OUTLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.ISQTY * -1 QTY FROM INVDCDET TRD INNER JOIN INVDCMAIN TRM ON TRD.DCCODE = TRM.DCCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'DCI' ENTTYPE, NULL SUBENTTYPE, TRM.DCDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.INLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.ISQTY QTY FROM INVDCDET TRD INNER JOIN INVDCMAIN TRM ON TRD.DCCODE = TRM.DCCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'DCI' ENTTYPE, 'CNL' SUBENTTYPE, TRM.CNLDT::date ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.OUTLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.ISQTY QTY FROM INVDCDET TRD INNER JOIN INVDCMAIN TRM ON TRD.DCCODE = TRM.DCCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND TRM.STATUS = 'C' UNION ALL SELECT 'DCO' ENTTYPE, 'CNL' SUBENTTYPE, TRM.CNLDT::date ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.INLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.ISQTY * -1 QTY FROM INVDCDET TRD INNER JOIN INVDCMAIN TRM ON TRD.DCCODE = TRM.DCCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND TRM.STATUS = 'C' UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' THEN 'STO' ELSE 'SAL' END ENTTYPE, CASE WHEN TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' THEN 'CT' ELSE NULL END SUBENTTYPE, TRM.INVDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRD.OUTLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.INVQTY * -1 QTY FROM SALINVDET TRD INNER JOIN SALINVMAIN TRM ON TRD.INVCODE = TRM.INVCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' THEN 'STI' ELSE case when S.SITETYPE = 'US-CO-OM-TS' then 'GRC' else 'STI' end END ENTTYPE, CASE WHEN TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' THEN 'CT' ELSE 'SST' END SUBENTTYPE, TRM.INVDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.INLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.INVQTY QTY FROM SALINVDET TRD INNER JOIN SALINVMAIN TRM ON TRD.INVCODE = TRM.INVCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON TRM.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND ( TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' OR (TRM.SALETYPE = 'O' AND TRM.ISSECONDARY = 'Y')) UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' THEN 'STO' ELSE case when S.SITETYPE = 'US-CO-OM-TS' then 'GRT' else 'STO' end END ENTTYPE, CASE WHEN TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' THEN case when S.SITETYPE='US-CO-CM' then 'CRU' else 'CR' end ELSE 'SSR' END SUBENTTYPE, TRM.RTDT ENTDT, CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE LIKE 'US%' THEN TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ELSE TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER END ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.OUTLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY * -1 QTY FROM SALRTDET TRD INNER JOIN SALRTMAIN TRM ON TRD.RTCODE = TRM.RTCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON TRM.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND ( TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' OR (TRM.SALETYPE = 'O' AND S.SITETYPE LIKE '%TS')) AND TRD.QTY <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' THEN 'STI' ELSE 'SRT' END ENTTYPE, CASE WHEN TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' THEN case when S.SITETYPE='US-CO-CM' then 'CRU' else 'CR' end ELSE NULL END SUBENTTYPE, TRM.RTDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.INLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY QTY FROM SALRTDET TRD INNER JOIN SALRTMAIN TRM ON TRD.RTCODE = TRM.RTCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON TRM.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND TRD.QTY <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT 'ADJ' ENTTYPE, CASE WHEN TRM.SALETYPE = 'C' THEN CASE WHEN TRD.SHORTEXCESSQTY > 0 THEN 'CRI' ELSE 'CRO' END ELSE CASE WHEN TRD.SHORTEXCESSQTY > 0 THEN 'SRI' ELSE 'SRO' END END SUBENTTYPE, TRM.RTDT ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.OUTLOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.SHORTEXCESSQTY QTY FROM SALRTDET TRD INNER JOIN SALRTMAIN TRM ON TRD.RTCODE = TRM.RTCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON TRM.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND (S.SITETYPE = 'OS-OO-CM' OR S.SITETYPE LIKE 'MS%') AND COALESCE (TRD.SHORTEXCESSQTY, 0) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT 'SAL' ENTTYPE, 'CS' SUBENTTYPE, TRM.CSDATE ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.OUTLOCCODE LOCCODE, TRD.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY * -1 QTY FROM SALCSDET TRD INNER JOIN SALCSMAIN TRM ON TRD.CSCODE = TRM.CSCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'SAL' ENTTYPE, 'SSS' SUBENTTYPE, TRM.SSDATE ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.OUTLOCCODE LOCCODE, TRD.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, TRD.QTY * -1 QTY FROM SALSSDET TRD INNER JOIN SALSSMAIN TRM ON TRD.SSCODE = TRM.SSCODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'STO' ENTTYPE, CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE LIKE '%CM' THEN 'CIO' ELSE 'SIO' END SUBENTTYPE, TRM.DOCDT::date ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.PSITE_TRANSIT_LOCCODE LOCCODE, NULL PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, ( COALESCE (TRD.RECEIVEQTY, 0) + COALESCE (TRD.DAMAGEQTY, 0)) * -1 QTY FROM PSITE_GRCITEM TRD INNER JOIN PSITE_GRC TRM ON TRD.PSITE_GRC_CODE = TRM.CODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON TRM.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND ( COALESCE (TRD.RECEIVEQTY, 0) + COALESCE (TRD.DAMAGEQTY, 0)) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE LIKE '%CM' THEN 'STI' ELSE 'GRC' END ENTTYPE, CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE LIKE '%CM' THEN 'CII' ELSE 'SII' END SUBENTTYPE, TRM.DOCDT::date ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.STORE_LOCCODE LOCCODE, TRM.REC_PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, COALESCE (TRD.RECEIVEQTY, 0) QTY FROM PSITE_GRCITEM TRD INNER JOIN PSITE_GRC TRM ON TRD.PSITE_GRC_CODE = TRM.CODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON TRM.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND COALESCE (TRD.RECEIVEQTY, 0) <> 0 UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE LIKE '%CM' THEN 'STI' ELSE 'GRC' END ENTTYPE, CASE WHEN S.SITETYPE LIKE '%CM' THEN 'CII' ELSE 'SII' END SUBENTTYPE, TRM.DOCDT::date ENTDT, TRM.ADMSITE_CODE ADMSITE_CODE, TRM.STORE_LOCCODE LOCCODE, TRM.DAM_PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, TRD.ICODE ICODE, COALESCE (TRD.DAMAGEQTY, 0) QTY FROM PSITE_GRCITEM TRD INNER JOIN PSITE_GRC TRM ON TRD.PSITE_GRC_CODE = TRM.CODE INNER JOIN INVITEM I ON TRD.ICODE = I.ICODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON TRM.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE WHERE I.NONINVENTORY = 'Y' AND COALESCE (TRD.DAMAGEQTY, 0)
