ason_pending_tranfer_sales_order, B.production_issue_amount, B.production_issue_quantity, B.production_receive_amount, B.production_receive_quantity, B.production_return_amount, B.production_return_quantity, B.retail_sale_amount, B.retail_sale_quantity, B.retail_sale_return_amount, B.retail_sale_return_quantity, B.sale_discount_amount, B.sale_promo_amount, B.sale_tax_amount, B.site_transfer_in_amount, B.site_transfer_in_quantity, B.site_transfer_out_amount, B.site_transfer_out_quantity, B.transit_adjustment_amount, B.transit_adjustment_quantity, 0 transit_difference_amount, 0 transit_difference_qty, B.transit_inward_amount, B.transit_inward_quantity, B.transit_outward_amount, B.transit_outward_quantity, B.unsettled_discount_amount, B.unsettled_promo_amount, B.unsettled_qty, B.unsettled_net_netamount, B.unsettled_tax_amount, B.warehouse_transfer_in_amount, B.warehouse_transfer_in_quantity, B.wh_transfer_out_amount, B.wh_transfer_out_quantity, B.invbatch_serial_code from stk_book_summary_batch_serial B where B.monthcode between to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999) and to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) and (b.icode in (select icode from invitem where (barcode IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text))) union all /*For Cost Difference*/ select sum(Round(case /*Rev.7*/ when admmonth_code between to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999) and to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) then 0-coalesce(a.diff_cost_amt,0) else 0 end,2)) adjusted_gp_amount, 0 adjustment_amount, 0 adjustment_quantity, a.admsite_code, 0 ason_wms_reserv_qty_pkg_due, a.icode, 0 closing_package_qty, sum(Round(case /*Rev.7*/ when admmonth_code = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) then coalesce(a.diff_cost_amt,0) else 0 end,2)) closing_stock_amount, 0 closing_stock_quantity, 0 closing_store_qty, 0 closing_transit_amount,/*Rev.7*/ 0 closing_transit_quantity, 0 conversion_issue_amount, 0 conversion_issue_quantity, 0 conversion_receive_amount, 0 conversion_receive_quantity, sum(Round(case /*Rev.6*/ when admmonth_code between to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999) and to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) then coalesce(a.diff_cost_amt, 0) else 0 end,2)) cost_difference_amount, 0 goods_receive_amount, 0 goods_receive_quantity, 0 goods_return_amount, 0 goods_return_quantity, 0 gp_amount, 0 ho_sale_amount, 0 ho_sale_quantity, 0 ho_sale_return_amount, 0 ho_sale_return_quantity, 0 misc_issue_receive_amount, 0 misc_issue_receive_quantity, 0 net_ho_sale_amount, 0 net_ho_sale_cogs_amount, 0 net_ho_sale_quantity, 0 net_retail_sale_amount, 0 net_retail_sale_cogs_amount, 0 net_retail_sale_quantity, 0 net_sale_amount, 0 net_sale_cogs_amount, 0 net_sale_quantity, Sum(Round(case /*Rev.7*/when admmonth_code < to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999) then coalesce(a.diff_cost_amt,0) else 0 end,2)) opening_amount, 0 opening_package_qty, 0 opening_quantity, 0 opening_store_qty, 0 opening_transit_amount,/*Rev.07*/ 0 opening_transit_quantity, 0 ason_pending_pkgin_qty_inv_due, 0 ason_pending_po_quantity, 0 ason_pending_tranfer_sales_order, 0 production_issue_amount, 0 production_issue_quantity, 0 production_receive_amount, 0 production_receive_quantity, 0 production_return_amount, 0 production_return_quantity, 0 retail_sale_amount, 0 retail_sale_quantity, 0 retail_sale_return_amount, 0 retail_sale_return_quantity, 0 sale_discount_amount, 0 sale_promo_amount, 0 sale_tax_amount, 0 site_transfer_in_amount, 0 site_transfer_in_quantity, 0 site_transfer_out_amount, 0 site_transfer_out_quantity, 0 transit_adjustment_amount, 0 transit_adjustment_quantity, 0 transit_difference_amount,/*Rev.07*/ 0 transit_difference_qty, 0 transit_inward_amount, 0 transit_inward_quantity, 0 transit_outward_amount, 0 transit_outward_quantity, 0 unsettled_discount_amount, 0 unsettled_promo_amount, 0 unsettled_qty, 0 unsettled_net_netamount, 0 unsettled_tax_amount, 0 warehouse_transfer_in_amount, 0 warehouse_transfer_in_quantity, 0 wh_transfer_out_amount, 0 wh_transfer_out_quantity, invbatch_serial_code from stk_book_summary_costadj_batch_serial A where (admmonth_code = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) or admmonth_code = (select max(mcode) from admmonth where mcode < to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999))) and (a.icode in (select icode from invitem where (barcode IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text))) group by a.admsite_code, a.icode,invbatch_serial_code )T left join invbatch_serial bs on (T.invbatch_serial_code=bs.code) group by T.admsite_code, T.icode, T.invbatch_serial_code, BS.batch_serial_no, BS.mfg_date, BS.exp_date

entity.object_description: Complete stock movement of each stock points for each site (If the site is POS type site then POS stock point will be shown else Organization Site's Stock Point). The total stock value of stock in this will be same as it is giving in 'Stock Book Summary'. Note : Performance will impact for large data volume.
entity.sql_stmt: with selected_site_stockpoint as (select distinct s.code sitecode, l.loccode, ps.code sp_code FROM admsite s left join invloc l on s.code=l.admsite_code left join psite_stockpoint ps on s.code=ps.admsite_code where (s.name in ( SELECT UNNEST(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS g ) OR COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) AND (coalesce(ps.name,l.locname) in ( SELECT UNNEST(regexp_matches('@#StockpointNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS g ) OR COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#StockpointNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text)), tbl_costrate as ( select /* NAME: sq_stockbook_stockpoint PURPOSE: REVISIONS: Rev. Date Author Description --------- ---------- ---------------------- --------------------------------------------------- XXX XX/XX/XXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 001 19/07/2024 Tanmoy Adak Creation as per new logic 002 20/08/2024 Tanmoy Adak BUG-60135 MISC_ISSUE and MISC_RECEIVE separate column 003 09/09/2024 Tanmoy Adak BUG-62317 Average cost rate is showing wrong 004 19/09/2024 Tanmoy Adak BUG-63855 Closing Quantity Showing Wrong 005 27/09/2024 Tanmoy Adak SupportTiket#364688 Site, Stockpoint and Icode filtration in base table level for better performance */ admsite_code, icode, case when sum(QTY) <> 0 then ABS(round(sum(cost_amount)/ sum(QTY), 2)) else 0 end AVG_cost_rate from ( select admsite_code, icode, /*Start Rev.003 sum(diff_cost_amt) cost_amount ,*/ sum(diff_cost_amt_running) cost_amount , /*End Rev.003*/ 0 QTY from STK_BOOK_SUMMARY_COSTADJ where admmonth_code = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) /*Start Rev.005*/ AND admsite_code IN (select sitecode from selected_site_stockpoint) AND (icode in (select icode from invitem where coalesce(barcode,icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) /*End Rev.005*/ group by admsite_code, icode union all select admsite_code, icode, sum(closing_stock_amount) cost_amount, sum(closing_stock_quantity) QTY from STK_BOOK_SUMMARY where monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) /*Start Rev.005*/ AND admsite_code IN (select sitecode from selected_site_stockpoint) AND (icode in (select icode from invitem where coalesce(barcode,icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) /*End Rev.005*/ group by admsite_code, icode) group by admsite_code, icode) select row_number() over() UK, k.admsite_code SITECODE, coalesce(K.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, K.LOCCODE::varchar) STOCKPOINT_CODE, coalesce(ps.NAME, L.LOCNAME) STOCKPOINT_NAME, k.icode BARCODE, sum(case when K.monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999) then OPENING else 0 end) OPENING, sum(PURCHASE) PURCHASE, sum(PURCHASE_RETURN) PURCHASE_RETURN, /* Start Rev.002 SUM(MISC_ISSUE) MISC_ISSUE, SUM(MISC_RECEIVE) MISC_RECEIVE,*/ SUM(case when coalesce(misc_issue_receive,0) < 0 then misc_issue_receive else 0 end ) MISC_ISSUE, SUM(case when coalesce(misc_issue_receive,0) > 0 then misc_issue_receive else 0 end ) MISC_RECEIVE, /* End Rev.002*/ SUM(CONVERSION_ISSUE) CONVERSION_ISSUE, SUM(CONVERSION_RECEIVE) CONVERSION_RECEIVE, SUM(SITE_TRANSFER_IN) SITE_TRANSFER_IN, SUM(SITE_TRANSFER_OUT) SITE_TRANSFER_OUT, SUM(NET_PACKET_IN) NET_PACKET_IN, SUM(NET_PACKET_OUT) NET_PACKET_OUT, SUM(INTER_STOCK_POINT_TRANSFER_IN) INTER_STOCK_POINT_TRANSFER_IN, SUM(INTER_STOCK_POINT_TRANSFER_OUT) INTER_STOCK_POINT_TRANSFER_OUT, SUM(SALES) SALES, SUM(SALES_RETURN) SALES_RETURN, SUM(NET_SALES) NET_SALES, SUM(ADJUSTMENT) ADJUSTMENT, SUM(PRODUCTION_RECEIVE) PRODUCTION_RECEIVE, SUM(PRODUCTION_RETURN) PRODUCTION_RETURN, SUM(PRODUCTION_ISSUE) PRODUCTION_ISSUE, SUM(case when K.monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) then CLOSING_STOCK_QTY else 0 end) CLOSING_STOCK_QTY, /*Start Rev.004 round(SUM(((case when K.monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) then CLOSING_STOCK_QTY else 0 end) * AVG_cost_rate)),2) CLOSING_STOCK_AMOUNT,*/ round(SUM(((case when K.monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) then CLOSING_STOCK_QTY else 0 end) * COALESCE(AVG_cost_rate,0))),2) CLOSING_STOCK_AMOUNT, /*End Rev.004*/ SUM(UNSETTLES_SALES_QTY) UNSETTLES_SALES_QTY from STK_BOOK_SUMMARY_STOCKPOINTWISE K /*Start Rev.004 join tbl_costrate acr on (k.admsite_code = acr.admsite_code and k.icode = acr.icode)*/ left join tbl_costrate acr on (k.admsite_code = acr.admsite_code and k.icode = acr.icode) /*End Rev.004*/ join invloc l on K.loccode = l.loccode left join PSITE_STOCKPOINT ps on K.psite_stockpoint_code = ps.code where K.monthcode between to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999) and to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) /*Start Rev.005*/ AND k.admsite_code IN (select sitecode from selected_site_stockpoint) AND (k.loccode IN (select loccode from selected_site_stockpoint) OR k.psite_stockpoint_code IN (select sp_code from selected_site_stockpoint)) AND (k.icode in (select icode from invitem where coalesce(barcode,icode) IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) /*End Rev.005*/ group by k.admsite_code, coalesce(K.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, K.LOCCODE::varchar), coalesce(ps.NAME, L.LOCNAME), k.icode /*Start Rev.005*/ HAVING (sum(COALESCE(OPENING,0,0))<> 0 OR sum(COALESCE(PURCHASE,0)) <> 0 OR sum(COALESCE(PURCHASE_RETURN,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(misc_issue_receive,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(CONVERSION_ISSUE,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(CONVERSION_RECEIVE,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(SITE_TRANSFER_IN,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(SITE_TRANSFER_OUT,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(NET_PACKET_IN,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(NET_PACKET_OUT,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(INTER_STOCK_POINT_TRANSFER_IN,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(INTER_STOCK_POINT_TRANSFER_OUT,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(SALES,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(SALES_RETURN,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(NET_SALES,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(ADJUSTMENT,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(PRODUCTION_RECEIVE,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(PRODUCTION_RETURN,0))<> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(PRODUCTION_ISSUE,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(CLOSING_STOCK_QTY,0)) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(UNSETTLES_SALES_QTY,0))<> 0) /*End Rev.005*/

entity.object_description: Complete stock movement of each stock points for each site (If the site is POS type site then POS stock point will be shown else Organization Site's Stock Point) at item batch level. Note : Performance may impact for large data volume.
entity.sql_stmt: with tbl_costrate as ( select /* NAME: sq_stockbook_stockpoint_batch PURPOSE: REVISIONS: Rev. Date Author Description --------- ---------- ---------------------- --------------------------------------------------- XXX XX/XX/XXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 001 19/07/2024 Tanmoy Adak Creation as per new logic 002 24/10/2025 Jyotirmoy MISC_ISSUE & MISC_RECEIVE Invalid Identifier */ admsite_code, icode, invbatch_serial_code, case when sum(QTY) <> 0 then ABS(round(sum(cost_amount)/ sum(QTY), 2)) else 0 end AVG_cost_rate from ( select admsite_code, icode, invbatch_serial_code, diff_cost_amt cost_amount, 0 QTY from stk_book_summary_costadj_batch_serial where admmonth_code = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) union all select admsite_code, icode, invbatch_serial_code, closing_stock_amount cost_amount, closing_stock_quantity QTY from stk_book_summary_batch_serial where monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) union all /*Start: NON BATCH ITEMS*/ select admsite_code, icode, null:: int4 invbatch_serial_code, diff_cost_amt cost_amount, 0 QTY from stk_book_summary_costadj where (case when '@InclNonBatchItems@'= 'Y' then is_batch_item = 'N' end) and admmonth_code = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) union all select admsite_code, icode, null:: int4 invbatch_serial_code, closing_stock_amount cost_amount, closing_stock_quantity QTY from stk_book_summary where (case when '@InclNonBatchItems@'= 'Y' then is_batch_item = 'N' end) and monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) /*End: NON BATCH ITEMS*/ ) group by admsite_code, icode, invbatch_serial_code) select row_number() over() UK, k.admsite_code SITECODE, coalesce(K.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, K.LOCCODE::varchar) STOCKPOINT_CODE, coalesce(ps.NAME, L.LOCNAME) STOCKPOINT_NAME, k.icode BARCODE, k.invbatch_serial_code, sum(opening) OPENING, sum(PURCHASE) PURCHASE, sum(PURCHASE_RETURN) PURCHASE_RETURN, SUM(MISC_ISSUE) MISC_ISSUE, SUM(MISC_RECEIVE) MISC_RECEIVE, SUM(CONVERSION_ISSUE) CONVERSION_ISSUE, SUM(CONVERSION_RECEIVE) CONVERSION_RECEIVE, SUM(SITE_TRANSFER_IN) SITE_TRANSFER_IN, SUM(SITE_TRANSFER_OUT) SITE_TRANSFER_OUT, SUM(NET_PACKET_IN) NET_PACKET_IN, SUM(NET_PACKET_OUT) NET_PACKET_OUT, SUM(INTER_STOCK_POINT_TRANSFER_IN) INTER_STOCK_POINT_TRANSFER_IN, SUM(INTER_STOCK_POINT_TRANSFER_OUT) INTER_STOCK_POINT_TRANSFER_OUT, SUM(SALES) SALES, SUM(SALES_RETURN) SALES_RETURN, SUM(NET_SALES) NET_SALES, SUM(ADJUSTMENT) ADJUSTMENT, SUM(PRODUCTION_RECEIVE) PRODUCTION_RECEIVE, SUM(PRODUCTION_RETURN) PRODUCTION_RETURN, SUM(PRODUCTION_ISSUE) PRODUCTION_ISSUE, SUM(closing_stock_qty) CLOSING_STOCK_QTY, round(SUM(closing_stock_qty * AVG_cost_rate),2) CLOSING_STOCK_AMOUNT, SUM(UNSETTLES_SALES_QTY) UNSETTLES_SALES_QTY from (select admsite_code, icode, loccode, psite_stockpoint_code, case when K.monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999) then OPENING else 0 end opening, purchase, purchase_return, case when k.misc_issue_receive < 0 then k.misc_issue_receive else 0 end misc_issue,/*002*/ case when k.misc_issue_receive > 0 then k.misc_issue_receive else 0 end misc_receive,/*002*/ conversion_issue, conversion_receive, site_transfer_in, site_transfer_out, net_packet_in, net_packet_out, inter_stock_point_transfer_in, inter_stock_point_transfer_out, sales, sales_return, net_sales, adjustment, production_receive, production_return, production_issue, case when K.monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) then CLOSING_STOCK_QTY else 0 end closing_stock_qty, unsettles_sales_qty, invbatch_serial_code from STK_BOOK_SUMMARY_STOCKPOINT_BATCH_SERIAL_WISE k where K.monthcode between to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999) and to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) and (k.icode in (select icode from invitem where barcode IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)) union all select admsite_code, icode, loccode, psite_stockpoint_code, case when K.monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999) then OPENING else 0 end opening, purchase, purchase_return, case when k.misc_issue_receive < 0 then k.misc_issue_receive else 0 end misc_issue,/*002*/ case when k.misc_issue_receive > 0 then k.misc_issue_receive else 0 end misc_receive,/*002*/ conversion_issue, conversion_receive, site_transfer_in, site_transfer_out, net_packet_in, net_packet_out, inter_stock_point_transfer_in, inter_stock_point_transfer_out, sales, sales_return, net_sales, adjustment, production_receive, production_return, production_issue, case when K.monthcode = to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) then CLOSING_STOCK_QTY else 0 end closing_stock_qty, unsettles_sales_qty, null::int4 invbatch_serial_code from stk_book_summary_stockpointwise k where (case when '@InclNonBatchItems@'= 'Y' then is_batch_item = 'N' end) and K.monthcode between to_number('@SBSMonthFrom@',9999999) and to_number('@SBSMonthTo@',9999999) and (k.icode in (select icode from invitem where barcode IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemBarcodeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text))) K join tbl_costrate acr on (k.admsite_code = acr.admsite_code and k.icode = acr.icode and k.invbatch_serial_code=acr.invbatch_serial_code) join invloc l on K.loccode = l.loccode left join PSITE_STOCKPOINT ps on K.psite_stockpoint_code = ps.code group by k.admsite_code, coalesce(K.PSITE_STOCKPOINT_CODE, K.LOCCODE::varchar), coalesce(ps.NAME, L.LOCNAME), k.icode, k.invbatch_serial_code

entity.object_description: Get Stock Point Wise Complete inventory aging data of all sites including the stock value of the stock. This includes FIFO valuation of closing stock.
entity.sql_stmt: with tbl_costrate as ( select /* NAME: sq_stockpoint_ageing_summary PURPOSE: REVISIONS: Rev. Date Author Description --------- ---------- ---------------------- --------------------------------------------------- XXX XX/XX/XXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 001 20/07/2024 Tanmoy Adak Creation as per new logic */ admsite_code, icode, case when sum(QTY) <> 0 then ABS(round(sum(cost_amount)/ sum(QTY),2)) else 0 end AVG_cost_rate from ( select admsite_code, icode, sum(diff_cost_amt) cost_amount , 0 QTY from stk_book_summary_costadj where admmonth_code = (select mcode from admmonth where (current_date-1) between dtfr and dtto ) group by admsite_code, icode union all select admsite_code, icode, sum(closing_stock_amount) cost_amount, sum(closing_stock_quantity) QTY from stk_book_summary where monthcode = (select mcode from admmonth where (current_date-1) between dtfr and dtto ) group by admsite_code, icode) group by admsite_code, icode) select row_number() over() uk, to_char(sys_date,'DD-MM-YYYY') report_date, barcode, sitecode, loccode, sum(qty) qty, coalesce(AVG_cost_rate,0) cost_rate, round(sum(qty * coalesce(AVG_cost_rate, 0)),2) cost_amount, null::date fifo_date, null::int days_age, slab_name from stk_ageing_stockpointwise_summary s left join tbl_costrate cr on (s.sitecode = cr.admsite_code and s.barcode = cr.icode) group by to_char(sys_date,'DD-MM-YYYY'), barcode, sitecode, loccode, AVG_cost_rate, slab_name

entity.object_description: Get WIP Material Transaction detail informations. Information w.r.t. raw materials Issued/Returned/Wastage entry can be checked for each jober order. Transaction details like issue from or return to Stock Point, quantity and rate is reflected in the report. Note : Performance will impact for large data volume
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk, A.WIPTXNNO WIPTXN_NO, A.WIP_DATE::DATE WIPTXN_DATE, A.REFNO REF_NO, A.REMARKS MAIN_REMARK, CASE WHEN A.AUTOGEN_TYPE = 'O' THEN 'ON ORDER' WHEN A.AUTOGEN_TYPE = 'R' THEN 'ON RECEIPT' END AUTOGEN_TYPE, B.COMPONENT_ICODE, CASE WHEN A.WIPTXN_TYPE = 'I' THEN B.QTY ELSE 0-B.QTY END WIPTXN_QTY, B.COSTRATE COST_RATE, B.WIP_LOCCODE WIPTXN_LOCATION_CODE, A.CODE PRDWIPTXN_CODE, A.JRCCODE PRDJRC_CODE, A.JOBCODE PRDJOB_CODE, B.LOTCODE PRDPLAN_CODE, A.PCODE PARTY_CODE, A.PRCODE PROCESS_CODE, B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE BARCODE, ADMSITE.CODE SITECODE, B.SITE_COSTRATE SITE_COST_RATE, B.CNLCODE, PRD_SAITEM.SAINAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_NAME, PRD_SAITEM.SHORT_NAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_SHORT_NAME, L.WORKING_PLAN_NO WORKING_PLAN_NO, L.WORKING_PLAN_DATE::DATE WORKING_PLAN_DATE, M.MASTER_PLAN_NO MASTER_PLAN_NO, M.MASTER_PLAN_DATE::DATE MASTER_PLAN_DATE, M.SALES_ORDER_NO SALES_ORDER_NO, M.SALES_ORDER_DATE::DATE SALES_ORDER_DATE, PRDJOBMAIN.JOBNO JOB_ORDER_NO, PRDJOBMAIN.JOB_DATE::DATE JOB_ORDER_DATE, --DECODE(A.WIPTXN_TYPE,'I','Issue','R','Return','W','Wastage'), CASE WHEN A.WIPTXN_TYPE = 'I' THEN 'Issue' WHEN A.WIPTXN_TYPE = 'R' THEN 'Return' WHEN A.WIPTXN_TYPE = 'W' THEN 'Wastage' ELSE NULL END WIPTXN_TYPE, CASE WHEN PRDJOBMAIN.JOBTYPE IN ('AS','AN') THEN 'Unplanned' WHEN PRDJOBMAIN.JOBTYPE = 'LS' THEN 'Lot Based Standard' WHEN PRDJOBMAIN.JOBTYPE = 'LN' THEN 'Lot Based Non Standard' ELSE NULL END JOBTYPE FROM PRDWIPMAIN A INNER JOIN PRDWIPDET B ON A.CODE = B.WIPTXN_CODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE ON A.ADMSITE_CODE = ADMSITE.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRD_SAITEM ON B.ASS_SAITEM_CODE = PRD_SAITEM.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDJOBMAIN ON B.JOBCODE = PRDJOBMAIN.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT D.LOTCODE ,D.ASSEMBLY_ICODE ,D.PRDMPLANALLOC_CODE ,M.LOTNO WORKING_PLAN_NO ,M.SCHEDULE_DATE WORKING_PLAN_DATE FROM PRDLOTMAIN M INNER JOIN PRDLOTDET D ON M.CODE = D.LOTCODE) L ON B.LOTCODE = L.LOTCODE AND B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = L.ASSEMBLY_ICODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT A.CODE ,A.ASSEMBLY_ICODE ,M.PLANNO MASTER_PLAN_NO ,M.SCHEDULE_DATE MASTER_PLAN_DATE ,S.ORDNO SALES_ORDER_NO ,S.ORDDT SALES_ORDER_DATE FROM PRDMPLANALLOC A INNER JOIN PRDMPLANDET B ON A.PRDMPLANDET_CODE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDMPLANMAIN M ON B.PLANCODE = M.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SALORDMAIN S ON M.ORDCODE = S.ORDCODE) M ON L.PRDMPLANALLOC_CODE = M.CODE AND L.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = M.ASSEMBLY_ICODE WHERE A.WIP_DATE::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')

entity.object_description: Get Working Plan wise material requirement. Details of Operation sequence wise each components like Supply type, Required Qty, Tolerance, Shrinkage etc is available. Note : Performance will impact for large data volume
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk, A.LOTNO PLAN_NO, A.SCHEDULE_DATE::DATE SCHEDULED_START_DATE, A.REMARKS MAIN_REMARK, CASE WHEN A.IS_CLOSED = 'Y' THEN 'YES' WHEN A.IS_CLOSED = 'N' THEN 'NO' END IS_CLOSED, A.CLOSE_DATE::DATE, C.OPERATION_SEQ, CASE WHEN C.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'P' THEN 'PUSH' WHEN C.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'O' THEN 'PULL ON ORDER' WHEN C.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'C' THEN 'PULL ON COMPLETION' END SUPPLY_TYPE, CASE WHEN C.ISMANDATORY = 'Y' THEN 'YES' WHEN C.ISMANDATORY = 'N' THEN 'NO' END IS_MANDATORY, CASE WHEN C.COMPONENT_TYPE = 'S' THEN 'STANDARD' WHEN C.COMPONENT_TYPE = 'N' THEN 'NON-STANDARD' WHEN C.COMPONENT_TYPE = 'A' THEN 'ALTERED' END COMPONENT_TYPE, C.QTY PLAN_BOM_QTY, C.BOM_QTY, C.TOLERANCE, C.SHRINKAGE, A.CODE PRDPLAN_CODE, B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE BARCODE, C.PRCODE PROCESS_CODE, C.COMPONENT_ICODE, C.ALT_GRPCODE ALT_GROUP_CODE, ADMSITE.CODE SITECODE, ASS.SAINAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_NAME, ASS.SHORT_NAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_SHORT_NAME, COM.SAINAME SUB_COMPONENT_NAME, COM.SHORT_NAME SUB_COMPONENT_SHORT_NAME FROM PRDLOTMAIN A INNER JOIN PRDLOTDET B ON A.CODE = B.LOTCODE INNER JOIN PRDLOTBOM C ON B.LOTCODE = C.LOTCODE AND B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = C.ASSEMBLY_ICODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE ON A.ADMSITE_CODE = ADMSITE.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRD_SAITEM ASS ON C.ASS_SAITEM_CODE = ASS.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRD_SAITEM COM ON C.COM_SAITEM_CODE = COM.CODE WHERE A.SCHEDULE_DATE::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')

entity.object_description: Get Operation sequence wise Assembly Item details for a Working Plan. Information like planned qty., ordered qty., pending qty., completed qty., cancelled qty., available to forward qty, clearance qty etc. for every process of each assembly item in working plan. Note : Performance will impact for large data volume.
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk, A.LOTNO PLAN_NO, A.SCHEDULE_DATE::DATE SCHEDULED_START_DATE, A.REMARKS MAIN_REMARK, CASE WHEN A.IS_CLOSED = 'Y' THEN 'YES' WHEN A.IS_CLOSED = 'N' THEN 'NO' END IS_CLOSED, A.CLOSE_DATE::DATE, B.OPERATION_SEQ, B.LEADTIME LEAD_TIME, B.LOT_QTY PLANNED_QTY, B.ORD_QTY ORDERED_QTY, B.P_QTY PENDING_QTY, B.COMPLETED_QTY, B.CNL_QTY CANCELLED_QTY, B.AVAILABLE_TO_FORWARD, B.CONSIDER_IN_WIP, CASE WHEN B.IS_STANDARD = 'Y' THEN 'YES' WHEN B.IS_STANDARD = 'N' THEN 'NO' END IS_STANDARD, A.CODE PRDPLAN_CODE, B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE BARCODE, B.PRCODE PROCESS_CODE, ADMSITE.CODE SITECODE, CASE WHEN B.ISSUE_ASSEMBLY_ITEM = 'O' THEN 'On Order' WHEN B.ISSUE_ASSEMBLY_ITEM = 'P' THEN 'Push/Manual' WHEN B.ISSUE_ASSEMBLY_ITEM = 'N' THEN 'None' END ASSEMBLY_SUPPLY_TYPE, PRD_SAITEM.SAINAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_NAME, PRD_SAITEM.SHORT_NAME SUB_ASSEMBLY_SHORT_NAME, B.WIPCLR_QTY WIP_CLEARANCE_QTY, B.ALTERNATE_QTY ALTERNATE_COMPLETED_QTY, B.ALTERNATE_CNL_QTY ALTERNATE_CANCEL_QTY FROM PRDLOTMAIN A INNER JOIN PRDLOTOPERATION B ON A.CODE = B.LOTCODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE ON A.ADMSITE_CODE = ADMSITE.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRD_SAITEM ON B.ASS_SAITEM_CODE = PRD_SAITEM.CODE WHERE A.SCHEDULE_DATE::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')

entity.object_description: Get Working Plan Item details. Information for Assembly item and Planned Qty for each working plan is available here. Note : Performance will impact for large data volume
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT row_number() over() uk, A.LOTNO PLAN_NO, A.SCHEDULE_DATE::DATE SCHEDULED_START_DATE, A.REMARKS MAIN_REMARK, CASE WHEN A.IS_CLOSED = 'Y' THEN 'YES' WHEN A.IS_CLOSED = 'N' THEN 'NO' END IS_CLOSED, A.CLOSE_DATE, B.QTY PLANNED_QTY, A.CODE PRDPLAN_CODE, B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE BARCODE, ADMSITE.CODE SITECODE, B.REMARKS, MASTER_PLAN_NO, MASTER_PLAN_DATE, SALES_ORDER_NO, SALES_ORDER_DATE FROM PRDLOTMAIN A INNER JOIN PRDLOTDET B ON A.CODE = B.LOTCODE INNER JOIN ADMSITE ON A.ADMSITE_CODE = ADMSITE.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT A.CODE, A.ASSEMBLY_ICODE, M.PLANNO MASTER_PLAN_NO, M.SCHEDULE_DATE::DATE MASTER_PLAN_DATE, S.ORDNO SALES_ORDER_NO, S.ORDDT::DATE SALES_ORDER_DATE FROM PRDMPLANALLOC A INNER JOIN PRDMPLANDET B ON A.PRDMPLANDET_CODE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDMPLANMAIN M ON B.PLANCODE = M.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SALORDMAIN S ON M.ORDCODE = S.ORDCODE) M ON B.PRDMPLANALLOC_CODE = M.CODE AND B.ASSEMBLY_ICODE = M.ASSEMBLY_ICODE WHERE A.SCHEDULE_DATE::DATE BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')

entity.object_description: Stock audit verification analysis can be done in comprehensive way through this data. User can use this data to analyse Physical inventory with actual book inventory in 360 degree way.
entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 06-08-2024 12:46:04 (QP5 v5.294) */ /*Stock Audit Verification*/ /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 80173 Tanmoy Item properties are not showing for the items in the #Stock Audit Verification Register# report when the Snapshot Qty is zero. */ WITH plan_dt AS ( SELECT DISTINCT actual_startdt actual_startdt FROM ( SELECT p1.actual_startdt actual_startdt FROM ( WITH date_count AS ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p1.actual_startdt::DATE) AS distinct_count FROM invstkplanmain p1 WHERE p1.STATUS = 'V' AND ( p1.DESCRIP IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) AND p1.actual_startdt::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@PlanDateFrom@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::DATE AND TO_DATE('@PlanDateTo@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::DATE ) SELECT LOCCODE ,ADMSITE_CODE ,STATUS ,actual_startdt actual_startdate ,DESCRIP ,CASE WHEN dc.distinct_count > 1 THEN NULL ELSE p1.actual_startdt::DATE END AS actual_startdt FROM invstkplanmain p1 ,date_count dc WHERE p1.STATUS = 'V' AND ( p1.DESCRIP IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) AND p1.actual_startdt::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@PlanDateFrom@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::DATE AND TO_DATE('@PlanDateTo@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::DATE ) p1 ,INVLOC L ,ADMSITE S WHERE P1.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE AND P1.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE AND p1.STATUS = 'V' AND ( ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT AND SITETYPE IN ( 'OS-OO-CM' ,'MS-OO-CM' ,'MS-CO-CM' ) ) OR ( s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) ) AND ( p1.DESCRIP IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) AND p1.actual_startdt::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@PlanDateFrom@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::DATE AND TO_DATE('@PlanDateTo@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::DATE AND ( l.locNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockpointNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockpointNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) ) ) ,q1 AS ( SELECT p.plan_description PLAN_DESCRIPTION ,p.sitecode SITECODE ,p.plan_type PLAN_TYPE ,p.barcode BARCODE ,p.ecode ,h.fname PLAN_CREATED_BY ,p.plan_date PLAN_DATE ,p.plan_activation_date PLAN_ACTIVATION_DATE ,p.stock_plan_remarks STOCK_PLAN_REMARKS ,p.stkplancode STKPLANCODE ,p.loccode loccode ,p.locname LOCNAME ,stk.qty BOOK_STOCK ,p.snapshot_qty SNAPSHOT_QTY ,p.physical_stock PHYSICAL_STOCK ,coalesce(p.physical_stock, 0) - coalesce(stk.qty, 0) DIFF_STOCK /*,l.lev1grpname snap_division ,l.lev2grpname snap_section ,l.grpname snap_department ,l.article_name snap_article ,l.cname1 snap_cname1 ,l.cname2 snap_cname2 ,l.cname3 snap_cname3 ,l.cname4 snap_cname4 ,l.cname5 snap_cname5 ,l.cname6 snap_cname6 BUG 80173*/ ,COALESCE(L.LEV1GRPNAME, IM.DIVISION) SNAP_DIVISION ,COALESCE(L.LEV2GRPNAME, IM.SECTION) SNAP_SECTION ,COALESCE(L.GRPNAME, IM.DEPARTMENT) SNAP_DEPARTMENT ,COALESCE(L.ARTICLE_NAME, IM.ARTICLE_NAME) SNAP_ARTICLE ,COALESCE(L.CNAME1, IM.CATEGORY1) SNAP_CNAME1 ,COALESCE(L.CNAME2, IM.CATEGORY2) SNAP_CNAME2 ,COALESCE(L.CNAME3, IM.CATEGORY3) SNAP_CNAME3 ,COALESCE(L.CNAME4, IM.CATEGORY4) SNAP_CNAME4 ,COALESCE(L.CNAME5, IM.CATEGORY5) SNAP_CNAME5 ,COALESCE(L.CNAME6, IM.CATEGORY6) SNAP_CNAME6 ,CASE WHEN coalesce(stk.qty, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((stk.COSTAMOUNT / stk.QTY)::NUMERIC, 0) END CURRENT_COST_RATE ,p.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE ,BATCH_SERIAL_NO ,EXP_DATE ,MFG_DATE FROM ( SELECT plan_description ,sitecode ,plan_type ,barcode ,ecode ,plan_date ,plan_activation_date ,stock_plan_remarks ,stkplancode ,loccode ,locname ,SUM(snapshot_qty) snapshot_qty ,SUM(physical_stock) physical_stock ,INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM ( SELECT p1.descrip plan_description ,p1.admsite_code sitecode ,CASE p1.entrytype WHEN 'I' THEN 'Item Wise' WHEN 'G' THEN 'Assortment Wise' END plan_type ,i1.icode barcode ,p1.ecode ecode ,p1.startdt plan_date ,p1.actual_startdt plan_activation_date ,p1.remarks stock_plan_remarks ,p1.stkplancode ,p1.loccode ,l.locname ,coalesce(i1.lock_invstock_qty, 0) snapshot_qty ,0 physical_stock ,i1.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM invstkplanmain p1 INNER JOIN invstkplanitem i1 ON p1.stkplancode = i1.stkplancode INNER JOIN admsite s ON p1.admsite_code = s.code INNER JOIN invloc l ON p1.loccode = l.loccode WHERE p1.STATUS = 'V' AND p1.ACTUAL_STARTDT::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@PlanDateFrom@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@PlanDateTo@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) AND ( l.locNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockpointNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockpointNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) AND ( p1.DESCRIP IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) UNION ALL SELECT p1.descrip plan_description ,p1.admsite_code sitecode ,CASE p1.entrytype WHEN 'I' THEN 'Item Wise' WHEN 'G' THEN 'Assortment Wise' END plan_type ,d.icode barcode ,p1.ecode ecode ,p1.startdt plan_date ,p1.actual_startdt plan_activation_date ,p1.remarks stock_plan_remarks ,p1.stkplancode ,p1.loccode ,l.locname ,0 snapshot_qty ,coalesce(d.qty, 0) physical_stock ,d.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE FROM invstkplanmain p1 INNER JOIN invstkentmain m ON P1.stkplancode = m.stkplancode RIGHT JOIN invstkentdet d ON m.stkentcode = d.stkentcode INNER JOIN admsite s ON p1.admsite_code = s.code INNER JOIN invloc l ON p1.loccode = l.loccode WHERE p1.STATUS = 'V' AND p1.ACTUAL_STARTDT::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@PlanDateFrom@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('@PlanDateTo@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) AND ( l.locNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockpointNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockpointNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) AND ( p1.DESCRIP IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) ) WHERE ( plan_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanModeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanModeMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) GROUP BY plan_description ,sitecode ,plan_type ,barcode ,ecode ,plan_date ,plan_activation_date ,stock_plan_remarks ,stkplancode ,loccode ,locname ,INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE ) p LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT K.ADMSITE_CODE ,K.LOCCODE ,K.ICODE ,SUM(K.QTY) qty ,SUM(K.COSTAMOUNT) COSTAMOUNT ,K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE /*Feature 107045 batch serial*/ FROM INVSTOCK K ,ADMSITE S ,INVLOC L WHERE K.ENTDT <= ( SELECT actual_startdt FROM plan_dt ) AND K.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE AND K.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE AND ( K.admsite_code ,K.loccode ) IN ( SELECT p1.admsite_code ,p1.loccode FROM invstkplanmain p1 ,invloc l ,admsite s WHERE p1.loccode = l.loccode AND p1.admsite_code = s.code AND p1.STATUS = 'V' AND ( ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT AND SITETYPE IN ( 'OS-OO-CM' ,'MS-OO-CM' ,'MS-CO-CM' ) ) OR ( s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) ) AND ( p1.DESCRIP IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockAuditPlanHeaderPlanNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) AND p1.actual_startdt::DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('@PlanDateFrom@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::DATE AND TO_DATE('@PlanDateTo@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')::DATE AND ( l.locNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#StockpointNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#StockpointNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::TEXT = 0::TEXT ) ) GROUP BY K.ADMSITE_CODE ,K.LOCCODE ,K.ICODE ,K.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE ) stk ON ( p.LOCCODE = stk.LOCCODE AND p.BARCODE = stk.icode AND p.sitecode = stk.ADMSITE_CODE AND coalesce(p.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, 999999999999) = coalesce(stk.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, 999999999999) ) INNER JOIN hrdemp h ON (p.ecode = h.ecode) LEFT OUTER JOIN invstkplanitem l ON ( p.stkplancode = l.stkplancode AND p.BARCODE = l.icode AND p.loccode = l.loccode AND coalesce(p.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, 999999999999) = coalesce(l.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE, 999999999999) ) LEFT OUTER JOIN invbatch_serial b ON (p.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = b.CODE) INNER JOIN INVITEM_DETAIL_AGG IM ON (P.BARCODE = IM.CODE) ) SELECT t1.* ,row_number() over() uk FROM ( SELECT 'LVL1' lvl ,STKPLANCODE ,NULL requestid ,plan_description ,sitecode ,plan_created_by ,plan_type ,plan_date ,plan_activation_date ,stock_plan_remarks ,loccode ,locname ,barcode ,physical_stock ,book_stock ,diff_stock ,snapshot_qty ,snap_division ,snap_section ,snap_department ,snap_article ,snap_cname1 ,snap_cname2 ,snap_cname3 ,snap_cname4 ,snap_cname5 ,snap_cname6 ,current_cost_rate , /*Feature 107045 batch serial Start*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE ,BATCH_SERIAL_NO ,EXP_DATE ,MFG_DATE /*End Change */ FROM q1 UNION ALL SELECT 'LVL2' lvl ,a.STKPLANCODE ,NULL requestid ,a.plan_description ,a.sitecode ,a.plan_created_by ,a.plan_type ,a.plan_date ,a.plan_activation_date ,a.stock_plan_remarks ,a.loccode ,a.locname ,a.barcode ,a.physical_stock ,a.book_stock ,a.diff_stock ,a.snapshot_qty ,a.snap_division ,a.snap_section ,a.snap_department ,a.snap_article ,a.snap_cname1 ,a.snap_cname2 ,a.snap_cname3 ,a.snap_cname4 ,a.snap_cname5 ,a.snap_cname6 ,a.current_cost_rate , /*Feature 107045 batch serial Start*/ A.INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE ,A.BATCH_SERIAL_NO ,A.EXP_DATE ,A.MFG_DATE /*End Change */ FROM q1 a ,invitem_detail_agg b WHERE a.barcode = b.code AND ( coalesce(b.division, '~') <> coalesce(a.snap_division, '~') OR coalesce(b.section, '~') <> coalesce(a.snap_section, '~') OR coalesce(b.department, '~') <> coalesce(a.snap_department, '~') OR coalesce(b.article_name, '~') <> coalesce(a.snap_article, '~') OR coalesce(b.category1, '~') <> coalesce(a.snap_cname1, '~') OR coalesce(b.category2, '~') <> coalesce(a.snap_cname2, '~') OR coalesce(b.category3, '~') <> coalesce(a.snap_cname3, '~') OR coalesce(b.category4, '~') <> coalesce(a.snap_cname4, '~') OR coalesce(b.category5, '~') <> coalesce(a.snap_cname5, '~') OR coalesce(b.category6, '~') <> coalesce(a.snap_cname6, '~') ) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'LVL3' ,STKPLANCODE ,NULL requestid ,plan_description ,sitecode ,plan_created_by ,plan_type ,plan_date ,plan_activation_date ,NULL ,loccode ,locname ,NULL ,NULL::NUMERIC ,NULL::NUMERIC ,NULL::NUMERIC ,NULL::NUMERIC ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL::NUMERIC , /*Feature 107045 batch serial Start*/ NULL::int8 ,NULL ,NULL::DATE ,NULL::DATE /*End Change */ FROM q1 ) t1

/* Formatted on 25-11-2022 10:31:04 (QP5 v5.294) */ with d_slab as ( select slab, LPAD (slab_from::text, 5, '0') || '#' ||slab_name slab_name, slab_from*-1 slab_from,slab_to*-1 slab_to from ( select 'Slab1' slab,to_number('0','99999')::text||' - '||to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab1@',''),'99999')::text||' Days' slab_name, to_number('0','99999')slab_from, to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab1@',''),'99999') slab_to union all select 'Slab2' slab, (to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab1@',''),'99999')+1)::text||' - '|| case when to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab2@',''),'99999') is null then 'Above' else (to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab2@',''),'99999'))::text end ||' Days' slab_name, to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab1@',''),'99999')+1 slab_from, coalesce(to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab2@',''),'99999'),99999) slab_to union all select 'Slab3' slab, case when to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab2@',''),'99999') is null then null else (to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab2@',''),'99999')+1)::text||' - '|| case when to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab3@',''),'99999') is null then 'Above' else (to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab3@',''),'99999'))::text end ||' Days' end slab_name, to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab2@',''),'99999')+1 slab_from, coalesce(to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab3@',''),'99999'),99999) slab_to union all select 'Slab4' slab, case when to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab3@',''),'99999')is null then null else (to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab3@',''),'99999')+1)::text||' - '|| case when to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab4@',''),'99999') is null then 'Above' else (to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab4@',''),'99999'))::text end ||' Days' end slab_name, to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab3@',''),'99999')+1 slab_from, coalesce(to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab4@',''),'99999'),99999) slab_to union all select 'Slab5' slab, case when to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab4@',''),'99999')is null then null else (to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab4@',''),'99999')+1)::text||' - '|| 'Above Days' end slab_name, to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab4@',''),'99999')+1 slab_from, 99999 slab_to )q1 where slab_name is not null and to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab1@',''),'99999') is not null ) SELECT row_number() over() UK, SITE.CODE ADMSITE_CODE, I.CODE ICODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE VALID_UPTO, ENTTYPE, LAST_IN_DATE, SLNAME, LOCNAME, NOW()::date - EXP_DATE::date AGEING, (select slab from d_slab where to_number(nullif('@NearExpirySlab1@',''),'99999') is not null and NOW()::date - b.EXP_DATE::date between slab_to and slab_from) AGE_SLAB, SUM (CASE WHEN b.EXP_DATE::date < NOW()::date THEN stk.qty else 0 END) Expired_qty, SUM (QTY) STOCK_QTY FROM INVBATCH_SERIAL B INNER JOIN INVSTOCK_ONHAND_STOCKPOINT_AGG STK ON (B.CODE = INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL P ON (PCODE = P.SLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE SITE ON (STK.ADMSITE_CODE = SITE.CODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (STK.ICODE = I.CODE) INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (STK.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) Where b.BATCH_SERIAL_MODE = 'B' AND i.MANAGE_EXPIRY = 'Y' AND b.EXP_DATE IS NOT NULL AND 1= case when to_number('@ShowExpired@','9G999g999999999999d99')=1 then 1 when to_number('@ShowExpired@','9G999g999999999999d99')=0 and b.EXP_DATE::date >= NOW()::date then 1 end GROUP BY site.code, i.CODE, b.BATCH_SERIAL_NO, b.MFG_DATE, b.EXP_DATE, b.ENTTYPE, b.LAST_IN_DATE, p.slname, l.LOCNAME Having SUM (stk.qty)<>0

entity.object_description: This data source will display expiry analisys of stock. This data source will consider items which is expiry managed only and Stock details would be showing based on report run time.
entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 13-12-2022 14:41:45 (QP5 v5.294) */ SELECT row_number() over() UK, SITE.CODE ADMSITE_CODE, I.CODE ICODE, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, MFG_DATE, EXP_DATE VALID_UPTO, ENTTYPE, LAST_IN_DATE, SLNAME, NOW()::date - EXP_DATE::date AGEING, CASE WHEN (TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0) THEN (CASE WHEN ( (NOW()::date - EXP_DATE::date) BETWEEN 0 AND 7) THEN 'Expired in last 0 - 7 Days' WHEN ( (NOW()::date - EXP_DATE::date) BETWEEN 8 AND 30) THEN 'Expired in last 8 -30 Days' WHEN ( (NOW()::date - EXP_DATE::date) > 30) THEN 'Expired in last 30+ Days' WHEN ( (NOW()::date - EXP_DATE::date) BETWEEN (-7) AND 0) THEN 'Near to Expiry in Next 7 Days' WHEN ( (NOW()::date - EXP_DATE::date) BETWEEN (-30) AND (-8)) THEN 'Near to Expiry in Next 8 - 30 Days' WHEN ( (NOW()::date - EXP_DATE::date) BETWEEN (-90) AND (-31)) THEN 'Near to Expiry in Next 31 - 90 Days' WHEN ( (NOW()::date - EXP_DATE::date) BETWEEN (-120) AND (-91)) THEN 'Near to Expiry in Next 91 - 120 Days' WHEN ( (NOW()::date - EXP_DATE::date) < (-120)) THEN 'Near to Expiry in Next 120+ Days' END) WHEN (TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 99999) THEN 'Already Expired' WHEN (TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 7) THEN 'Expired in Last 7 days' WHEN (TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 30) THEN 'Expired in Last 30 days' WHEN (TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 90) THEN 'Expired in Last 90 days' WHEN (TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') = (-30)) THEN 'Near to Expire in 30 days' WHEN (TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') = (-90)) THEN 'Near to Expire in 90 days' WHEN (TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') = (-91)) THEN 'Others' ELSE NULL END VALIDITY_TYPE, string_AGG (l.LOCNAME || ' : ' || stk.qty::text, ' | ' ORDER BY site.code, i.CODE, b.BATCH_SERIAL_NO) Stockpoint, SUM (QTY) STOCK_QTY, SUM (AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM INVBATCH_SERIAL B INNER JOIN INVSTOCK_ONHAND_STOCKPOINT_AGG STK ON (B.CODE = INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINSL P ON (PCODE = P.SLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE SITE ON (STK.ADMSITE_CODE = SITE.CODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_ITEM I ON (STK.ICODE = I.CODE) INNER JOIN INVLOC L ON (STK.LOCCODE = L.LOCCODE) Where b.BATCH_SERIAL_MODE = 'B' AND i.MANAGE_EXPIRY = 'Y' AND b.EXP_DATE IS NOT NULL AND 1 = CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 THEN 1 WHEN TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') > 0 AND b.exp_date BETWEEN NOW()::date -TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99')::int AND NOW()::date THEN 1 WHEN TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') < 0 AND TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') <> -91 AND b.exp_date BETWEEN NOW()::date AND NOW()::date - TO_NUMBER ( '@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99')::int THEN 1 WHEN TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99') = -91 AND b.exp_date >= NOW()::date - TO_NUMBER ('@BatchValidityPeriodType@','9G999g999999999999d99')::int THEN 1 WHEN '@BatchValidityOption@' ='D' AND TO_DATE ('@BatchValidUpToDate@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= NOW()::date AND b.exp_date BETWEEN NOW()::date AND TO_DATE ('@BatchValidUpToDate@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') THEN 1 WHEN '@BatchValidityOption@' ='D' AND TO_DATE ('@BatchValidUpToDate@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') < NOW()::date AND b.exp_date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@BatchValidUpToDate@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND NOW()::date THEN 1 END GROUP BY site.code, i.CODE, b.BATCH_SERIAL_NO, b.MFG_DATE, b.EXP_DATE, b.ENTTYPE, b.LAST_IN_DATE, p.slname HAVING SUM (stk.qty) <> 0

entity.object_description: This is a report specific source dedicated to produce #Store Collection (MOP wise) Register#. Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT null REQUESTID ,row_number() over() uk ,admsite_code ,billdate ,billno ,PAYMENTSOURCE ,MOPDESC ,sum(BASEAMT) BASEAMT ,IS_VOID ,UDFSTRING1 ,UDFSTRING2 ,UDFSTRING3 ,UDFSTRING4 ,UDFSTRING5 ,UDFSTRING6 ,UDFSTRING7 ,UDFSTRING8 ,UDFSTRING9 ,UDFSTRING10 ,UDFNUM01 ,UDFNUM02 ,UDFNUM03 ,UDFNUM04 ,UDFNUM05 ,UDFDATE01 ,UDFDATE02 ,UDFDATE03 ,UDFDATE04 ,UDFDATE05 ,CREATEBY ,CREATEDON ,LASTMODIFIEDBY ,LASTMODIFIEDON ,PSITE_CUSTOMER_CODE, /*Start Changes Bug Id : 110781*/ WALLET_REF_NUMBER, TPEDC_RESPONSE /*End Changes Bug Id : 110781*/ FROM ( select b.admsite_code, b.billdate::date billdate, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillNo@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then billno else 'All Bill' end billno, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then paymentsource else 'All Type' end paymentsource, mopdesc, baseamt, 'No' is_void, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillNo@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring1 end udfstring1, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillNo@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring2 end udfstring2, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring3 end udfstring3, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring4 end udfstring4, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring5 end udfstring5, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring6 end udfstring6, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring7 end udfstring7, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring8 end udfstring8, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring9 end udfstring9, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring10 end udfstring10, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFNUM01 end UDFNUM01, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFNUM02 end UDFNUM02, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFNUM03 end UDFNUM03, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFNUM04 end UDFNUM04, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFNUM05 end UDFNUM05, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFDATE01 end UDFDATE01, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFDATE02 end UDFDATE02, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFDATE03 end UDFDATE03, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFDATE03 end UDFDATE04, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFDATE05 end UDFDATE05, CREATEBY, CREATEDON, LASTMODIFIEDBY, LASTMODIFIEDON, PSITE_CUSTOMER_CODE, /*Start Changes Bug Id : 110781*/ m.WLT_REFNUMBER WALLET_REF_NUMBER, m.TPEDCRESPONSE TPEDC_RESPONSE /*End Changes Bug Id : 110781*/ from psite_posbillmop m inner join ( SELECT admsite_code, code billid, billno, billdate, psite_customer_code, createby, createdon, lastmodifiedon, lastmodifiedby, udfstring1, udfstring2, udfstring3, udfstring4, udfstring5, udfstring6, udfstring7, udfstring8, udfstring9, udfstring10, UDFNUM01, UDFNUM02, UDFNUM03, UDFNUM04, UDFNUM05, UDFDATE01, UDFDATE02, UDFDATE03, UDFDATE04, UDFDATE05 FROM psite_posbill UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, code billid, billno, billdate, psite_customer_code, createdby, createdon, lastmodifiedon, lastmodifiedby, udfstring1, udfstring2, udfstring3, udfstring4, udfstring5, udfstring6, udfstring7, udfstring8, udfstring9, udfstring10, UDFNUM01, UDFNUM02, UDFNUM03, UDFNUM04, UDFNUM05, UDFDATE01, UDFDATE02, UDFDATE03, UDFDATE04, UDFDATE05 FROM psite_posgvbill UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, code billid, billno, billdate, psite_customer_code, createby, createdon, lastmodifiedon, lastmodifiedby, udfstring1, udfstring2, udfstring3, udfstring4, udfstring5, udfstring6, udfstring7, udfstring8, udfstring9, udfstring10, UDFNUM01, UDFNUM02, UDFNUM03, UDFNUM04, UDFNUM05, UDFDATE01, UDFDATE02, UDFDATE03, UDFDATE04, UDFDATE05 FROM psite_posdeprefbill UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, code billid, billno, billdate, null psite_customer_code, createdby, createdon, lastmodifiedon, lastmodifiedby, null udfstring1, null udfstring2, null udfstring3, null udfstring4, null udfstring5, null udfstring6, null udfstring7, null udfstring8, null udfstring9, null udfstring10, null UDFNUM01, null UDFNUM02, null UDFNUM03, null UDFNUM04, null UDFNUM05, null UDFDATE01, null UDFDATE02, null UDFDATE03, null UDFDATE04, null UDFDATE05 FROM psite_ptcbill ) b on (m.psite_posbill_code = b.billid) inner join admsite s on (m.admsite_code = s.code) Where TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowVoidOnly@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 0 AND b.billdate::date BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.sitetype IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) union all select b.admsite_code, b.billdate::date billdate, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then billno else 'All Bill' end billno, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then paymentsource else 'All Type' end paymentsource, mopdesc, baseamt, 'Yes' is_void, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring1 end udfstring1, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring2 end udfstring2, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring3 end udfstring3, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring4 end udfstring4, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring5 end udfstring5, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring6 end udfstring6, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring7 end udfstring7, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring8 end udfstring8, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring9 end udfstring9, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.udfstring10 end udfstring10, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFNUM01 end UDFNUM01, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFNUM02 end UDFNUM02, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFNUM03 end UDFNUM03, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFNUM04 end UDFNUM04, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFNUM05 end UDFNUM05, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFDATE01 end UDFDATE01, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFDATE02 end UDFDATE02, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFDATE03 end UDFDATE03, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFDATE03 end UDFDATE04, case when TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowBillType@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 then b.UDFDATE05 end UDFDATE05, CREATEBY, CREATEDON, LASTMODIFIEDBY, cast(null as timestamp without time zone) LASTMODIFIEDON, PSITE_CUSTOMER_CODE, /*Start Changes Bug Id : 110781*/ m.WLT_REFNUMBER WALLET_REF_NUMBER, m.TPEDCRESPONSE TPEDC_RESPONSE /*End Changes Bug Id : 110781*/ from psite_posbillmopvoid m inner join ( SELECT admsite_code, code billid, voidbillno billno, voidbilldate billdate, psite_customer_code, createby, createdon, null lastmodifiedon, null lastmodifiedby, udfstring1, udfstring2, udfstring3, udfstring4, udfstring5, udfstring6, udfstring7, udfstring8, udfstring9, udfstring10, UDFNUM01, UDFNUM02, UDFNUM03, UDFNUM04, UDFNUM05, UDFDATE01, UDFDATE02, UDFDATE03, UDFDATE04, UDFDATE05 FROM psite_posbillvoid UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, code billid, voidbillno billno, voidbilldate billdate, psite_customer_code, createby, createdon, null lastmodifiedon, null lastmodifiedby, udfstring1, udfstring2, udfstring3, udfstring4, udfstring5, udfstring6, udfstring7, udfstring8, udfstring9, udfstring10, UDFNUM01, UDFNUM02, UDFNUM03, UDFNUM04, UDFNUM05, UDFDATE01, UDFDATE02, UDFDATE03, UDFDATE04, UDFDATE05 FROM psite_posdeprefbillvoid UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, code billid, voidbillno billno, voidbilldate billdate, null psite_customer_code, createdby, createdon, null lastmodifiedon, null lastmodifiedby, null udfstring1, null udfstring2, null udfstring3, null udfstring4, null udfstring5, null udfstring6, null udfstring7, null udfstring8, null udfstring9, null udfstring10, null UDFNUM01, null UDFNUM02, null UDFNUM03, null UDFNUM04, null UDFNUM05, null UDFDATE01, null UDFDATE02, null UDFDATE03, null UDFDATE04, null UDFDATE05 FROM psite_ptcbillvoid ) b on (m.psite_posbillvoid_code = b.billid) inner join admsite s on (b.admsite_code = s.code) Where TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(nullif('@ShowVoidOnly@',''),'-1'),'9G999g999') = 1 AND b.billdate::date BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.sitetype IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) ) q1 GROUP BY admsite_code ,billdate ,billno ,PAYMENTSOURCE ,MOPDESC ,IS_VOID ,UDFSTRING1 ,UDFSTRING2 ,UDFSTRING3 ,UDFSTRING4 ,UDFSTRING5 ,UDFSTRING6 ,UDFSTRING7 ,UDFSTRING8 ,UDFSTRING9 ,UDFSTRING10 ,UDFNUM01 ,UDFNUM02 ,UDFNUM03 ,UDFNUM04 ,UDFNUM05 ,UDFDATE01 ,UDFDATE02 ,UDFDATE03 ,UDFDATE04 ,UDFDATE05 ,CREATEBY ,CREATEDON ,LASTMODIFIEDBY ,LASTMODIFIEDON ,PSITE_CUSTOMER_CODE /*Start Changes Bug Id : 110781*/ ,WALLET_REF_NUMBER, TPEDC_RESPONSE /*End Changes Bug Id : 110781*/

entity.object_description: TBD
entity.sql_stmt:
/* Formatted on 01-01-2024 14:24:23 (QP5 v5.294) */ /*STORE_PERFORMANCE*/ /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 78287 Jyotirmoy 'Avg. Bill Value' field is showing wrong data in #Store Performance Report# 74104 Jyotirmoy Store Status is showing wrong data */
select null requestid, row_number() over() uk, st.code admsite_code, st.shrtname store_name, case when '@ReportBasis@' = 'D' then 'Daily' when '@ReportBasis@' = 'M' then 'Monthly' when '@ReportBasis@' = 'W' then 'Weekly' end report_basis, st.report_basis_date_format, st.date_order, coalesce (t1.net_qty, 0) net_qty, coalesce (t1.net_sale, 0) net_sale, coalesce (t1.discount_amt, 0) discount_amt, coalesce (t1.promo_amt, 0) promo_amt, coalesce (t1.avg_unit_per_bill, 0) avg_unit_per_bill, case when coalesce (st.store_size, 0) = 0 then 0 else ROUND ( (coalesce (t1.net_sale, 0) / coalesce (st.store_size, 0)), 2) end Sales_per_SQFT, coalesce (t1.avg_bill_value, 0) avg_bill_value, coalesce (t1.avg_selling_price, 0) avg_selling_price, coalesce (t1.no_of_bill, 0) no_of_bill, dense_rank () over (partition by st.date_order order by coalesce (t1.net_sale, 0) desc, st.shrtname) rank, coalesce (T1.footfall, 0) footfall, case when coalesce (T1.footfall, 0) = 0 then 0 else ROUND (t1.no_of_bill / T1.footfall, 2) end Coversion, coalesce (st.store_size, 0) Store_Area, lst.createdon last_sync_time, case when status is null then 'Info Pending' else status end status,/*74104*/ coalesce (netpayable, 0) netpayable, coalesce (mrpamt, 0) mrpamt, coalesce (idiscountamt, 0) idiscountamt, coalesce (returnamt, 0) returnamt, coalesce (taxamt, 0) taxamt, coalesce (taxableamt, 0) taxableamt, coalesce (settlement_count, 0) settlement_count, coalesce (mdiscountamt, 0) mdiscountamt, coalesce (lpdiscountamt, 0) lpdiscountamt /*Start Feature Id : 109921*/ , BILL_PROMO_AMT, BILL_DISC_APPORTIONED_AMT, BILL_COUPON_AMT /*End Feature Id : 109921*/ from ( select distinct case when '@ReportBasis@' = 'D' then (b.saledt::date)::text when '@ReportBasis@' = 'M' then TO_CHAR (b.saledt, 'MON-YY') when '@ReportBasis@' = 'W' then date_trunc('week', b.saledt)::date::text || ' to ' || (date_trunc('week', b.saledt)::date + 6)::text end report_basis_date_format, case when '@ReportBasis@' = 'D' then TO_CHAR (b.saledt, 'YYMMDD') when '@ReportBasis@' = 'M' then TO_CHAR (b.saledt, 'YYMM') when '@ReportBasis@' = 'W' then to_char(date_trunc('week', b.saledt), 'YYMMDD') end date_order, s.code, s.psite_initial, s.shrtname, coalesce (s.store_size, 0) store_size, coalesce (s.ext, 'N') ext from admdaybook b, admsite s where saledt between TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and coalesce (psite_ispublished, 'N') = 'Y' and (( (coalesce(nullif('@MSSiteType@',''),'-1')='-1' and s.sitetype in ('MS-OO-CM', 'MS-CO-CM', 'MS-CO-OM-TS')) or (coalesce(nullif('@MSSiteType@',''),'-1')<>'-1' and s.sitetype =coalesce(nullif('@MSSiteType@',''),'-1')) ) and ( (coalesce(to_number(nullif('@MSSiteTypeSiteNameExNonEx@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'),-1)=-1) or (coalesce(to_number(nullif('@MSSiteTypeSiteNameExNonEx@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'),-1)<>-1 and s.code = coalesce(to_number(nullif('@MSSiteTypeSiteNameExNonEx@',''),'9G999g999999999999d99'),-1)) ) ) ) st left outer join ( select sendercuid, MAX (createdon) createdon from dxreceive group by sendercuid) lst on (st.psite_initial = lst.sendercuid) left outer join ( select admsite_code, report_basis_date_format, SUM (coalesce (net_qty, 0)) net_qty, SUM (coalesce (net_sale, 0)) net_sale, SUM (coalesce (discount_amt, 0)) discount_amt, SUM (promo_amt) promo_amt, SUM (avg_unit_per_bill) avg_unit_per_bill, SUM (avg_bill_value) avg_bill_value, SUM (avg_selling_price) avg_selling_price, SUM (no_of_bill) no_of_bill, SUM (footfall) footfall, MAX (status) status, SUM (netpayable) netpayable, SUM (mrpamt) mrpamt, SUM (idiscountamt) idiscountamt, SUM (returnamt) returnamt, SUM (taxamt) taxamt, SUM (taxableamt) taxableamt, SUM (settlement_count) settlement_count, SUM (mdiscountamt) mdiscountamt, SUM (lpdiscountamt) lpdiscountamt /*Start Feature Id : 109921*/ , SUM (BILL_PROMO_AMT) BILL_PROMO_AMT, SUM (BILL_DISC_APPORTIONED_AMT) BILL_DISC_APPORTIONED_AMT, SUM (BILL_COUPON_AMT) BILL_COUPON_AMT /*End Feature Id : 109921*/ from ( select a.admsite_code, case when '@ReportBasis@' = 'D' then billdate::DATE::text when '@ReportBasis@' = 'M' then TO_CHAR (billdate, 'MON-YY') when '@ReportBasis@' = 'W' then date_trunc('WEEK', billdate)::DATE::text || ' to ' || (date_trunc('WEEK', billdate)::DATE + 6)::text end report_basis_date_format, SUM (coalesce (net_qty, 0)) net_qty, SUM (coalesce (a.netamt, 0)) net_sale, SUM (coalesce (a.discountamt, 0)) discount_amt, SUM (a.promoamt) promo_amt, ROUND (SUM (coalesce (net_qty, 0)) / COUNT (a.code), 2) avg_unit_per_bill, ROUND (SUM (coalesce (a.netamt, 0)) / COUNT (a.code), 2) avg_bill_value, case when SUM (coalesce (net_qty, 0)) = 0 then 0 else ROUND ( SUM (coalesce (a.netamt, 0)) / SUM (coalesce (net_qty, 0)), 2) end avg_selling_price, COUNT (a.code) no_of_bill, 0 footfall, MAX ( CASE WHEN '@ReportBasis@' = 'D' AND a.billdate::date > c.max_openon THEN 'Info Pending' ELSE 'Close' END)/*74104*/ status, SUM (a.netpayable) netpayable, SUM (a.mrpamt) mrpamt, SUM (a.idiscountamt) idiscountamt, SUM (a.returnamt) returnamt, SUM (b.taxamt) taxamt, SUM (b.taxableamt) taxableamt, 0 settlement_count, SUM (mdiscountamt) mdiscountamt, SUM (lpdiscountamt) lpdiscountamt /*Start Feature Id : 109921*/, /*Start Changes ADO Id : 78287*/ sum(a.MPROMOAMOUNT) BILL_PROMO_AMT, sum(a.MDISCOUNTAPPORTIONEDAMOUNT) BILL_DISC_APPORTIONED_AMT, sum(a.MCOUPONAMOUNT) BILL_COUPON_AMT /*End Changes ADO Id : 78287*/ /*End Feature Id : 109921*/ from psite_posbill a inner join ( select psite_posbill_code, SUM (qty) net_qty, SUM (taxamt) taxamt, SUM (taxableamt) taxableamt from psite_posbillitem group by psite_posbill_code) b on (a.code = b.psite_posbill_code) left outer join ( select admsite_code, MAX (closedon::DATE) max_closedon, MAX (openon::date) max_openon from psite_possession group by admsite_code) c on (a.admsite_code = c.admsite_code) --,psite_posstlm stlm where billdate::DATE between TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by a.admsite_code /* Change Start Against Bug Id : 107411 ,coalesce(footfall, 0) Change End Against Bug Id : 107411*/ --,NVL(footfall, 0) /*Bug Id : 108030*/ , case when '@ReportBasis@' = 'D' then billdate::DATE::text when '@ReportBasis@' = 'M' then TO_CHAR (billdate, 'MON-YY') when '@ReportBasis@' = 'W' then date_trunc('WEEK', billdate)::DATE::text || ' to ' || (date_trunc('WEEK', billdate)::DATE + 6)::text end /*Start Feature Id : 109921*/ /*, a.MPROMOAMOUNT, a.MDISCOUNTAPPORTIONEDAMOUNT, a.MCOUPONAMOUNT*/ /*End Feature Id : 109921*/ union all select pb.admsite_code, case when '@ReportBasis@' = 'D' then billdate::DATE::text when '@ReportBasis@' = 'M' then TO_CHAR (billdate, 'MON-YY') when '@ReportBasis@' = 'W' then date_trunc('WEEK', BILLDATE)::DATE::text || ' to ' || date_trunc('WEEK', BILLDATE)::DATE + 6::text end report_basis_date_format, 0 net_qty, 0 net_sale, 0 discount_amt, 0 promo_amt, 0 avg_unit_per_bill, 0 avg_bill_value, 0 avg_selling_price, 0 no_of_bill, SUM (footfall) footfall, MAX ( CASE WHEN '@ReportBasis@' = 'D' AND pb.billdate::date > c.max_openon THEN 'Info Pending' ELSE 'Close' END) status,/*74104*/ 0 netpayable, 0 mrpamt, 0 idiscountamt, 0 returnamt, 0 taxamt, 0 taxableamt, COUNT (stlm.SETTLEDON) settlement_count, 0 mdiscountamt, 0 lpdiscountamt /*Start Feature Id : 109921*/ , 0 BILL_PROMO_AMT, 0 BILL_DISC_APPORTIONED_AMT, 0 BILL_COUPON_AMT /*End Feature Id : 109921*/ from ( select distinct admsite_code, billdate::DATE billdate from psite_posbill) pb left outer join ( select admsite_code, MAX (closedon::DATE) max_closedon, MAX (openon::date) max_openon from psite_possession group by admsite_code) c on (pb.admsite_code = c.admsite_code)/*74104*/ left outer join psite_posstlm stlm on ( pb.ADMSITE_CODE = stlm.ADMSITE_CODE and billdate::DATE = stlm.STLMFOR) where billdate::DATE between TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by pb.admsite_code, case when '@ReportBasis@' = 'D' then billdate::DATE::text when '@ReportBasis@' = 'M' then TO_CHAR (billdate, 'MON-YY') when '@ReportBasis@' = 'W' then date_trunc('WEEK', BILLDATE)::DATE::text || ' to ' || date_trunc('WEEK', BILLDATE)::DATE + 6::text end)q1 group by admsite_code, report_basis_date_format) t1 on ( st.code = t1.admsite_code and st.report_basis_date_format = t1.report_basis_date_format) where 1 = case when (st.ext = 'Y' and coalesce (t1.net_sale, 0) = 0) then 0 else 1 end

COALESCE (NULLIF ('@BillType@', ''), '-1') = 'POSBill' AND coalesce (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@BillType@', ''), '-1'), '-1') <> '-1') OR coalesce (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@BillType@', ''), '-1'), '-1') = '-1') AND (s.sitetype IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) UNION ALL /*End change*/ LASTMODIFIEDON, LASTMODIFIEDBY, NETAMT, NOOFPRINTS, 'No' ISVOID FROM PSITE_POSGVBILL M INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) Where m.billdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ( COALESCE (NULLIF ('@BillType@', ''), '-1') = 'POSGVBill' AND coalesce (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@BillType@', ''), '-1'), '-1') <> '-1') OR coalesce (COALESCE (NULLIF ('@BillType@', ''), '-1'), '-1') = '-1') AND (s.sitetype IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT TERMINAL, CUSTOMER, REDMOBILENUMBER, CREATEBY, CREATEDON, LASTMODIFIEDON, LASTMODIFIEDBY, AMOUNT, NOOFPRINTS, 'No' ISVOID FROM PSITE_POSDEPREFBILL M INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) Where m.billdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ( COALESCE (NULLIF ('@BillType@', ''), '-1') = 'POSDepRefBill' AND coalesce (COALESCE (NULLIF 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text (BILLDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') BILL_TIME, TERMINAL, NULL CUSTOMER, NULL REDMOBILENUMBER, CREATEDBY, CREATEDON, LASTMODIFIEDON, LASTMODIFIEDBY, AMOUNT, NOOFPRINTS, 'No' ISVOID FROM PSITE_PTCBILL M INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) Where m.billdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ( ( COALESCE (NULLIF ('@BillType@', ''), '-1') = 'PTCBill' entity.sql_stmt:
/*STORE_SALE_PERIODIC_GROWTH*/
with main_data as (select pp.admsite_code ADMSITE_CODE, i.lev1grpname DIV, i.lev2grpname SEC, i.grpname DEPT, pp2.icode ICODE, concat( case WHEN to_number('@ShowBarcode@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(coalesce (i.barcode, i.icode), ' ')END , CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory1F@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.cname1 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory2F@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.cname2 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory3F@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.cname3 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory4F@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.cname4 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory5F@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.cname5 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory6F@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.cname6 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@IsDescription1@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.DESC1 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@IsDescription2@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.DESC2 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@IsDescription3@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.DESC3 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@IsDescription4@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.DESC4 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@IsDescription5@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(i.DESC5 , ' ') END , CASE WHEN to_number('@IsDescription6@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN i.DESC6 end) ITEM_DESC, case when billdate::date between TO_DATE ('@Period1DateFrom@','yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@Period1DateTo@','yyyy-mm-dd') then 'PERIOD_1' when billdate::date between TO_DATE ('@Period2DateFrom@','yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@Period2DateTo@','yyyy-mm-dd') then 'PERIOD_2' else null end PERIOD_TYPE, case when (TO_DATE ('@Period1DateFrom@','yyyy-mm-dd') between TO_DATE ( '@Period2DateFrom@','yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ( '@Period2DateTo@','yyyy-mm-dd')) or (TO_DATE ('@Period1DateTo@','yyyy-mm-dd') between TO_DATE ( '@Period2DateFrom@','yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ( '@Period2DateTo@','yyyy-mm-dd')) then 1 else 0 end ISOVERLAPPED, pp2.qty, pp2.netamt, pp2.TAXABLEAMT, pp2.GROSSAMT, pp2.TAXAMT, pp2.DISCOUNTAMT, pp2.PROMOAMT, (pp2.RSP * pp2.QTY) RSP_AMT from psite_posbill pp inner join psite_posbillitem pp2 on (pp.code = pp2.psite_posbill_code) inner join v_item i on (pp2.icode = i.icode) inner join ( select * from admsite s where (s.sitetype in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@','[^]+','g')) as col1) or coalesce (nullif ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@',''),'0')::text = 0::text) and (s.name in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@','[^]+','g')) as col1) or coalesce (nullif ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@',''),'0')::text = 0::text)) s on ( pp.admsite_code = s.code) where ( (billdate::date between TO_DATE ('@Period1DateFrom@','yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@Period1DateTo@','yyyy-mm-dd')) or (billdate::date between TO_DATE ('@Period2DateFrom@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ('@Period2DateTo@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and (i.lev1grpname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1) or coalesce (nullif ('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (i.lev2grpname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1) or coalesce (nullif ('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (i.grpname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1) or coalesce (nullif ('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text)) select null REQUESTID, row_number() over() UK, ADMSITE_CODE, DIV, SEC, DEPT, ICODE, ITEM_DESC, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_1' then qty else 0 end) PERIOD_1_QTY, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_1' then netamt else 0 end) PERIOD_1_NETAMT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_1' then TAXABLEAMT else 0 end) PERIOD_1_TAXABLE_AMOUNT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_1' then GROSSAMT else 0 end) PERIOD_1_GROSS_AMOUNT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_1' then TAXAMT else 0 end) PERIOD_1_TAX_AMOUNT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_1' then DISCOUNTAMT else 0 end) PERIOD_1_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_1' then PROMOAMT else 0 end) PERIOD_1_PROMO_AMOUNT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_1' then RSP_AMT else 0 end) PERIOD_1_RSP_AMT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_2' then qty else 0 end) PERIOD_2_QTY, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_2' then netamt else 0 end) PERIOD_2_NETAMT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_2' then TAXABLEAMT else 0 end) PERIOD_2_TAXABLE_AMOUNT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_2' then GROSSAMT else 0 end) PERIOD_2_GROSS_AMOUNT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_2' then TAXAMT else 0 end) PERIOD_2_TAX_AMOUNT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_2' then DISCOUNTAMT else 0 end) PERIOD_2_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_2' then PROMOAMT else 0 end) PERIOD_2_PROMO_AMOUNT, SUM ( case when PERIOD_TYPE = 'PERIOD_2' then RSP_AMT else 0 end) PERIOD_2_RSP_AMT, PERIOD_TYPE, ISOVERLAPPED, REPLACE ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', ', ') SITE_PARAM, REPLACE ('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '', ', ') DIV_PARAM, REPLACE ('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', '', ', ') SEC_PARAM, REPLACE ('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '', ', ') DPT_PARAM from main_data group by ADMSITE_CODE, DIV, SEC, DEPT, ICODE, ITEM_DESC, PERIOD_TYPE, ISOVERLAPPED
