entity.sql_stmt:
/* Formatted on 27-12-2022 13:14:06 (QP5 v5.294) */ /*Store Sales Person Performance*/
SELECT NULL REQUESTID, row_number() over() UK, admsite_code, salesperson_fname, salesperson_mname, salesperson_lname, salespersonno, salespersonid, icode, SUM (netamt) netamt, SUM (GrossAmt) GrossAmt, SUM (DiscountAmt) DiscountAmt, SUM (TaxAmt) TaxAmt, SUM (PromoAmt) PromoAmt, BILLNO, COUNT (icode) no_of_items, replace ('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '',', ') DIV_PARAM, replace ('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', '',', ') sec_PARAM, replace ('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '',', ') dpt_PARAM, /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE /*End change*/ /*Start Feature Id : 110935*/ , SUM(BILL_PROMO_AMT) BILL_PROMO_AMT , SUM(BILL_DISC_APPORTIONED_AMT) BILL_DISC_APPORTIONED_AMT , SUM(BILL_COUPON_AMT) BILL_COUPON_AMT , BILL_COUPON_FACTOR , BILL_COUPON_BASIS /*End Feature Id : 110935*/ /*Start EPIC Id : 110934 | FEATURE Id : 110935*/ ,sum(qty) total_item_qty ,billdate /*End EPIC Id : 110934 | FEATURE Id : 110935*/ FROM ( SELECT PB.ADMSITE_CODE, PB.CODE BILLNO, FNAME SALESPERSON_FNAME, MNAME SALESPERSON_MNAME, LNAME SALESPERSON_LNAME, SPNO SALESPERSONNO, ID SALESPERSONID, PBI.ICODE, PBI.NETAMT NETAMT, PBI.GROSSAMT GROSSAMT, PBI.DISCOUNTAMT DISCOUNTAMT, TAXAMT TAXAMT, PBI.PROMOAMT PROMOAMT, INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE /*Start Feature Id : 110935*/ ,pbi.MPROMOAMOUNT BILL_PROMO_AMT ,pbi.MDISCOUNTAPPORTIONEDAMOUNT BILL_DISC_APPORTIONED_AMT ,pbi.MCOUPONAMOUNT BILL_COUPON_AMT ,pbi.MCOUPONFACTOR BILL_COUPON_FACTOR ,pbi.MCOUPONBASIS BILL_COUPON_BASIS /*End Feature Id : 110935*/ /*Start EPIC Id : 110934 | FEATURE Id : 110935*/ ,pbi.qty ,pb.billdate /*End EPIC Id : 110934 | FEATURE Id : 110935*/ FROM PSITE_POSBILL PB INNER JOIN PSITE_POSBILLITEM PBI ON (PB.CODE = PSITE_POSBILL_CODE) INNER JOIN ADMSITE S ON (PB.ADMSITE_CODE = S.CODE) INNER JOIN PSITE_SALESPERSON SP1 ON (PSITE_SALESPERSON_ID = ID) AND (PBI.ADMSITE_CODE = SP1.ADMSITE_CODE) INNER JOIN V_ITEM I ON (PBI.ICODE = I.ICODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN INVBATCH_SERIAL B ON (INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE = B.CODE) Where (i.lev1grpname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDivisionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.lev2grpname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemSectionMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (i.grpname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ItemDepartmentMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.sitetype IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND pb.billdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))q1 GROUP BY admsite_code, salesperson_fname, salesperson_mname, salesperson_lname, salespersonno, salespersonid, icode, BILLNO, /*Start Change Feature 107045 batch serial*/ INVBATCH_SERIAL_CODE /*End Change*/ /*Start Feature Id : 110935*/ ,BILL_COUPON_FACTOR ,BILL_COUPON_BASIS /*End Feature Id : 110935*/ ,billdate/*EPIC Id : 110934 | FEATURE Id : 110935*/

entity.object_description: This is a report specific source dedicated to produce #Sub Ledger Monthly# system report. Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
entity.sql_stmt:
WITH V_YEAR AS ( SELECT ycode vycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NULL requestid ,keyval ,year_month ,ycode ,glcode ,slcode ,CASE WHEN parcode IS NULL THEN opening ELSE lag(running) OVER ( PARTITION BY glcode ,slcode ) END opening ,debit ,credit ,running CLOSING FROM ( SELECT keyval ,year_month ,ycode ,glcode ,slcode ,opening ,debit ,credit ,LAG(keyval) OVER ( PARTITION BY glcode ,slcode ORDER BY keyval ) parcode ,SUM(balance) OVER ( PARTITION BY glcode ,slcode ORDER BY keyval ) running FROM ( SELECT year_month ,glcode ,slcode ,keyval ,ycode ,SUM(opening) opening ,SUM(debit) debit ,SUM(credit) credit ,SUM(opening + debit - credit) balance FROM ( SELECT t1.keyval ,t1.year_month ,t1.ycode ,t2.glcode ,t1.slcode ,coalesce(opening, 0) opening ,coalesce(debit, 0) debit ,coalesce(credit, 0) credit FROM ( SELECT slcode::VARCHAR || t4.glcode::VARCHAR || TO_CHAR(dtfr, 'YYYYMM') keyval ,TO_CHAR(dtfr, 'YYYY-MMMON') year_month ,t4.glcode ,slcode ,ycode FROM admmonth t1 ,finsl t2 ,admcls t3 ,( SELECT glcode ,glname FROM fingl WHERE slapp = 'Y' ) t4 WHERE t2.clscode = t3.clscode AND dtfr BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND (t4.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( ( coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' AND t3.CLSNAME = nullif('@AllClass@', '') ) OR coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) ) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT (P.SLCODE::VARCHAR || P.GLCODE::VARCHAR) || TO_CHAR(ENTDT, 'YYYYMM') KEYVAL ,TO_CHAR(ENTDT, 'YYYY-MMMON') YEAR_MONTH ,P.GLCODE GLCODE ,P.SLCODE ,0 OPENING ,SUM(DAMOUNT) DEBIT ,SUM(CAMOUNT) CREDIT FROM FINPOST P INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (P.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN FINSL SL ON (P.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMCLS CL ON (SL.CLSCODE = CL.CLSCODE) WHERE admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND ENTDT BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( ( coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' AND CLSNAME = nullif('@AllClass@', '') ) OR coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) AND (glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( SLNAME IN ( SELECT unnest(string_to_array('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '')) ) OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0') = '0' ) AND ( ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT = 0 AND release_status = 'P' ) OR ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT = 1 AND release_status IN ( 'P' ,'U' ) ) ) GROUP BY (P.SLCODE::VARCHAR || P.GLCODE::VARCHAR) || TO_CHAR(ENTDT, 'YYYYMM') ,TO_CHAR(ENTDT, 'YYYY-MMMON') ,P.GLCODE ,P.SLCODE ORDER BY (P.SLCODE::VARCHAR || P.GLCODE::VARCHAR) || TO_CHAR(ENTDT, 'YYYYMM') ) t2 ON (t1.keyval = t2.keyval)
UNION ALL
SELECT p.slcode::VARCHAR || p.glcode::VARCHAR || TO_CHAR(to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMM') keyval ,TO_CHAR(to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MMMON') year_month ,p.ycode ,p.glcode ,p.slcode ,SUM(damount) - SUM(camount) opening ,0 debit ,0 credit FROM finpost p JOIN V_YEAR y ON (p.YCODE = y.vycode) JOIN fingl gl ON P.glcode = gl.glcode JOIN finsl sl ON p.slcode = sl.slcode JOIN admcls cl ON sl.clscode = cl.clscode WHERE entdt < to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( ( coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' AND cl.clsname = nullif('@AllClass@', '') ) OR coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) AND admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT = 0 AND release_status = 'P' ) OR ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '')::INT = 1 AND release_status IN ( 'P' ,'U' ) ) ) GROUP BY p.slcode::VARCHAR || p.glcode::VARCHAR || TO_CHAR(to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMM') ,TO_CHAR(to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MMMON') ,p.ycode ,p.glcode ,p.slcode UNION ALL SELECT (P.SLCODE::VARCHAR || P.GLCODE::VARCHAR) || TO_CHAR(to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMM') KEYVAL ,TO_CHAR(to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MMMON') YEAR_MONTH ,p.YCODE ,P.GLCODE ,P.SLCODE ,SUM(OPDAMT) - SUM(OPCAMT) OPENING ,0 DEBIT ,0 CREDIT FROM FINSLOP P JOIN V_YEAR y ON (p.YCODE = y.vycode) INNER JOIN FINGL GL ON (P.GLCODE = GL.GLCODE) INNER JOIN FINSL SL ON (P.SLCODE = SL.SLCODE) INNER JOIN ADMCLS CL ON (SL.CLSCODE = CL.CLSCODE) WHERE ( ( coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') <> '-1' AND cl.clsname = nullif('@AllClass@', '') ) OR coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@', ''), '-1') = '-1' ) AND admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INT AND (glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY (P.SLCODE::VARCHAR || P.GLCODE::VARCHAR) || TO_CHAR(to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMM') ,TO_CHAR(to_date('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MMMON') ,YCODE ,P.GLCODE ,P.SLCODE ) T1 GROUP BY year_month ,glcode ,slcode ,keyval ,ycode ) T2 WHERE ( coalesce(opening, 0) <> 0 OR coalesce(debit, 0) <> 0 OR coalesce(credit, 0) <> 0 ) ) ) WHERE ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 1 OR ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 0 AND closing <> 0 ) )

/* Formatted on 26-09-2022 14:48:25 (QP5 v5.294) */ SELECT row_number() over() uk, slcode, t1.glcode, COALESCE (opening, 0) opening, COALESCE (debit, 0) debit, COALESCE (credit, 0) credit, g.glname, COALESCE (opening, 0) + COALESCE (debit, 0) - COALESCE (credit, 0) closing, SUM (COALESCE (opening, 0) + COALESCE (debit, 0) - COALESCE (credit, 0)) OVER (partition by slcode ORDER BY slcode, g.glname) AS running_balance FROM ( SELECT slcode, glcode, SUM (opening) opening, SUM (debit) debit, SUM (credit) credit FROM ( SELECT slcode, glcode, 0 opening, SUM (damount) debit, SUM (camount) credit FROM finpost WHERE admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND slcode IS NOT NULL AND entdt BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY slcode, glcode UNION ALL SELECT slcode, glcode, SUM (debit) - SUM (credit) opening, 0 debit, 0 credit FROM ( SELECT slcode, glcode, SUM (opdamt) debit, SUM (opcamt) credit FROM finslop WHERE admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) GROUP BY slcode, glcode UNION ALL SELECT slcode, glcode, SUM (damount) debit, SUM (camount) credit FROM finpost WHERE admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND entdt < TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ycode = (SELECT ycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto) AND slcode IS NOT NULL GROUP BY slcode, glcode)q1 GROUP BY slcode, glcode)q2 GROUP BY slcode, glcode) t1 inner join fingl g on (t1.glcode = g.glcode) where to_number('@ShowSummary@','9G999g999999999999d99')=1

entity.object_description: Get details of Transaction to be shown as per the selected Sub-ledger and other parameters
entity.sql_stmt: with /* ADO Id Developed By Issue 95838 Jyotirmoy Performance Issue */ SL_NAME as (select * from ( select sl.SLCODE sl_code, sl.SLNAME, sl.SLID, sl.BCTNAME, sl.CLSCODE, sl.AGCODE, cl.clsname, ag.slname agname, GINVIEW.ERPBALANCE('SL'::text, sl.slcode::INTEGER, to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd'), (select yname::text from admyear where to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto ), null::INTEGER, nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::INTEGER) Outstanding From finsl sl inner join admcls cl on (sl.clscode = cl.clscode) LEFT OUTER JOIN finsl ag ON (sl.agcode = ag.slcode) where (sl.slname||'|'||sl.slid IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerDisplayNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerDisplayNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ((cl.clsname = coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') and coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') <> '-1') or coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') = '-1') and ((sl.agcode = coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''), '-1')::int and coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''), '-1')::int <> -1) or coalesce(nullif('@Agent@',''), '-1')::int = -1)) where (nullif('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','')::int = 1 or (nullif('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@','')::int = 0 and Outstanding <> 0))), GL_NAME as ( select GLCODE gl_code, GLNAME from FINGL GL where (gl.glname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 ) or coalesce(nullif('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0') = '0' )), data as (select f.postcode, entcode, entno, entdt, f.enttype, docno, docdt, duedt, glcode, slcode, coalesce(damount,0) damount, coalesce(camount,0) camount, adjamt, ycode, nartext, scheme_docno, chqno, chqdt, drawnon, brsdt, chqlabel, chgcode, chgrate, tdstypecode, tdssrccode, tdssection, tdsrate, tds_appamt, certificateno, servicecode, case release_status when 'P' then 'Posted' when 'U' then 'Unposted' when 'R' then 'Reversed' end release_status, admsite_code_owner, ref_admsite_code, chgappamt, chgamt, ecode, "time", last_access_ecode, last_access_time, release_ecode, release_time, chg_pk_code, cash_discount_applicable, cash_discount_percentage, cash_discount_period, admou_code, sl_code, slname, slid, clscode, agcode, agname, gl_code, glname, e.entname , 'Doc No. ' || coalesce(f.docno, f.scheme_docno) || case when f.docno is null then null else case when f.docdt is null then null else ' (' || f.docdt::DATE || ')' end end || CHR(10) || case when f.TDSRATE is null then null else 'TDS Rate ' || f.TDSRATE::text || ' TDS App. Amt. ' || f.TDS_APPAMT::text || CHR(10) || 'TDS Amt. '::text || ROUND((f.TDSRATE::numeric * f.TDS_APPAMT::numeric) / 100, 2)::text end document_details, case when p2.POSTCODE is null then ginview.fnc_ledgerdetails(f.postcode, entcode, f.enttype, f.glcode, f.damount, f.camount) else p2.particulars end particulars , null particulars_2 , null particulars_3 , null particulars_4 , null particulars_5, case when p2.POSTCODE is null then ginview.FNC_REFDETAIL(f.postcode) else p2.refdetail end refdetail , null refdetail_2 , null refdetail_3 , null refdetail_4 , null refdetail_5 from finpost f inner join finenttype e on (f.enttype = e.enttype) inner join SL_NAME s on (f.slcode = s.sl_code) inner join gl_name g on (f.glcode = g.gl_code) left outer join main.FINPOST_PARTICULARS p2 on (f.POSTCODE = p2.POSTCODE) where ((entdt::date between to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd')) or (entdt::date < to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and ycode = (select ycode from admyear where to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto))) and admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@', '')::int and ((f.release_status = 'P' and coalesce(nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@',''))::int = 0) or (coalesce(nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@',''))::int = 1))), ref_doc_details as (select distinct X.entcode entcode1,X.slcode,X.glcode,docno, docdt from (select X.entcode ,X.slcode,X.glcode from data x) X join (select ENTCODE, docno, to_char(docdt::date,'DD-MM-YYYY') docdt from data where (entcode,POSTCODE) in (select entcode,min(postcode) from data where entcode IN (select DISTINCT entcode from data x join SL_NAME SL on SL.SL_CODE=X.SLCODE join GL_NAME GL on GL.GL_CODE=X.GLCODE) GROUP BY entcode)) D on X.entcode = d.entcode) select null requestid , keyval , entcode , glcode , entname , maingl_code , source_type , entdt entrydate , entno entryno , docno refno , docdt refdate , brsdt brsdate , created_sitecode owner_sitecode , slcode , nartext , document_details , particulars , particulars_2 , particulars_3 , particulars_4 , particulars_5 , case when PARCODE is null then opening else coalesce(lag(CLOSING) over ( partition by GLCODE order by KEYVAL ), 0) end OPENING , debit , credit , closing , parcode , year_month , release_status , enttype , chqno , chqdt , drawnon , refdetail , refdetail_2 , refdetail_3 , refdetail_4 , refdetail_5 , agcode , agname from( select keyval, entcode, glcode, entname, maingl_code, source_type, entdt, entno, docno, docdt, brsdt, created_sitecode, slcode, nartext, document_details, opening, debit, credit, SUM(opening+debit-credit) over ( partition by glcode, slcode order by keyval ) closing , lag(keyval) over ( partition by glcode , slcode order by keyval ) parcode , year_month, release_status, enttype, chqno, chqdt, drawnon, agcode, agname, particulars, particulars_2, particulars_3, particulars_4, particulars_5, refdetail, refdetail_2, refdetail_3, refdetail_4, refdetail_5 from (select d.glcode::text || d.slcode::text || to_char(entdt::DATE,'yyyymmdd') || d.postcode::text || coalesce(ref_admsite_code::text, d.admsite_code_owner::text) keyval , entcode , d.glcode , d.entname , vch.GLCODE maingl_code , fgl.SRCTYPE source_type , entdt , d.scheme_docno entno , c.docno docno , c.docdt docdt , brsdt , d.admsite_code_owner created_sitecode , d.slcode, d.nartext , d.document_details, 0 opening , d.damount debit , d.camount credit , TO_CHAR(entdt, 'YYYY-MMMON') year_month , d.release_status , d.enttype , d.chqno , d.chqdt , d.drawnon , d.agcode, d.agname, d.particulars , d.particulars_2 , d.particulars_3 , d.particulars_4 , d.particulars_5, d.refdetail , d.refdetail_2 , d.refdetail_3 , d.refdetail_4 , d.refdetail_5 from data d inner join ref_doc_details c on ( d.ENTCODE = C.ENTCODE1 and d.SLCODE = C.slcode and d.glcode = c.glcode ) left outer join FINVCHMAIN vch on (d.ENTCODE = vch.VCHCODE::VARCHAR) left outer join fingl fgl on (vch.GLCODE = fgl.GLCODE) where entdt between to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('@DTTO@','yyyy-mm-dd') union all select d.glcode::text || d.slcode::text || to_char(to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyymmdd')|| 0::text keyval , null entcode , d.glcode , 'OP' entname , null maingl_code , null source_type , to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') entdt , null entno , null docno , null docdt , null brsdt , null created_sitecode , d.slcode, null nartext , null document_details, sum(opening) opening, 0 debit , 0 credit , TO_CHAR(to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'YYYY-MMMON') YEAR_MONTH, null release_status , null enttype , null chqno , null chqdt , null drawnon , null agcode, null agname, null particulars , null particulars_2 , null particulars_3 , null particulars_4 , null particulars_5, null refdetail , null refdetail_2 , null refdetail_3 , null refdetail_4 , null refdetail_5 from (select d.glcode, d.slcode, sum(damount-camount) opening, d.slname from data d where entdt < to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') and ycode = (select ycode from admyear where to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto) group by d.glcode, d.slcode, d.slname union all select d.glcode, d.slcode, sum(coalesce(opdamt,0)-coalesce(opcamt,0)) opening, s.SLNAME from finslop d inner join sl_name s on (d.slcode = s.sl_code) where admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int and ycode = (select ycode from admyear where to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') between dtfr and dtto) group by d.glcode, d.slcode, s.slname) d group by d.glcode::text || d.slcode::text || to_char(to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyymmdd') , d.glcode , to_date('@DTFR@','yyyy-mm-dd') , d.slcode))

entity.entity_name: Sub Ledger Detail Debit Credit Format
entity.object_description: Get details of Transaction to be shown as per the selected ledger and date range.
entity.sql_stmt: /* Formatted on 31-10-2022 11:54:02 (QP5 v5.294) */ with TV_DATA as /*Against Support Ticket 196198 Particulars columns set as NULL to fix the CLOB issue*/ ( select * from ( select 1 requestid, keyval, entcode, glcode, entname, maingl_code, source_type, entdt entrydate, entno entryno, docno refno, docdt refdate, brsdt brsdate, created_sitecode owner_sitecode, slcode, nartext, document_details, /*particulars,*/ --opening, case when PARCODE is null then opening else coalesce ( lag (CLOSING) over (partition by GLCODE order by KEYVAL), 0) end OPENING, debit, credit, closing, parcode, year_month, release_status, enttype, chqno, chqdt, drawnon, refdetail, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ refdetail_2, refdetail_3, refdetail_4, refdetail_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ agcode, agname, admou_code /*Bug Id 107335*/ from ( select null datasetid, keyval, entcode, glcode, entname, maingl_code, source_type, entdt, entno, docno, docdt, brsdt, created_sitecode, slcode, nartext, document_details, /*particulars,*/ opening, debit, credit, SUM (balance) over (partition by glcode, slcode order by keyval) closing, lag (keyval) over (partition by glcode, slcode order by keyval) parcode, year_month, release_status, enttype, chqno, chqdt, drawnon, refdetail, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ refdetail_2, refdetail_3, refdetail_4, refdetail_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ agcode, agname, admou_code /*Bug Id 107335*/ from ( select keyval, entcode, glcode, entname, maingl_code, source_type, entdt, entno, docno, docdt, brsdt, created_sitecode, slcode, nartext, document_details, /*particulars,*/ opening, debit, credit, (opening + debit - credit) balance, year_month, release_status, enttype, chqno, chqdt, drawnon, refdetail, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ refdetail_2, refdetail_3, refdetail_4, refdetail_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ agcode, agname, admou_code /*Bug Id 107335*/ from ( select a.glcode::text || a.slcode::text || TO_CHAR (entdt, 'yyyymmdd') || a.postcode::text || coalesce (ref_admsite_code, a.admsite_code_owner)::text keyval, entcode, a.glcode, b.entname, vch.GLCODE maingl_code, case fgl.SRCTYPE when 'C' then 'CASH' when 'B' then 'BANK' when 'R' then 'AR/AP' when 'G' then 'GENERAL' end source_type, entdt, a.scheme_docno entno, docno, docdt, brsdt, a.admsite_code_owner created_sitecode, a.slcode, a.nartext, concat_ws('','Doc No. ', coalesce (a.docno,a.scheme_docno), case when a.docno is null then null else case when a.docdt is null then null else concat(' (' , TO_CHAR ( a.docdt, 'DD/MM/RRRR') , ')') end end , CHR (10) , case when a.TDSRATE is null then null else concat('TDS Rate ' , a.TDSRATE::text , ' TDS App. Amt. ' , a.TDS_APPAMT::text , CHR (10) , 'TDS Amt. ' , ROUND ( ( a.TDSRATE * a.TDS_APPAMT) / 100, 2)::text) end) document_details, /*ginview.fnc_ledgerdetails (postcode, entcode, a.enttype, a.glcode, a.damount, a.camount) particulars,*/ 0 opening, coalesce (a.damount, 0) debit, coalesce (a.camount, 0) credit, TO_CHAR (entdt, 'YYYY-MMMON') year_month, case a.release_status when 'P' then 'Posted' when 'U' then 'Unposted' when 'R' then 'Reversed' end release_status, a.enttype, a.chqno, a.chqdt, a.drawnon, /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ /*ginview.FNC_REFDETAIL (a.postcode) refdetail,*/ case when p1.postcode is null and p2.POSTCODE is null then ginview.FNC_REFDETAIL (a.postcode) when p1.postcode is not null and p2.POSTCODE is null then ginview.FNC_REFDETAIL (a.postcode) else p2.refdetail1 end refdetail, case when p1.postcode is null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null when p1.postcode is not null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null else p2.refdetail2 end refdetail_2, case when p1.postcode is null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null when p1.postcode is not null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null else p2.refdetail3 end refdetail_3, case when p1.postcode is null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null when p1.postcode is not null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null else p2.refdetail4 end refdetail_4, case when p1.postcode is null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null when p1.postcode is not null and p2.POSTCODE is null then null else p2.refdetail5 end refdetail_5, /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ sl.agcode, ag.slname agname, a.admou_code /*Bug Id 107335*/ from finpost a inner join finenttype b on (a.enttype = b.enttype) inner join fingl gl on (a.glcode = gl.glcode) inner join finsl sl on (a.slcode = sl.slcode) left outer join finsl ag on (sl.agcode = ag.slcode) inner join admcls cl on (sl.clscode = cl.clscode) left outer join FINVCHMAIN vch on (a.ENTCODE = vch.VCHCODE::text) left outer join fingl fgl on (vch.GLCODE = fgl.GLCODE) /*Start: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ left outer join ( select distinct postcode from GINVIEW.FINPOST_PARTICULARS_STAGE where DML_TYPE <> 'D') p1 on (a.POSTCODE = p1.POSTCODE) left outer join GINVIEW.FINPOST_PARTICULARS p2 on (a.POSTCODE = p2.POSTCODE) /*End: Particulars Work Addition/Bug Id :*/ where a.entdt between TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.admou_code = TO_NUMBER ( nullif ( '@ConnOUCode@', ''), '9G999g999999999999d99') and ( ( TO_NUMBER ( '@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 0 and a.release_status = 'P') or ( TO_NUMBER ( '@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@', '9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 and a.release_status in ('P', 'U'))) and (gl.glname in ( select unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) as col1 from generate_series(1, ( select count(*) from regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+ 1) as g ) or coalesce (nullif ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text = 0::text) and (sl.slname || '|' || sl.slid in ( select entity.object_description: This data source will show top 10 selling sites.
entity.sql_stmt: WITH TV_CONSOLIDATE_SALE_SUMMARY AS (/* Formatted on 11-11-2021 16:47:43 (QP5 v5.294) */ SELECT NULL REQUESTID, row_number() over() UK, admsite_code SITECODE, /*Start Bug Id: 111266*/ SUM (coalesce(POS_settled_saleAMT,0)) POS_OFFLINE_SETTLED_AMT, SUM (coalesce(POS_unsettled_amt,0)) POS_OFFLINE_UNSETTLED_AMT, SUM (coalesce(Online_ecom_saleamt,0)) ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_AMT, SUM (coalesce(wholesale_amt,0)) WHOLESALE_AMT, SUM (coalesce(offline_settled_billcount,0)) POS_OFFLINE_SETTLED_COUNT, SUM (coalesce(POS_unsettled_billcount,0)) POS_OFFLINE_UNSETTLED_COUNT, SUM (coalesce(online_billcount,0)) ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_COUNT, SUM (coalesce(whoesale_billcount,0)) WHOESALE_COUNT /*End Bug Id : 111266*/ FROM (SELECT admsite_code, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL' THEN sum(NETAMT) end /*Bug Id*/ Online_ecom_saleamt, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'RTL' THEN sum(NETAMT) end /*Bug Id*/ POS_settled_saleAMT, COUNT (DISTINCT scheme_docno) online_billcount, 0 offline_settled_billcount, 0 POS_unsettled_amt, 0 POS_unsettled_billcount, 0 wholesale_amt, 0 whoesale_billcount FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, CASE WHEN (CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL') THEN M.CSCODE ELSE NULL END SCHEME_DOCNO, CASE WHEN (CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL') THEN SUM (TAXABLEAMT) ELSE NULL END NETAMT FROM SALCSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALCSDET D ON (M.CSCODE = D.CSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.csdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY M.admsite_code, M.CHANNELTYPE, CASE WHEN channeltype = 'ETL' THEN m.cscode ELSE NULL END UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, CASE WHEN (CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL') THEN M.SSCODE ELSE NULL END SCHEME_DOCNO, CASE WHEN (CHANNELTYPE = 'ETL') THEN SUM (TAXABLEAMT) ELSE NULL END NETAMT FROM SALSSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALSSDET D ON (M.SSCODE = D.SSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) WHere m.ssdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY M.admsite_code, M.CHANNELTYPE, CASE WHEN channeltype = 'ETL' THEN m.sscode ELSE NULL END)q1 WHERE CHANNELTYPE IS NOT NULL group by admsite_code,channeltype /*Bug Id*/ --START ADDITION UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, 0 Online_ecom_saleamt, CASE WHEN CHANNELTYPE = 'RTL' THEN sum(NETAMT) end /*Bug Id*/ POS_settled_saleAMT, 0 online_billcount, COUNT (DISTINCT scheme_docno) offline_settled_billcount, 0 POS_unsettled_amt, 0 POS_unsettled_billcount, 0 wholesale_amt, 0 whoesale_billcount FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, 'RTL' CHANNELTYPE, M.CSCODE::text SCHEME_DOCNO, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) NETAMT FROM SALCSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALCSDET D ON (M.CSCODE = D.CSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.csdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND channeltype IS NULL AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', M.SSCODE::text SCHEME_DOCNO, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) NETAMT FROM SALSSMAIN M INNER JOIN SALSSDET D ON (M.SSCODE = D.SSCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.ssdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND channeltype IS NULL AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY M.admsite_code, 'RTL'::text, m.sscode::text UNION ALL SELECT M.ADMSITE_CODE, 'RTL' CHANNELTYPE, M.CODE SCHEME_DOCNO, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) NETAMT FROM PSITE_POSBILL M INNER JOIN PSITE_POSBILLITEM D ON (M.CODE = PSITE_POSBILL_CODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (M.ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) INNER JOIN PSITE_POSSTLM STLM ON (M.ADMSITE_CODE = STLM.ADMSITE_CODE and m.billdate::date = stlm.stlmfor::date) Where coalesce (stlm.status, 'U') = 'C' AND m.billdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND s.SITE_TYPE LIKE '%MS%' AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY m.admsite_code, 'RTL'::text, m.code UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, scheme_docno, sum(taxableamt) NETAMT /*Bug Id*/ FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, m.CSCODE::text SCHEME_DOCNO, taxableamt FROM SALCSMAIN M inner join salcsdet d on (m.cscode = d.cscode) /*Bug Id*/ INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.csdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND m.channeltype = 'RTL' AND s.SITE_TYPE NOT LIKE '%MS%' AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE, CHANNELTYPE, m.SSCODE::text SCHEME_DOCNO, taxableamt FROM SALSSMAIN M inner join salssdet d on (m.sscode = d.sscode) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.ssdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ( '@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ( '@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND m.channeltype = 'RTL' AND s.SITE_TYPE NOT LIKE '%MS%' AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text))q2 group by admsite_code, CHANNELTYPE, scheme_docno)q3 group by admsite_code,CHANNELTYPE /*Bug Id*/ UNION ALL SELECT M.ADMSITE_CODE, 0 ONLINE_ECOM_SALEAMT, 0 POS_SETTLED_SALEAMT, 0 ONLINE_BILLCOUNT, 0 OFFLINE_SETTLED_BILLCOUNT, SUM (TAXABLEAMT) POS_UNSETTLED_AMT, COUNT (DISTINCT M.CODE) POS_UNSETTLED_BILLCOUNT, 0 WHOLESALE_AMT, 0 WHOESALE_BILLCOUNT FROM PSITE_POSBILL_PARK M INNER JOIN PSITE_POSBILLITEM_PARK D ON (M.CODE = PSITE_POSBILL_CODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (M.ADMSITE_CODE = SITECODE) Where m.billdate::date BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY M.admsite_code, m.code UNION ALL SELECT admsite_code, 0 Online_ecom_saleamt, 0 POS_settled_saleAMT, 0 online_billcount, 0 offline_settled_billcount, 0 POS_unsettled_amt, 0 POS_unsettled_billcount, SUM (AMT) wholesale_amt, COUNT (DISTINCT invcode) whoesale_billcount FROM ( SELECT ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, M.INVCODE, SUM (EFFAMT) AMT FROM SALINVMAIN M INNER JOIN SALINVDET D ON (M.INVCODE = D.INVCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = SITECODE) Where M.invdt BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND m.saletype = 'O' GROUP BY M.admsite_code_OWNER, m.invcode UNION ALL SELECT ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER ADMSITE_CODE, M.RTCODE INVCODE, -SUM (EFFAMT) AMT FROM SALRTMAIN M INNER JOIN SALRTDET D ON (M.RTCODE = D.RTCODE) INNER JOIN GINVIEW.LV_SITE S ON (ADMSITE_CODE_OWNER = SITECODE) Where M.rtdt BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (s.site_type IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteSiteTypeMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND m.saletype = 'O' GROUP BY M.admsite_code_OWNER, M.RTCODE)q4 GROUP BY admsite_code, invcode) data GROUP BY admsite_code) SELECT row_number() over() UK, Row_Num, requestid, sitecode, short_code, T_Amt FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY requestid ORDER BY Total_amt DESC NULLS LAST) Row_Num, requestid, sitecode, short_code, coalesce (Total_amt, 0) T_Amt FROM ( SELECT requestid, TV.sitecode, short_code, SUM ( POS_OFFLINE_SETTLED_AMT + POS_OFFLINE_UNSETTLED_AMT + ECOMMERCE_ONLINE_AMT + WHOLESALE_AMT) Total_amt FROM TV_CONSOLIDATE_SALE_SUMMARY TV inner join ginview.lv_site B on (TV.SITECODE = B.SITECODE) GROUP BY requestid, TV.sitecode, short_code ) A) q5 WHERE Row_Num <= 10

entity.object_description: Inventory Item Image wise description.
entity.sql_stmt: WITH SelectedSites AS ( SELECT code::TEXT ,replace(name, '''', '') name FROM admsite a WHERE ( ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@SiteType@', ''), '-1') = 'OS-OO-CM' AND ( ( coalesce(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT, - 1) = - 1 AND sitetype = 'OS-OO-CM' ) OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT <> - 1 AND code = nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT ) ) ) OR ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@SiteType@', ''), '-1') = 'MS-OO-CM' AND ( ( coalesce(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT, - 1) = - 1 AND nullif(COALESCE(NULLIF('@SiteType@', ''), '-1'), NULL) = 'MS-OO-CM' ) OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT <> - 1 AND code = nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT ) ) ) OR ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@SiteType@', ''), '-1') IN ( 'MS-CO-CM' ,'US-CO-CM' ) AND ( ( coalesce(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT, - 1) = - 1 AND sitetype IN ( 'MS-CO-CM' ,'US-CO-CM' ) ) OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT <> - 1 AND code = nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT ) ) ) OR ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@SiteType@', ''), '-1') = '-1' AND ( ( coalesce(nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT, - 1) = - 1 AND sitetype IN ( 'OS-OO-CM' ,'MS-OO-CM' ,'MS-CO-CM' ,'US-CO-CM' ) ) OR ( nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT <> - 1 AND code = nullif('@SiteTypeSiteName@', NULL)::INT ) ) ) ) ORDER BY a.code ) SELECT sitename ,sitecode ,row_number() OVER () UK ,MAX(CASE WHEN ry = 1 THEN image_name ELSE NULL END) IMG_NAME1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN ry = 2 THEN image_name ELSE NULL END) IMG_NAME2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN ry = 3 THEN image_name ELSE NULL END) IMG_NAME3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN ry = 4 THEN image_name ELSE NULL END) IMG_NAME4 ,MAX(CASE WHEN ry = 5 THEN image_name ELSE NULL END) IMG_NAME5 ,MAX(CASE WHEN ry = 1 THEN item_desc ELSE NULL END) IMG_DESC1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN ry = 2 THEN item_desc ELSE NULL END) IMG_DESC2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN ry = 3 THEN item_desc ELSE NULL END) IMG_DESC3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN ry = 4 THEN item_desc ELSE NULL END) IMG_DESC4 ,MAX(CASE WHEN ry = 5 THEN item_desc ELSE NULL END) IMG_DESC5 FROM ( SELECT round((b.rn - 1) / 5, 0) + 1 rx ,mod(b.rn - 1, 5) + 1 ry ,b.* FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER ( PARTITION BY sitecode ORDER BY item_desc ) rn ,REPLACE(sitename, '''', '') sitename ,sitecode ,REPLACE(image_name, '''', '') image_name ,REPLACE(item_desc, '''', '') item_desc FROM ( SELECT t1.sitename sitename ,t1.sitecode ,i.image_name ,CONCAT ( i.barcode ,CHR(10) ,'Qty : ' ,qty::TEXT ,CHR(10) , CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowPriceType@','') = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(NULLIF('@PriceType@','') , ' : ') END , CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowPriceType@','') = '1|#|Y' AND NULLIF('@PriceType@','') = 'WSP' THEN concat(i.wsp::text , CHR (10)) END , CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowPriceType@','') = '1|#|Y' AND NULLIF('@PriceType@','') = 'MRP' THEN concat(i.MRP::text , CHR (10)) END , CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowPriceType@','') = '1|#|Y' AND NULLIF('@PriceType@','') = 'Standard Rate' THEN concat(i.standard_rate::text , CHR (10)) END , CASE WHEN NULLIF('@ShowItemGroup@','') = '1|#|Y' THEN concat('Group : ' , i.division , CHR (10) , i.section , CHR (10) , i.department , CHR (10)) end , CASE WHEN COALESCE(NULLIF('@ShowDetails@',''),'N') = 'Y' THEN 'Item : ' END , CASE WHEN COALESCE(NULLIF('@ShowDetails@',''),'N') = 'Y' AND NULLIF('@IsCategory1@','') = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(i.category1 , CHR (10)) END , CASE WHEN COALESCE(NULLIF('@ShowDetails@',''),'N') = 'Y' AND NULLIF('@IsCategory2@','') = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(i.category2 , CHR (10)) END , CASE WHEN COALESCE(NULLIF('@ShowDetails@',''),'N') = 'Y' AND NULLIF('@IsCategory3@','') = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(i.category3 , CHR (10)) END , CASE WHEN COALESCE(NULLIF('@ShowDetails@',''),'N') = 'Y' AND NULLIF('@IsCategory4@','') = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(i.category4 , CHR (10)) END , CASE WHEN COALESCE(NULLIF('@ShowDetails@',''),'N') = 'Y' AND NULLIF('@IsCategory5@','') = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(i.category5 , CHR (10)) END , CASE WHEN COALESCE(NULLIF('@ShowDetails@',''),'N') = 'Y' AND NULLIF('@IsCategory6@','') = '1|#|Y' THEN concat(i.category6 , CHR (10)) end) item_desc FROM ( SELECT sitecode ,sitename ,icode ,SUM(qty) qty FROM ( SELECT k.admsite_code sitecode ,s.name sitename ,k.icode ,qty FROM invstock_onhand k INNER JOIN SelectedSites s ON (k.admsite_code = s.code::INT8) INNER JOIN invloc l ON ( k.loccode = l.loccode AND loctype <> 'T' ) WHERE ( k.loccode = NULLIF('@SiteTypeStockPoint@', '')::INT OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@SiteTypeStockPoint@', '')::INT, - 1) = - 1 ) UNION ALL SELECT k.admsite_code sitecode ,s.name sitename ,k.icode ,qty FROM invstock k INNER JOIN SelectedSites s ON (k.admsite_code = s.code::INT8) INNER JOIN invloc l ON ( k.loccode = l.loccode AND loctype <> 'T' ) WHERE k.entdt BETWEEN TO_DATE('@ASON@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CURRENT_DATE AND TO_DATE('@ASON@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') <> CURRENT_DATE AND ( k.loccode = NULLIF('@SiteTypeStockPoint@', '')::INT OR COALESCE(NULLIF('@SiteTypeStockPoint@', '')::INT, - 1) = - 1 ) ) GROUP BY sitecode ,sitename ,icode HAVING SUM(QTY) <> 0 ) t1 JOIN invitem_detail_agg i ON (t1.icode = i.code) WHERE (( i.vendor_code = NULLIF('@VendorName@','')::INT OR COALESCE (NULLIF('@VendorName@','')::INT, -1) = -1) AND ( ( NULLIF('@PriceType@','') <> '-1' AND ( ( NULLIF('@PriceType@','') = 'WSP' AND i.wsp BETWEEN COALESCE (0 , 0) AND COALESCE (null, 9999999999999)) OR ( NULLIF('@PriceType@','') = 'MRP' AND i.mrp BETWEEN COALESCE (null, 0) AND COALESCE (null, 9999999999999)) OR ( NULLIF('@PriceType@','') = 'Standard Rate' AND i.standard_rate BETWEEN COALESCE ( NULLIF('@PriceFrom@','')::NUMERIC, 0) AND COALESCE ( NULLIF('@PriceTo@','')::NUMERIC, 9999999999999)))) OR COALESCE (NULLIF('@PriceType@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.division = NULLIF('@Division@','') AND NULLIF('@Division@','') <> '-1') OR COALESCE (NULLIF('@Division@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.section = NULLIF('@Section@','') AND NULLIF('@Section@','') <> '-1') OR COALESCE (NULLIF('@Section@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( (i.department = NULLIF('@Department@','') AND NULLIF('@Department@','') <> '-1') OR COALESCE (NULLIF('@Department@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND 1 = CASE WHEN NULLIF('@SelectOperator@','') = '>' AND qty > NULLIF('@OperatorValue@','')::NUMERIC THEN 1 WHEN NULLIF('@SelectOperator@','') = '>=' AND qty >= NULLIF('@OperatorValue@','')::NUMERIC THEN 1 WHEN NULLIF('@SelectOperator@','') = '<' AND qty < NULLIF('@OperatorValue@','')::NUMERIC THEN 1 WHEN NULLIF('@SelectOperator@','') = '<=' AND qty <= NULLIF('@OperatorValue@','')::NUMERIC THEN 1 WHEN NULLIF('@SelectOperator@','') = '=' AND qty = NULLIF('@OperatorValue@','')::NUMERIC THEN 1 WHEN NULLIF('@SelectOperator@','') = '<>' AND qty <> NULLIF('@OperatorValue@','')::NUMERIC THEN 1 WHEN COALESCE (NULLIF('@SelectOperator@',''), '-1') = '-1' THEN 1 END) ORDER BY t1.sitename ,i.barcode ) a ) b ) c GROUP BY sitename ,sitecode ,rx

entity.object_description: This is report specific source dedicated to produce site wise Profitability based on sales, COGS, used defined Indirect Expenese & Indirect Incomes.Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
This is a report specific source dedicated to produce #Sub-ledger Summary# system report. Not recommended to use it for any other kind of report.
entity.sql_stmt: WITH V_YEAR AS ( SELECT ycode vycode FROM admyear WHERE TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN dtfr AND dtto ) SELECT NULL datasetid ,CONCAT_WS ('', glcode ,slcode ) keyval ,glcode ,slcode ,SUM(opening) opening ,SUM(debit) debit ,SUM(credit) credit ,SUM(opening + debit - credit) closing FROM ( SELECT a.glcode ,a.slcode ,0 opening ,SUM(coalesce(damount, 0)) debit ,SUM(coalesce(camount, 0)) credit FROM finpost a INNER JOIN finsl s ON a.slcode = s.slcode INNER JOIN fingl gl ON a.glcode = gl.glcode INNER JOIN admcls cl ON s.clscode = cl.clscode WHERE entdt BETWEEN TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('@DTTO@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int AND ((coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND cl.clsname = nullif('@AllClass@','')) OR coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') = '-1') AND ( coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) = - 1 OR ( coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) = 0 AND s.agcode IS NULL ) OR ( coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 AND coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) <> 0 AND s.agcode = nullif('@Agent@','')::INT ) ) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::INT = 0 AND release_status = 'P' ) OR ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::INT = 1 AND release_status IN ( 'P' ,'U' ) ) ) GROUP BY a.glcode ,a.slcode UNION ALL SELECT a.glcode ,a.SLCODE ,SUM(coalesce(damount, 0)) - SUM(coalesce(camount, 0)) opening ,0 debit ,0 credit FROM finpost a JOIN V_YEAR y ON (a.YCODE = y.vycode) INNER JOIN finsl s ON a.slcode = s.slcode INNER JOIN fingl gl ON a.glcode = gl.glcode INNER JOIN admcls cl ON s.clscode = cl.clscode WHERE entdt < TO_DATE('@DTFR@', 'YYYY-MM-DD') /*AND ycode = vycode*/ AND admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int AND ( ( coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND cl.clsname = nullif('@AllClass@','') ) OR coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') = '-1' ) AND ( coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) = - 1 OR ( coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) = 0 AND s.agcode IS NULL ) OR ( coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 AND coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) <> 0 AND s.agcode = nullif('@Agent@','')::INT ) ) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND ( ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::INT = 0 AND release_status = 'P' ) OR ( nullif('@FinIncludeUnpostedRecords@','')::INT = 1 AND release_status IN ( 'P' ,'U' ) ) ) GROUP BY a.glcode ,a.slcode UNION ALL SELECT a.glcode ,a.slcode ,SUM(coalesce(opdamt, 0)) - SUM(coalesce(opcamt, 0)) opening ,0 debit ,0 credit FROM finslop a JOIN V_YEAR y ON (a.YCODE = y.vycode) INNER JOIN finsl s ON a.slcode = s.slcode INNER JOIN fingl gl ON a.glcode = gl.glcode INNER JOIN admcls cl ON s.clscode = cl.clscode WHERE /*ycode = vycode AND*/ admou_code = nullif('@ConnOUCode@','')::int AND ( ( coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') <> '-1' AND cl.clsname = nullif('@AllClass@','') ) OR coalesce(nullif('@AllClass@',''), '-1') = '-1' ) AND ( coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) = - 1 OR ( coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) = 0 AND s.agcode IS NULL ) OR ( coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) <> - 1 AND coalesce(nullif('@Agent@','')::INT, - 1) <> 0 AND s.agcode = nullif('@Agent@','')::INT ) ) AND (gl.glname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#LedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#SubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) GROUP BY a.glcode ,a.slcode ) T1 GROUP BY glcode ,slcode HAVING ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 1 OR ( COALESCE(NULLIF('@FinIncludeZeroBalanceRecords@', '')::INT, 1) = 0 AND SUM(opening + debit - credit) <> 0 ) )

entity.object_description: Get all details of the Vendor Master Label as per selected report parameter. This data source to be used for specific report purpose. Source from Inventory Status Summary for Inventory Purpose
entity.sql_stmt: WITH LREC AS (select (row_number() over (order by s.SLNAME || '(' || s.slid || ')'))-1 rn, s.slcode AS code, s.SLNAME || '(' || s.slid || ')' as NAME, s.baddr AS BILLING_ADDRESS, bct.stname AS BILLING_STATE, bct.dist AS BILLING_DISTRICT, s.bctname AS BILLING_CITY, s.bpin AS BILLING_PINCODE, s.bfx2 AS BILLING_MOBILE, s.glcode AS ARAP_GLCODE, CASE WHEN s.ext = 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END EXTINCT, COALESCE(ag.slname, 'No Agent') AS AGENT_NAME from finsl s JOIN fingl gl ON s.glcode = gl.glcode JOIN admcls cls ON s.clscode = cls.clscode LEFT JOIN admcity bct ON s.bctname = bct.ctname LEFT JOIN finsl ag ON s.agcode = ag.slcode WHERE gl.srctype = 'R' and cls.clstype in ( 'S', 'T', 'J', 'A', 'O') /*CLASS_TYPE IN ('SUPPLIER' ,'TRANSPORTER' ,'JOBBER' ,'AGENT' ,'OTHERS')*/ and (coalesce (nullif('@VendorClass@', ''), '-1')::text = '-1' or cls.clsname = '@VendorClass@') and (coalesce (nullif('@City@', ''), '-1')::text = '-1' or (s.bctname = '@City@' and '@City@' <> '-1')) and (coalesce (nullif('@State@', ''), '-1')::text = '-1' or bct.stname = '@State@') and (coalesce (nullif('@Agent@', ''), '-1')::text = '-1' or COALESCE(ag.slcode, '0')::int = nullif('@Agent@', '')::int) and (coalesce (nullif('@Ledger@', '')::int, -1) = -1 or s.glcode = nullif('@Ledger@', '')::int) and (s.slname IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#ARAPSubLedgerNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text)), grouped AS ( SELECT (rn / 3) + 1 AS row_group, (rn % 3) + 1 AS pos , CODE, NAME, BILLING_ADDRESS, BILLING_STATE, BILLING_DISTRICT, BILLING_CITY, BILLING_PINCODE, BILLING_MOBILE, ARAP_GLCODE, EXTINCT, AGENT_NAME FROM LREC) SELECT NULL REQUESTID ,row_group UK ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN CODE ELSE NULL END) CODE_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN NAME ELSE NULL END) NAME_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_ADDRESS ELSE NULL END) BILLING_ADDRESS_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_STATE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_STATE_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_DISTRICT ELSE NULL END) BILLING_DISTRICT_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_CITY ELSE NULL END) BILLING_CITY_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_PINCODE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_PINCODE_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN BILLING_MOBILE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_MOBILE_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN ARAP_GLCODE ELSE NULL END) ARAP_GLCODE_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN EXTINCT ELSE NULL END) EXTINCT_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 1 THEN AGENT_NAME ELSE NULL END) AGENT_NAME_1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN CODE ELSE NULL END) CODE_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN NAME ELSE NULL END) NAME_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_ADDRESS ELSE NULL END) BILLING_ADDRESS_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_STATE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_STATE_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_DISTRICT ELSE NULL END) BILLING_DISTRICT_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_CITY ELSE NULL END) BILLING_CITY_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_PINCODE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_PINCODE_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN BILLING_MOBILE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_MOBILE_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN ARAP_GLCODE ELSE NULL END) ARAP_GLCODE_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN EXTINCT ELSE NULL END) EXTINCT_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 2 THEN AGENT_NAME ELSE NULL END) AGENT_NAME_2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN CODE ELSE NULL END) CODE_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN NAME ELSE NULL END) NAME_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_ADDRESS ELSE NULL END) BILLING_ADDRESS_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_STATE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_STATE_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_DISTRICT ELSE NULL END) BILLING_DISTRICT_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_CITY ELSE NULL END) BILLING_CITY_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_PINCODE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_PINCODE_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN BILLING_MOBILE ELSE NULL END) BILLING_MOBILE_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN ARAP_GLCODE ELSE NULL END) ARAP_GLCODE_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN EXTINCT ELSE NULL END) EXTINCT_3 ,MAX(CASE WHEN pos = 3 THEN AGENT_NAME ELSE NULL END) AGENT_NAME_3 FROM grouped group by row_group

entity.object_description: TBD
entity.sql_stmt: SELECT NULL requestid, row_number() over() UK, lotm.admsite_code, lotm.CODE lotcode, lotm.lotno, lotm.schedule_date, lotd.qty lotqty, d.assembly_icode, concat(CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowBarcode@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(coalesce (ai.barcode, ai.icode),' ') END ,CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory1@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(ai.cname1,' ') END ,CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory2@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(ai.cname2,' ') END ,CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory3@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(ai.cname3,' ') END ,CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory4@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(ai.cname4,' ') END ,CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory5@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN concat(ai.cname5,' ') END ,CASE WHEN to_number('@ShowCategory6@','9G999g999999999999d99') = 1 THEN ai.cname6 end) ASSEMBLY_ITEM_DESC, m.jrcno Job_Receipt_No, m.JRC_DATE Job_Receipt_Date, pr.prname, jobd.operation_seq, b.component_icode, ci.unitname com_unitname, b.consume_qty, --NVL(b.jobreceipt_qty, d.qty) Received_Qty, d.qty Received_Qty, coalesce(b.costrate,0) costrate, d.job_rate Job_Rate, CASE WHEN lotop.operation_seq = jobd.operation_seq THEN 1 ELSE 0 END IS_FINISHED_PROCESS, job.code jobcode, d.job_assembly_icode, job.JOBNO job_order_no, /*Bug : 107384*/ /*Feature 107046 Start*/ assb.BATCH_SERIAL_NO assm_icode_batch_serial_no, assb.MFG_DATE assm_icode_MFG_DATE, assb.EXP_DATE assm_icode_Exp_date, compb.BATCH_SERIAL_NO comp_icode_batch_serial_no, compb.MFG_DATE comp_icode_MFG_DATE, compb.EXP_DATE comp_icode_Exp_date /*End Change*/ FROM prdlotmain lotm inner join prdlotdet lotd on (lotm.code = lotd.lotcode) inner join ( SELECT lotcode, ASSEMBLY_ICODE,MAX (operation_seq) operation_seq FROM prdlotoperation GROUP BY lotcode,ASSEMBLY_ICODE) lotop on (lotd.lotcode = lotop.lotcode and lotd.ASSEMBLY_ICODE=lotop.ASSEMBLY_ICODE) inner join prdjrcdet d on (lotd.lotcode = d.lotcode AND lotd.assembly_icode = d.assembly_icode) inner join prdjobdet jobd on (d.jobdet_code = jobd.code) inner join prdjrcmain m on (d.jrccode = m.code) left outer join prdjrcbom b on (d.code = b.jrcdet_code) inner join (select code, jobno from prdjobmain) job on(jobd.JOBCODE = job.code)/*Bug : 107384*/ left outer join v_item ci on (b.component_icode = ci.icode) inner join v_item ai on (d.assembly_icode = ai.icode) inner join prdpr pr on (m.prcode = pr.prcode) inner join admsite s on (lotm.admsite_code = s.code) /*Feature 107046 Start */ left outer join invbatch_serial assb on (coalesce(d.invbatch_serial_code,999999999)=assb.code) left outer join invbatch_serial compb on (coalesce(b.invbatch_serial_code,999999999)=compb.code) /*End Change*/ WHERE lotm.admou_code = to_number('@ConnOUCode@','9G999g999999999999d99') AND (lotm.lotno IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#WPlanHeaderPlannoMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND (s.name IN ( SELECT unnest(regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '[^]+', 'g')) AS col1 FROM generate_series(1, (SELECT count(*) FROM regexp_matches('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', '', 'g'))+1) AS g ) or COALESCE (NULLIF ('@#OwnerSiteNameMulti#@', ''), '0')::text =0::text) AND lotm.schedule_date BETWEEN to_date('@DTFR@', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date('@DTTO@', 'yyyy-mm-dd')

/*COMPOSITEGST_ENTRY_SOURCE ADO ID : 91738*/ SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER () UK, ENTRY_SOURCE FROM (SELECT 'SND: TRANSFER OUT' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'SND: SALES INVOICE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'SND: TRANSFER IN' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'SND: SALES RETURN' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'SND: SALES DEBIT NOTE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'SND: SALES CREDIT NOTE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'POS: GOODS RECEIVE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'POS: GOODS RETURN' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'POS: POS BILL' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'SND: RETAIL SALE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'PROCUREMENT: PURCHASE INVOICE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'PROCUREMENT: SERVICE INVOICE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'PROCUREMENT: PURCHASE RETURN' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'PURCHASE DEBIT NOTE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'PURCHASE CREDIT NOTE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'SND: SERVICE INVOICE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'PROCUREMENT: SERVICE DEBIT NOTE' ENTRY_SOURCE UNION ALL SELECT 'CLOUD POS: POSBILL' ENTRY_SOURCE)

function.name: BarCode
function.description: To generate and printing barcode for label

function.name: QuarterNumber
function.description: Returns the fiscal quarter of a date as a number
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDate","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, Date value, or DateTime value"}]

function.name: QuarterName
function.description: Returns the fiscal quarter of a date in the typical Q1, ..., Q4 style
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDate","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, Date value, or DateTime value"}]

function.name: MonthName
function.description: Returns the name of the month. Function can take a formatted date string, a Date or DateTime value, or an integer value as input
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDateOrNumber","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, a Date or DateTime value, or an integer value"}]

function.name: WeekOfYear
function.description: Returns the ordered number of the week in the year that a date occurs on, from 1 to 53
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDate","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, Date value, or DateTime value representing the date to get the week of the year for"}]

function.name: DayOfWeekName
function.description: Returns the name of the weekday of a date
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDate","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, Date value, or DateTime value representing the date to get the day of the week for"}]

function.name: DayOfWeekNumber
function.description: Returns the ordered number of the weekday that a date occurs on, from 1 (Sunday) to 7 (Saturday)
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDate","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, Date value, or DateTime value representing the date to get the day of the week for"}]

function.name: SpanDateDiff
function.description: This will returns the difference between two dates in format "days hh:mm:ss". First argument is Start Date Second argument is End Date.

function.name: ReplaceBlankSpace
function.description: This will returns the difference between two dates in format "days hh:mm:ss". First argument is Start Date Second argument is End Date.

function.name: FormatAmount
function.description: This will convert any amount upto Thousand/Lacs/Millions/Crores/Actual as specified by user through @AmountDisplayFormat@ system parameter

function.name: Contains
function.description: Users may want to classify string values based on words or characters they contain. This custom function searches its first argument (the original values) for its second argument (the words or characters contained therein) and returns 'True' if the second argument is found. If the second argument is not found in the first, it returns 'False.'

function.name: OULogo
function.description: OULogo

function.name: LineNumberWithReset
function.description: This will show a sequential numeric value which will reset to 1 for each instance of a value specified in 'ResetInterval' For Example : Invoice Document report to show Item Line number which will be reset for each Invoice No.

function.name: PageNoWithReset
function.description: This will show the page number in report which will reset to 1 for each instance of a value specified in 'ResetInterval' For Example : Invoice Document report to show page number which will be rest for each Invoice No

function.name: AggConcat
function.description: This will creates a "bucket" that will store all of the values of a selected field, which can then be displayed in a footer section. The function accepts four arguments: The field that will be concatenated. The delimiter that should be used to separate the values. The name of the bucket, allowing for multiple concatenations within the same report. The final argument specifies whether to "clear" the bucket (for concatenating within groups), "add" values to the bucket, or "get" values from the bucket.

function.name: AmountinWords
function.description: This will show any given amount in words as per specified currency. It will take tree parameter, first one is amount which is mandatory, second parameter is Currency symbol (INR/$) and third one is currency decimal symbol (Paise/cent). If last two parameter not given then amount in word will be converted as per base currency specified in currency master.

function.name: QrCodeXzing
function.description: QR Code generation using QrCodeXzing

function.name: ExecuteQuery
LineNumber
function.description: This will show a sequential numeric value which will continue till end of the report.

function.name: LastDayofCurrentFinYear
function.description: Last Day of Current Fin Year

function.name: LoadItemImage
function.description: This will show item image. It takes three parameter , first parameter is mandatory and remaining two are optional. First parameter is image name and next two are width and height f image.If user pass wrong image name it will show NoImage .
